story:
We're deeply committed to and excited about delivering a high-quality product that we know you'll enjoy for a long time to come.

We started the Kickback Project because we volunteer with students who use digital camera-enabled devices.  The shocking truth is that just about anyone can hack into your computer and turn on the camera without you even knowing it.  The only way to guarantee your family's privacy is to cover the camera when you are not using it.  We believe that it is your space, so you should be the one to decide when your camera is being used.

Prior attempts at covering the webcam, like using tape (sticky residue left on the camera lens) and a post-it paper (falls off, easily repurposed) all fell short. Kickback offers a professional look and reliable durability.

 

 

Our Story: The Bungajungle products are inspired by travel, open roads, cities, towns, mountains, oceans, and all of nature. The ideas came while traveling around the continental United States and Hawaii. These designs are inspirations from that simple life of freedom.

 

The Design

In creating a camera shield, our first focus was to have something that looks clean and refined. The profile needed to be thin, minimal, and above all else, functional. As a result of confronting these design challenges, our product now exceeds our earlier expectations.

 

Promoting your brand with Kickback:

  • All Natural Materials
  • Sleek Minimalist Design
  • Easy Peel-and-Stick Installation (durable adhesive removes easily and cleanly with alcohol)
  • Cover glides to the side whenever webcam is used
  • Paper-Thin: 0.7mm -- So thin that any laptop will still close all the way
  • Support a Sustainable Wood Craft Startup Company: Bungajungle

 

Risks & Challenges

We had great reviews on our past campaigns, and always deliver on schedule.

Perfectly operating, and thoroughly tested production samples are already in our hands. We will be making Kickback right here in the United States. This will help us to closely monitor production quality.

We're deeply committed to and excited about delivering a high-quality product that we know you'll enjoy for a long time to come.

Original Kickback designed for smart phones

Why Kickback Original?

Regular webcam covers just don't cut it when it comes to your smartphones.  They can easily be swiped off from use with pockets and tight spaces.  

Kickback uses a unique combination of nano-suction and static cling to create the perfect smartphone webcam cover.  Durable and long lasting. 

 

Kickback can remain in open position.

 

 

Kickback works with most phones - Samsung Galaxy 9

 

Kickback Webcam Cover in Galaxy S9 rear camera

 

 

 

Kickback Webcam Cover on rear iPad Camera

 

Kickback Webcam Cover on front iPad Camera

 

Kickback Webcam Cover on iPhone rear camera with case

 

Kickback Webcam Cover with heavy duty phone case

 

iPhone SE and Kickback Webcam Cover

         

Risks and challenges

Perfectly operating, and thoroughly tested production samples are already in our hands. We will be making them right here in the United States. This will help us to make sure they are of the highest quality.

We're deeply committed to and excited about delivering a high-quality product, on time, that we know you'll enjoy for a long time to come.

story:
From concrete jungles to wilderness timberlines,

the Raptor Pro can bring the power.

The Raptor Pro fully charges in one day of sunlight to bring you power.

Anytime, anywhere.

Only have a few minutes but your phone is dying?  The quick charge technology of the Raptor Pro will give you a 20% power boost in just ten minutes, so you can get on with your day.  Leave it plugged in for 30 minutes, and get up to a 60% boost!

Quick Charge 2.0 will enable your device to be charged at the fastest possible rate, up to 75% faster than a conventional wall charger!

A new quick charger for a new world.

Join the solar revolution: change the way you power your devices.

A built in LED Light Bar provides an industry leading 350 Lumen output.  Illuminate your entire campsite, or light up the living room in a power outage for up to 8 hours.  Powered by the sun.

Two products to choose from:  the Raptor & the Raptor Pro:

Your purchase will make a difference.

Our mission is to bring portable solar power to the world. The Raptor represents our latest effort, and the closest we’ve come to realizing our dream. Cell phones and other portable electronic devices have spread across the globe, yet often people in developing countries without reliable infrastructure lack the means to power them. With the integrated LED Light Bar, the Raptor can not only provide that power, but also provide light.

 

For every 10 units sold, we’re putting 1 into a charity pool. Simply use the code in the “Thank You” email to vote on our website for where you would like us to donate the Raptors. All you need to do is choose a charity from our list, or suggest your own! At the end of our Indiegogo campaign we’re going to evenly divide the donated units between the top 10 charities you selected.

 
 

Q: Are there other ways to charge the Raptor & Raptor Pro?
A: Yes. Both units come with a micro USB input, allowing it to be charged with a wall charger or car charger as well.

Q: How long does it take to charge the Raptor & Raptor Pro?
A: In good sun conditions, it takes 9 hours to fully charge. A Qualcomm Quickcharger (car or wall adapter) can recharge the Raptor Pro in about 2.5 hours. The Raptor takes about 3 hours to charge via car or wall charger.

Q:How many devices can be charged at once?
A: Two. The Raptor Pro offers two Qualcomm 2.0 Quick Charge outputs, while the Raptor offers two standard USB ports.

Q: Can I charge my phone if it isn't Qualcomm Quick Charge compatible?
A: Yes. The Raptor Pro offers smart USB ports (AI) that communicate with any connected device to determine the fastest possible charge rate, up to 2.4 Amps.

Q: Are iPhones Quick Charge compatible?
A: No, Apple products do not accept Quick Charge but will still charge at the normal rate on either the Raptor or Raptor Pro.

Q: How is the Raptor waterproof?
A: The internal components are treated with a high performance hydrophobic coating that repels water, similar to many new smartphones today. Even if water gets inside the USB ports, operation and performance isn't affected.

story:
Novatio is the world’s first modular gaming console based on the Linux operating system called NovOS.The main feature of this console is the possibility to play all PC and Android Games!

Our console is fully customizable which means you have the possibility to change and substitute its components, adapting itself to your gaming needs, this way you will always keep up to date with the changes in the world of technology!

Novatio will be world’s first console using PC hardware which allows anybody to find them easily and let the user personalize their console as they wish.

The components  that can be changed are:

  • CPU
  • Graphic Card
  • Hard Disk
  • RAM
  • PSU

A simple way to find new components is just one of the features of a customizable console. Novatio is also projected in a smooth way that allows any user to change its internal parts quickly and easily. You will not need a specific person in order to change its composition, even a kid could do it!

Why customization modules?

Linux is open source and can easily be updated. We have decided to apply its simple concept to Project Novatio hardware. We do think that changing your devices every 5 years is not wealth healthy and a bad concept so we have created a way to keep your hardware up to date.

Changing the main components of the console is quick and easy. The internal part of the machine is sorted into modules and in order to change, for example, the graphic card, all you have to do is pushing a button.

What’s the Achilles’ heel for Linux users?

Let me point that out for you. It is its gaming side.

Don’t get us wrong. Gaming on Linux has improved significantly in recent years, thanks to the effort of companies like Steam, Feral Interactive and GOG.com. We even have Linux distributions specifically for gaming but despite all these ways to get the world of Linux closer to the world of videogames we are still missing a final solution. What if there would be one that runs Windows softwares on Linux without the usage of emulators or programs like “Wine”?

If Novatio does not use emulators or external programs, how can it run Windows softwares?

Novatio will have NovOs as operating system, a customized Debian derivate, along with our mainboard it can execute Windows software.

Our mainboard uses a FPGA chip that will have the revolutionary feature of executing software “.exe” on NovOS. In the souce code of our OS there are the codes to interface the chip with any .exe program downloaded on the console allowing its execution, this feature will make NovOS compatible with all kind of Windows programs opening new ways into a new future for Linux.
Thanks to this extraordinary method it will be possible to play the whole Steam, Origin and Uplay libraries!
In future we are looking forward to the creation of a PCI board that allows to use NovOS outside Novatio and to use its incredible features!

Is your project just an idea?

No, we have already started working on the different aspects of this project. At the moment everything is working correctly, except some little bug the code of NovOS looks stable.

Is Novatio a Steam Machine?

Our console is not a Steam Machine. The issue with them is that they were limited to the small library of games offered on Linux. The lack of games and them being overpriced made the concept fail on the large scale.

Novatio is the future. It will become what the Steam Machine failed to be.

We are a group of PC gamers. An italian project formed by passionates, programmers and students that want to bring innovation into the world of consoles.

Summary of Novatio’s features:

  • Modular console
  • High-end PC configuration
  • Custom Linux OS: NovOS
  • Can run all Steam,Origin and Uplay games including Windows ones
  • Compatibility with Android Games
  • Can also use an Android smartphone as controller

Configurations of Novatio

There will be two versions of Novatio with different standard hardware specs. Novatio will be cheaper and slightly smaller, Novatio Pro will more pricy and bigger but both versions will remain high in the performances.

What will the funds be used for?

  • Renting a studio
  • Paying engineers and programmers
  • Build the prototype of the case
  • Realization of the final prototype of the console
  • Presentation at the main videogames conferences

Why should you support this project?

With a little contribute you will be able to give a hand in order to change an industry. We have a big project that aims to put a dent in the universe.

What would be the impact of this project in the world of videogames in case of a success?

Our goal is to change the world of gaming on Linux forever with this console. By doing so, it would be a big step for the free-open source operating systems because an user wouldn’t have to choose anymore between “Having many games on Windows” or “Having an open source system”. If the crossing happens, it will be a huge step for everybody.

Other ways you can help our project!

If you can’t help our project directly by giving a little contribution, there is no issue in it. You can help us by sharing this page with your friends and people that might be interested in our project.

Follow :
www.project-novatio.com

story:
A FREE global website for anybody and everybody on this globe to be inspired on a daily basis!

How often have you looked for advice, or just needed some positive re-assurance to continue believing in yourself? Most of the time, when you do find something, it either costs a lot of money, or it's unrealistic and not applicable to you.

Here is my solution. A website that is updated daily with short Quick Tip videos on various topics, plus interviews with inspirational people world-wide - from goal setting to coping with family feuds to seeking a meaning to life. A site where this information is shared openly and freely in english and through practical tips that apply to us all. A site that is non discriminatory to any religion, creed, sex or race and that also promotes love and peace between all people everywhere.

The emphasis WILL ALWAYS be on PRACTICAL, SUSTAINABLE TIPS that we as human beings can apply in our lives.

How did the idea originate?

For years I have been inspiring corporate clients throughout the world as a Change Management Inspirational Speaker. I initially started in the entertainment industry as a magician. i worked on cruise ships, in leading theatres and for big corporates, and became well known on television in South Africa. I started my career in the UK and since then have worked in over 100 countries globally. If anything, it has been a dream come true. 

My parents always taught me to think differently and to follow my heart and passion in life. The majority of people I meet cannot believe that I have achieved and experienced so much from being an entertainer & speaker. For me it was never about money, but following my passion and enjoying life – that has always been my definition of wealth. I always figured, if there are going to be tough times ahead, why experience this in a job I hate? I would rather experience tough times doing something I love, at least then my life has meaning!

As someone that focused on the info-tainment in the corporate market, many senior executives spoke to me about my life and experiences and suggested I become a motivational speaker. This never appealed to me at all as many 'speakers' I had seen were full of hype. Basically he/she stirred up an audience and the high never lasted more than a few days - so I never had much time for the industry.

Eventually a friend twisted my arm and suggested I speak from my own experience, as he believed my story was an inspiration to him. I was searching for something 'more' hence I started speaking about 14 years ago... but my way. For me it was all about being sincere, authentic and actually walking my talk. It was tough! Ra ra was the flavour of the day, and no one wanted to hear my story. Then everything changed with the first recession – suddenly companies wanted sustainable life skills and a measurable return on investment. They were now looking for 'real-life' practical skills that the majority of staff could implement immediately. They began looking for authenticity and people that actually offered value!

For the last few years I have been working mainly throughout Africa as I felt this was where inspiration and hope was needed most. I also reached a point where I wanted to touch more lives, not just employees of big companies. In 2006 one of the solutions I came up with, was to offer a FREE 'Useletter' (because you use it) to all delegates that saw me speak. I asked them to pass this information on to friends so that the 'general public' could also benefit from my inspirational messages. In 2009 I launched a You Tube channel called 'inspiringtheworld' where I began sharing short Quick Tip videos every month. As the popularity of my Useletter and the channel grew, I began uploading videos on a weekly basis.

Couple this with hundreds of public appearances, I quickly built up a name and in 2010 was elected chairman of the Professional Speakers Association for Southern Africa. During these 2 years I continued on my global travels again, and met some incredible speakers around the world. People that touched my heart and who I so wished the rest of the world could see. And that's when the seed was planted for positivpeople.com.

Although the corporate market is the bread and butter market in the speaking indusrty, my priorities and focus has shifted to wanting to do more! To making the world a better place for all. I am tired of corporate politics, egos, hidden agenda's, political corruption and greed. Although I am living my passion, my frustration is that the majority of people benefitting from my messages are still only the employees of companies who can afford to book a good inspirational speaker! This doesn't sit well with me anymore. What about the rest of the world that need hope and inspiration 'out there'? The people who are the foundation of society! But sadly they are the ones with limited exposure to authentic inspiration - and when they do find something, they are 'milked' for every cent. Hence my desire to inspire for completely free via the Internet.

The reality of life is that we all need to pay a mortgage, taxes, school fees and eat! Yes I am following my calling by speaking and am loving what I do. But in my heart I feel I can do so much more! So far I have done all my free stuff at my own cost and it has been incredibly rewarding. In fact I would love to do this on a daily basis and not just make the site about my message, but include all the incredible people I have met around the world to become part of this venture too. And I am sure you know many amazing people too!

I believe in walking the talk and practicing what I preach. Don't believe what I say – check me out for yourself. See my client endorsements over the last 10 years here. Look at the over 100 inspirational videos I have uploaded on the You Tube inspiringtheworld channel here.

Whetehr you contribute to my campaign or not, I care, so feel free to subscribe free of charge to my monthly 'Useletter' here. If the link doesn't work - visit www.wolfgangriebe.com and sign up there.

I want to put my money where my mouth is and I want to make this world a better place for all.

Why do we need the £150 000?

This is actually the bare minimum to get everything off the ground, but a great start to get us going and enable us to begin changing lives daily. As we establish ourselves, we can offer a larger variety of speakers and message mediums.

Initially I would focus on uploading a new video everyday, including extra inspirational items such as quotations and anecdotes as we receive them. The goal will be to eventually travel around the globe and interview awesome people in every country and built a site that contains video interviews and messages from the world's most inspirational people – free to access for anyone!

This will be your channel and everything will be done to inspire YOU! Hence we will source people from all over the world who are prepared to contribute. From free E-books to Video courses. Anything and everything to help you be more positive and find meaning in life. However, we will also be most conscious of high moral standards and focus on 'authentic' speakers and messages. This means that I won't just focus on industry speakers and gurus, but the normal person out there that does incredible things in their community too!

Currently I am looking at setting up either outside London or near Frankfurt in Germany. Simply because these are central hubs and offer economic easy access across Europe and the rest of the world. I figure it's the best central location to travel anywhere in the world. Initially I will focus on local people and factor in extra time in my current travel schedule so as to save costs and focus on building up the site as well as brand awareness.

Currently I am hiring the equipment and studio to do the few shoots I have done. By purchasing our own camera's, lights and tripods we will save costs these costs. It will also give us control over when to shoot and enable more versatility in terms of time and place. We also need a decent edit suite and an editor to finish off the videos. For local interviews we need to rent studio/office space. It is important for me that the videos are professional, clear and well edited. The idea is to try get some of the information aired on public television as well - hence we need good broadcast quality footage.

We also want to purchase a standard portable banner style backdrop. This will be a curved expanda frame backdrop for travelling. I would like to take a cameraman to various countries with me where we can interview other awesome people and share their messages with the world. This all costs money!

We need to secure the services of an IT marketer who can run the whole Internet side and create awareness. Currently I put together the website with my limited knowledge. We need a full time high tech IT person to do the SEO, uploading, updating and keep the website looking funky and appealing.

We need assistance with research on topics and making the message simple and clear for all to understand. This person also need to liase with potential guests and run the office.

That's just the beginning - if it grows as I expect it will - we will need more staff. Yes, we will be using volunteers and there will be many people donating their skill and time, but the permananet staff also need to eat and pay bills. Remember, charity starts at home. The reality is that to offer a free product 'out there' we need to cover costs on the inside. I figure that if we are touching hundreds of thousands of lives, and those who can afford it, just donate 10 Pounds a year (that's a beer and a burger) for an entire year's worth of positive life changing info - we can do it easily!

As the funds come in, one future goal will be to host public events throughout the world, also for free, where we record and also share these messages on the site.

Is this idea sustainable and viable?

Just look at the negativity, hatred and fighting going on daily! The mainstream media only cares about sensationalism and bad news to sell their newspapers, magazines and airtime. It's time someone said, enough is enough and focuses on the positive. I have a challenged the media for years to focus on positive news rather then negative news. They would rather report that 12 people were killed in an accident than use a headline saying that the ambulance arrived in under 5 minutes and saved 4 lives. The believe sensationalism sells.

I believe that not all of us are that stupid to believe this lie. I believe there are millions of people out there that are tired of the conditioning, and constant negativity that gets rammed down our throats daily. It takes one person to stand up and say, "Enough is enough." I'm doing that now! But I can only do it with YOUR help!

Let's change lives and make everyone everywhere more positive. Let's give this world hope again. Let's give YOU some heroes to look up to again and some mentors that can guide you to achieve your dreams.

Yes my site is small at the moment – I am already touching around 25 000 lives per month – imagine we could take that to 20 million, and on a daily basis. It all starts with taking the first step. My passion, my dedication is there, with your help we can make this happen.

My PROMISE to you – this site will ALWAYS be FREE and ALWAYS about sharing a POSITIVE MESSAGE to the people of this world.

Here is my solution. A website that is updated daily with short Quick Tip videos on various topics, plus interviews with inspirational people world-wide - from goal setting to coping with family feuds to seeking a meaning to life. A site where this information is shared openly and freely in english and through practical tips that apply to us all. A site that is non discriminatory to any religion, creed, sex or race and that also promotes love and peace between all people everywhere.
The emphasis WILL ALWAYS be on PRACTICAL, SUSTAINABLE TIPS that we as human beings can apply in our lives.
How did the idea originate?
For years I have been inspiring corporate clients throughout the world as a Change Management Inspirational Speaker. I initially started in the entertainment industry as a magician. i worked on cruise ships, in leading theatres and for big corporates, and became well known on television in South Africa. I started my career in the UK and since then have worked in over 100 countries globally. If anything, it has been a dream come true. 
My parents always taught me to think differently and to follow my heart and passion in life. The majority of people I meet cannot believe that I have achieved and experienced so much from being an entertainer & speaker. For me it was never about money, but following my passion and enjoying life – that has always been my definition of wealth. I always figured, if there are going to be tough times ahead, why experience this in a job I hate? I would rather experience tough times doing something I love, at least then my life has meaning!
As someone that focused on the info-tainment in the corporate market, many senior executives spoke to me about my life and experiences and suggested I become a motivational speaker. This never appealed to me at all as many 'speakers' I had seen were full of hype. Basically he/she stirred up an audience and the high never lasted more than a few days - so I never had much time for the industry.
Eventually a friend twisted my arm and suggested I speak from my own experience, as he believed my story was an inspiration to him. I was searching for something 'more' hence I started speaking about 14 years ago... but my way. For me it was all about being sincere, authentic and actually walking my talk. It was tough! Ra ra was the flavour of the day, and no one wanted to hear my story. Then everything changed with the first recession – suddenly companies wanted sustainable life skills and a measurable return on investment. They were now looking for 'real-life' practical skills that the majority of staff could implement immediately. They began looking for authenticity and people that actually offered value!
For the last few years I have been working mainly throughout Africa as I felt this was where inspiration and hope was needed most. I also reached a point where I wanted to touch more lives, not just employees of big companies. In 2006 one of the solutions I came up with, was to offer a FREE 'Useletter' (because you use it) to all delegates that saw me speak. I asked them to pass this information on to friends so that the 'general public' could also benefit from my inspirational messages. In 2009 I launched a You Tube channel called 'inspiringtheworld' where I began sharing short Quick Tip videos every month. As the popularity of my Useletter and the channel grew, I began uploading videos on a weekly basis.
Couple this with hundreds of public appearances, I quickly built up a name and in 2010 was elected chairman of the Professional Speakers Association for Southern Africa. During these 2 years I continued on my global travels again, and met some incredible speakers around the world. People that touched my heart and who I so wished the rest of the world could see. And that's when the seed was planted for positivpeople.com.
Although the corporate market is the bread and butter market in the speaking indusrty, my priorities and focus has shifted to wanting to do more! To making the world a better place for all. I am tired of corporate politics, egos, hidden agenda's, political corruption and greed. Although I am living my passion, my frustration is that the majority of people benefitting from my messages are still only the employees of companies who can afford to book a good inspirational speaker! This doesn't sit well with me anymore. What about the rest of the world that need hope and inspiration 'out there'? The people who are the foundation of society! But sadly they are the ones with limited exposure to authentic inspiration - and when they do find something, they are 'milked' for every cent. Hence my desire to inspire for completely free via the Internet.
The reality of life is that we all need to pay a mortgage, taxes, school fees and eat! Yes I am following my calling by speaking and am loving what I do. But in my heart I feel I can do so much more! So far I have done all my free stuff at my own cost and it has been incredibly rewarding. In fact I would love to do this on a daily basis and not just make the site about my message, but include all the incredible people I have met around the world to become part of this venture too. And I am sure you know many amazing people too!
I believe in walking the talk and practicing what I preach. Don't believe what I say – check me out for yourself. See my client endorsements over the last 10 years here. Look at the over 100 inspirational videos I have uploaded on the You Tube inspiringtheworld channel here.
Whetehr you contribute to my campaign or not, I care, so feel free to subscribe free of charge to my monthly 'Useletter' here. If the link doesn't work - visit www.wolfgangriebe.com and sign up there.
I want to put my money where my mouth is and I want to make this world a better place for all.
Why do we need the £150 000?
This is actually the bare minimum to get everything off the ground, but a great start to get us going and enable us to begin changing lives daily. As we establish ourselves, we can offer a larger variety of speakers and message mediums.
Initially I would focus on uploading a new video everyday, including extra inspirational items such as quotations and anecdotes as we receive them. The goal will be to eventually travel around the globe and interview awesome people in every country and built a site that contains video interviews and messages from the world's most inspirational people – free to access for anyone!
This will be your channel and everything will be done to inspire YOU! Hence we will source people from all over the world who are prepared to contribute. From free E-books to Video courses. Anything and everything to help you be more positive and find meaning in life. However, we will also be most conscious of high moral standards and focus on 'authentic' speakers and messages. This means that I won't just focus on industry speakers and gurus, but the normal person out there that does incredible things in their community too!
Currently I am looking at setting up either outside London or near Frankfurt in Germany. Simply because these are central hubs and offer economic easy access across Europe and the rest of the world. I figure it's the best central location to travel anywhere in the world. Initially I will focus on local people and factor in extra time in my current travel schedule so as to save costs and focus on building up the site as well as brand awareness.
Currently I am hiring the equipment and studio to do the few shoots I have done. By purchasing our own camera's, lights and tripods we will save costs these costs. It will also give us control over when to shoot and enable more versatility in terms of time and place. We also need a decent edit suite and an editor to finish off the videos. For local interviews we need to rent studio/office space. It is important for me that the videos are professional, clear and well edited. The idea is to try get some of the information aired on public television as well - hence we need good broadcast quality footage.
We also want to purchase a standard portable banner style backdrop. This will be a curved expanda frame backdrop for travelling. I would like to take a cameraman to various countries with me where we can interview other awesome people and share their messages with the world. This all costs money!
We need to secure the services of an IT marketer who can run the whole Internet side and create awareness. Currently I put together the website with my limited knowledge. We need a full time high tech IT person to do the SEO, uploading, updating and keep the website looking funky and appealing.
We need assistance with research on topics and making the message simple and clear for all to understand. This person also need to liase with potential guests and run the office.
That's just the beginning - if it grows as I expect it will - we will need more staff. Yes, we will be using volunteers and there will be many people donating their skill and time, but the permananet staff also need to eat and pay bills. Remember, charity starts at home. The reality is that to offer a free product 'out there' we need to cover costs on the inside. I figure that if we are touching hundreds of thousands of lives, and those who can afford it, just donate 10 Pounds a year (that's a beer and a burger) for an entire year's worth of positive life changing info - we can do it easily!
As the funds come in, one future goal will be to host public events throughout the world, also for free, where we record and also share these messages on the site.
Is this idea sustainable and viable?
Just look at the negativity, hatred and fighting going on daily! The mainstream media only cares about sensationalism and bad news to sell their newspapers, magazines and airtime. It's time someone said, enough is enough and focuses on the positive. I have a challenged the media for years to focus on positive news rather then negative news. They would rather report that 12 people were killed in an accident than use a headline saying that the ambulance arrived in under 5 minutes and saved 4 lives. The believe sensationalism sells.
I believe that not all of us are that stupid to believe this lie. I believe there are millions of people out there that are tired of the conditioning, and constant negativity that gets rammed down our throats daily. It takes one person to stand up and say, "Enough is enough." I'm doing that now! But I can only do it with YOUR help!
Let's change lives and make everyone everywhere more positive. Let's give this world hope again. Let's give YOU some heroes to look up to again and some mentors that can guide you to achieve your dreams.
Yes my site is small at the moment – I am already touching around 25 000 lives per month – imagine we could take that to 20 million, and on a daily basis. It all starts with taking the first step. My passion, my dedication is there, with your help we can make this happen.
My PROMISE to you – this site will ALWAYS be FREE and ALWAYS about sharing a POSITIVE MESSAGE to the people of this world.

story:
Hey Indiegogo, and welcome to our project. We are Envy Gaming, where we make serious custom computers for the true hardcore nerds among us! I know what some of you might be thinking that you can go on a lot of websites now a days and have them build a custom machine for you. But here at Envy Gaming we want to take this concept to the next level! No more picking through pre-sorted parts, and especially no more pre-made cases!!!

     When we say custom built for each individual user we mean it. Take for example this amazing computer built into a desk:

http://www.l3p.nl/l3p-d3sk/other-desk-builds/

(Note these are not our projects in any way, just a concept of what we will be working towards.) 

     These great modders are actually where our company idea originally came from. Why not set up a website where we can work with the users to have custom built rigs like the ones above built just for them. EVERYTHING fully custom and unique in every way! That is our main goal at Envy!! No more of hundreds even thousands of user having the same old boring cases and rigs, just the user and what they want and what works for them.

     In essence this is the project we are trying to fund, and I know some of you may have questions about why this project isn't set to launch for a long while. Well to answer that is two fold. One a longer time gives us more time for the word to get out, and more backers to come in. And two for a more personal reason I am currently active duty military but next year I will be heading back home to finish up college and do whatever life throws my way. So by then I can have the full team assembled, all the parts and machinery that we need bought and ready to go. And we can start working on users new rigs as soon as possible. Active duty does not allow enough free time for a project like this, but if our idea takes off and you guys want more and bigger and better rigs, we can make a full time business out of this and spend more time on keeping our customers happy. 

     So why $50,000? The main answer to that is because this is going to be a fresh starting company, so we will need to not only buy materials to build these awesome new rigs, but we will need to buy all of the machining tools that are required to take on a job such as this, and if all goes well maybe even our own separate area to set aside just for the business! Also we will need to buy all the proper license and other permits so we can really make this a full on business for you guys. We will also even be building a fully functional website which will be a sort of starting area for users to start the process of making their own rigs, before they have a design meeting via the web with one of our workers. And obviously we can go over funding and that would be great. The more people contribute, the better we can make our business. Better tools, better builds you name it.

     Unfortunately I am terrible at both video recording, and image editing software such as photoshop so I don’t have much in the way of those to show you guys yet. But if this idea starts to take off and gets backers I will work my hardest to work with whomever I can find to get you guys more details, images, and videos and the project progresses, I will be going back home this July for some vacation and plan to then form our team, and work on some images and videos for you guys as well. Thanks you guys we hope to be building you a new custom rig soon!

     Also one final note I would like to add. Even if we reach our goal, backers who donate after the goal is reach will still receive the proper rewards for their donations. The more backing we have the bigger, better, and longer we can keep this going and alive for all you guys!! 

Risks and challenges

- The main challenges we will face as a company is making sure we have all the right equipment to fill the needs of our users. We will be making high end steel or other metal type cases so they will be built to last, but also will require good equipment as well.

- If the company does take of we run the risk of be backlogged with orders, which I don't think is a bad thing, but we will make sure that each customer has a set time frame of what to expect, and will be updated as often as possible to the statues of the various projects.

- As far as risk kickstarter does a good job of limiting those as much as possible, so I dont think we have much to worry about there.

story:
In the course of 2016 thingCHARGER had a series of financial challenges and as a result ceased operations in Q4 2016.

In the final week of 2016 founder Seymour Segnit wrote to all supporters and invited them to watch the video above, which explains in detail what happened.

He also invited everyone to complete a survey – asking whether they should take the lessons of thingCHARGER and start over – or not.

The results are published below.

In summary a large majority of backers – 84.5% – voted to start over with a new company, using all the lessons of the past 3 years to make a second attempt at creating a great charging company.

As a result Amy & Seymour have formed a new company and are working on a new project.

 

Backer Survey Results

Q&A

 

How many thingCHARGERs did you ship?
Over 1/4 million chargers to over 70,000 individuals.

 

But you didn't ship me?
thingCHARGER's Indiegogo campaign was one of the largest ever at the time, and went on to many times the size after Indiegogo. Most folks were shipped, but when a project/company of that size fails the number of unshipped folks was considerable. By far the majority were shipped, or refunded... Most everyone who wasn't shipped or refunded was invited to collect their perks but did not respond to the invitation before the company failed.

 

Can I get a refund?
Sorry. Previously yes, but not any more. thingCHARGER Inc ultimately failed and closed because it ran out of money. In good measure that was because of trying to do the right thing and offer refunds to backers who became impatient waiting for the product to ship. Over $1million was sent in refunds in this way and each refund wiped out the benefit of 4 or 5 other supporters. (That last part is important. Around 1 in 10 folks insisted on a refund, wiping out the benefit to thingCHARGER of 4 or 5 out of 10. Around half of all support was spoilt like this).

 

What about putting my $ towards the new product?
thingCHARGER Inc closed down and with it so did its obligations. The new company is completely separate so cannot assume thingCHARGERs debts and obligations.

 

However
Generous discounts, in most cases of greater $ value than old thingCHARGER contributions have been offered to all backers of the new project. Please check your email for 'Seymour' if you haven't seen any of the dozens of emails sent to backers since November 2016.

story:
What Is KeeBuddy

KeeBuddy is the most portable cable ever that works to charge and sync both your iPhone and Android on the move. 

One of the major complaints we have on smartphone is that the battery doesn't last as long due to capacity and volume limitations, It could be a lot disappointing while you're playing Angry Birds, playing high-definition tracks, or watching YouTube and your battery gets drained before you know it.

KeeBuddy is the solution that makes perfect sense.



True Mobility

A brilliant replacement to stock long USB cables, it fits neatly onto your wallet,key chain or handbag to juice up your smartphone in a pinch from any USB power source: power banks,Mac Pro, Laptop PC,projectors, cars, speakers,TVs and more than 16 billions USB-ported devices from all over the world!


The size of a small key tag, it's right there when you need it, and out of your way when you don't.

Beyond that,you can use it not just as a short mini charger when you stand by the counter or laptop PC, but much like a regular Apple lightning cable or micro USB cable so you can still use your device while it's charging, i.e. through a wall outlet or car charger.


Say goodbye to the bunched-up cables in your briefcase, drawers or battery pouch.


Support For iPhone AND Android

With a host of mobile devices in place,you would probably shell out for a lightning cable to work with your iPhone 5s, aside from buying a USB cable when you switch to an Android,or vice versa. 

So why buy more for less?

KeeBuddy is a smart recharger that can do it all, with a combination of lightning and micro USB connector compatible with iPhone 5s/5/5c, Samsung Galaxy S5/S4, HTC One Max,LG G Flex,Blackberry,and Windows phones.

Further, it allows charging for your iPad Air, iPad mini or Android tablets with support of 3.1 Amp charging current.



The Freedom Of Charging

With a clever retractable cable design,KeeBuddy makes it much easier to transport neatly and to charge without messy cords getting tangled up,

When your iPhone needs a charge, all you have to do is take KeeBuddy off your key chain,unwind the cord,and plug the connector into USB port on Laptop PC, MacBook Pro, and charger blocks alike. 


When you're done, simply touch the button on the housing and it winds up easily so that there are no tangled cords to deal with.

If you're not next to the desk,you can still use KeeBuddy to deliver power, for example, while watching TV in living room or driving on the road. The cord actually extends out from the cavity, which could make it easy to place the plug into your device's port from a desired length.


Perfect companion to your iPhone whether you're in office,at home or on the move!


Our Retractable Cable Doesn't Suck

While retractable cables on the market typically offer the convenience for charging, most of them are flimsy due to the thin cords, and a lot bulky when made to 3 feet or longer. KeeBuddy is of much heavier duty construction with a flat thicker cord that withstands more potential strain placed, and offers an optimal reach of 50cm when fully extended without increasing the bulk.


As opposed to regular retractable cables which unwind and rewind in reverse, KeeBuddy employs a clever unidirectional opening design to allow for a compact form factor,and help prevent tangles of the cords inside the reel when extended in haste, which is encountered quite often otherwise.

This could be way frustrating when you're on a spree with your iPhone and the battery is dying, let's say,Sunday Night Football games or FIFA World Cup final. What's worse, you run a high risk breaking the cable even your iPhone,as the frustration grows when you've been fumbling for hours to de-clutter the tangle.


Reversible USB Connector

Comparable to Apple's lighting connector,yet with more utility,KeeBuddy comes with a patent double side USB (reversible USB) connector on the USB end that allows you to use it in each direction:

Connect KeeBuddy to your iPhone or Android and plug the USB end with the front side facing up into Mac or PC, and your smartphone starts charging and syncing through the USB 2.0 interface.


Plug in the USB end upside down, and it functions as a flash memory disk so that you can always have a thumb drive on you and never again fumble looking for the drive in your bag,pockets or leaving it behind somewhere.


Never Run Out Of Memory

Flash drives are commonly used in everyday life. There are many folks who seem to always forget their drives on the desk,leave them plugged in, or even drop them in the washing machine. 

With a waterproof thumb drive embedded, KeeBuddy can be used as a USB key to store,upload or download video clips, selfie photos, high-resolution tracks and files to your device anytime,anywhere. The transfer speed is faster than any Cloud storage and you don't need to pay for recurring online Cloud storage subscription.


A true lifesaver during outages of Internet (and thus the Cloud), or if you simply want to retain something that's 100% under your control (beware, your data stored on cloud servers could be accessed or hacked by the likes of malwares or phishing emails). With KeeBuddy,you're the only person that has access to your data.


The Most Comprehensive Protection Ever

Compact, light weight, and pleasant looking, KeeBuddy fits perfectly onto your key chain without being too bulky and obtrusive.

It features invisible cable design so that you can hardly notice it's a charge cable until the cord extends out. When not in use, both the connectors,cords and thumb drive are well protected from dirt and splash inside the solid housing that's made from quality Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene copolymers. In most cases, less exposure helps prevent accidental breakage. 


With a rubberized finish, it offers a secure and comfortable grip on your hand. Embedded into the ABS housing are two brushed metal cases that deliver a solid feel and resit against slippage and scratches from your house keys and finger nails.


How Does KeeBuddy Compare

  1. Taking 32GB version for instance.
  2.  Lightning version and Android version combined.
  3. Pricing quotes from BestBuy.


For those folks without Apple's latest iDevices, we made a Micro USB version-only KeeBuddy, which works with all Android phones,Blackberry,Windows phones and tablets with Micro USB port.


When Will My KeeBuddy Ship

We know well from our combined experience in product development that it takes a lot of preps and upkeep to bring new gadgets from concept to fruition. That's why we've planned ahead every possible factors, from design to manufacturing, so that your KeeBuddy can ship as soon as possible. 

Our intention is to deliver you your KeeBuddy by November, to that end,here is the campaign timeline we're following along the journey.

   Oct.2013: Ideation,Research,Project planning.

   Nov.2013: Product strategies,Sketching,Initial structure planning.

   Dec.2013: External and ergonomics analysis,3D rendering,Verification.

    Jan.2014: Rapid prototyping, Refining, Campaign preparation.

    Feb.2014: Engineering design.

    Apr.2014: Functioning prototype, Testing, Photo shot, 

   May.2014: Website design, Video clip, Campaign completion.

    Jun.2014: Indiegogo launch.

   Aug.2014: Evaluation, Tooling, licensing.

Sept. 2014: T1 off-tooled samples.Mold modification.

   Oct.2014: Full production runs.

  Nov.2014: Packing and shipping.


The Minds Behind

KeeBuddy is developed by a team of gadget enthusiasts that each has a passion to mobilize our digital life through creative design and integration. We built KeeBuddy because we really want to use it ourselves, and we consider it our mission to bring this innovation to the world.

    

Co-founders of KeeBuddy are Nick Leung, a product designer who over his decades of career made a multitude of elegant products for world-class companies like Adidas, Lenovo and Polaroid, Wyndell Wong, project manager with years of experience in product development, international business for consumer electronics and logistics handling, and Christian Fenes, hardware engineer who led the engineering and manufacturing of more than a dozen electronic products in previous companies. This would be our first try at building an affordable quality gadget through crowdfunding. 


Use of Funds

We know you will love to have the genius gizmo in your digital life,and we would love it even more to bring the idea to life. We're very proud of the work we've done so far, but we need one more push to get it in production and make KeeBuddy your key buddy worldwide.

While working tight to keep the expenses as low as possible, we found there're still significant costs that's unavoidable to take the next steps. The funding we raise with your help, will be used for the main points like High precision injection molding,Die casting,CE & FCC certification,Mass production, Packaging,QA and so much more.


FAQ

What if I change phones?
The majority of mobile phones on the market for now and in the future are with Micro USB or Apple's 8pin port, so KeeBuddy works with virtually any phones you may upgrade to in the future. However, note that, it doesn't work with legacy iPhones with 30pin port,or those earlier phones with Mini USB even DC2.0 ports.

Does it work with iOS 8.0?

Absolutely! KeeBuddy is designed to be a key buddy for your everyday life, and we're employing apple-certified lightning connector to make sure it works with iOS 6.0,iOS7.0,iOS 8.0 and later on any lightning-ported iPhones,iPads and iPods.

Will it charge my iPad mini?

Yup, KeeBuddy charges both your smartphone,and iPad or tablets that requre higher charging current like 2.1 Amp,3.1 Amp. 

What if I forget to add shipping?

For those who make the contribution without shipping,we've created a new perk. Please contribute the shipping amount and select no perk and we will match your contribution up.

I don't have an iPhone. Will it work on my phone?

No worries,KeeBuddy works with both iPhone and any smartphone with Micro USB port, Samsung, HTC,Blackberry, LG,Nokia,Sony,Motorola, to name a few. If you don't have an iPhone and have no plan to have it in future, you can also contribute to the Android (Micro USB) only version.

Can I transfer data as well?

Definitely KeeBuddy doesn't just work to deliver power, but also enables data transfer.


If you like KeeBuddy, please back us and tell your family and friends so we can make it a reality altogether.

Here are some tips to help spread out the word.

1. Click on the "Link" icon underneath the video clip on top of this page and share around the web.

2. Share KeeBuddy with your friends on Facebook,Twitter and Google+.

3. Email your friends or post the link to Pinterest, Instagram,Reddit,other forums and blogs. 

Be creative!
story_txt:
What Is KeeBuddy

KeeBuddy is the most portable cable ever that works to charge and sync both your iPhone and Android on the move. 
One of the major complaints we have on smartphone is that the battery doesn't last as long due to capacity and volume limitations, It could be a lot disappointing while you're playing Angry Birds, playing high-definition tracks, or watching YouTube and your battery gets drained before you know it.
KeeBuddy is the solution that makes perfect sense.








True Mobility

A brilliant replacement to stock long USB cables, it fits neatly onto your wallet,key chain or handbag to juice up your smartphone in a pinch from any USB power source: power banks,Mac Pro, Laptop PC,projectors, cars, speakers,TVs and more than 16 billions USB-ported devices from all over the world!









The size of a small key tag, it's right there when you need it, and out of your way when you don't.
Beyond that,you can use it not just as a short mini charger when you stand by the counter or laptop PC, but much like a regular Apple lightning cable or micro USB cable so you can still use your device while it's charging, i.e. through a wall outlet or car charger.






Say goodbye to the bunched-up cables in your briefcase, drawers or battery pouch.




Support For iPhone AND Android


With a host of mobile devices in place,you would probably shell out for a lightning cable to work with your iPhone 5s, aside from buying a USB cable when you switch to an Android,or vice versa. 
So why buy more for less?KeeBuddy is a smart recharger that can do it all, with a combination of lightning and micro USB connector compatible with iPhone 5s/5/5c, Samsung Galaxy S5/S4, HTC One Max,LG G Flex,Blackberry,and Windows phones.Further, it allows charging for your iPad Air, iPad mini or Android tablets with support of 3.1 Amp charging current.The Freedom Of ChargingWith a clever retractable cable design,KeeBuddy makes it much easier to transport neatly and to charge without messy cords getting tangled up,When your iPhone needs a charge, all you have to do is take KeeBuddy off your key chain,unwind the cord,and plug the connector into USB port on Laptop PC, MacBook Pro, and charger blocks alike. When you're done, simply touch the button on the housing and it winds up easily so that there are no tangled cords to deal with.If you're not next to the desk,you can still use KeeBuddy to deliver power, for example, while watching TV in living room or driving on the road. The cord actually extends out from the cavity, which could make it easy to place the plug into your device's port from a desired length.Perfect companion to your iPhone whether you're in office,at home or on the move!Our Retractable Cable Doesn't SuckWhile retractable cables on the market typically offer the convenience for charging, most of them are flimsy due to the thin cords, and a lot bulky when made to 3 feet or longer. KeeBuddy is of much heavier duty construction with a flat thicker cord that withstands more potential strain placed, and offers an optimal reach of 50cm when fully extended without increasing the bulk.As opposed to regular retractable cables which unwind and rewind in reverse, KeeBuddy employs a clever unidirectional opening design to allow for a compact form factor,and help prevent tangles of the cords inside the reel when extended in haste, which is encountered quite often otherwise.This could be way frustrating when you're on a spree with your iPhone and the battery is dying, let's say,Sunday Night Football games or FIFA World Cup final. What's worse, you run a high risk breaking the cable even your iPhone,as the frustration grows when you've been fumbling for hours to de-clutter the tangle.Reversible USB ConnectorComparable to Apple's lighting connector,yet with more utility,KeeBuddy comes with a patent double side USB (reversible USB) connector on the USB end that allows you to use it in each direction:Connect KeeBuddy to your iPhone or Android and plug the USB end with the front side facing up into Mac or PC, and your smartphone starts charging and syncing through the USB 2.0 interface.Plug in the USB end upside down, and it functions as a flash memory disk so that you can always have a thumb drive on you and never again fumble looking for the drive in your bag,pockets or leaving it behind somewhere.Never Run Out Of MemoryFlash drives are commonly used in everyday life. There are many folks who seem to always forget their drives on the desk,leave them plugged in, or even drop them in the washing machine. With a waterproof thumb drive embedded, KeeBuddy can be used as a USB key to store,upload or download video clips, selfie photos, high-resolution tracks and files to your device anytime,anywhere. The transfer speed is faster than any Cloud storage and you don't need to pay for recurring online Cloud storage subscription.A true lifesaver during outages of Internet (and thus the Cloud), or if you simply want to retain something that's 100% under your control (beware, your data stored on cloud servers could be accessed or hacked by the likes of malwares or phishing emails). With KeeBuddy,you're the only person that has access to your data.The Most Comprehensive Protection EverCompact, light weight, and pleasant looking, KeeBuddy fits perfectly onto your key chain without being too bulky and obtrusive.It features invisible cable design so that you can hardly notice it's a charge cable until the cord extends out. When not in use, both the connectors,cords and thumb drive are well protected from dirt and splash inside the solid housing that's made from quality Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene copolymers. In most cases, less exposure helps prevent accidental breakage. With a rubberized finish, it offers a secure and comfortable grip on your hand. Embedded into the ABS housing are two brushed metal cases that deliver a solid feel and resit against slippage and scratches from your house keys and finger nails.How Does KeeBuddy Compare
Taking 32GB version for instance.
 Lightning version and Android version combined.
Pricing quotes from BestBuy.
For those folks without Apple's latest iDevices, we made a Micro USB version-only KeeBuddy, which works with all Android phones,Blackberry,Windows phones and tablets with Micro USB port.When Will My KeeBuddy ShipWe know well from our combined experience in product development that it takes a lot of preps and upkeep to bring new gadgets from concept to fruition. That's why we've planned ahead every possible factors, from design to manufacturing, so that your KeeBuddy can ship as soon as possible. Our intention is to deliver you your KeeBuddy by November, to that end,here is the campaign timeline we're following along the journey.   Oct.2013: Ideation,Research,Project planning.   Nov.2013: Product strategies,Sketching,Initial structure planning.   Dec.2013: External and ergonomics analysis,3D rendering,Verification.    Jan.2014: Rapid prototyping, Refining, Campaign preparation.    Feb.2014: Engineering design.    Apr.2014: Functioning prototype, Testing, Photo shot,    May.2014: Website design, Video clip, Campaign completion.    Jun.2014: Indiegogo launch.   Aug.2014: Evaluation, Tooling, licensing.Sept. 2014: T1 off-tooled samples.Mold modification.   Oct.2014: Full production runs.  Nov.2014: Packing and shipping.The Minds BehindKeeBuddy is developed by a team of gadget enthusiasts that each has a passion to mobilize our digital life through creative design and integration. We built KeeBuddy because we really want to use it ourselves, and we consider it our mission to bring this innovation to the world.    Co-founders of KeeBuddy are Nick Leung, a product designer who over his decades of career made a multitude of elegant products for world-class companies like Adidas, Lenovo and Polaroid, Wyndell Wong, project manager with years of experience in product development, international business for consumer electronics and logistics handling, and Christian Fenes, hardware engineer who led the engineering and manufacturing of more than a dozen electronic products in previous companies. This would be our first try at building an affordable quality gadget through crowdfunding. Use of FundsWe know you will love to have the genius gizmo in your digital life,and we would love it even more to bring the idea to life. We're very proud of the work we've done so far, but we need one more push to get it in production and make KeeBuddy your key buddy worldwide.While working tight to keep the expenses as low as possible, we found there're still significant costs that's unavoidable to take the next steps. The funding we raise with your help, will be used for the main points like High precision injection molding,Die casting,CE & FCC certification,Mass production, Packaging,QA and so much more.FAQWhat if I change phones?The majority of mobile phones on the market for now and in the future are with Micro USB or Apple's 8pin port, so KeeBuddy works with virtually any phones you may upgrade to in the future. However, note that, it doesn't work with legacy iPhones with 30pin port,or those earlier phones with Mini USB even DC2.0 ports.Does it work with iOS 8.0?Absolutely! KeeBuddy is designed to be a key buddy for your everyday life, and we're employing apple-certified lightning connector to make sure it works with iOS 6.0,iOS7.0,iOS 8.0 and later on any lightning-ported iPhones,iPads and iPods.Will it charge my iPad mini?Yup, KeeBuddy charges both your smartphone,and iPad or tablets that requre higher charging current like 2.1 Amp,3.1 Amp. What if I forget to add shipping?For those who make the contribution without shipping,we've created a new perk. Please contribute the shipping amount and select no perk and we will match your contribution up.I don't have an iPhone. Will it work on my phone?No worries,KeeBuddy works with both iPhone and any smartphone with Micro USB port, Samsung, HTC,Blackberry, LG,Nokia,Sony,Motorola, to name a few. If you don't have an iPhone and have no plan to have it in future, you can also contribute to the Android (Micro USB) only version.Can I transfer data as well?Definitely KeeBuddy doesn't just work to deliver power, but also enables data transfer.If you like KeeBuddy, please back us and tell your family and friends so we can make it a reality altogether.Here are some tips to help spread out the word.1. Click on the "Link" icon underneath the video clip on top of this page and share around the web.2. Share KeeBuddy with your friends on Facebook,Twitter and Google+.3. Email your friends or post the link to Pinterest, Instagram,Reddit,other forums and blogs. Be creative!

story:
What is Sonus II ?

Sonus II is a Padlock with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). The Padlock can be used everywhere the user seem it fitted, for example to lock the caravan, the trailer, the container at work etc. 

Sonus II has the BLE module integrated and uses only power when activated. When deactivated, the padlock uses no power at all, which makes the battery last for years!


How Does it Work?

When Sonus II is unpacked and ready to use for the first time, the user inserts the battery, and turns on the device in the bottom (At the little push button).

Then the user downloads the 'Sonus' app, and connects with the Padlock.

After the devices gets paired, the user chooses a 4 digit password (Default password is individually for each lock). Then the user is able to use the Sonus II Padlock!

Features

The Padlock features:

  • Encryption standards that enables only the user with a correct password to connect and unlock the Sonus II Padlock.
  • The user can assign other smartphones to use the lock with either the same, or different passwords.
  • If you loose your smartphone, use another smartphone to unlock the Sonus II with your personal password.
  • If your neighbor needs to borrow your lawnmower, just send him an sms with a Guest Password from the Sonus app, and the lock will open when the neighbor activates the lock via the 'Guest Password'. The user can set the guestpassword to work for only a specific time (1 hour for example).
  • Battery alarm, that will alarm the user at 20% battery and 10% battery.
  • Battery Level.

A 3D model of the shackle and the solenoid.

A image of the padlock disassembled.

Breakdown of Components

Sonus II Padlock contains:

  • Beautiful Danish Design and Engineering.
  • A stainless Steel casing, with a hardened Stainless steel shackle, for maximum protection.
  • BLE 4.0 Module with integrated Microprocessor.
  • Lithium Ion batteries.
  • A solenoid with a fixed end, that prevents mechanical pressure to deflect the solenoid.
  • A magnet that fixes the shackle.

This Image shows the Padlock's modules.

A 3D model of the inside of the lock.

Who i am?

I'm Charlie Haagendrup, 25 years old and i'm a mechanical engineer from the Technical University of Denmark.

The idea of a Bluetooth Padlock came along with my company that i started in 2012. The company sells Bicycle Alarm Locks, and in the start of 2013 i developed a bluetooth bicycle lock. From that idea, the Bluetooth padlock was actually an extension of the bicycle lock, and since i'm tired of having 23487285702 keys in my keychain i figured: Why not reduce the keys in the keychain to 0? Also, i've actually tried several times to lock my basement room in my apartment, without having the keys in my pocket. But my smartphone is always in my pocket? So with Sonus II Padlock, you're always having your keys in the palm of your hand?


FAQ

So, like, what if:

  • ... I forgot my password?

Then it's unfortunate. But you can reset the password by holding down the power button for 10 seconds, and enter the default code (you'll get it with the Padlock). From here, you can enter a new password.

  • ... The battery in the lock is dead?

That's very unfortunate! But you're still able to get access to Sonus II, since the electronics shuts down at around 5% battery power. So when it's 'out of Juice' you're actually able to unlock it, and change battery.

  • ... The lock is positioned in rainy weather?

Nõ Prõblemõs Senõr! The Sonus II Padlock is weatherproof, so it can withstand rain, winter and corrosion! But you're not able to leave it in a bucket of water and expect it to work afterwards.

  • ... I lost my smartphone, now what?

Well, that sucks. But you're still able to unlock the padlock with another smartphone! Just connect to the lock, and enter your 4 digit password, and voila!

  • ... it doesn't fit my needs, i mean how big is the Sonus II?
Sonus II measures 70mmx12mmx125mm.


Timeline:

16th November: IndieGoGo Launch. Prototype of mechanical design and electronics done. App for iOS and Android in development.

At the moment the design is being updated for a nicer finish.

story:
Hey there! Thanks for checking out the ProKASE.If you’ve seen us before, thanks for coming back!

We designed the ProKASE to seamlessly integrate with the Microsoft Surface Pro and Surface Pro 2, in a sleek protective case with even more power and function. At its core, the ProKASE is a protective modular enclosure that completely covers the back of the Surface Pro. The 3 main components of the ProKASE system are the Frame, the Mobile Dock cover, and a KASE cover.

3-Part ProKASE vs 2-Part KASE. Need help figuring out which to buy?  The 3-Part ProKASE system includes everything you need to turn your Microsoft Surface Pro into a mobile workstation. It includes the Frame, the Thin Cover, and Mobile Dock Cover. If you don't need all that, and just want to protect your Surface Pro, just select the 2-Part KASE.


The first set of ProKASEs  will be offered in black, cyan and purple to match the Microsoft Touch and Type covers.



Communication between the Microsoft Surface Pro and the ProKASE is seamless. The Mobile Dock cover houses (3) USB3.0 ports and a full sized SD/CF card reader. The right side has two easy access USB ports and a push-activated SD card reader which runs flush against the dock. On the left side, there is another hidden USB port, and a CF card reader when you really need to work. All of the ports and buttons on the Surface Pro itself are fully accessible


The Mobile Dock and KASE covers are interchangeable. We know that Microsoft Surface Pro is powerful enough to handle serious software for work, but there are times where we just want to kick back and enjoy it as a tablet. So we made the covers modular. The ProKASE system can be used with either the Mobile Dock cover, KASE cover or you can use the Frame just by itself! There are integrated magnets and Velcro to easily align and secure the covers to the Frame. In the future, we plan to use the modular design for even more accessories; maybe even a battery pack!

Using the ProKASE is ergonomic and can be easily viewed at different angles. The Mobile Dock cover was a bit of a challenge. We had to figure out a way to add more utility but without adding a lot of bulk. Also, since the keyboard is an integral part of the Surface Pro experience, we had to design around that as well. The Mobile Dock cover has a small foam wedge in front of the electronics. This makes it easier to use the Touch and Type covers so that they’re not bouncing around midair as you type. When everything is closed, an elastic band securely closes your ProKASE and the Surface Pro.

Our electronic devices have become such a personal part of our lives. We use them every day and we’ve developed high expectations for what they can do. Most people want their devices to just work seamlessly with their daily lives without the need for bulky accessories or cables. If you own the Microsoft Surface Pro, you know that there are a few compromises for its portability and full operating processing power. But when it comes to the way we live, we believe you shouldn’t have to make compromises.

A KASE for our story. The original concept was conceived in February 2013. The ProKASE was originally launched on Kickstarter in March 2013, but the campaign failed to reach the funding goal within the timeframe. During the campaign, we were active on forums and supported the criticism to reinvent a better ProKASE based on what consumer had to say. We had a lot of feedback – positive and negative – and we used all of it to make a product that they wanted to use. We always want feedback. We want you to be part of our process.

We decided to start Key Add-on Systems Engineering LLC (KASE) in October this year! That’s we’re launching the ProKASE on Indiegogo this time. Indiegogo has a flex funding program that allows the inventors to keep the funds that they raise. But don’t worry. By the time this campaign goes live, the first shipment of 600 ProKASE systems will have been ordered and paid for and should arrive by late January. We’re using this as a way to recoup our startup costs, so even if we don't make our goal, you'll still receive your ProKASE! The ProKASE system is our first product “Designed for Surface Pro.” We’re dedicated to developing “Designed for Surface” products and other Designed for Microsoft products in the future.

As engineers we believe that the things we use in all parts of our lives should be simple and easy to use. When we were designing the ProKASE we asked people with the Microsoft Surface Pro what they liked and didn’t like about it. After we found out what people wanted, our job was easy. We just had to make what they asked for. They asked for something that was simple, compact, had more storage space, and a way to use more peripherals with the Surface Pro. We started working on the problem and then we created something based on their ideas. And that’s why we believe that Innovation can come from anyone. If you have a suggestion for the ProKASE, future KASE products, or an idea that you want to start yourself but don’t know how to get things going, please contact us!
