story:
Internet Should Be FREE, Right?

The impact of internet on our modern society is so widespread, that it is almost impossible to imagine a world without it. Yet, millions of people around the world are still living with no way of connecting to the internet due to the lack of network infrastructure, electricity, and computers. We tackled this problem head-on by creating a mobile device that comes with built-in internet access that you don’t have to keep paying for.

Rooah! Peacock Tablet: The Key to Unlocking Free Internet

The Rooah! Peacock tablet is uniquely crafted in order to make internet not only free but simple to use. With many useful applications that can greatly enhance everyday life, built right into our tablets, this tablet becomes the ultimate tool that takes the powers of the internet to a whole new level. We felt that by beautifully packaging all these benefits into a tablet device, this hands-on and engaging system would allow even the least tech-savvy users to quickly get comfortable with using such robust technology.

What Else Can The PEACOCK Do?

Connect to Your TV

Using the micro-HDMI cable that comes with the Peacock, you can connect your Peacock Tablet to your TV, and transform it into your new personal entertainment center.

Watch Movies & TV Shows

The Peacock is compatible with your usual online watching favorites such as Netflix and Hulu, and if you want to watch the latest movies and TV shows, watch it through our Rooah! Entertainment Hub.

Play Video Games

Play your favorite Android games, emulators, and many other new games using the Peacock. Peacock’s powerful quad-core processors allow you to game with seamless clarity and smoothness. Also, using the Rooah! “GameNimbus”, you can now get exclusive access to new games being developed in emerging markets. Game developers will also have a new way to bring their games to market and begin monetizing them as well!

Use As Second Monitor

Rooah! Peacock allows you to extend the functionality of your PC or laptop by wirelessly connecting as a extended display. For all the busy people and multi-taskers, this allows you to organize and increase your overall productivity.


Use as a Phone

The Rooah! Peacock allows you to insert your phone’s SIM card and transform your tablet into your cell phone. With our special Rooah! Calling Package, you can easily make hands-free international calls on our Rooah! Messenger.

Rooah! Helps You Be You

Since our goal is to bring new users online, we understand that there will be a lot of people using our tablets that will be a little awkward with browsing the web and not as experienced with using tablet devices. That is why the Rooah! Peacock operating system is designed to guide the user through their online experience. The Rooah! OS learns the user as they are using the device and will suggest apps, people, websites, and content that it believes the user may like or find useful. But for the users that are experienced with using the internet, our software will be more subtle and will not impede the ambitious self-learner.

The Specifics

  • 7.89 inch LCD Screen
  • 1.2GHz Quad Core Processor
  • 1.0 GB Storage Memory
  • 16 GB Internal Memory
  • 5 Point Touch Screen
  • Built-in 2.0 Megapixel Front Camera
  • Built-in 8.0 Megapixel Rear Camera
  • 3.7V/3500mAh Li-Polymer Battery
  • Can support up to 32GB external memory
  • Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean (Without the Rooah! Operating System)
  • Battery Lasts 6-10 Hours (Browsing, Reading)
  • Battery Lasts 4-6 Hours (Watching Videos, Playing Games)
  • Compatible eBook Formats: TXT, EPUB, PDF, WORD, EXCEL, PPT
  • Compatible Audio Formats: MP3, WMA, OGG, APE, FLAC, AAC, WAV
  • Compatible Picture Formats: JPG, BMP, GIF, PNG
  • Bluetooth 3.0
  • 3.5mm Stereo Headphone Port


What Comes With The Rooah! Peacock


  • 1 DC/AC Charger

  • 1 Micro-USB Cable

  • 1 Micro/Mini HDMI Cable

  • 1 Micro-USB OTG Cable

  • 1 User Manual

  • 1 Pair of Headphones

  • 1 Leather Sleeve

So What Is Rooah! All About? 

Rooah! is evolving the way internet is accessed, and utilized, by providing free internet access through our tablet devices. Rooah, actually spelled “Ruwa”, means water in the Nigerian language of Hausa, and Spirit in Hebrew. Both things share the qualities of an impelling force that drives growth and are essential to life. At Rooah!, we believe that the internet should work in the same way, and that everyone is entitled to an opportunity to utilize such a potential. Our goal is to enable people with the internet and best tools to inspire innovation, creativity, and growth; but most of all, free and unrestricted access to all things which may be necessary to reaching one’s full potential.

Where Will Internet Be Free First?

We know that providing free internet access is a daunting task, so we have devised a simple plan in order to deliver our tablets to people that will utilize it to the fullest. Our prime objective is to complete the software, as previously mentioned, in order to have a product that is in the position to start providing the free internet service. In order to properly scale to the number of people we are looking extend this service to, which is in the millions, the first group of people to receive the free internet service are the students of select universities in Nigeria.

Rooah!'s First Stop

We are surely looking to provide this service in the United States but, we want to pilot our service in the most challenging emerging market, which happens to be Nigeria. Nigeria is truly unique to the world because it is the most populous country in Africa, the 7th most populous country in the world, and has a colossal population of 178 million people, compacted into a land mass nearly doubled the size of Texas. In addition, the youth of Nigeria (under 25) accounts for over 60% of the Nigerian population. Due to the high density of people, it will truly be a challenge getting our networks to provide steady and reliable internet to such a large number of people simultaneously. Additionally, with such a large number of youth, they will be accessing information for education, browsing social media, using email, and sharing local music, videos, and multimedia content. So by making Nigeria the vanguard for our “#FreeTheWeb” campaign, we will not only be adequately prepared to provide our service in any other location, but we will be granting a large majority of youth in Nigeria the ability to become the pioneers of a interactive generation, providing an inside perspective of young Africa.

Rooah! In the U.S.

Although the United States will not be the first to see our free internet service, the Peacock tablet can still be utilized by anyone, in any state. The Peacock's simplicity and convenience allows one to begin using it straight out of the box. The Peacock can easily detect, and connect to any available WiFi networks in the area, and the dual SIM slots allows the tablet to be practically outfitted with the ability to be used as a phone and host a data plan. With reliable  internet availability so widespread in the U.S., it arguably makes it easier for the average U.S. citizen to take advantage of all the free benefits of internet along with using our tablet. 

Why We Need Your Help

The most complex part about our mission is the custom designed Rooah! operating system through which the user is granted access to the internet. Our software was initially programmed to work with our USB modems for computers so it is currently in Windows format. What we are in the process of doing is reprogramming this Windows software to run as the operating system of our tablets. Our programmers have worked around the clock to produce our current software, but we have taken up a pretty intricate programming task that we need some help to fund. With your backing, we will be able to fully complete the Rooah! Peacock tablet and begin delivering it to those in need.

Initial Rooah! USB Modem Prototype


Rooah! Software for PC

Rooah! Tablet OS Design

Rooah! OS Design - App Dock

Milestones

Perks

Campaign Bonuses


Special Thanks to...

FAQ

Can I get free internet here In America with my Rooah! OS?

Short Answer: No

Long Answer: We are surely looking to provide this service in the United States but, we want to pilot our service in the most challenging emerging market, which happens to be Nigeria. But the tablets will work perfectly fine on WiFi and with a 3G SIM card anywhere. 

Can I use apps from Google Play on the Rooah! Peacock Tablet?

Short Answer: Yes

Long Answer: The Rooah! Peacock Tablet without the Rooah! OS runs on the Android 4.2.2. Jelly Bean operating system, so all Google Play apps are compatible with the device.

The Rooah! Peacock Tablet with the Rooah! OS will also be compatible with all Google Play apps and content. Our goal is to make sure our device is compatible with tools that users are already accustomed to, making it easier for people to accommodate our devices into their lives.

What are my Rooah! Peacock Tablet Color options?

Short Answer: Gold and Silver

Long Answer: We are hoping to release more colors for our tablets. Hopefully we can add a future stretch goal that will make various colors a possibility.

What is the shipping costs for U.S. Residents?

Short Answer: Shipping is free for all U.S. Residents

Long Answer: Your Welcome :)

What is the shipping costs for international residents?

Short Answer: Anywhere between $29.99 to $249.99, depending on the perk.

Long Answer: Shipping cost for all international backers is $29.99 for the "#FREETHEWEB T-Shirt", "#FREETHEWEB T-Shirt and Power Pack" & "Rooah! Wear" perks.

Shipping cost is $49.99 for the "Silver Rooah! Peacock Tablet", "Peacock Tablet - Calling Kit", & "Peacock Tablet - Gamers Kit" perks

Shipping cost is $59.99 for the "Silver Peacock Tablet Deluxe", & "Peacock Tablet with Rooah! OS" perks.

Shipping cost is $119.99 for the "2 is Company, 3 is a Crowd" perk.

Shipping cost is $249.99 for the "Peacock Muster" perk 

There are no shipping costs for the "Eternal Rooah! Beta Tester" & "Be a Hero!" perks.

When should we expect to receive the Rooah! Tablets with the Rooah! Operating System?

Short Answer: First Quarter of 2015

Long Answer: Our programmers have quite a task ahead of them, making sure to deliver a reliable and secure product. To make sure of this, we want to provide our developers with an ample amount of time to produce, evaluate, and refine our software to meet our high Rooah! standards.

What are the specifications of the lipstick power pack offered as part of the “#FREETHEWEB T-Shirt and Power Pack” perk?

Sleek, compact, and lightweight, the lipstick power pack is designed to provide durable and inconspicuous power to any of your mobile devices while easily fitting into any pocket or bag. The lipstick power pack is built with overcharge, over discharge, and short circuit protection,  and the 2600 mAH external battery takes about 3-4 hours to fully charge. The power pack also comes with a Micro USB power wire.

What are the specifications of the solar panel power bank offered as part of a few of the perks?

Short Answer:

  • Input : DC 5V 1A

  • Output : DC 5V / 2 x 1A

  • Charge Time: 7-8 hours under normal sunlight

  • Battery type : Lithium polymer

  • Battery capacity : 5000mAh

  • Solar panel : 5V, 200mA

  • Dimensions (W x H x D) : 142mm x 75mm x 13.6mm (5.6” x 3.0” x 0.5”)

  • Color : Black

Long Answer:

The Solar Power Bank is a portable solar charger power source with a built-in backup battery for powering up your USB-supported cell phone or tablet when you can’t find a power outlet. The mobile solar panel comes with two USB ports, built-in LED flashlight, and a carabiner for easy attachment. The Power Bank is equipped with port gaskets to protect the charging ports from dust, and water, making it fully waterproof, shockproof, dustproof, and drop-resistant. The power bank can be recharged from solar power, indoor light, or USB port with the included micro-USB charging cable. This compact, and easy-to-carry solar panel power bank is great for traveling, power outages, emergencies,  and makes a great gift!
story_txt:
Internet Should Be FREE, Right?The impact of internet
on our modern society is so widespread, that it is almost impossible to imagine
a world without it. Yet, millions of people around the world are still living
with no way of connecting to the internet due to the lack of network
infrastructure, electricity, and computers. We tackled this problem head-on by
creating a mobile device that comes with built-in internet access that you
don’t have to keep paying for.Rooah! Peacock Tablet: The Key to Unlocking Free InternetThe Rooah! Peacock tablet is uniquely crafted in order to make internet
not only free but simple to use. With many useful applications that can greatly
enhance everyday life, built right into our tablets, this tablet becomes the
ultimate tool that takes the powers of the internet to a whole new level. We
felt that by beautifully packaging all these benefits into a tablet device, this
hands-on and engaging system would allow even the least tech-savvy users to
quickly get comfortable with using such robust technology. What Else Can The PEACOCK Do?Connect to Your TV
Using the micro-HDMI cable that comes with the Peacock, you can connect
your Peacock Tablet to your TV, and transform it into your new personal
entertainment center.


Watch Movies & TV Shows

The Peacock is
compatible with your usual online watching favorites such as Netflix and Hulu,
and if you want to watch the latest movies and TV shows, watch it
through our Rooah! Entertainment Hub.




Play Video Games

Play your favorite Android games, emulators, and many other new games
using the Peacock. Peacock’s powerful quad-core processors allow you to game
with seamless clarity and smoothness. Also, using the Rooah! “GameNimbus”, you
can now get exclusive access to new games being developed in emerging markets.
Game developers will also have a new way to bring their games to market and
begin monetizing them as well!


Use As Second Monitor
Rooah! Peacock allows you to extend the functionality of your PC or
laptop by wirelessly connecting as a extended display. For all the busy people
and multi-taskers, this allows you to organize and increase your overall
productivity.



Use as a Phone
The Rooah! Peacock allows you to insert your phone’s SIM card and
transform your tablet into your cell phone. With our special Rooah! Calling
Package, you can easily make hands-free international calls on our Rooah!
Messenger.


Rooah! Helps You Be You

Since our goal is to bring new users online, we understand that there
will be a lot of people using our tablets that will be a little awkward with
browsing the web and not as experienced with using tablet devices. That is why
the Rooah! Peacock operating system is designed to guide the user through their
online experience. The Rooah! OS learns the user as they are using the device
and will suggest apps, people, websites, and content that it believes the user
may like or find useful. But for the users that are experienced with using the
internet, our software will be more subtle and will not impede the ambitious
self-learner.The Specifics

story:
Do you find having to bring your charger, power bank, and dongles while traveling a bother? Have you ever thought that a single product can replace them all?

 

Charger X can. Take care of all your Fast-charging and Data-transfer tasks with this new Charger-Battery-Hub! Embrace the convenience by backing this wonderful gadget today!

 

 

 

Introducing Charger X, the only 100W Fast Charger-Battery-Hub you need!

  • Replaces all your messy dongles
  • Charges your devices up to 3 times faster with 100W PD fast charge tech
  • Latest GaN Technology minimized size for traveling, FAA-approved for carry-on
  • 3 charging ports for multiple-charging
  • View, edit, copy and transfer your files quickly and safely on USB and micro SD/TF card
  • Large 10,000mAh battery keeps your mobiles on for hours
  • Travel-friendly plugs - charge all around the world
  • Power output detection makes sure your devices are charged at optimal voltage
  • Extra safety with multiple stages of protection systems against overcharging and shorts

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Charger X is the only 100W Fast Charger-Battery-Hub you need.

Replacing your USB hub, Laptop charger, 10,000 mAh power bank and travel adapter.

No more messy dongles and cables!!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Charger X has integrated the Power Delivery (PD) tech to further increase charging speed. With up to 100W output power, it can easily fast-charge demanding devices, including MacBook Pros, laptops and all iPads.

 

 

 

The latest GaN Technology uses Gallium Nitride (GaN), a new semiconductor material that enables Charger X to be smaller and more efficient. It has improved safety, capacity, performance and retains power better than any existing battery.

 

 

 

 

 

Charger X is equipped with a 100W PD USB-C 3.0 Power Delivery port and two 18W/ 15W USB-A 3.0/2.0 Qualcomm Quick Charge ports. You can easily fast-charge multiple devices at the same time.

 

 

Power Delivery (PD) fast charging is the recent technology that delivers much higher levels of power than standard charging. It is a specification for handling higher power and allows the most demanding devices to charge quickly over a USB connection.

 

 

 

 

 

With 3 USB Ports & 1 Micro SD/ TF Card slot, Charger X can transfer files rapidly. You can easily access your files by plugging in USB HDD, flash drive and Micro SD/TF card direct into Charger X.

 

 

 

Easy to back up your files when traveling. Give you extra spaces for your phones/ iPads/ cameras etc.

 

 

 

 

 

Charger X comes with a 10,000mAh battery, easily fully charges any mobile phone several times. It can also charge laptops, iPads, cameras and other digital gadgets. You can replace other chargers and power banks with it.

 

 

 

 

 

Charger X is compatible with most common devices, from the most demanding to the smallest ones. It will always be your support and back up all your power. The PD technology auto-detects different devices and charges as quickly as they allow. You don't have to worry about damaging your device by over-currency.

 

​

 

 

 

Charger X can be used directly in over 150 countries with included plugs. Its interchangeable wall charging heads allow you to use it in most countries around the world! You will find it more convenient and secure than using travel-adapter with other chargers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have all seen power banks blowing up for various reasons. Setting fire to homes, causing a severe burn to the owner…

 

As convenience as they are, the battery inside a power bank can be volatile and dangerous if it is not properly designed. However, this will not happen with Charger X, as it is protected by 8 layers of fail-safe designs.

 

Charger X has built-in safety designs to cut off power when it gets overcharged, getting too hot or if short-circuiting takes place. At worst, you may have to send in your Charger X for warranty repair but it will never risk your connected devices.

 

 

 

We want to give you extra safety when using our product. We will perform different industrial tests. Certification marks are also applied to ensure we match the international standard.  

 

​

 

 

 

After performing various trials and testings, we finally produced our prototype of Power X.  Here, we share our success in completing one of our major milestones.

 

 

 

 

 

100W Power Output Demonstration

 

 

 

100W Laptop Charging Demonstration

 

 

 

File Transfer Demonstration

 

 

 

Multiple Charging Demonstration

 

 

 


 

 

Comparison:

 

 

 

 

 

 

What’s included in the package:

  1. Charger X
  2. US/China Plug
  3. EU Plug
  4. UK Plug
  5. AUS/NZ Plug

 

 

 

We are ZIRUX, a team of professional engineers, designers and marketers who experienced in reinventing new products and bringing them to live. We would like to take this moment and special thanks to all backers from our previous Power X campaign. It was a great experience to have all your supports. Power X has finally come to the end and being shipped out to backers.

 

Guaranteed Shipping & Lifetime Warranty:

For this project, we will continue to keep our promise. Since we have already produced a fully-functioning prototype and tooling, we are confident to arrange the production and deliver on time.

Also, We are confident in the quality of Charger X and we want you to feel the same!

Therefore, we offer a warranty over the lifetime of Charger X. This means:

  • Any defect in the material and construction of the device will be covered
  • All Charger X received by us for warranty will be repaired back to brand-new performance, and
  • If it cannot be repaired, it will be replaced with a brand new or refurbished unit of the same model
  • The high-quality battery of Charger X is designed to last 5 years under normal usage. We consider this as the lifetime of Charger X
  • Accidental damage, abuse or general wear and tear that doesn’t affect use are not covered
  • Warranty only covers Charger X in an original, unmodified condition. Opening up the shell or tampering of the device may void its warranty
  • If your case is not covered by the above, we still encourage you to contact us as we can repair your Charger X outside of warranty, charging actual material and labor costs

 

 

Risks and challenges:

 

It is always challenging to bring a new product to live. Although we have experiences in the field, we still have to face many challenges especially during the design and production process. With our passion, we will continue make improvements for ZIRUX and bring the best product to you. Since we want to provide the very best to our backers, we may need some time during the process to safeguard our product quality. There are many risks and challenges, but we will always strive to manage them and ensure the production could run smoothly.

However, this will not happen with Charger X, as it is protected by 8 layers of fail-safe designs. Charger X has built-in safety designs to cut off power when it gets overcharged, getting too hot or if short-circuiting takes place. At worst, you may have to send in your Charger X for warranty repair but it will never risk your connected devices.   We want to give you extra safety when using our product. We will perform different industrial tests. Certification marks are also applied to ensure we match the international standard.   ​   After performing various trials and testings, we finally produced our prototype of Power X.  Here, we share our success in completing one of our major milestones.     100W Power Output Demonstration   100W Laptop Charging Demonstration   File Transfer Demonstration  

 
Multiple Charging Demonstration     Comparison:      What’s included in the package:
Charger X
US/China Plug
EU Plug
UK Plug
AUS/NZ Plug
   We are ZIRUX, a team of professional engineers, designers and marketers who experienced in reinventing new products and bringing them to live. We would like to take this moment and special thanks to all backers from our previous Power X campaign. It was a great experience to have all your supports. Power X has finally come to the end and being shipped out to backers. Guaranteed Shipping & Lifetime Warranty:For this project, we will continue to keep our promise. Since we have already produced a fully-functioning prototype and tooling, we are confident to arrange the production and deliver on time.Also, We are confident in the quality of Charger X and we want you to feel the same!Therefore, we offer a warranty over the lifetime of Charger X. This means:
Any defect in the material and construction of the device will be covered
All Charger X received by us for warranty will be repaired back to brand-new performance, and
If it cannot be repaired, it will be replaced with a brand new or refurbished unit of the same model
The high-quality battery of Charger X is designed to last 5 years under normal usage. We consider this as the lifetime of Charger X
Accidental damage, abuse or general wear and tear that doesn’t affect use are not covered
Warranty only covers Charger X in an original, unmodified condition. Opening up the shell or tampering of the device may void its warranty
If your case is not covered by the above, we still encourage you to contact us as we can repair your Charger X outside of warranty, charging actual material and labor costs
  Risks and challenges: It is always challenging to bring a new product to live. Although we have experiences in the field, we still have to face many challenges especially during the design and production process. With our passion, we will continue make improvements for ZIRUX and bring the best product to you. Since we want to provide the very best to our backers, we may need some time during the process to safeguard our product quality. There are many risks and challenges, but we will always strive to manage them and ensure the production could run smoothly.

story:
Overall introduction of the product features

The selfie-stick with the features of full-automation controlling, and APPControl, Bluetooth connection, high precision automatic focusing, face recognition technology tracked by multiple people, following shooting forward and backward, facial beautification , fill-in light and sharing with each other at once.

 

Function:

1. Automatic controlling, easy to operate

Built in smart core, automatic detection of facial features; automatically identificate and rotate to the appropriate angle without manual settings.

 

2. Sharp focusing and face recognition

Because of advanced face detection technology, it can automatically focus on the human face, making your face outline more dynamic and outstanding.

Also, can support more than 6 people face tracking,making the get together party more free and easy.

 

3. farewell to blind shoot and automatically track

Automatically adjust the lens angle according to your tracks, no matter how you move, can always capture your beautiful moments

 

4, Have your own way, automatic shot by seconds

Set POSE, hold still, automatically start the static identification shooting without manually starting the shutter

 

5, template self timer, glorious and touching

Just open magazine production mode, users can see that it contains massive magazine template, and it is time to say goodbay to boring single selfie, enrich your life, glorious and charming

 

 

6, Shoot at your will, facial beautification, fill-in light

Night lighting function, that is, open beauty lights in weak light environment, make the skin more bright and clear. A variety of beauty style for options make you more charming。

 

7, intelligent beauty, more choices

Intelligent control, beauty at once, whitening and filters, choose among these according to the actual demands

Open portrait beauty interface, you can filter, color, brightness, contrast, saturation, whitening, grinding and other depth adjustment

 

8, share for perpetual memories

Click sharing button and then switch to the function of built-in photo sharing, suitable for all models and APP

 

9, smart APP, multiple modes

Smart APP with a combination of hardware and software, convenient to operate, choose a solo tracking, lover tracking, multi tracking, continuous shooting mode etc according to your actual needs.

 

10, smart accessories, more fun

Explore different photographic experiences, broader horizons, more micro worlds, more exotic pleasures.

Wide angle 0.4X; large lens angle and wide view. Effectively increase 30%-40% shooting range.

At the same time, the shooting performance is more stable with three tripods.

HD micro lens; clear close-up with zoom in 19 times, enjoy the beauty of the microscopic.

 

11, Want to make the film, pretty world, beauty on you

Record every beautiful moment in your life with your selfie time

 

Product introduction:

1, the quality of beauty, save worry save trouble

The handle with aluminum alloy and ergonomic design, let you have a comfortable grip experience, your shot is not tired.

The rod body with Aluminum Alloy material does not fade does not rust, more attractive and more durable.

Pull out the connecting rod to lock the fixed, save worry save trouble, convenient and efficient

 

2, radium carving process, high glossiness

Outstanding durability: silver plated light, functional keys of character laser engraving

High glossiness: selfie-stick with rod surface injection, treatment over UV light oil

 

3, powerful motor, million times testing

Built in powerful motor, small motor, high power. reliability tests of million times of rotation make the rotation angle smoother, CD textured finish of the surface for outstanding durability

 

4, Product Parameters, Quality Stability

Weight: 520g, load bearing: 172g

Charging voltage current: 5V/330MA

Battery capacity: 900MAH

Charge time: 3 hours. Standby time: 100 hours

Bluetooth version: BLUETOOTH 4.0

 

5, optional color

Choose whatever color at your will.

 

6, qualification and quality

Outward appearance patent, product qualification, factory picture and packing material

 

The best gift

 

 

Logistics mode:

DHL delivery

 

Tax model:

Additional International duties / taxes may be required at a later date.

story:
Cyprian Class of '05
Brittany was kind enough to open up her house to our entire class for a reunion party. It's an unfortunate shame that someone stooped so low as to steal something from the party host, a classmate, and most of all a friend. Let's show her our support and dedication by pitching in for her loss. I would ask that each of you pitch in at least $20.00 so we can meet our goal. I am doing the same.

If our class of 30 pitches in $25.00 we will meet our goal. $25.00... a book, a few number 2's from In-n-out, that shirt you didn't really need but looked kinda cool... The $25.00 to each of us individually isn't much, but collectively it's enough to restore confidence. Let's do this

Cyprian class of '05 reunion party... Too awesome to not happen again. 

Cheers,

Alec

How this works:

For those of you who have never worked a crowd funding page before, this is a way to store donation money for the duration of a campaign. In this case, our duration is 25 days and our campaign is refunding Brittany for her stolen phone. At the end of 25 days, all money will be transferred directly to the account that she specifies.

story:
As the president of Sumbrella,LLC,it is my honor to share with all my new Indiegogo friends the story of how The Sumbrella, the worlds only Solar powered charging patio Umbrella came about.

The Beginning

I have been working in a family business for over 15 years. My father Les Pelletz, started a very successful Plumbing and Heating manufacturers Rep agency called Raven Products over 30 years ago. He has designed and patented 7 different plumbing and heating products that have allowed our wonderful company to grow and thrive throughout the years. One of my many duties at Raven has been to travel all over the world visiting factories and attending trade shows and calling on customers. Some of these places were China,Thailand,Canada and many states across the US.The one common factor I become aware of was almost everyone had cell phones, MP3 players, and Tablets.While I was staying at hotels, I started to notice that adults and children alike began to change their habits while enjoying the pools, beaches and Patios. It didn't matter if a family was on a vacation or business executives were attending a convention,as soon as their batteries began to die in their cell phones or tablets the Pools and Patios began to empty as they had to go back to their rooms to charge their devices. I have to admit, I was and still am one of those people.

My father always taught me to be aware of my surroundings and if you can come up with a solution that could make peoples lives easier, then you will have a very successful idea or product. One day, I was sitting by the pool working on my laptop at a hotel in Florida and the glare from the sun was so bright I had to move under a Patio Umbrella. That did the trick. I could see the screen perfectly and began to work on a proposal. About 10 minutes later the phone rang and it was my daughter. As soon as she started to talk and tell me about how she lost her first tooth and how much she missed me and when was I going to come home, I heard the dreaded beeps that alert you when your battery is low and your phone is about to die. I had to stop my chatty 4 year old daughter midsentence and tell her that daddy had to go and I would call her back in 15 minutes. I then turned off my laptop, left the beautiful 80 degree weather and ran to my room so I could plug my phone in the wall so I could continue my conversation. As I was returning to my room, I began to think, what if that phone conversation was an emergency and not my beautiful daughter letting me know her tooth fell out. That bothered me. After listening to the cutest story, as only a 4 year old can tell you,I hung up the phone and realized my phones battery was 3%. I looked outside and knew my time at the pool was over as I had to wait for awhile in my room until the battery was strong enough to keep me connected to my family and work. There had to be a better way!!!!

Good Things Come To Those Who Wait

Looking out my Hotel room window, staring down at the beautiful pool and Ocean an idea popped into my head. I would design a product that allows anyone to continue enjoying the outdoors while still being able to use and charge their electronic devices without having to run and hide inside to find a plug.

The idea for The Sumbrella was then born. I would invent a Solar powered patio and beach umbrella that would allow the consumer to continue to use and charge any electronic device while sitting by the pool or the Ocean or enjoying lunch on a Patio.After talking with my family and many different solar manufactures, I realized my dream was too advanced for the current technology. The idea was great, but the solar technology was not where it had to be to design special solar panels that can withstand the opening and closing of an Umbrella and being thrown in the back of a car while driving to the beach. I was forced to put my dream of helping others stay connected while away from the indoors to the back of my mind until April of 2010.

Turning A Dream Into Reality

I was attending a Plumbing trade show in Canada when I met a gentleman from China, who approached me and asked if he could manufacture some products for Raven. We began a conversation, which to this dayhasn't stopped. That gentleman has become a great friend and business partner. Not only has he manufactured many items for Raven, but he has helped bring my dream of The Sumbrella to reality. In April of 2012, after 2 years of designing and tweaking, I finally received my finished sample of the world's first Solar powered charging Patio Umbrella.

As soon as I took out the finished Sumbrella, and unwound the very heavy duty crank that opened the UV protected, wind resistant extremely high quality fabric to it's full 9' width, I knew that I was holding something very special. I had no idea the path The Sumbrella would lead me on in less than one year.

Finding Customer # 1

Standing in front of me was the most beautiful and functional Patio Umbrella I had ever witnessed. I am not saying that because I invented it, but because it is the truth. The Sumbrella will take your breath away, from the 4 solar panels that blend in the fabric so beautifully you don't even realize they are there, to the 2 USB ports on the extremely high quality aluminum pole that invites the most skeptical of critics to gaze in amazement with the possibilities of never having to search for a plug indoors again.

I sat in front of the computer with the internet turned on ready to share The Sumbrella with the world. Who should be the first company to help bring my dream to the marketplace? That was easy. Brookstone. I typed in Brookstone.com and on the bottom of the home page I saw a link that said contact a buyer.I filled out the form and hit the send button. Immediately I get a popup thanking me for my submission and a buyer will be contacting me within 4 to 6 weeks. As soon as I saw that, I said to myself, If I receive an email or phone call sooner then 4 to 6 weeks, The Sumbrella will be a huge success. Well, 2 hours after I sent the info, I received both. On the phone was the assistant buyer for Home and Garden and she asked if I could come to their headquarters in New Hampshire to discuss with the head buyer about The Sumbrella.I asked her when, and she said as soon as possible. The next day, my father and I were on the 1 hour drive from Westboro, Massachusetts to Nashua, New Hampshire.There we were sitting in front of The headquarters of Brookstone. It was too good to be true, and the best part was, it was all true.My father, is an amazing salesman. It is not that he pushes products down people's throats, that's not it at all. My father has the rare ability to show that he cares more about making friends and building strong relationships then just selling a product to a customer. I owe all my salesmanship to my him. As we sat in our car about to embark on an adventure of a lifetime my father said something to me that I will never forget. He told me he was not going to say one word, as he was so proud of how far I had come. That gave me the courage knowing he completely trusted my product and how I was going to present it to Brookstone.When I opened The Sumbrella, The head buyer was speechless for about 20 minutes. You could hear his jaw hit the ground with amazement. His first words were, "This is it. This is what the world has been waiting for!" I couldn't believe what I was hearing. I believed in my product, but you never know what reaction you will receive from others so I was prepared for the worst. Needless to say, and to make a long story a little shorter, I received my first order 2 months later and The Sumbrella will be featured on the cover of Brookstone in the March, 2013 issue.During this time, I made a business plan that targeted many different industries. These included Hotels, Restaurants, Amusement Parks, Coffee Shops, Colleges and University's, Homeowners and more. I couldn't think of one industry where The Sumbrella would not be a very useful addition to their product offering or service. My philosophy was going to be that I would not keep any inventory and I would start with only the largest of hotel chains and restaurants who I would supply directly from my factory as The Sumbrella is not a one or two dollar item and as with most startups cash flow islow due to all the startup costs. I decided to hired a couple of reps that had established relationships in these markets and the results have been nothing but positive with many potential Po's coming in the next few months.

A Cadillac Problem To Have

As you are well aware, I am writing this to you on Kickstarter as I need your help. I thank my lucky stars everyday that I have been fortunate enough to have the contacts to invent a product that everyone really believes in. The problem with developing a great new product, is that everyone wants it. That takes capitol, and as the sole owner of Sumbrella,LLC, the amount of money Sumbrella will need to sustain all the incoming orders is very hard to come by. As my friends father told me, It is a Cadillac Problem To Have. I couldn't agree more. Sumbrella, with your help, will be able to not only fulfill all the orders that Brookstone and other companies have placed and will place, but it will allow me to keep thousands of Sumbrellas in my warehouse to help expedite shipping and lower freight costs in the future.

Lighting Up The Night Sky

I have travelled to many countries and have seen some of the most beautiful places, but unfortunately I have also seen the poverty and devastation that is so abundant across the globe. In the last two months Sumbrella has transformed into much more than aPatio Umbrella that can be sold to households and hotels and restaurants. Sumbrella has become a life changing and life saving Solar Powered functional charging station that will help to light the night sky for hundreds of millions of impoverished men, women and children across the globe. There are over 300 million people that wake up and go to bed without power each and every day. The Sumbrella will allow children to read books and continue to do their homework and study even when the sun goes down, which will allowfuture generations to thrive and succeed unlike the generations before due to the lack of education and the ability to study at home. The Sumbrella will allow parents to read stories to their children before bed without having to remember to blow out their lanterns. Oil filled lanterns burn and injure over 6000 people a day due to spills and accidents.

The Sumbrella will help to eliminate these dangerous lanterns by having built in LED lights that charge during the day and stay lit for 8 hours during the night. The Sumbrella also allows the user to plug in a USB powered LED lantern or other type of light source.

Why Me? Why Did I Survive?

That is a question that has been haunting the most loving, caring, compassionate and special woman in my life, my soul mate and wife Kelly. Natural Disasters can strike anyone at anyplace at anytime without any warning at all. With the birth of the internet and media all across the globe we are now able to see and witness these disasters almost on a daily basis. Kelly was 48 hours away from experiencing this first hand. Kelly is a registered nurse and she has the biggest heart and always wants to help others in need. New Years day 2010 Kelly was on a plane to Haiti to work with an incredible organization that brings Dr's and Nurses together in third world countries to help treat the sick and spread medicine and vaccines to those in need. They go into the tiniest of villagesand towns and perform surgeries and give vaccines to the young and old and help deliver babies.These men and women are Saints. Well, 48 hours after Kelly left Haitito come home, one of the largest and most destructive earthquakes flattened Haiti and injured or killed many of the same men, women and children Kelly and The Dr's just helped. Why Me? Why Did I survive? That question has been recently answered as Kelly gave me an idea. This idea will change the way people stay in communication with relief efforts, safety personnel and loved ones before, during and after a natural disasters such as Hurricane Sandy, the earthquakes in Haiti, floods, ice storms and more.

Kelly gave me an idea which I just patented worldwide and will be available in August, 2013. Sumbrella,LLC will be introducing the world's only Solar powered emergency 10' popup shelter and charging station. The pop up tent will have 4 USB chargers. One on each Pole which will allow the user to escape the elements while using or charging their phones which will allow them to contact emergency personnel andloved ones to let them know they are ok, due to the loss of power from these Disasters. They will also be able to charge their devices so they don't have to drain the car battery, or waste gas while trying to charge their devices. As we saw with Hurricane Sandy the gas lines were miles long due to the power loss. Many people ran out of gas trying to charge their devices to keep in contact.

I recently contacted the red cross. The woman who I spoke with was so happy someone finally developed this item. She said they would have put up a tent at every street corner after Hurricane Sandy hit. That would have lessoned the gas lines tremendously and allowed worried loved ones to stay in contact. She is very interested in carrying The Sumbrellaand thinks the tents will provide a much needed service during times of disaster. I just received my final sample and it looks incredible. In the next few months I will be contacting many other relief services such as FEMA.

Kelly's-World

Sumbrella, LLC, has just started a non-profit organization called Kelly's-World. This life changing organization will bring alternative energy sources to men, women and children in need across the globe. Sumbrella,LLC will provide 1 Sumbrella to Kelly's-World for every 10th Sumbrella sold, which then will be delivered to Poverty stricken areas of the world or areas affected by Natural disasters. Kelly's-World is dedicated to all the men, women and children who have lived without power for much too longor have been affected by Natures wrath.This charity would not have been possible without my wife's haunting question, that can now be put to rest.

Kelly, you survived to help provide the world with an alternative source of energy that will have an impact on saving millions of lives by keeping communication open during times of disaster and power outages.

With your Pledges and Charitable contributions to both Sumbrella,LLC and Kelly's-World, I will now be able to spread the word and build up inventory that will allow Sumbrellas to be distributed across the globe to those in need.

Thank you for believing in The Sumbrella, Kelly's-World, myself and my story.

Best Regards,

Michael Pelletz

President, Sumbrella,LLC.

Kelly Pelletz

Founder, Kelly's-World

It was too good to be true, and the best part was, it was all true.My father, is an amazing salesman. It is not that he pushes products down people's throats, that's not it at all. My father has the rare ability to show that he cares more about making friends and building strong relationships then just selling a product to a customer. I owe all my salesmanship to my him. As we sat in our car about to embark on an adventure of a lifetime my father said something to me that I will never forget. He told me he was not going to say one word, as he was so proud of how far I had come. That gave me the courage knowing he completely trusted my product and how I was going to present it to Brookstone.When I opened The Sumbrella, The head buyer was speechless for about 20 minutes. You could hear his jaw hit the ground with amazement. His first words were, "This is it. This is what the world has been waiting for!" I couldn't believe what I was hearing. I believed in my product, but you never know what reaction you will receive from others so I was prepared for the worst. Needless to say, and to make a long story a little shorter, I received my first order 2 months later and The Sumbrella will be featured on the cover of Brookstone in the March, 2013 issue.During this time, I made a business plan that targeted many different industries. These included Hotels, Restaurants, Amusement Parks, Coffee Shops, Colleges and University's, Homeowners and more. I couldn't think of one industry where The Sumbrella would not be a very useful addition to their product offering or service. My philosophy was going to be that I would not keep any inventory and I would start with only the largest of hotel chains and restaurants who I would supply directly from my factory as The Sumbrella is not a one or two dollar item and as with most startups cash flow islow due to all the startup costs. I decided to hired a couple of reps that had established relationships in these markets and the results have been nothing but positive with many potential Po's coming in the next few months.

A Cadillac Problem To Have
As you are well aware, I am writing this to you on Kickstarter as I need your help. I thank my lucky stars everyday that I have been fortunate enough to have the contacts to invent a product that everyone really believes in. The problem with developing a great new product, is that everyone wants it. That takes capitol, and as the sole owner of Sumbrella,LLC, the amount of money Sumbrella will need to sustain all the incoming orders is very hard to come by. As my friends father told me, It is a Cadillac Problem To Have. I couldn't agree more. Sumbrella, with your help, will be able to not only fulfill all the orders that Brookstone and other companies have placed and will place, but it will allow me to keep thousands of Sumbrellas in my warehouse to help expedite shipping and lower freight costs in the future.

Lighting Up The Night Sky
I have travelled to many countries and have seen some of the most beautiful places, but unfortunately I have also seen the poverty and devastation that is so abundant across the globe. In the last two months Sumbrella has transformed into much more than aPatio Umbrella that can be sold to households and hotels and restaurants. Sumbrella has become a life changing and life saving Solar Powered functional charging station that will help to light the night sky for hundreds of millions of impoverished men, women and children across the globe. There are over 300 million people that wake up and go to bed without power each and every day. The Sumbrella will allow children to read books and continue to do their homework and study even when the sun goes down, which will allowfuture generations to thrive and succeed unlike the generations before due to the lack of education and the ability to study at home. The Sumbrella will allow parents to read stories to their children before bed without having to remember to blow out their lanterns. Oil filled lanterns burn and injure over 6000 people a day due to spills and accidents.
The Sumbrella will help to eliminate these dangerous lanterns by having built in LED lights that charge during the day and stay lit for 8 hours during the night. The Sumbrella also allows the user to plug in a USB powered LED lantern or other type of light source.

Why Me? Why Did I Survive?
That is a question that has been haunting the most loving, caring, compassionate and special woman in my life, my soul mate and wife Kelly. Natural Disasters can strike anyone at anyplace at anytime without any warning at all. With the birth of the internet and media all across the globe we are now able to see and witness these disasters almost on a daily basis. Kelly was 48 hours away from experiencing this first hand. Kelly is a registered nurse and she has the biggest heart and always wants to help others in need. New Years day 2010 Kelly was on a plane to Haiti to work with an incredible organization that brings Dr's and Nurses together in third world countries to help treat the sick and spread medicine and vaccines to those in need. They go into the tiniest of villagesand towns and perform surgeries and give vaccines to the young and old and help deliver babies.These men and women are Saints. Well, 48 hours after Kelly left Haitito come home, one of the largest and most destructive earthquakes flattened Haiti and injured or killed many of the same men, women and children Kelly and The Dr's just helped. Why Me? Why Did I survive? That question has been recently answered as Kelly gave me an idea. This idea will change the way people stay in communication with relief efforts, safety personnel and loved ones before, during and after a natural disasters such as Hurricane Sandy, the earthquakes in Haiti, floods, ice storms and more.
Kelly gave me an idea which I just patented worldwide and will be available in August, 2013. Sumbrella,LLC will be introducing the world's only Solar powered emergency 10' popup shelter and charging station. The pop up tent will have 4 USB chargers. One on each Pole which will allow the user to escape the elements while using or charging their phones which will allow them to contact emergency personnel andloved ones to let them know they are ok, due to the loss of power from these Disasters. They will also be able to charge their devices so they don't have to drain the car battery, or waste gas while trying to charge their devices. As we saw with Hurricane Sandy the gas lines were miles long due to the power loss. Many people ran out of gas trying to charge their devices to keep in contact.
I recently contacted the red cross. The woman who I spoke with was so happy someone finally developed this item. She said they would have put up a tent at every street corner after Hurricane Sandy hit. That would have lessoned the gas lines tremendously and allowed worried loved ones to stay in contact. She is very interested in carrying The Sumbrellaand thinks the tents will provide a much needed service during times of disaster. I just received my final sample and it looks incredible. In the next few months I will be contacting many other relief services such as FEMA.
Kelly's-World





Sumbrella, LLC, has just started a non-profit organization called Kelly's-World. This life changing organization will bring alternative energy sources to men, women and children in need across the globe. Sumbrella,LLC will provide 1 Sumbrella to Kelly's-World for every 10th Sumbrella sold, which then will be delivered to Poverty stricken areas of the world or areas affected by Natural disasters. Kelly's-World is dedicated to all the men, women and children who have lived without power for much too longor have been affected by Natures wrath.This charity would not have been possible without my wife's haunting question, that can now be put to rest.
Kelly, you survived to help provide the world with an alternative source of energy that will have an impact on saving millions of lives by keeping communication open during times of disaster and power outages.
With your Pledges and Charitable contributions to both Sumbrella,LLC and Kelly's-World, I will now be able to spread the word and build up inventory that will allow Sumbrellas to be distributed across the globe to those in need.
Thank you for believing in The Sumbrella, Kelly's-World, myself and my story.
Best Regards,
Michael Pelletz
President, Sumbrella,LLC.
Kelly Pelletz
Founder, Kelly's-World

story:
Start a Faster Transfer and Higher Storage Experience

The iCrusers is an ultra portable and high speed storage SSD that can keep up with your modern lifestyle. The small simple design boasts many features, including high durability, water resistance, fast transfer speeds and universal compatibility. It can improve your work, gaming, and everyday experiences. 

Enhanced Data Transfer Performance

 

 

Transfer 60GB of files in 1min
 

iCrusers is built to equip the USB 3.2 Gen 2 Interface that boosts the transfer speed up to 1,150MB/s, which is 2x faster than SATA SSDs and 10x faster than external HDDs.

 

Fine and Smart

​The iCrusers weighs 35g, with a dimensions of 64 x 28 x 9.5 mm. It can easily fit in your camera bag, laptop bag, or even wallet!

 

Designed to be Smart for You and the SSD

The iCrusers is designed to be sleek and thin, while providing the best data transfer performance. While SSDs tend to heat up during the data transfer process, the aluminium case can smoothly transfer the heat to the surroundings, to protect you and ensure its stability and endurance.

For Everyday Use

 

 

Startup Disk is almost full? Fear not. iCrusers has a super high 4TB storage capacity, filling your needs for any type of work. And the super small size means you can take it anywhere and have it handy at all times. 

 

 

Durable & Water Resistant

 

 

iCrusers is drop and shock proof, protecting all your valuable data inside. It's been dropped tested 1,000 times to ensure its high durability. And it's also Water Resistant with an IP55 rating, so dropping it in puddles or minor water spills won't ruin your day.

Compatible with All Devices

iCrusers is designed not to be used only with laptops and desktop computers, but many other devices such as your smartphone, Switch, PS5, Xbox One. iCrusers provide high-speed data transfer along with a mass storage for your valuable data via USB-C to USB-C or USB-C to USB-A connection. 

Works with All OS

Different types of creators and gamers have different preferences towards their choice of operating systems. Explore your option with iCrusers - which allows you to boot Windows, Linux, and MacOS on your laptop.

Specs Table

Rewards

 

Testing Videos

iCrusers SSD tested with Blackmagic Disk Speed Test:

 

iCrusers SSD tested with ATTO Disk Benchmark:

Our Design & Team 

 Hand Drawing

Team Members

 

The iCrusers team is made up of a bunch of professional engineers, organizers, designers and administrators.

With all different specialties in product design, software development, hardware design, and marketing, we combine every team members’ talent to create the iCrusers.

Please let us introduce our CEO, who led the team from when the idea was created to launching the campaign:

Ivan Gao was a head of design in a prestigious tech company before he came up with the idea of iCrusers. Some of the team members followed his lead to build iCrusers as a startup because they trust his insight and ability.

Amy Wong is our operation and marketing manager. Having worked in the marketing field for over 5 years, Amy is talented in write-ups and promoting products to the mass audience.

Zhong Kai provides the team with his expertise in product branding, user experience research, product offering, as well as monitoring the testing and prototyping process. His extensive network widens the possibility of sourcing great components from trust-worthy suppliers.

And we have YOU, our backers.

Without you, this campaign would never have existed. We hope iCrusers will improve your workspace, or gaming experience!

Timeline

October 2019 - Concept development

November 2019 - Sourcing and Research

December 2019 - Prototype and Testing

January 2020 - Covid-19 cases started to rise

April 2020 - Design and Engineering Test

May 2020 - Sourcing Supplier and Manufacturer Deal

August 2020 - Kickstarter Campaign Starts

October 2020 - Campaign Ends

October 2020 - Survey | Preparing Manufacture Orders

November 2020 - Mass Production Begins

November 2020 - Sample Test and Certification

December 2020 - Mass Testing

January 2021 - Shipment Begins

 

Risks & Challenges

All Indiegogo campaigns come with risks and challenges, and ours makes no difference. We are confident with our research process and we trust our engineers, who had many years of experience of creating different kinds of gadgets. We have also minimized the potential risks by planning ahead and confirmed our major deals with suppliers and manufacturers. We understand the world is now hit with a global pandemic, we are also taking measures to contact our partners. All the partners we have are from the same province as our head office. This will not only provide a safe space for all our staff members, but also allow frequent visits and monitoring processes. We promise to keep our backers informed with major decisions and developments throughout the campaign until all rewards are fulfilled.

October 2020 - Survey | Preparing Manufacture Orders

November 2020 - Sample Test and Certification
December 2020 - Mass Testing
January 2021 - Shipment Begins

 
Risks & Challenges
All Indiegogo campaigns come with risks and challenges, and ours makes no difference. We are confident with our research process and we trust our engineers, who had many years of experience of creating different kinds of gadgets. We have also minimized the potential risks by planning ahead and confirmed our major deals with suppliers and manufacturers. We understand the world is now hit with a global pandemic, we are also taking measures to contact our partners. All the partners we have are from the same province as our head office. This will not only provide a safe space for all our staff members, but also allow frequent visits and monitoring processes. We promise to keep our backers informed with major decisions and developments throughout the campaign until all rewards are fulfilled.

story:
Among Five senses of us, vision is the most important for most people. Meanwhile, vision is also the most fragile sense.

Now, cellphone is becoming an extension of our bodies. However, this "part" of our body is damaging our eyes, brains, relationships and lives. We spend less and less time communicating and thinking, in turn, more and more of us become lonely and depress.

Even though we all know the danger of overly using cellphone, we still need to balance health, work and life. At Kingrow, we understand your struggle, so we come up with Kingrow K1

The Healthy Phone Cares About You

By using E-ink display, the Kingrow K1 adopts the principle of reflective illumination. It does not activate the front light source in normal visual environment, and emits light by external reflection source, which is no different from normal naked eyes. In the dark state, the front light is used to perform the reflective illumination, and the light source is irradiated on the electronic ink screen, and then reflected to the human eyeball for imaging, thereby eliminating more than 95% of harmful blue light to the eyeball. In this way, K1 can protect users’ eyes and reduce symptoms such as dry eyes, pain and other eye problems.

 

The Healthy Phone Cares About Your Family

As a parent, as a child, you care about your family. This is why, at Kingrow, we care about them too.

The French Agency for Food, Environmental and Occupational Health & Safety announced on May 17, 2019 that blue light emitted by LED lights would cause irreversible damage to retinal cells, leading to decreased vision, macular degeneration, and even blindness. ANSES urged officials to modify the maximum exposure limit of LED lights，

With Kingrow K1, the eyes of your family will also be protected. The phone can minimize both the blue light and interruption from the entertainment apps for teenagers, so they can stay away from myopia and other eye problems, as well as stay focused.


Your life is busy, you are always on your way, but there are always some moments you wish for a peaceful reading time without any interruption.

At Kingrow, we understand you, so we designed Kingrow K1 to help you. Combines the function of a phone and powerful E-reader, you can read your favorite book with the minimum interruption anytime, anywhere.

Moreover, We Are In Production Now!

We are happy to announce, we are now in production! If you haven't back, this is your last chance to join our shipping list! 

The shipping has finished!

story:
A Switzerland of bits, a Safe Haven

The International Modern Media Institute (IMMI) is working to create a Safe Haven for freedom of expression, freedom of information, the right to privacy, the protection of whistleblowers and freedom of the media. We need to protect those rights online and offline, everytime, everywhere.

Leaks like the #panamapapers currently require massive teams to protect the research of the journalists working on the story, and even then there's no guarantee of safety. Imagine a space where journalists can investigate worldwide crimes, free from the pressures of corrupt organizations. Imagine how much more corruption could be exposed if we provided a safer place for this work to take place - it could be the difference between the next big leak reaching the public or it being shunted by the rich and powerful.

This 'Media Safe Haven’ in Iceland will serve as a quality standard for worldwide reform and legislation for data protection, privacy, freedom of information and freedom of expression.

You can be part of making it happen - be a part of the movement!


Local laws, global impact: The Icelandic Modern Media Initiative

In 2010, the Icelandic Parliament unanimously adopted a resolution tasking the government to write the best possible laws for a journalism Safe Haven in Iceland. IMMI was created as an organization independent from the government to ensure that the drafting process of the resolution would be a transparent and successful process. Currently IMMI is fighting for its survival and is primaily run by volunteer efforts. If we are to deliver on our commitment we need your support


Access to Information

Journalists and whistleblowers need a space that truly protects them and respects the work they do, and we the people need a space that gives us information uncorrupted by the influence of money and politics. IMMI exists to ensure the birth of a free, open platform that safeguards, hosts and guarantees access to the information that belongs to the people.


One example can make the difference

Funding our effort toward the first *true* safe haven for journalists is the first step to the rest of the world becoming a safer place for free expression. Enough talking, let's start the process.


Help IMMI create this Safe Haven

Join us in creating a place where progressive modern laws protect privacy, information and expression. Your help is absolutely vital. You can help by donating to this fundraising effort and by spreading the word!


Our focus: 

Data Retention is a retroactive form of mass surveillance where everyone’s metadata is retained by telecommunications companies that are required by law to store your information. IMMI wants to remove Data Retention from Icelandic law and has prevented efforts to adopt the EU Data Retention directive in Iceland. 

Intermediary Limited Liability - IMMI is research and advocating for laws that will make intermediaries (such as social media, blogs, forums, news websites, etc.) free from responsibility for uploaded content, thereby making sure that these private companies are not the gatekeepers and censors of content.

Whistleblower Protection - IMMI has researched law on whistleblowers and is advocating for solid whistleblower protection laws in Iceland whereby information relevant to the public can be safely disseminated while also strengthening the legal position of whistleblowers.

Data Protection - IMMI wants to create a place where information is as secure as possible, where your privacy is best protected and any attempts to gather or trawl through your information by the secret agencies of foreign states are illegal. Whether you are a start-up company, a news organization, a journalist, a blogger, an activist or an individual, IMMI believes that everyone has a right to privacy. Sometimes, world leaders echo these sentiments, but they have not followed through on them. We want to create a safe haven for information in Iceland, a Switzerland of Bits.

Virtual Limited Liability Companies - IMMI will help draft a law legalizing VLLC in Iceland. This means that a company can register virtually in Iceland, benefitting from the jurisdiction in which it is registered. Therefore, if you are running a news website in your country and your government wants to shut it down, under this law if it is registered as a VLLC company, hosted on Icelandic servers, they will not be able to.


Process

IMMI participates in two ministerial working groups where research and implementation on two separate resolutions takes place among experts and stakeholders. Those resolutions are on the Utilization of the Internet and the Protection of User Rights (Ministry of Industry and Innovation) and the resolution upon which IMMI is established, on creating a Safe Haven for Freedom of Expression and Freedom of Information (Ministry of Education and Culture).


Where the money goes

IMMI is a non-profit institute controlled and financed independently from the Icelandic government, relying fully on donations and grants. Every donation goes 100% towards running the institute and building its capacity. It takes $7,500 per month to run the institute at our current capacity. We do:

  • Legal research (local and global)

  • Advocacy; submitting observations to Parliament on bills and resolutions. We provide opinon to Parliamentary committees on proposed laws. And we participate in international collaborative advocacy efforts and awareness raising for online rights and free journalism

  • Participation in the two ministerial working groups IMMI is involved in.

  • Advice for journalists, bloggers, activists, policy makers and other organizations from around the world concerning their legal position within Iceland.

  • Organizing networks of expertise in drafting policy or legislative proposals.

Our initial appeal is for $45,000 and will cover our minimum operating costs for 6 months. During these 6 months we wil seek other sources of funding through collaborative projects and research, with the aim of building further the institute's capacity.

Stretch Goals:

The more money we fundraise, the more we can do, the more we can diversify and strengthen our efforts.

$60,000 secures 8 months of minimum operating costs.

Beyond $60,000 gives us more power during these months beyond the operating costs, enabling:

·  More FOIA requests

·  Litigations to support freedom of expression cases (something we previously couldn't afford to do)

·  More awareness campaigns and outreach on the work IMMI does

You can also Support IMMI by Sharing this Campaign via Social Media and spreading the word. And follow IMMI on Twitter and Facebook.


Who we are - The IMMI team

Guðjón Idir is Executive Director of IMMI and has been working with the Institute for the last 2 years. Guðjón holds degrees in philosophy and psychology, and has an activist background fighting for the rights of refugees, governmental transparency and information freedom.

Birgitta Jónsdóttir - MEP, Icelandic Pirate Party

Birgitta is co-founder and chair of IMMI and the Pirate Party. She is an activist inside the system, a poetician and parliamentarian. She was the chief sponsor of the Icelandic Modern Media Initiative resolution that the Icelandic Parliament unanimously passed in 2010. Birgitta was also co-rapporteur for the Inter-Parliamentary Union’s resolution: Democracy in the Digital Era

Mörður Ingólfsson, Director 1984

Mörður co-founded IMMI. He serves as a boardmember and treasurer of IMMI. Mörður runs the 1984.is hosting company registered in Iceland. 1984.is has developed a reputation for fighting for their customers' rights.

Smári McCarthy, CTO OCCRP

Smári co-founded IMMI along side Birgitta and Mörður. He serves as a board member of IMMI. Smári is CTO for the Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Project (OCCRP) in Bosnia Herzegovina.

IMMI has an Advisory Board with experts and activists and IMMI has also been supported by brilliant people who have volunteered their efforts.
