Those resolutions are on the Utilization of the Internet and the Protection of User Rights (Ministry of Industry and Innovation) and the resolution upon which IMMI is established, on creating a Safe Haven for Freedom of Expression and Freedom of Information (Ministry of Education and Culture). Where the money goesIMMI is a non-profit institute controlled and financed independently from the Icelandic government, relying fully on donations and grants. Every donation goes 100% towards running the institute and building its capacity. It takes $7,500 per month to run the institute at our current capacity. We do:Legal research (local and global)Advocacy; submitting observations to Parliament on bills and resolutions. We provide opinon to Parliamentary committees on proposed laws. And we participate in international collaborative advocacy efforts and awareness raising for online rights and free journalismParticipation in the two ministerial working groups IMMI is involved in.Advice for journalists, bloggers, activists, policy makers and other organizations from around the world concerning their legal position within Iceland.Organizing networks of expertise in drafting policy or legislative proposals.Our initial appeal is for $45,000 and will cover our minimum operating costs for 6 months. During these 6 months we wil seek other sources of funding through collaborative projects and research, with the aim of building further the institute's capacity.
Stretch Goals:
The more money we
fundraise, the more we can do, the more we can diversify and strengthen our
efforts.
$60,000 secures 8 months of minimum operating costs.
Beyond $60,000 gives
us more power during these months beyond the operating costs, enabling:
· 
More FOIA requests
· 
Litigations to support
freedom of expression cases (something we previously couldn't afford to do)
· 
More awareness campaigns
and outreach on the work IMMI does
You can also Support IMMI by Sharing this
Campaign via Social Media and spreading the word. And follow IMMI on
Twitter and Facebook.
Who we are - The IMMI teamGuðjón Idir is Executive Director of IMMI and has been working with the Institute for the last 2 years. Guðjón holds degrees in philosophy and psychology, and has an activist background fighting for the rights of refugees, governmental transparency and information freedom. Birgitta Jónsdóttir - MEP, Icelandic Pirate PartyBirgitta is co-founder and chair of IMMI and the Pirate Party. She is an activist inside the system, a poetician and parliamentarian. She was the chief sponsor of the Icelandic Modern Media Initiative resolution that the Icelandic Parliament unanimously passed in 2010. Birgitta was also co-rapporteur for the Inter-Parliamentary Union’s resolution: Democracy in the Digital EraMörður Ingólfsson, Director 1984Mörður co-founded IMMI. He serves as a boardmember and treasurer of IMMI. Mörður runs the 1984.is hosting company registered in Iceland. 1984.is has developed a reputation for fighting for their customers' rights.Smári McCarthy, CTO OCCRPSmári co-founded IMMI along side Birgitta and Mörður. He serves as a board member of IMMI. Smári is CTO for the Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Project (OCCRP) in Bosnia Herzegovina.IMMI has an Advisory Board with experts and activists and IMMI has also been supported by brilliant people who have volunteered their efforts.

story:
Who We Are

My name is Monique Smith from Atlanta, GA I am the Owner of Unique Empire and the inventor of the NEPP. I am the proud parent of two wonderful children, both conceived while I was actively taking birth control. I know what you are asking…. HOW??? There are hundreds of thousands of women that asked the same question. It is not about whether the pill works or not, it is really about whether or not you have been taking the pill correctly. Dosage, timing and frequency all play a huge part in your birth control pill regiment being effective. I have constantly kept on the lookout for ANYTHING that would assist in keeping me on task with my dosage. I never found one, SO I INVENTED IT!!!

                                             

What We Do

Unique Empire will manufacture and market an automated pill-dispensing unit. The No Excuse Pregnancy Protector will help assist consumers in timely administering their contraceptive pills while not sacrificing style and sophistication. Nearly 67% of all consumers fail to follow dosage instructions for their birth control medications. The risk of unintended pregnancy is greatly increased by not following the dosage instructions.

Unique Empire's mission is to provide people the opportunity to live better and healthier lives though the use of this technology. We will provide a medication reminder compact, portable, fashion forward and cost effective package for the consumer which will use patentable technology to ensure safety, ease of use and continuous protection from unintended pregnancies and other health complications that may arise from not following dosage protocols. The target market is women ages 15 - 44. Sixty-seven million American women are in this demographic and it is growing annually.

Unique Empire faces competition in the medication compliance market from reminder devices, automated medication dispensers and compliance services. But those items do not focus on our target market. Teens 15-19 will comprise a huge share of our customer base.  The company anticipates working with a major distributor to get the product out on the market by the 3rd quarter of 2015.


Unique Empire is in the pre-start-up stage, and will be formed as a start-up LLC in Southeast, USA. The management team has experience in growth-oriented technology, business unit development, finance, and team leadership and development. Having witnessed the problems of medication compliance in their families, the management team is committed to being part of the solution. Unique Empire is looking to add sales, marketing and medical device product development experience to its management team.

The product is early developmental stage with patent pending. The company anticipates working with a major distributor to get the product out on the market by the 3rd quarter of 2015.  Projections are 105,000 units during Year 1 and 4,500,000 units during Year 3 (this will be due to the worldwide patent being approved).

The US has been hit by staggering statistics from the CDC, SEICUS and The National Campaign to Prevent Teen and Unplanned Pregnancy that 74 out of 1000 girls between 15-19 in rural areas become pregnant annually. With that number being 63/1000 in metropolitan areas, it proves that raising your kids in Middle America, does not exclude them from the chances of teenage pregnancy. The racial statistics are even more staggering. The further into Middle America you go, the lower the population of African Americans, Hispanics, and Asians get. Which causes a huge swing in the ratio of inner-city African American teenage pregnancies to Rural Non-African American teenage pregnancies. The statistics show that these numbers make the issue just as explosive and harmful in both communities. With the Hispanic, Asian, Native American and Native African populations unaccounted for in this research, we see a great opportunity to enter into this marketplace poised for success.  

What We Need

Unique Empire is seeking a total of $10,000.00 in order to complete the development of the N.E.P.P. This $10,000.00 will be used to: 

  • Finalize the prototype of the model

  • Site visits to select a manufacturing and distribution partner.

  • Apply for National and Worldwide patents on the product

  • Hire two sales agents to provide retail orders

  • Retain General Counsel

  • Focus Groups in the US 5 major markets.

  • The first bulk order of the NEPP to contributors

Now, let us tell you how the funds will NOT be used.

•  The funds will not be going to personal expenses and bills. 

•  An office building and expenses associated with having an office.

•  Expensive and elaborate marketing tactics.  

•  Salaries and/or bonuses (We cannot spend money we haven’t earned)

The Impact

We at Unique Empire are excited to bring you some GREAT Perks that will give any contributor a great product and the ability to be involved with a wonderful cause.

Also, we are currently designing various skins that will be able to be used to cover the NEPP. These skins will be made in various colors and designs. This will give a very personal age appropriate look to each device.

We have put a lot of time, funding and effort into our project but like many things in life, not everything can be completed by just a few. You and your contribution will enable us to reach our goal. You will be a part of a worldwide movement and be first in enabling us to complete production of our unique product. If you believe in our vision of putting a halt to the worldwide epidemic of teen/unplanned pregnancy, and looking good while doing it, then please donate to this project! 

We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Share your involvement in the NEPP product launch among your friends and relatives on Facebook and Twitter, and together we will bring the NEPP to life! 

If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us on the comments section of our campaign. For Press Inquiries please contact Monique Smith at missnique978@gmail.com

story:
Where is my car?

Where is my iPhone4s?

Where is my bag?....

That occurs to everyone almost every day. So we decided to do something about it, by making a small accessory. "ihere" for iPhone 4S/5 is a bluetooth-enabled, energy-saving device. It can run for three months on a lithium polymer battery. 

Simply attach the iHere to your cars, keys, handbag or pets, and locate them using your iPhone

Backers can vote on the final product look

Or

We will email you in June on which packaging is chosen.

It has beautiful design that perfectly matches your iPhones.

Only 0.374 inches thin, weighing 0.33oz. You can have it on anywhere without being looking odd.

Have it on your keys, handbags, pets，iPods, or even little kids, anything you want to keep track of.

iHere has a buzzer light, so you can easily locate your belongings, even in the darkness.

iHere has a reach of 100 feet, and lithium polymer battery that supports continunious usage for 40 days or 3-month standby. Besides, you can charge the battery with the USB cable.

The iHere app will automatically notify you if the iHere is running low on battery.

Yes, we have made an amazing app for iHere with many features...

Function:

The first function: to locate your vehicle at the parking lot

1. Park your car,

2. Push the iHere’s button,

3. The iHere app automatically will drop a pin in google map, marking your parking spot.

The 2nd function: To locate your iPhone

1. Push and hold the iHere’s button for 3 seconds, then release

2. Your iphone4s will start to buzz and gleam

The 3rd is to find your keys

1. Open iphone4s app and push  the "find" button

2. ihere will buzz and flash so you can easily locate your keys

Of course you can find almost anything, just by attaching the iHere

The 4th feature is to protect you from being anti loss.

If your iPhone4s and iHere roams further than 50 feets from each other

Both will start to buzz and flash.

We will also release the open SDK. Here are some examples of the application.

Traveling with iHere

You can also tie the iHere to your luggages. When all the suitcases flush out of the belt, you can sit down and wait. Once your suitcase reach the range, your phone will give you an alert, and you can take your suitcase. No more trouble of scanning every single suitcase.

Preorder your iHere now, and enjoy the early-bird price.

Compared with other product

1.Finding my car could cost $30

2.Find my key could cost $50

iHere = Find my car + Find my key + Find my Phone + Anti-lost + Battery recharge + two-way communication for only $25

Requirements: 

·iOS devices with Bluetooth 4.0 (iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, new iPad, New iPod, New Touch, mini iPad) 

Specs:

·Technology:

·Bluetooth 4.0 (Bluetooth Low Energy)   Range: approximately 100 feet 

·Battery: rechargable lithium polymer battery

·Size and weight: 1.527 inches  x 1.377 inches 

·Weight: 0.33oz

FAQ

What Smartphones do the iHere work with?

·iHere works with iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, new-generation iPad, iPad mini, and new iPod touch.

Does it require a separate adapter or special case for my phone?

·Nothing special is required. iHere can communicate directly with your smartphone via bluetooth.

What is the range of iHere?

·Approximately 100 feet or 30 meters.

How long will the battery last?

· 3-month standby time.

How do I recharge the battery?

·The bottom of the iHere has a charging port.

What kind of battery does the iHere use?

·The iHere uses a rechargable lithium polymer battery.

Are the iHere waterproof?

·Unfortunately, the iHere is not waterproof. Please keep the iHere from water. 

 

PROJECT TIMELINE

We currently have fully-functional units.

Our hardware and software have been finalized. Our App development is still in Beta test phase as of now.

We have identified all components that are to be used for commercial production, and have produced samples using these components.

Tooling (Injection Molding tool) started back in October 2012. Our mechanical engineer will inspect T1 off-tooled samples.

·The pre-produced 50 samples have been completed with T2 off-tooled by mid December 2012.

·App Development: App Development has entered final beta phase in December 2012. 

·Testing: mid-January, we will start an extensive 30-day product testing using beta testers. Products will be tested in USA (fremont, CA)

·Packaging: Retail packaging will be finalized.

·App submission to Apple Store for approval. https://itunes.apple.com/artist/bok-lee/id527094782?l=zh&mt=8

·Setup QC and assembly line in China.

May:

·Make final adjustments to circuit board, for final certifying.

·Certification completed for iHere.

·Start mass production 

July:

Distribution - Backers will get their iHeres.

Our Team:

American Naturalscope LLC, is a US-based company that develops modernistic bluetooth products. Our company is dedicated to and experienced in making buetooth products and related softwares. Our hardware and software R&D abilities ensure our competitiveness. We produce a variety of products for large enterprises, ranging from automobile to healthcare, many of which are currently being sold in retail worldwide.

Our product line includes bluetooth 2.0, 3.0, and 4.0.

Eric Li, a talented and experienced senior mechanical engineer, is the creator of this project. He has more than ten-year experience in designing digital camera as well as conducting market research for prominent international brands. He is responsible for designing the mechanics and the sensational consumer experience for iHere. Eric and Bok Lee, another creator of this project, have been friends and business partners for more than two decades.

 

Bok Lee, also a senior engineer, has been an innovator in the IT world for over two decades. Previously, he served as vice president of CTO, a prestigious medical company, and has been in charge of product development and design management for Philip Medical System since 2005. He has 30-year experience in designing high-level digital medical devices, including tools used in cancer treatment. Currently, his career focus is iHere, plus developing homecare monitor devices based on Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE).  Bok has been utilizing his extensive experience in embedded technologies on app design for the Apple iOS system. 

Bok Lee and Eric Li founded American Naturalscope in 2012.

Software engineer Michael Smith is also a key teammember. He has over 7-year experience in app design using C, VC, Java, .net, etc. Here, he is responsible for the developing communication protocol and apps.

Our app, “Here Is Your Car,” is currently downloadable in the Apple Store. We have released the latest 1.6 version.

We have made the product line includes bluetooth 2.0, 3.0, and 4.0  of versions  before.

Use of fund:

We've built our prototypes. We’ve worked out the supply chain. Now we need your help on the next step. We’re looking for funds to put iHere into commercial production. We know what we’re doing; We've led the development and manufacturing for over 20 hardware products for many large companies, so we know exactly what are required to succeed. You are getting in early, having the idea ahead of everyone else.

Your help is deepest appreciated to make iHere become reality.

Risks and challenges

A lot of time has gone in to this project and we are able to deliver on our promise.
We have now completed the development process such as the tooling as you can see from our videos and we are already to go into production immediately.
We are confident we can meet the schedule of June 2013 and we have given ourselves a buffer as a safety net.
We have produced many similar products based on the bluetooth 2.0, 3.0 , 4.0before.
Now we need your help to get this product produced and to market. We believe this project will be a huge success and we hope you do to and become part of this journey with us.
Any support from you will be greatly appreciated!
Thank you for your time!

story:
Short Summary

Signatronic is a project created by me, Aldo F. Mosti, and the team of Futura Technologies Limited. A company recently registered in England for this purpose. 

I started in computers and website development around 14 years ago with my first website launched in the USA in 2001. I became a developer in those days. That was the time of the expansion of Google, Yahoo and the Silicon Valley.

I formed Futura Technologies mainly because of the Signatronic project and other future high-tech projects that will be launched in the coming years.

Singatronic is extremely important for me and I think, for the business world, because the electronic signature is the future with a potential billion dollar industry in constant growth in the upcoming years.

The main market for the english language project will be the USA and the United Kingdom. The project will also expand to Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland and South Africa.

Although the concept is not new, the way we offer our services is totally innovative and I think it clearly beats any other alternative in the market.

Test the Technology Right Now!

If you help us now you will help the expansion of the digital mouse/finger/stylus pen signature and you will save the earth's environment tons of paper...

This type of mouse/finger/stylus pen signature is much more secure and it is as legally binding as signing with a pen and a paper or a digital certificate. Maybe it is even more legal than any other option, because you can much better verify: a) consent; b) identity of who signs and c) understanding of what is being signed.

The potential market is huge: a) Lawyers and Accountants; b) Sales and Marketing Departments; c) Human Resources Departments; d) Legal Departments; e) Webmasters and IT Departments; f) Accounting and Finance Departments; g) Small Businesses; h) Websites (all their Order Forms); i) Non-Profits, Sports Clubs, Organizations, etc; h) Operations and Administrative Departments.

How will the funds be used:


    To be able to succeed in this proyect, state-of-the-art technology, which we have, is not enough. Without an adequate and serious sales and marketing campaign, the project will not be able to launch properly. We need to execute a comprehensive marketing campaign online and offline plus optimize out technology on a weekly basis. For this goal we require $32,470.00. The funds will be applied as follows:

What do you get in return:

But we also have these exciting Perks for you:

$10 - Digital Stylus Pen Perk for use in iPad, Smartphone and Tablet with or without the Signatronic logo. Blue stylus pen with black ink color.

$10 - Thank you for giving us a hand Perk and making our project come true! You name will be posted on the Contributors section of our website www.signatronic.com.

$25 - T-Shirt Perk. A limited edition beautiful T-Shirt with the Signatronic logo.

$35 - QR Code Perk. We will create the corresponding QR Code for your website, logo, image or video. Use the QR code in your stickers, brochures, business cards or business stationary.

$50 - One eSign form Perk. One online signature form during six months with a unique URL for your contract, agreement, bill of sale, web form, power of attorney, etc. A $127 value. Upload and Set-Up of your document included. Unlimited generated PDF e-documents.

$100 - Three eSign forms Perk. Three online signature forms during six months with a unique URL (each form) for your contracts, agreements, bills of sale, web forms, powers of attorney, etc. A $285 value. Upload and Set-Up of your documents included. Unlimited generated PDF e-documents.

$199 - Seven eSign forms Perk. Seven online signature forms during six months with a unique URL (each form) for your contracts, agreements, bills of sale, web forms, powers of attorney, etc. A $385 value. Upload and Set-Up of your documents included. Unlimited generated PDF e-documents.

$350 - London's Dinner Perk. Meet Aldo, the project's creator, in amazing London. Have a tour of the new sales office that will be launched thanks to this crowdfunding campaign contributions and join him and his team to dinner in one of London's best restaurants.


The Impact


Your contribution will make a difference. Not only to us but also to you and to the advancement of technology and to the efficiency of the economy as a whole.

  • As a contributor you will be part of this new, revolutionary trend, regarding how documents will get signed and how signatures and signatories will be authenticated.
  • The world of business, the environment and society in general will benefit because: a) the impact on the environment is extremely positive. If more people sign electronic documents instead of paper, it will help the global ecosystem; b) legal documents and web forms will have more strengh legally speaking because of the authentication process which indicates 1) exact date and time, 2) IP address of signer (place of signature), 3) operating system (if signed with a mouse or with a finger, 4) biometric data (to analyse the signature), 5) referring URL (the exact online form from where it was signed); c) businesses will reduce costs and this will result in better prices for consumers and for the economy as a whole; d) businesses will also increase sales because of the simplification of he signature process; e) society in general will benefit because it will simplify the process of signing documents and it will reduce transportation and "transfering to sign" costs or faxing or scanning and f) both consumers and businesses will benefit because electronic transactions will be more secure.
  • In a few words, your contribution will definitely make a difference!

Risks & Challenges


No project is risk or challenge free. Telling you otherwise would not be honest.

  • Although there are almost no risks, the main risks and challenges of this project are: a) very improbable but possible server downtimes; b) Judges that are not familiarized with electronic documents or electronic transactions as evidence; c) countries with laws that do not recognize or protect electronic signatures.
  • Our Plans of Action to solve the above risks and challenges are: a) constant server monitoroing and maintenance guaranteeing at least a 99.5% server uptime; b) free seminars and courses directed to lawyers and judges to get more familiarized with this type of pieces of evidence; c) cooperation with governments and legislators of countries without electronic transactions laws to include electronic signature Acts in their legislation.

Other Ways You Can Help

Yo can also help us by:

  • Getting the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Using the Indiegogo share tools!

Short Summary

 
Signatronic is a project created by me, Aldo F. Mosti, and the team of Futura Technologies Limited. A company recently registered in England for this purpose. 
I started in computers and website development around 14 years ago with my first website launched in the USA in 2001. I became a developer in those days. That was the time of the expansion of Google, Yahoo and the Silicon Valley. 
I formed Futura Technologies mainly because of the Signatronic project and other future high-tech projects that will be launched in the coming years.
Singatronic is extremely important for me and I think, for the business world, because the electronic signature is the future with a potential billion dollar industry in constant growth in the upcoming years. 
The main market for the english language project will be the USA and the United Kingdom. The project will also expand to Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland and South Africa.
Although the concept is not new, the way we offer our services is totally innovative and I think it clearly beats any other alternative in the market.


Test the Technology Right Now!

story:
Not Japanese？ Click to English version of CASE campaign

!!!Update!!!

Great news! 

我々の開発メンバーは、7月にiOSおよびAndroidにおけるAppの同時リリースを予定しています。皆様に満足してもらえる製品を開発する為に、我々は一丸となって全力で取り組んでいます。

沢山の撮影ファンと支援者の方々から、有益なアドバイスとコメントを頂くことができ、深く感謝しております。その中から最も多い要望に応え、以下の写真のようにホットシューによりCASEをカメラに固定する方法を実現しました。

ホットシュー以外のCASEの固定方法もあります。また、何かご要望がございましたら、お気軽にお申し付けください。検討次第では、CASEはあなたの思い描く通りになるかもしれません。CASEは我々だけの夢ではなく、皆様と共に叶えてゆく夢でもあります！


CASEの斬新性は、すでに多くの撮影ファンおよび各メディアから注目されています。下記のリンクはその関連記事になります。

Click Blog; CASCHYS Blog; Photo Rumors; JuzaPhoto; Ilgossip.net; Pttl.gr; BackerJack

Be the First to Feel CASE Only @ Indiegogo

Quick Review

CASEを使って、スマートデバイスでCanonとNiconの一眼レフカメラを

簡単に無線で操作するができる。

対応デバイス：AndroidまたはiOSを搭載するもの

Compare

Supporting List

これらがすべての対応型式ではありません。カメラの対応機種につきましては、

気軽にメールにてお問い合わせください。

Operation

Live View

  • ライブビューは、ファインダーからスマートデバイスに
  • ズーム調整可能
  • タッチスクリーンでピント合わせ

Capture And Save Photo

  • スマートデバイスから無線で撮影
  • スマートデバイスのディスプレイで写真を手軽に閲覧可能
  • 最大解像度の画像をスマートデバイスで見る
  • 簡単操作で写真をインターネットに共有

Wirelessly Edit Camera

  • シャッタースピード、ISO、絞り、ホワイトバランスおよび露出調整とブラケティングなど全ての機能を、スマートデバイスから無線で操作できる
  • SDカード内のデータの再生と管理

Movie

  • ライブビューレコーダ
  • タッチスクリーンでピント合わせ

Time Lapse

  • 撮影間隔と撮影枚数の設定
  • 全ての撮影機能の設定(CASE Pro)

User Friendly

  • 4つの固定方法（ホットシュー、両面テープなど）
  • Appの操作は非常に簡単
  • iOSとAndroidのデバイスに適応
  • 拡張センサー対応（CASE + CASE Pro）

Who Are We

我々の開発チームは、想像力豊かな、若いメンバーにより構成されています。世界的にも認められる経歴を持つ者が多いことも、チームの特徴です。

すでにCASEの特許権を取得しました。


Why Indiegogo

我々は、写真を撮ることが大好きです。しかし、写真を撮る際、いくらかの不便なことに気が付きました。そこで、何とかして撮影を今まで以上に簡単にできないかと言う考えの下、CASEの開発を始めました。しかし、我々は起業の初期段階であり、一般的な企業のような余裕のある開発資金を確保できていません。そのような中、開発チームの工夫により、合理的に、限られた資金を運用し、プロトタイプを完成させました。この便利なツールを撮影ファンの皆様に、出来る限り安価に提供したいと考えています。しかしながら、現状は資金面における問題を抱えているいるため、次段階の開発および量産を進めることが非常に困難となっています。そこで、Indiegogoはこれまでたくさんの優秀なプロジェクトを支援し、成功させたという実績の下、Indiegogoを通して、皆様からのご支援により、コスト削減と共に、拡張センサーとCASE Proの開発に取り掛かろうと考えています。ご満足いただける製品を世界に提供することで、有望な会社を目指します！

あなたの支援が、このプロジェクトを成功させる鍵となります。

ぜひ、CASEを使ってみてください！

必ず満足していただけると確信しています！

あたなの支援は、我々だけではなく、世界中にいる、安価でCASEを購入したい方々に対しても、重要な手助けとなります。

資金は全て量産と開発に使用される予定です。出荷に関しましては、およそ３ヶ月後を目処に考えています。

Time Line

Indiegogo campaign timeline:

美しいパッケージでCASEをお届けします！！！

Stretch Goals

CASEはスマート撮影のプラットフォームであり、いろいろな拡張機能を利用することができます。

CASEの専用Appは、Google PlayとApple Storeにリリースされる予定です。

CASE と CASE Pro App の比較:

　

　

CASE now, enjoy future!

資金調達の程度に関わらず、CASEの開発は下記の予定通り行います。

Rewards

Updated perks!!!

　　　　　　　　　

一部支援者の要求に応え、刻印サービスを提供します。$10を支払い頂くと、メッセージをCASEに刻むのが可能です。刻み場所：CASEの裏です。文字数：16文字のアルファベットまたは数字に限ります。刻み内容は、メールでお知らせてください。

Risks and Challenges

我々はプロトタイプに様々な検証を施した上で、CASEは間違いなく信頼できる製品であると判断しました。しかし、製品をリリースする上で、リスクとチャンスが同時に存在しています。

(a) 販売量によっては、価格が高くなる。

検討した結果、販売価格は＄79になります。しかしながら、＄15,000（目標額）の資金を得られなければ、価格設定を見直さなければなりません。当然、資金の調達が不十分であっても、このプロジェクトを継続的に進めていく予定です。我々はCASEが今後、広く認められていくことを期待します。

(b) 供給と生産

いくらかのご支援により、量産が可能です。できるだけ早い段階で、量産開始ができるよう、我々は準備に取り組んでいます。

(c) 出荷

出荷時のトラブルをできる限り防ぐために、運送会社はUPS、FedEx、DHLのような信頼のできる会社に委託します。

Click to English version of CASE campaign

FAQ

  1. 配達料は、いくらですか？

    中国大陸、香港、台湾、マカウの地区であれば、送料無料。これら以外の地区に関しましては、送料は＄15になります。

  2. 発送開始時期は、いつですか?

    2014年7月より、発送開始と共に、Android と iOS Appを同時リリースする予定です。 

  3. 黒と白以外の色もありますか？

    今のところ、黒と白の2色しかありません。ご要望次第では、他の色の製品も検討させていただきます。

  4. CASEは、どんなスマートデバイスにも対応していますか？

    はい。CASE本体は、Android と iOS どちらにおいても動作可能です。

  5. CASEを入手後、CASE Pro App でも使用が可能でしょうか？

    問題はありません。CASE と CASE Pro のAppは、共にCASEに対応しています。

  6. 再利用可能な両面テープは、商品に付属されていますか？

    もちろんです。USBコネクタも付属しているので、CASEをカメラに固定する方法はあなた次第です。このテープは特殊であり、繰り返し使用が可能で、表面に粘着痕が残りません。カメラ本体に優しく、安心してご使用していただけます。

  7. CASEは、Sony と Panasonic のカメラに対応しますか?

    申し訳ございません。現在は Sony と Panasonic のカメラには対応しておりません。

  8. ライブビューの時、ズーム機能を使えますか？

    ズーム機能に関しましては、CanonのGシリーズのようなカメラ自体にズーム機能が付いているタイプにしか対応しておりません。ズーム機能の付いていない一眼レフカメラに対して、CASEはそれを拡張するような機能は備えておりません。

    注：ピント合わせの機能は、ライブビューの際、操作可能です。

CASEに関する詳細とご質問がございましたら、お気軽に下記のメールにてお申し付けください。常にFAQを更新するように心がけております。

e-mail: sales@cheeringtech.com


支援方法

ステップ １：ページの一番下にある「CONTRIBUTE」のボタンをクリックします。

ステップ 2：Perkを選びます。

ステップ 3：金額確認。例、「ブラックケース」のPerkを選択する場合、$79となります。配達先は、中国地区以外の場合、$15の送料が必要、$94に変更します。

ステップ 4：配達及び支払い情報を記入、完了。控えを発行する為、Indiegogoのアカウントをお持ちではない場合、メールアドレスをご教示てください。

CASE Pro）
Who Are We
我々の開発チームは、想像力豊かな、若いメンバーにより構成されています。世界的にも認められる経歴を持つ者が多いことも、チームの特徴です。すでにCASEの特許権を取得しました。Why Indiegogo我々は、写真を撮ることが大好きです。しかし、写真を撮る際、いくらかの不便なことに気が付きました。そこで、何とかして撮影を今まで以上に簡単にできないかと言う考えの下、CASEの開発を始めました。しかし、我々は起業の初期段階であり、一般的な企業のような余裕のある開発資金を確保できていません。そのような中、開発チームの工夫により、合理的に、限られた資金を運用し、プロトタイプを完成させました。この便利なツールを撮影ファンの皆様に、出来る限り安価に提供したいと考えています。しかしながら、現状は資金面における問題を抱えているいるため、次段階の開発および量産を進めることが非常に困難となっています。そこで、Indiegogoはこれまでたくさんの優秀なプロジェクトを支援し、成功させたという実績の下、Indiegogoを通して、皆様からのご支援により、コスト削減と共に、拡張センサーとCASE Proの開発に取り掛かろうと考えています。ご満足いただける製品を世界に提供することで、有望な会社を目指します！あなたの支援が、このプロジェクトを成功させる鍵となります。ぜひ、CASEを使ってみてください！必ず満足していただけると確信しています！あたなの支援は、我々だけではなく、世界中にいる、安価でCASEを購入したい方々に対しても、重要な手助けとなります。資金は全て量産と開発に使用される予定です。出荷に関しましては、およそ３ヶ月後を目処に考えています。Time LineIndiegogo campaign timeline:美しいパッケージでCASEをお届けします！！！Stretch GoalsCASEはスマート撮影のプラットフォームであり、いろいろな拡張機能を利用することができます。CASEの専用Appは、Google PlayとApple Storeにリリースされる予定です。CASE と CASE Pro App の比較:　　CASE now, enjoy future!資金調達の程度に関わらず、CASEの開発は下記の予定通り行います。RewardsUpdated perks!!!　　　　　　　　　一部支援者の要求に応え、刻印サービスを提供します。$10を支払い頂くと、メッセージをCASEに刻むのが可能です。刻み場所：CASEの裏です。文字数：16文字のアルファベットまたは数字に限ります。刻み内容は、メールでお知らせてください。



















Risks and Challenges我々はプロトタイプに様々な検証を施した上で、CASEは間違いなく信頼できる製品であると判断しました。しかし、製品をリリースする上で、リスクとチャンスが同時に存在しています。(a) 販売量によっては、価格が高くなる。検討した結果、販売価格は＄79になります。しかしながら、＄15,000（目標額）の資金を得られなければ、価格設定を見直さなければなりません。当然、資金の調達が不十分であっても、このプロジェクトを継続的に進めていく予定です。我々はCASEが今後、広く認められていくことを期待します。(b) 供給と生産いくらかのご支援により、量産が可能です。できるだけ早い段階で、量産開始ができるよう、我々は準備に取り組んでいます。(c) 出荷出荷時のトラブルをできる限り防ぐために、運送会社はUPS、FedEx、DHLのような信頼のできる会社に委託します。Click to English version of CASE campaignFAQ

配達料は、いくらですか？
中国大陸、香港、台湾、マカウの地区であれば、送料無料。これら以外の地区に関しましては、送料は＄15になります。



発送開始時期は、いつですか?
2014年7月より、発送開始と共に、Android と iOS Appを同時リリースする予定です。 



黒と白以外の色もありますか？
今のところ、黒と白の2色しかありません。ご要望次第では、他の色の製品も検討させていただきます。



CASEは、どんなスマートデバイスにも対応していますか？
はい。CASE本体は、Android と iOS どちらにおいても動作可能です。



CASEを入手後、CASE Pro App でも使用が可能でしょうか？
問題はありません。CASE と CASE Pro のAppは、共にCASEに対応しています。



再利用可能な両面テープは、商品に付属されていますか？
もちろんです。USBコネクタも付属しているので、CASEをカメラに固定する方法はあなた次第です。このテープは特殊であり、繰り返し使用が可能で、表面に粘着痕が残りません。カメラ本体に優しく、安心してご使用していただけます。



CASEは、Sony と Panasonic のカメラに対応しますか?
申し訳ございません。現在は Sony と Panasonic のカメラには対応しておりません。



ライブビューの時、ズーム機能を使えますか？
ズーム機能に関しましては、CanonのGシリーズのようなカメラ自体にズーム機能が付いているタイプにしか対応しておりません。ズーム機能の付いていない一眼レフカメラに対して、CASEはそれを拡張するような機能は備えておりません。
注：ピント合わせの機能は、ライブビューの際、操作可能です。

CASEに関する詳細とご質問がございましたら、お気軽に下記のメールにてお申し付けください。常にFAQを更新するように心がけております。e-mail: sales@cheeringtech.com支援方法
ステップ １：ページの一番下にある「CONTRIBUTE」のボタンをクリックします。

ステップ 2：Perkを選びます。

ステップ 3：金額確認。例、「ブラックケース」のPerkを選択する場合、$79となります。配達先は、中国地区以外の場合、$15の送料が必要、$94に変更します。


ステップ 4：配達及び支払い情報を記入、完了。控えを発行する為、Indiegogoのアカウントをお持ちではない場合、メールアドレスをご教示てください。

story:
Want to watch 3D Movies on your Phone?

3-D films have existed in some form since the 1950s.



YouSee3D The Story So Far...
My name is Steven Fletcher - Director of YouSee3D.

Over the last 8 Months we have been working on a 3D viewer that would work with iPhone, iPod, Windows Phone, Android and all Smart phones so you can watch videos from over 100,000 3D stereoscopic Youtube videos now online.

We created designs for a special Fresnel stereoscopic lens that you simply would hold in front of your phone playing 3D video and - wow - you see 3D...

The basic designs where fine tuned to get the best clear 3D possible, the lens even magnifies the video image to immerse you more into the 3D world.

We have now done a basic small production run and have been busy demoing to retail companies.

Feedback has been very good with pre-orders pending depending on the final retail packaging that is designed.

After spending over $10,000 from our personal funds we need to raise $7,500 to do a full production run with on lens branding and to create all the retail packaging and promotion material.

What do you get?

We have made available a limited number of lenses from our initial production run as a perk for anybody helping with funding.

We are also looking to get sponsorship that would include your business logo and website address being included on all retail packaging and the website sponsor page.

If you run a chain of stores we are even giving you the opportunity to have your own brand packaging done.

I hope we can get this product into many of the top retail stores, also there could be interest from Movie companies to co-brand the product for viewing 3D trailers of their next blockbuster.

In the future we also want to develop a range of iPhone and Android App's that marry up with the YouSee3D viewer and allow easy search of new Trailers and Videos. Another app will enable you to take 3D photos with any iPhone or Android Phone.







Watch 3D video on your iPhone or Smartphone with the YouSee3D viewer.

Watch 3D videos from over 32,000 YouTube 3D videos

MOBILE - Fits in your pocket with your phone.

ZOOM - Enlarges video.

WATCH - Trailers, animations, cartoons, sport, game demos and more...


HOW DOES IT WORK?


The YouSee3D lens for iPhone, iPod, Windows Phone, Android and all Smartphones contains 2 specially designed fresnel lenses that take video from a selection of over 100,000 3D stereoscopic YouTube videos and bring the side by side images together to give you real 3D on your PHONE - cool!.



Search 'yt3d' on YouTube with your Phone and hold the YouSee3D viewer in front - it's that simple.


Sample videos you can watch...





Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the news about YouSee3D, any news is good news.

Thanks for your time reading about us, I hope you see YouSee3d in a shop near you soon...


More info and links
http://www.yousee3d.com/
http://www.youtube.com/user/yousee3d
http://www.facebook.com/pages/YouSee3D/280901861933959
http://doyousee3d.blogspot.com.au/
http://twitter.com/#!/DoYouSee3D

About Me
http://twitter.com/#!/steven_fletcher
http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=29921673&trk=tab_pro

story:
Enabling development for SailFishOS devices

Developers are an important part of the success for opensource projects. Jolla have made good progress, first with their phone, based on SailfishOS, and recently success in funding the development of their Tablet device based on their OS:

  • I am an avid developer that contributes a lot (100+ applications) for SailfishOS.
  • To support further development I need assistance to obtain new devices and applications & hardware to support development.
  • This will help not only exisiting developers, as well as consumers obtaining the device, but also Jolla on further developing their device in the future.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I need funding to cover the initial costs of obtaing hardware for development.
  • I have contributed to exisiting device (Jolla Phone) with 100+ applications and application updates
  • To mention the most widely used: 

  • bash, Imagemagick, iodine, MidnightCommander, minidlna, mosh, ncdu, nmap, p7zip, postgresql, prey, sudo, tor, transmission.

  • But also interresting projects that can be further developed, like: cifsutils, clamav, cpufrequtils, davfs2, debootstrap, emacs, icedtea, qemu, sudo, tex, toxic, truecrypt.

Other Ways You Can Help

Post link to my startup on any social media or forums, spread the word, if you have already enjoyed my work, or would like to

story:
Hi everyone!

After the end of the indiegogo campaign  you can still pre-order hicon for a limited period of time and save up to 45%!

Get ‘em while they’re hot!

For any questions, feel free to email us at: info@things-lab.com

Thank you.

The hicon team: Johnny, Vittorio, Marco, Gilles and Tomaso

 

 Dear Friends and Supporters,

in the last month following your feedback, suggestions and ideas, we have worked hard on a very important implementation of hicon. Now, we are proud  to announce  that  we have  successfully achieved this  goal and we have  launched this hicon campaign part two, to spread the word  about this new main hicon feature.

hicon is now  equipped with an OLED display 128x32 fully integrated into the  wristband. With  the OLED display  you can read any notification is important for you instantly thanks to the Message Screen Display fully integrated into the wristband.  

hicon  gives you total control over notifications and  social media updates and the OLED display  will show you only  the contents and details of the  notifications that You choose, so you can stay updated discreetly and get right back to what you were doing in a second

We have had to work to a complete  and improved new  design,  while  keeping all the great features and  the hicon colors and the interchangeable icons that are still the same.

 

 

 

 

 

 

This very important implementation is  completed and we are advancing well toward the finalized product.  According to the  plan we will be able to ship to early adopters already in late June. Mass production will follow shortly and relative shipment will start by end of September 2016. 

You can pre-order now  your hicon choosing one of the  perks and  save  up to  the 50% on the official retail price.

For any questions, feel free to email us at: info@things-lab.com

Thank you again... we feel so grateful for your support, comments and ideas.

The hicon team

As seen on:

 

 

hicon smart wristband is all your social networks, made wearable!

Hi - We are Tomaso, Gilles, Johnny, Marco and Vittorio from Lugano (Swiss) and Milan (Italy) . We want to tell you about a product we really believe in. It's called hicon - The social Bangle, and it can simplify your life, keeping you  always updated only about smartphone notifications and social network events that are really important for You.

 

 

 

 

The idea:

In the internet of things and wearable technologies market, wearable devices and smart wristbands lack a true “social media  and smartphone notifications hub” that enable people to:

 

  • Communicate our personality and affiliation to particular social spheres;
  • Encourage visual recognition and physical interaction between other members of the same social networks;
  • Keep total control over notifications  via discrete, light, text and tactile  alerts  where we cannot have our Smartphone close to us: at school in business meetings, on the beach, while doing sports, while driving, etc. 
  • Customize your smartphone to alert us only when necessary, and read the alerts right from your smart wristband, not even having to take out our phone;

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Concept:

hicon is a groundbreaking, wearable communicator that helps you effortlessly to share your social media profiles and organize all your smartphone notifications and social updates. Tether this stylish smart wristband wirelessly to any smartphone via its intuitive companion app and go! Now all your social accounts like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linked In, Pinterest, WeChat Viber, WhatsApp and Google Plus are represented by customized icons that you can  choose to wear right on your wrist. When a selected notification or alert arrives on your smartphone, hicon gently vibrates and lights up in real-time and The OLED  display  will show in a discrete way  the incoming calls, texts, emails and social networks updates. When you wants to turn off a notification, a simple wrist shake will do. hicon also makes meeting new people a breeze. When users with matching  interests come in contact, if you have choosen this configuration from the available settings of the companion app,  the band will blink to help you make a connection. hicon brilliantly brings on-line social networking to the physical space. When it's time to transfer information between devices, do it with a simple handshake ... it's that easy!  hicon even locates your misplaced phone. It's 100% waterproof, sand and shock proof, so you can wear it ANYWHERE.

 

 

 

 

Meet hicon:

hicon wristband is a hi-tech, silicone material shatterproof,  shockproof and waterproof, available in many colors and textures, with interchangeable  social network and smartphone notification icons, it is connected via Bluetooth 4.0 L.E. to your  smartphone through its companion application and it is equipped with an OLED display 128x32 fully integrated into the wristband.  hicon connects to your SmartPhone and updates you on only the notifications you care, from social  networks or from smartphone applications (e.g. mail messages, phone calls, battery life) right at your wrist so that the corresponding icon lights up and vibrates with discretion. 

The OLED display will show you the notifications contents and details, so you can stay updated discreetly and get right back to what you were doing in a second

Thanks to the feature “exchange contacts”, you can exchange your business contacts and references of the social networks with other hicon users through the bracelets with predefined gesture, so you can easily find yourselves in the “virtual” world, share common  interests and passions on the various social network sites that you love the most.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

How it works:

Plug the icons  you prefer, choose the notifications you want to receive on your hicon and set as you prefer the light configurations. The icons will illuminate and the bracelet vibrates when your smartphone receives  the notification and you will be able to read instantly all the info, contents and details directly on the OLED screen. Might be an incoming call, time, calendar alert, text message, chat messages, email  or events of your social networks. You are  always free to dismiss every notification with a  simple shake of your wrist.

 

 

                   

 

Always connected through Bluetooth 4.0 L.E. !    

 

 

 

 You can add contacts to your phone and  exchange social media profiles  with just a high-five or a simple handshake. By tagging digital functions to this friendly gesture that comes naturally to us, hicon gives more meaning to your social interactions. Share your contacts and let your network grow!

 

Thanks to the feature “social matching”, hicon lights itself and discreetly warns you when you meet special people really related to you, your world and your passions and interests.

 

Thanks to the feature “radar" you can find through a geo-referenced map the profiles of other hicon bracelet users around you. You can exchange and  share contacts, references, common interests and passions and generate new  communities.

 

 

The hicon bangle acts like a tether to your phone, letting you know if you’ve left it behind. hicon wristband will notify you immediately lighting all the icons simultaneously when you go out of range. The 30/50ft separation alert will make sure your smartphone is always safe and secure.

 

 

hicon bangle Highlights:

Express your style:

Textures, colors and interchangeable icons to make your bracelet unique and capable of expressing the most of your social profile.

Always up to date:

Notification calls, watch time,  SMS, instant messaging and social pages: the hicon smart wristband vibrates, the  specific  icons light up and the OLED screen displays details and  contents of each  notitication.

With you wherever you go:

The wide range of colours, the stylish design and hypoallergenic materials make hicon the ideal accessory in every context.

Hi-Tech resistant:

hicon smart wristband, is made of shatter-proof silicone material, it is waterproof and shockproof.

Always connected:

Bluetooth 4.0 L.E. to be always connected with your smart phone and never miss a notification.

Make new acquaintances:

You can meet each other in the real world and share business and social network contacts with a simple handshake.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

These are just some of the features:

  • Choice and configuration of smartphone notifications you want to activate on the hicon wristband: call, time, email, sms, low phone battery life, calendar.
  • Choice and  configuration with icons of social networks and activation of related notifications you want to be notified on your hicon: follow, likes, messages, friend requests and comments.
  • Read any notification is important for you instantly thanks to the OLED display fully integrated into the wristband.
  • Stop receiving a notification with a simple shake of the wrist.
  • Search and display geo-referenced “radar” of the profiles of other hicon users with the same affinity as ours (level of affinity, which generates a notification on the bracelet customizable by each user) and installed with the same icons of our social networks.
  • Gesture recognition: Exchange and storing business contacts and social networks through personalized gesture (clap, handshake, high five) or via app if we are physically far; each user can choose which social and business contacts to  make them public and then share via configuration App.
  • hicon smart wristband lights itself and vibrates if you move to more than 30 meters from your smartphone.

 

 

 

 

 

The hicon companion App:

hicon is also an App dedicated and free for Android and iOS devices. It allows ultra fine-grained control of notifications to be displayed on the hicon message screen. Together with the bracelet allows you to make new acquaintances and to “socialize“ thanks to the feature “exchange contacts”, you can exchange business and social contacts and references of the your social networks, so you can easily find yourselves in the “virtual” world, share common interests and passions on the various social network platforms. Up to you to set the privacy level of your profile and You can decide what to share and what to look for. You can set and change any time  the maximal frequency of alerts and the priorities.

 

 

With hicon App you can record your favorite social networks and then associate them with the interchangeable icons:
Just a few simple steps to enter the world of hicon and you are free to receive only the notifications you care via Bluetooth low energy 4.0 from your smartphone to your hicon smart wristband.

 

 

 

Tech Specs:

DIMENSION & WEIGHT:

Height: 5 - 11 mm  Width: 14 mm  Diameter: 165 - 180 mm Weight: ~30 gr.

CONNECTIVITY:

Bluetooth® 4.0 BLE: hicon connects with modern smartphones and tablets thanks to the establishing Bluetooth 4 protocol.

HUMAN INTERFACE:

Lighting up icons with flashing lights.
3D accelerometer that measures your motion patterns to determine your   gesture, your activity and tap commands (like double tap with a finger on the  bracelet).
hicon smart wristband also contains a vibration motor, which allows it to vibrate everytime hicon receives notifications.

OLED DISPLAY:

hicon is  equiped  with an OLED display  128x32   fully integrated into the hicon wristband.

POWER & BATTERY:

The hicon Lithium-polymer battery lasts approximately 14 days when fully charged. You can see your battery level on your mobile application.
Charging is done simply by plugging hicon in any standard USB port.

SMARTPHONE COMPATIBILITY:

Modern Apple Devices: iPhone 4s and newer iPod Touch 5th Gen and newer iPad 3rd Gen and newer iPad mini and newer
Modern Android Devices Android 4.3 and later

ENVIRONMENTAL REQUIREMENTS:

hicon is waterproof. It should be able to brave all the elements of your everyday life whether you're in the shower or out in the rain.

 

 

 

 

 

Behind the scenes:

 

 

           

 

Where are we now?

  • Software Basis: OK
  • Debugging mobile app: OK
  • Expanding features
  • Production partners identified

 

 

 

 

 

Up to this point, we have been able to create dozens of functioning prototypes with the help of dedicated, smart folks who have put in their time and love in the past months to get us to this point. We are now debugging our mobile app, fine- tuning our web server and learning new tricks day after day.

 

 

Next Steps:

We're getting close to mass production and according to the  plan we will be able to ship to early adopters already in late December. Mass production will follow shortly and relative shipment will start by end of January 2016. However,  we still need your help and support to get the “hicon onto your wrists”.Your pre-order will help us with:

  • Series product run
  • Test series
  • Optimize the BOM and send the orders
  • Confirm the Bluetooth BT4 certifications (FCC, IC, CE, etc.)
  • Electronics (SMT) production and testing
  • mechanical assembly and testing
  • Packaging and shipping

The development team and production:

Around the project hicon bangle we have composed a fully team committed as follows:

Electronic and industrial design engineers for the programming of the microprocessor and the physical design of the bracelet.
Developers iOS, Android and Windows for the development and implementation of applications
Graphic web designers for the graphical part of the website and app
Expert in Social media marketing and communication for the actions of Public Relation. 
 

About Things-Lab company:

Things-Lab is founded by a group of tech enthusiasts with a background in mobile application, electronics, marketing and designers. The natural mix of their competences brings out ideas in the domain of Internet of Things and wearable devices. 
Things-Lab objects are unique in their simple design and easy to use characteristics, that is what people love from our work.

Company’s primary area of activity:

Internet of things, wearable devices, Connected devices.

 

 

 

Help make it happen for hicon Smart wristband BLE4.0  with OLED display and interchangeable social network icons and The hicon team!

Hi Everyone,

today we decided to launch a reward/referral campaign for hicon!

We want to give you your hicon for free! For every $275 in contributions from people you refer, we'll give you a hicon for free. That means if you refer 5 people that back our campaign and choose one or more hicon as their perk, your hicon is literally free!

 

How it works:

Simply pledge for a hicon to get your personal tracking URL then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the hicon page). Spread the word about hicon with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn your  free hicon quickly! 

Get creative — Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Stumble Upon, BuzzFeed  and blogs are great places to share your  unique URL!

The Easy Way: Facebook users love photos. Sharing your URL with Indiegogo's sharing tools is great, but sharing one of the photos on this page is easy and effective. 

Here's how you do it:

  1. Save a photo from our campaign to your computer.
  2. Log in to Facebook, and click "Add Photos/Video."
  3. Click on "Upload Photos/Video" and browse to the photo you saved.
  4. Write a quick testimonial about our campaign— be sure to share  your unique URL! (Copy your unique URL clicking the LINK ICON  below the main video )

 

    5. Once you have copy/paste your unique URL on Facebook then click "post".

 

Other easy ideas that takes a few seconds to do:

Post to your personal social media. Visit the hicon Indiegogo Page and simply press share buttons below the main video at the top of this page.

Post or message to other Fan Pages, LinkedIn Groups or Twitter accounts asking them to Share or RT.

 If you or a friend runs a blog or writes, ask them to do a story and provide your unique URL.

Post to the Reddit, BuzzFeed, StumbleUpon or similar sites with your unique URL.

 

Important Note : 

You can only be tracked as a "Campaigner" in the  Stats section if you are logged into an Indiegogo account when you use any of the Share Tools on our campaign. 

Any user that does not have an Indiegogo account can still have their referrals tracked on our  campaign's Referrals tab once you have  contributed to our hicon campaign. 

In the coming days we will be sending out an update to each of you with a status and confirmation of your referrals, so keep an eye out for it! 

Thank you again... we feel so grateful for your support, comments and ideas.

For any questions, feel free to email us at: info@things-lab.com

Let's do it together!

 

 

 

Risk of challenge:

The first challenge we will face is mass production. As a company, our goal is to bring our customers the utmost satisfaction with everything we make. The combined experience of our team members offers an extensive background in product development and mass production. Yet, in reality, there is always uncertainty in large-scale production and scheduling of shipments. In order to mitigate these risks, we are partnering with some of the most experienced manufacturers and suppliers in the industry who are specialized in high-end consumer electronics. Timing is the other challenge we will be facing. Before we can sell our product to the market, we need to obtain certifications such as FCC and CE to meet industry legal requirements. Usually, certification takes about four weeks and we would apply for it two months before our first shipment. We have high hopes that we will pass all certifications . However, if the product fails due to a reason that is not accounted for, we will be looking at a one- to three-months delay. Despite the risks and challenges ahead of us, we promise to continuously update you all on our progress and any other important news.

We've worked pretty hard to get this far...love to hear your thoughts :)

For any questions, feel free to email us at: info@things- lab.com

www.hiconbangle.com

 

As seen on:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Click here to visit the press area >>

F.A.Q:

Q: What sizes are available for hicon social smart wristband?  A: hicon fits to your wrist thanks to the open and flexible wristband for wrist circumference from 160 mm to 210 mm.

Q: How long does the battery last?  A: With a fully charged battery the hicon bangle will work for 14 days based on an average of 47 notifications per day.
 

Q: How to recharge the hicon bangle? A: You can recharge the battery of the hicon bangle simply connecting the waterproof USB integrated in the bracelet to a laptop or any generic charging adapter with USB port. The charging time for a fully charged battery is only 40 minutes via a laptop!

Q: Does the hicon bangle work with my phone? A: The hicon bangle and its App work with any mobile phone that uses Android4.3 and up, and iOS 6 and up such as iPhone 4s and successives.

Q: What are the dimensions of the hicon bangle ? A: The thickness of the band is 5mm mm and the thickness of the part that houses the electronics is only 12 mm. The band width is 14 mm all along its circumference.

Q: How to connect the hicon wristband to my phone? A: Turn on Bluetooth on your smartphone, look for hicon wristband  BLE device and once you see it, pair the device and launch the App. And let’s go!

Q: What is the connectivity range? A: In theory the range is 100 meters but in practice it's usually around 50 meters depending on geographic, atmospheric, and urban conditions.

Q: Does hicon bangle support Windows Phone 8? A: We focus on Android and iPhone now because we have only a limited budget. We hope to add it in the future though! You can follow us on Facebook and website for the latest updates!

Q: Is hicon bangle compatible with all the social networks? A: Not all the social Networks officially support the necessary Bluetooth profiles for compatibility with the hicon but We will try some workarounds after the core development has been finalized and will update all backers by then about the complete list of the social networks that we will connect to the hicon bangle.

Q: Is the hicon bangle waterproof? A: Yes, the hicon bangle is waterproof.

Q: Wich colors are available? A: hicon is available in (D)dark tone on tone  or (L)light  plus the following fashion colours: (P)Placid Blu, (V)Violet Tulip, (F)Freesia and (C)Celosia orange. Only for indiegogo supporters we have created a limited edition color (Hemlock).

Q: What kind of warranty will you offer for hicon smart bracelet? A: We offer one year replacement for any damages to internal parts or batteries, and all you need to pay for is shipping.

 

 

 

Thank you for supporting our project!

For any questions, feel free to email us at: info@things-lab.com

                                                                                                             The hicon Team

For any questions, feel free to email us at: info@things-lab.comThank you.
The hicon team: Johnny, Vittorio, Marco, Gilles and Tomaso


 
 Dear Friends and Supporters,
in the last month following your feedback, suggestions and ideas, we have worked hard on a very important implementation of hicon. Now, we are proud  to announce  that  we have  successfully achieved this  goal and we have  launched this hicon campaign part two, to spread the word  about this new main hicon feature.
hicon is now  equipped with an OLED display 128x32 fully integrated into the  wristband. With  the OLED display  you can read any notification is important for you instantly thanks to the Message Screen Display fully integrated into the wristband.  


hicon  gives you total control over notifications and  social media updates and the OLED display  will show you only  the contents and details of the  notifications that You choose, so you can stay updated discreetly and get right back to what you were doing in a second
We have had to work to a complete  and improved new  design,  while  keeping all the great features and  the hicon colors and the interchangeable icons that are still the same.
 
 
 
 
  This very important implementation is  completed and we are advancing well toward the finalized product.  According to the  plan we will be able to ship to early adopters already in late June. Mass production will follow shortly and relative shipment will start by end of September 2016. You can pre-order now  your hicon choosing one of the  perks and  save  up to  the 50% on the official retail price.
For any questions, feel free to email us at: info@things-lab.com
Thank you again... we feel so grateful for your support, comments and ideas.
The hicon team

As seen on:
 

 
hicon smart wristband is all your social networks, made wearable!
Hi - We are Tomaso, Gilles, Johnny, Marco and Vittorio from Lugano (Swiss) and Milan (Italy) . We want to tell you about a product we really believe in. It's called hicon - The social Bangle, and it can simplify your life, keeping you  always updated only about smartphone notifications and social network events that are really important for You.
 
 
 

 
The idea:
In the internet of things and wearable technologies market, wearable devices and smart wristbands lack a true “social media  and smartphone notifications hub” that enable people to:
 

Communicate our personality and affiliation to particular social spheres;
Encourage visual recognition and physical interaction between other members of the same social networks;
Keep total control over notifications  via discrete, light, text and tactile  alerts  where we cannot have our Smartphone close to us: at school in business meetings, on the beach, while doing sports, while driving, etc. 
Customize your smartphone to alert us only when necessary, and read the alerts right from your smart wristband, not even having to take out our phone;

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

The Concept:
hicon is a groundbreaking, wearable communicator that helps you effortlessly to share your social media profiles and organize all your smartphone notifications and social updates. Tether this stylish smart wristband wirelessly to any smartphone via its intuitive companion app and go! Now all your social accounts like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linked In, Pinterest, WeChat Viber, WhatsApp and Google Plus are represented by customized icons that you can  choose to wear right on your wrist. When a selected notification or alert arrives on your smartphone, hicon gently vibrates and lights up in real-time and The OLED  display  will show in a discrete way  the incoming calls, texts, emails and social networks updates. When you wants to turn off a notification, a simple wrist shake will do. hicon also makes meeting new people a breeze. When users with matching  interests come in contact, if you have choosen this configuration from the available settings of the companion app,  the band will blink to help you make a connection. hicon brilliantly brings on-line social networking to the physical space. When it's time to transfer information between devices, do it with a simple handshake ... it's that easy!  hicon even locates your misplaced phone. It's 100% waterproof, sand and shock proof, so you can wear it ANYWHERE.
 
 
 

 
Meet hicon:
hicon wristband is a hi-tech, silicone material shatterproof,  shockproof and waterproof, available in many colors and textures, with interchangeable  social network and smartphone notification icons, it is connected via Bluetooth 4.0 L.E. to your  smartphone through its companion application and it is equipped with an OLED display 128x32 fully integrated into the wristband.  hicon connects to your SmartPhone and updates you on only the notifications you care, from social  networks or from smartphone applications (e.g. mail messages, phone calls, battery life) right at your wrist so that the corresponding icon lights up and vibrates with discretion. 
The OLED display will show you the notifications contents and details, so you can stay updated discreetly and get right back to what you were doing in a second
Thanks to the feature “exchange contacts”, you can exchange your business contacts and references of the social networks with other hicon users through the bracelets with predefined gesture, so you can easily find yourselves in the “virtual” world, share common  interests and passions on the various social network sites that you love the most.
 
 
 


 
 

 

 
How it works:
Plug the icons  you prefer, choose the notifications you want to receive on your hicon and set as you prefer the light configurations. The icons will illuminate and the bracelet vibrates when your smartphone receives  the notification and you will be able to read instantly all the info, contents and details directly on the OLED screen. Might be an incoming call, time, calendar alert, text message, chat messages, email  or events of your social networks. You are  always free to dismiss every notification with a  simple shake of your wrist.
 
 
                    
Always connected through Bluetooth 4.0 L.E. !    
 
  
 You can add contacts to your phone and  exchange social media profiles  with just a high-five or a simple handshake. By tagging digital functions to this friendly gesture that comes naturally to us, hicon gives more meaning to your social interactions. Share your contacts and let your network grow!
 

Thanks to the feature “social matching”, hicon lights itself and discreetly warns you when you meet special people really related to you, your world and your passions and interests.
 

Thanks to the feature “radar" you can find through a geo-referenced map the profiles of other hicon bracelet users around you. You can exchange and  share contacts, references, common interests and passions and generate new  communities.
 

 
The hicon bangle acts like a tether to your phone, letting you know if you’ve left it behind. hicon wristband will notify you immediately lighting all the icons simultaneously when you go out of range. The 30/50ft separation alert will make sure your smartphone is always safe and secure.
 

 
hicon bangle Highlights: Express your style:Textures, colors and interchangeable icons to make your bracelet unique and capable of expressing the most of your social profile. Always up to date:Notification calls, watch time,  SMS, instant messaging and social pages: the hicon smart wristband vibrates, the  specific  icons light up and the OLED screen displays details and  contents of each  notitication. With you wherever you go:The wide range of colours, the stylish design and hypoallergenic materials make hicon the ideal accessory in every context. Hi-Tech resistant:hicon smart wristband, is made of shatter-proof silicone material, it is waterproof and shockproof. Always connected:Bluetooth 4.0 L.E. to be always connected with your smart phone and never miss a notification. Make new acquaintances:You can meet each other in the real world and share business and social network contacts with a simple handshake.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
These are just some of the features:

Choice and configuration of smartphone notifications you want to activate on the hicon wristband: call, time, email, sms, low phone battery life, calendar.
Choice and  configuration with icons of social networks and activation of related notifications you want to be notified on your hicon: follow, likes, messages, friend requests and comments.
Read any notification is important for you instantly thanks to the OLED display fully integrated into the wristband.
Stop receiving a notification with a simple shake of the wrist.
Search and display geo-referenced “radar” of the profiles of other hicon users with the same affinity as ours (level of affinity, which generates a notification on the bracelet customizable by each user) and installed with the same icons of our social networks.
Gesture recognition: Exchange and storing business contacts and social networks through personalized gesture (clap, handshake, high five) or via app if we are physically far; each user can choose which social and business contacts to  make them public and then share via configuration App.

hicon smart wristband lights itself and vibrates if you move to more than 30 meters from your smartphone.

 
 
 
 

 
The hicon companion App:
hicon is also an App dedicated and free for Android and iOS devices. It allows ultra fine-grained control of notifications to be displayed on the hicon message screen. Together with the bracelet allows you to make new acquaintances and to “socialize“ thanks to the feature “exchange contacts”, you can exchange business and social contacts and references of the your social networks, so you can easily find yourselves in the “virtual” world, share common interests and passions on the various social network platforms. Up to you to set the privacy level of your profile and You can decide what to share and what to look for. You can set and change any time  the maximal frequency of alerts and the priorities.
 

  With hicon App you can record your favorite social networks and then associate them with the interchangeable icons:Just a few simple steps to enter the world of hicon and you are free to receive only the notifications you care via Bluetooth low energy 4.0 from your smartphone to your hicon smart wristband.

 
 



 
Tech Specs:
DIMENSION & WEIGHT:Height: 5 - 11 mm  Width: 14 mm  Diameter: 165 - 180 mm Weight: ~30 gr. CONNECTIVITY:Bluetooth® 4.0 BLE: hicon connects with modern smartphones and tablets thanks to the establishing Bluetooth 4 protocol. HUMAN INTERFACE:Lighting up icons with flashing lights.3D accelerometer that measures your motion patterns to determine your   gesture, your activity and tap commands (like double tap with a finger on the  bracelet).hicon smart wristband also contains a vibration motor, which allows it to vibrate everytime hicon receives notifications. OLED DISPLAY:hicon is  equiped  with an OLED display  128x32   fully integrated into the hicon wristband. POWER & BATTERY:The hicon Lithium-polymer battery lasts approximately 14 days when fully charged. You can see your battery level on your mobile application.Charging is done simply by plugging hicon in any standard USB port. SMARTPHONE COMPATIBILITY:Modern Apple Devices: iPhone 4s and newer iPod Touch 5th Gen and newer iPad 3rd Gen and newer iPad mini and newerModern Android Devices Android 4.3 and later ENVIRONMENTAL REQUIREMENTS:hicon is waterproof. It should be able to brave all the elements of your everyday life whether you're in the shower or out in the rain.
 

 
 
   Behind the scenes: 

 
           
 
Where are we now?

Software Basis: OK
Debugging mobile app: OK
Expanding features
Production partners identified

 
 

 

 

 

Up to this point, we have been able to create dozens of functioning prototypes with the help of dedicated, smart folks who have put in their time and love in the past months to get us to this point. We are now debugging our mobile app, fine- tuning our web server and learning new tricks day after day.
 

 
Next Steps:
We're getting close to mass production and according to the  plan we will be able to ship to early adopters already in late December. Mass production will follow shortly and relative shipment will start by end of January 2016. However,  we still need your help and support to get the “hicon onto your wrists”.Your pre-order will help us with:

Series product run
Test series
Optimize the BOM and send the orders
Confirm the Bluetooth BT4 certifications (FCC, IC, CE, etc.)
Electronics (SMT) production and testing
mechanical assembly and testing
Packaging and shipping


The development team and production:
Around the project hicon bangle we have composed a fully team committed as follows: Electronic and industrial design engineers for the programming of the microprocessor and the physical design of the bracelet.Developers iOS, Android and Windows for the development and implementation of applicationsGraphic web designers for the graphical part of the website and appExpert in Social media marketing and communication for the actions of Public Relation.  About Things-Lab company: Things-Lab is founded by a group of tech enthusiasts with a background in mobile application, electronics, marketing and designers. The natural mix of their competences brings out ideas in the domain of Internet of Things and wearable devices. Things-Lab objects are unique in their simple design and easy to use characteristics, that is what people love from our work.

story:
DiamondShield™ mirror screen protector allows you to check your face one minute and your emails the next.

The DiamondShield is a mobile screen protector that will turn your mobile screen into a mirror when the light is turned off and will turn optically clear when the light is on.  You will never have to carry a compact mirror again and will be protecting your phone with an ultra-thin scratch-resistant screen protector so strong it can even withstand the power of an electric drill. 

See this actual live demo in the video above.

How many times have you seen a women try to catch her reflection on the screen of her phone or even take a picture of herself, just to see how her hair and face look? The DiamondShield™ solves this everyday problem by combining a screen protector that protects the phone AND a mirror so you can see yourself in a moment’s notice?

After months of R&D we now have a final working prototype as shown above. We now need your help to: 1. Get the final manufacturing setup for production for the most popular phones and tablets listed here and 2.Get our retail packaging designed and finalized before being able to sell this to retail chains. 

I was born into a family of inventors and I knew since childhood that inventing was my calling. I was Inspired by problems I  encountered as a female, a business woman, a homemaker and a mother of three, so I began finding solutions that save time and make life easier.

One of my solutions garnered the attention of Kelly Ripa, and her TLC television venture, Homemade Millionaire. So much so, that my invention, The Style and Go® Hair Care Valet, beat out thousands of others to become the winning product on Homemade Millionaire’s premiere episode and helped me to launch my company Simply Solved Innovations. 

I read about a company called CrowdHut in Entrepreneur magazine last February and decided to partner with them to help get my idea for DiamondShield off the ground. CrowdHut has a team of experts with all the product development resources I needed, including engineers and product designers. 

I am a member of Edison Nation, an incredible community of inventors, it was there I learned about the product development firm, Enventys, and the producers of the Emmy-award winning PBS television show on innovation, Everyday Edisons. I recruited the team to help me on the branding of DiamondShield as well as my video production and PR for the launch.  

Enventys has experts in industrial design, engineering, prototyping, web and interactive, branding and advertising, public relations and video production all under one roof to help you succeed from every angle. Instead of a singular focus or one size fits all process, they provide solutions tailored to meet your needs.

Over the last four seasons of Everyday Edisons, they have helped create and bring to market over 40 inventor products over the course of 53 episodes with their teams of industrial engineers and designers. 

To thank you for your generous contributions we have created perks at many levels: $10, $15, $20, $29, $500, and $2500. All levels will give you the opportunity to receive a DiamondShield protector before they hit retail stores. At $10, you will receive a personalized email from me, Marcy McKenna, thanking you for your support. At $15, you get to attend a Skype Q/A style conference call with me, Marcy McKenna, where you will have the opportunity to ask me questions about inventing, my experience on the show "Homemade Millionaire" or anything else that you would like. At $20 (phones) or $29 (iPads), you get one (1) DiamondShield™ CLEAR OR MIRROR scratch and shatter-resistant screen protector for versions listed below: 

    

Models 4/4s & 5

  

 

Models 3rd & 4th Gen & mini

                     

Models S3 & S4

To thank you for your $500 contribution, you will receive 50 DiamondShield phone protectors in retail packaging from the first batch we produce. 

We are also offering the opportunity to be featured in the DiamondShield commercial for a contribution of $2500. 

Please see the rewards to the right for more details on all perks.

 If you are not able to contribute to the campaign, you can still help us out by…

1. Using the sharing tools beneath the video above to share this campaign with your networks.  

2. Spreading the word…..Introduce us to any bloggers or media people you know that could possibly write about the campaign.
