DiamondShield™ mirror
screen protector allows you to check your face one minute and your emails the
next.





The DiamondShield is a
mobile screen protector that will turn your mobile screen into a mirror when
the light is turned off and will turn optically clear when the light is
on.  You will never have to carry a compact mirror again and will be
protecting your phone with an ultra-thin scratch-resistant screen protector so
strong it can even withstand the power of an electric drill. 

See
this actual live demo in the video above.

How many times have you seen a women try to catch her reflection
on the screen of her phone or even take a picture of herself, just to see how
her hair and face look? The DiamondShield™ solves this everyday problem by
combining a screen protector that protects the phone AND a mirror so you can
see yourself in a moment’s notice?








After months of R&D we now have a final working prototype as shown above. We now need your help to: 1. Get the final manufacturing setup for production for the most popular phones and tablets listed here and 2.Get our retail packaging designed and finalized before being able to sell this to retail chains. 



I was born into a family of inventors and I knew since childhood
that inventing was my calling. I was Inspired by problems I  encountered
as a female, a business woman, a homemaker and a mother of three, so I began
finding solutions that save time and make life easier.







One of my solutions garnered the attention of Kelly Ripa, and
her TLC television venture, Homemade Millionaire. So much so, that my
invention, The Style and Go® Hair Care Valet, beat out thousands of others to
become the winning product on Homemade Millionaire’s premiere episode and
helped me to launch my company Simply Solved Innovations. 












I
read about a company called CrowdHut in Entrepreneur magazine last February and
decided to partner with them to help get my idea for DiamondShield off the
ground. CrowdHut has a team of experts with all the product development
resources I needed, including engineers and product designers. 

I am a member of Edison Nation, an incredible community of inventors, it was there I learned about the product development firm, Enventys, and the producers of the Emmy-award winning PBS television show on innovation, Everyday Edisons. I recruited the team to help me on the branding of DiamondShield as well as my video production and PR for the launch.  
Enventys has experts in industrial design, engineering, prototyping, web and interactive, branding and advertising, public relations and video production all under one roof to help you succeed from every angle. Instead of a singular focus or one size fits all process, they provide solutions tailored to meet your needs.

Over the last four seasons of Everyday Edisons, they have helped create and bring to market over 40 inventor products over the course of 53 episodes with their teams of industrial engineers and designers. 






To thank you for your generous contributions we have created perks at many levels: $10, $15, $20, $29, $500, and $2500. All levels will give you the opportunity to receive a DiamondShield protector before they hit retail stores. At $10, you will receive a personalized email from me, Marcy McKenna, thanking you for your support. At $15, you get to attend a Skype Q/A style conference call with me, Marcy McKenna, where you will have the opportunity to ask me questions about inventing, my experience on the show "Homemade Millionaire" or anything else that you would like. At $20 (phones) or $29 (iPads), you get one (1) DiamondShield™ CLEAR OR MIRROR scratch and shatter-resistant screen protector for versions listed below: 
    

Models 4/4s & 5
  
 


Models 3rd & 4th Gen & mini                     


Models S3 & S4




To thank you for your $500 contribution, you will receive 50 DiamondShield phone protectors in retail packaging from the first batch we produce. 
We are also offering the opportunity to be featured in the
DiamondShield commercial for a contribution of $2500. 
Please see the
rewards to the right for more details on all perks.



 If you are not able to contribute to the campaign, you can still
help us out by…
1. Using the sharing
tools beneath the video above to share this campaign with your networks.  

2. Spreading the word…..Introduce us
to any bloggers or media people you know that could possibly write about the
campaign.

story:
Youtube MP3 Podcaster Everywhere


Glimmersoft is a small software company out of Phoenix, Arizona specializing in Mobile and Web apps. We opened our doors in January of 2011 with the launch of our first product, the Firefox Extension Youtube MP3 Podcaster.

More and more podcasts moved to 'Video Casts' that ate up battery life and processor time on our cell phones and MP3 Players. We made Youtube MP3 Podcaster solves that problem.

Youtube MP3 Podcaster downloads videos from site's like Youtube, Daily Motion and Blip.tv and creates and MP3 right on your computer running Firefox.

But what if you have an iPhone? Or an iPad? What about Chrome, Internet Explorer and Safari...

Since Day One the goal has been to bring Youtube MP3 Podcaster to as many devices as possible. To make it so anyone, no matter what their favorite phone, Operating system or browser was could benefit from the technology.

Now with your help that goal is in reach.

What We Need & What You Get

Everyone who contributes gets a copy of each device and browser. Full source code will be released under the Mozilla Public License, the same license Youtube MP3 Podcaster ships with today.

This Indiegogo is built from milestones; with milestones adding new devices, Operating Systems and browsers. Along the way some new features will be added and current features improved.

The entire scope of the project is large. In a nutshell:

  • 3 New Devices: IOS, Android and Windows 8 Mobile.

  • 4 new browsers: Safari, Chrome, IE 9/10.

  • 4 new features: Ogg/Vorbis Support, Logo Tagging for MP3, AV Capture and Slide Show creation.

  • Translation for English, German, French, Spanish, Italian.

  • Video tutorials and documentation (in English, but with an emphasis on visual how to).


Milestones

There are 16 milestones to unlock. As we reach each funding goal that milestone unlocks and we start building towards the next. They are:


  1. iOS 5/6, $2830.00

      This includes the iPhone 4 and 5, the iPad and iPad Mini and recent iPods.

      At this milestone 100% of the funds go towards buying the hardware needed for iOS development. The design of iOS requires current gen Mac hardware for any and all development.

      At a minimum we will need:

    1. A Mac Mini with i7 Processor + fast hard drive. (faster processors mean faster development)

      $1,099 + tax.

    2. 16 gb of RAM to upgrade the Mac Mini with.

      $150 + tax.

    3. An additional computer monitor, keyboard and mouse.

      $250 + tax.

    4. 4th Gen iPod Touch, to provide an iOS 4 device for testing.

      $229 + tax

    5. An iPhone 5, to provide an iOS 5 device for testing.

      $500 + tax.

    6. An iPad, to provide an iOS 6 device for testing.

      $599 + tax.


  1. Ogg Vorbis Support, $3,000.00.

    Ogg Vorbis is a music format with many advantages over MP3. Ogg sounds great and generally has smaller file size for the same quality. With this milestone YoutubeMP3Podcaster will finally have support for Ogg.

  2. Apple Safari support, $3,650.00.

    With the addition of proper OSX development tools Glimmersoft will finally be ready to bring Youtube MP3 Podcaster to the Safari Web Browser.

  3. Logo Tagging Feature for MP3, $4,200.00

    Youtube MP3 Podcaster supports MP3 tagging but only for text (artist, title, etc). MP3 has an 'Album Art' tag that adds a picture to the MP3 that displays while you search, play and organize. This Milestone will add support for that.

  4. Better format selection for higher and lower quality, $4,900.00.

    By default YoutubeMP3Podcaster grabs the highest quality audio & video it can find. This can mean huge downloads (2 gigs!). This feature will allow better control of download quality.

  5. 256 kbps webm + HD video, $5,600.00

    1. The higher resolution video and audio are separated on youtube these days. If we want to be able to download them they need to be reassembled, which is going to take quite a bit of code and re-writing.

  6. Av Capture in browser plugins, $6,600.00

    1. This will add AV capture to the browser plugins. This keeps YoutubeMP3Podcaster working between Youtube revisions at the cost of convenience. The plugin reads the audio stream directly from the sound card instead of from Youtube.

  7. Ability to split the video/audio up as much as you like, $7,600.00

  8. Google Chrome support, $7,900.00

  9. Translated Menus (DE, FR, IT, ES), $9,400.00

  10. Android support, $10,200.00

  11. Micro-console (Ouya/Gamestick, etc) Support, $11,400.00

  12. IE 9/10 Support, $14,400.00

  13. Windows 8 Mobile, $15,000.00


  14. Simultaneous IOS/Chrome port Development, $24,000.00

  15. Video Tutorials and Documentation (English), Unlocks FREE! after Milestone 13.

  16. AV Capture in iOS / Android. Unlocks FREE! after Milestone 13.

story:
Our Frustration: 

We all know how wonderful a smartphone is. We also understand how frustrating it is to carry an army of accessories to keep it stays cool while we hang out, such as tangled cables, bulky power bank, phone stand, OTG memory...the list seems endless. 

So a few years ago we challenged ourselves to create a better solution. One that's packed with essential functions you'll need on the go...in SMALLEST SIZE POSSIBLE! We wanted to create a better companion for you and your phone.

 

Introducing WonderCube! 

The world's smallest all-in-1 mobile solution for on the go generation, small enough to sit on your fingertip. It can unfold and transform in many ways to meet your needs. Carry one tiny keyring with nothing left behind:

 

Big Peace of Mind, Anywhere, Anytime

  • Snap anywhere; always be there when you need it
  • Super tiny, durable & lightweight. ( Only 1-cubic-inch in size, less than 20 gram)
  • Fits naturally to your belongings
  • Complete Freedom

 

 

A Cable You'll Have With You All The Time 

  • Type-C, iPhone Lightning(Apple MFi, Micro USB compatible. ( iPhone + Android )
  • No tangled cable. No Messy.
  • Integrated with a 3-inches foldout flexible USB cable.
  • Neatly folded in just 1-inch, the cable is safely protected without any exposed contacts.
  • Durable and compact. 
  • Designed to go with you everywhere.

Foldout flexible USB cable with 3 types of connector: MicroUSB (built-in connector), Type-C (adapter) and Apple Lightning (adapter). When folded into a Cube form, connector parts remain concealed and protected.

 

Quick Charge Anywhere Anytime

For those all-too-often instances of low battery, WonderCube is always there to power up your devices, whether you are on a trip, at cafe, in car, at work or anywhere on the go.

  • High speed optimal charging supports up to 3A. 
  • The built-in connectors ensure fast charging through any USB port to keep you stay connected.

WonderCube is always there to power up your devices, whether you are on a trip, at cafe, a car ride, at work or anywhere on the go.

 

KickStand: Portrait + Landscape

WonderCube has you covered with its innovative phone stand to prop up your phone in portrait or landscape mode to watch a movie or Skype on the go.

  • Strong and reusable micro-adhesive backing (3M™) 
  • Easily attach or detach on phone back panel as a stable kickstand.
  • Stick to different positions to adjust your best viewing angle.

Get the best viewing angle, every time. Portrait, landscape, it all works!

Features a strong and reusable micro-adhesive backing. Easily attach on phone back panel as a handy kickstand. Stick on different position to adjust viewing angle.

 

Extra Memory On The Go

  • Features a built-in micro-SD card reader.
  • Expand your phone capacity for extra 128GB. (micro-SD support)
  • Share photo, music, movie during your next trip.
  • Works perfectly as a USB Flash Drive.

(Note: OTG function currently works on Android devices only)

Features built-in microSD card reader support up to 128GB memory transfer. Works as USB Flash Drive and OTG for smartphones.

 

Drained Phone NO MORE!

We all share that desperate feeling holding a drained phone. Never again!

  • Integrated with a battery charger, ready for emergency power boost anytime.
  • Just pop the top open and plug in a 9V battery from any nearby store, to give an significant boost for up to 2-3hrs extra talk time for both iOS and Android devices.

Significant boost up to approx. 2-3 hrs extra talking time for iOS & Android devices

 

Back-Up & Transfer Data Anytime

WonderCube is a fully functional cable for file transfers and back up. A quick and handy way to sync up your photos, music and videos with or without a network.

 

LED Mini Torch

Whether you're coming home late or trying to find something in the dark. WonderCube has you covered with a convenient LED mini torch. All-in-1 WonderCube disguised as a handy LED keyring torch designed for your everyday journey.

WonderCube disguised as a handy torch lives on your keyring.

 

 

WonderCube is compatible to both Apple and Android devices. It works perfectly with any device that requires a Lightning connector (such as iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11, iPhone X, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 plus, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus, iPad, iPad Mini etc.) , a Type C or MicroUSB connector (such as Android phones, mini speakers, headphones, bluetooth earbuds etc.) 

Apple MFi certified / 100% Compatibility

WonderCube's Lightning connector is Apple MFi certified. Each connector contains a unique, verified serial number and an authorization chip issued by Apple to ensure 100% compatibilty with any Lightning device.

 

 

 

WonderCube is made of  Polycarbonate, durable ABS and Aluminium. Weighting approx. 20grams. Measuring 3 inches (76.2mm) when extended, and just 1 inch (25.4mm) when closed.

Compatibility: WonderCube Pro comes with 3 connectors: Apple Lightning(Mfi certified), Type-C and Micro USB. It compatible with market majority smart devices. (Including the latest iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11, iPhoneX, iPhone8, iPhone8 Plus, Samsung Note10, GalaxyS10, S10+, Note9, GalaxyS9, S9+, Note8, GalaxyS8, S8+...etc.)

 

WonderCube was invented by award Industrial Designer, Him Ng, Winnie Hui (the 2 founders of Mutants DesignLab) in 2014. We believed that there has to be a better way to accommodate our needs on the go with smartphone. Tired of carrying around bulky and easy-to-forget accessories like cables, charger, phone stand, we started to build something much more compact, versatile and easy to use!

We raised $430,000 on Indiegogo last year from over 6,700 amazing backers. WonderCube was shipped worldwide. It won global design awards, and was starred on TV, magazines, and various channels. This year, we launch the improved version of WonderCube with significant upgrades from previous generation: All Devices Compatible (TypeC + Apple MFi Lightning + MicroUSB), fast charging speed (up to 3A), expanded memory capacity (128Gb support), strong & reusable micro-adhesive backing and reinforced light-weight material.

WonderCube represents our passion, our pursuit of designing products aiming to make life easier and fun for modern mobile life. Thank you to every fan and supporter who’s shown us love along the way.
 

 

How WonderCube is created:

Smart devices are great. They make our lives more convenient and certainly more productive. Yet, they have always come with quite a number of accessories, which individually provide solutions such as charging battery, standing up your phone for the perfect viewing angle, storing and syncing data…etc. However, many of them are bulky and easy to forget.

Our quest was simple: 

We believe it's time to re-think a better way to carry those “solutions” with us. 

Multiple solutions in 1 design? It just NOT ENOUGH! It needed to be portable, easy to use and fit into our daily lives naturally. Obsessed with simplicity, a utilitarian and intuitive UX (user experience) design, we set to create the smallest possible product that included multiple essential solutions in one simple design. The result was a small and lightweight 8-in-1 product that you will love. WonderCube is reliable and useful in every situation.

Design evolution of the WonderCube from paper mockups to rapid-prototypes​

 

We spent the first 2 and half months examining how people use and carry smart accessories. We talked to people to understand which accessories they usually carry around and what they like and dislike. Inspired by the data we collected, we then started brainstorming and sketching thumbnails to better imagine solutions for them...and if there any latent needs we might be uncovering. 

We narrowed down and focused on the following aspects: Charging, Data storing/transferring, Emergency relieving. We also marked some common frustrations for carrying and using those accessories:

  • messing up your bag, backpack or purse
  • easy to forget (especially in a hurry which is a norm nowadays)
  • carrying more and more accessories means adding burden to your shoulders

Once we were set on several key directions, we moved from paper to action. We built quick prototypes using clay and paper, to get a hand-on experience for better understanding the strengths and weaknesses of our concepts. Having evolved through several versions, we moved to rapid prototyping and tested with users. We believe by putting our ideas into actual contexts and by acquiring feedback through user testing, the design evolved to better meet the needs of our users.

A year later and we are ready to present the fruits of our labor to you -- and we couldn't be more proud. WonderCube, it revolutionizes the way you carry and use accessories. It’s ultra-portable and exceptionally functional. All of this was only made possible by the endless pursuit of elegant and efficient design, paying attention to every detail (and every millimeter...) and selecting the most advanced engineering techniques.

 

Risks and challenges

This is no longer our first campaign, and there are many reasons why we expect to deliver faster than last time. For one, this version is much improved but similar enough that we can reuse much of what we have learned. 
Second, we're further along in the manufacturing process; Tooling has already finished and early bird units are already in production. Third, our new manufacturer is much more experienced with high volumes of smartphone accessories. 

 

 

FAQ

When will I receive m order?

The shipping time is indicated in your perk details. Once your order is shipped, a tracking number will e emailed to you hortl after. Tranit time depend on local deliver peed and cutom clearance.

 

Doe it come with a warrant?

Ye! WonderCue come with a one ear warrant for an manufacturer' defect. Thi warrant doe not cover an damage or defect incurred with normal wear & tear. If unit have een diaemled or repaired without authorization from the manufacturer, warrant will e voided.

 

Where do ou hip to?

All over the world! ;­)


ome countrie ma e uject to import dutie. We recommend that ou check with our cutom for detail. Backer is responsible for the duties. 


How do we contact ou?
For all cutomer ervice inquirie, pleae reach out to wondercue@thewondercue.com. We look forward to hearing from ou!

WonderCube was shipped worldwide. It won global design awards, and was starred on TV, magazines, and various channels. This year, we launch the improved version of WonderCube with significant upgrades from previous generation: All Devices Compatible (TypeC + Apple MFi Lightning + MicroUSB), fast charging speed (up to 3A), expanded memory capacity (128Gb support), strong & reusable micro-adhesive backing and reinforced light-weight material.WonderCube represents our passion, our pursuit of designing products aiming to make life easier and fun for modern mobile life. Thank you to every fan and supporter who’s shown us love along the way.  How WonderCube is created:Smart devices are great. They make our lives more convenient and certainly more productive. Yet, they have always come with quite a number of accessories, which individually provide solutions such as charging battery, standing up your phone for the perfect viewing angle, storing and syncing data…etc. However, many of them are bulky and easy to forget.Our quest was simple: We believe it's time to re-think a better way to carry those “solutions” with us. Multiple solutions in 1 design? It just NOT ENOUGH! It needed to be portable, easy to use and fit into our daily lives naturally. Obsessed with simplicity, a utilitarian and intuitive UX (user experience) design, we set to create the smallest possible product that included multiple essential solutions in one simple design. The result was a small and lightweight 8-in-1 product that you will love. WonderCube is reliable and useful in every situation.Design evolution of the WonderCube from paper mockups to rapid-prototypes​ We spent the first 2 and half months examining how people use and carry smart accessories. We talked to people to understand which accessories they usually carry around and what they like and dislike. Inspired by the data we collected, we then started brainstorming and sketching thumbnails to better imagine solutions for them...and if there any latent needs we might be uncovering. We narrowed down and focused on the following aspects: Charging, Data storing/transferring, Emergency relieving. We also marked some common frustrations for carrying and using those accessories:
messing up your bag, backpack or purse
easy to forget (especially in a hurry which is a norm nowadays)
carrying more and more accessories means adding burden to your shoulders
Once we were set on several key directions, we moved from paper to action. We built quick prototypes using clay and paper, to get a hand-on experience for better understanding the strengths and weaknesses of our concepts. Having evolved through several versions, we moved to rapid prototyping and tested with users. We believe by putting our ideas into actual contexts and by acquiring feedback through user testing, the design evolved to better meet the needs of our users.A year later and we are ready to present the fruits of our labor to you -- and we couldn't be more proud. WonderCube, it revolutionizes the way you carry and use accessories. It’s ultra-portable and exceptionally functional. All of this was only made possible by the endless pursuit of elegant and efficient design, paying attention to every detail (and every millimeter...) and selecting the most advanced engineering techniques. Risks and challengesThis is no longer our first campaign, and there are many reasons why we expect to deliver faster than last time. For one, this version is much improved but similar enough that we can reuse much of what we have learned. Second, we're further along in the manufacturing process; Tooling has already finished and early bird units are already in production. Third, our new manufacturer is much more experienced with high volumes of smartphone accessories.   FAQWhen will I receive m order?The shipping time is indicated in your perk details. Once your order is shipped, a tracking number will e emailed to you hortl after. Tranit time depend on local deliver peed and cutom clearance. Doe it come with a warrant?Ye! WonderCue come with a one ear warrant for an manufacturer' defect. Thi warrant doe not cover an damage or defect incurred with normal wear & tear. If unit have een diaemled or repaired without authorization from the manufacturer, warrant will e voided. Where do ou hip to?All over the world! ;­)ome countrie ma e uject to import dutie. We recommend that ou check with our cutom for detail. Backer is responsible for the duties. How do we contact ou?For all cutomer ervice inquirie, pleae reach out to wondercue@thewondercue.com. We look forward to hearing from ou!

story:
Update:

Plans Now Available! Visit us at www.SolarStation.com

www.SolarStation.com

(Archived) 

Introducing the Solar Station "Lander," 

The world's fastest & easiest solar power system


Just point it at the sun and plug into fun

The Lander is for recreational power and outdoor adventures. 

DIY friendly design. It comes complete (batteries included)



What can you do with solar power + extra space?

Here are just a few of the benefits: 

Have a shelter option during an emergency


Download a gear list at http://solarstation.com/emergency


Why did we create Solar Station?

Because a clean environment is our birth right

 


PROBLEM: Without clean energy it's...

Business as usual = drought, pollution & conflict



SOLUTION: Solar Station

What if solar power was fast, simple & scalable? Generated locally? 

With added functionality and an exceptional user experience?



OUR VISION: Recolonize Earth with solar power

Create clean energy, opportunity and foster connection... rapidly



NEXT STEPS: Raise $30,000 to build version 3

It's prime time now! Let's go mass market. Bigger. Bolder. Could we build a citizen supercharger network?

2000 watt solar | 3000 watt inverter | larger batteries | small server



Turn up the juice! Let's charge homes & cars

Together we can change the world. Your support buys the needed materials



Construction on version 3 has already started!

Thanks to your contributions we have already begun. Stay tuned and watch v3 develop over the campaign.

Adding more panels now. Stay tuned for updates!


As seen in





3 big ideas that make solar station unique:

1) Automate and standardize. Complete power systems in place of custom
2) Use exponential thinking to rapidly scale. Dematerialize the polluting power grid
3) Value bundle. Combine solar with internet and space to make it more personal


Team leadership


Spread the Word

  • Tell your friends
  • Send the campaign to your favorite blogs and local media
  • Like and share us on facebook, twitter and social media
  • Indiegogo has sharing tools too!

story:
About the Inventor


My name is Pat Mulrooney, I have three children and live with my wife of 30 years in Lanark, Ontario, a small town west of Ottawa, Canada's capital. I am currently employed as a senior site superintendent for a commercial builder in Ottawa. As a project superintendent, one of my major responsibilities is the health and safety of all workers on my site. I am not a writer, this will become apparent as you read on; I have no technical background whatsoever, please appreciate this and be patient if you ask technical questions. I simply have an idea that I believe in, and need your help getting it out there with the hope that it will help others.


The Idea

The idea for the app came to me after having to close my jobsite because I had commitments elseware and could not in clear conscience leave my lead hand alone on the construction site. Without strict protocols in place it is unlawful to leave a worker alone in Ontario. The idea was a simple one, an app that would perform two functions; first it prompt the worker at preset intervals by way of an alarm to disable the device; and second if for any reason the worker was unable to disable it a call would be generated to a co-worker, dispatcher, friend or family member that something was wrong.

Not in the construction industry?

This app has more uses than you can imagine!

Does your wife or daughter run? If she does my guess is she runs either early in the morning or late evening. One of the features of this app is a panic button. In a case like this once armed all she has to do is hit the button and the call/text/email is sent as well, as GPS coordinates. Piece of mind for both of you.

What about the security industry. The lone patrol guard now has that extra comfort factor while on a late watch in a remote area.

Babysitters, store clerks, home alone children, hunters, farmers, service technicians, even something as simple as a blind date can have that extra secure feeling knowing someone you know and trust is on the other end of a distress call.


The name may be Work-Safe as it was conceived in the construction industry, but could just as easily be Run-Safe, Sit-Safe, Date-Safe, Hunt-Safe, Secure-Safe.... 


Work Safe provides an alarm system when workers are in a position where they are expected to work alone. It will give the user working alone the confidence and piece of mind knowing, that if something happens help will arrive shortly. 


How Will it Work?

The app has unique features not presently available in the marketplace, many that I cannot reveal as it would compromise the development of the app. Although the programming has not yet been developed and is still in the developmental stages, an explanation of possible operation is as follows: Parameters are preset so that depending on the level of danger, the program will prompt the user to disable the app at preset intervals. At this stage we have chosen three levels of danger represented by colored buttons on the screen, green yellow and red. Once the app activated, and if the user does not deactivate it each time the alarm goes off, the app will generate a call/text message/email to whomever takes emergency calls. That person will attempt to contact the worker, and if unsuccessful will dispatch help immediately. The user may choose to simply arm the device and use the panic button to generate a call/text/email in the event of an emergency. Features such as GPS, audible, visual and vibration will be incorporated into the alarm. Impact sensors that will detect a fall and generate a call are also being incorporated as part of the app. This app may have been conceived for work,  but the uses and possibilities are endless.


Why does your contribution matter?


We have all heard and read stories on the news about tragedies involving  workers being injured or worse while working alone. I can't say that this app will solve all the problems associated with working or playing alone, but what if it helps avoid one critical injury. What if that one runner out for a late night run is kept out of harms way. What if that worker, runner, security guard or baby sitter was your husband, wife, son or daughter? Wouldn't you feel better knowing they are but a push of a button from getting the help they need?


Play-Safe


How will your investment be spent?


At this point I have invested thousands of dollars and spent countless hours on development and progress of the idea. I am at a point where I need help if I am going to see this through to the end. The goal I set at 40,000 (CAD) breaks down as follows:

  • $25,000.00 is needed for development and programming costs, this will create a ready to use product on both android and apple platforms, covering the largest market.
  • The $15,000.00 balance is marketing, campaigning safety organizations,  and R&D. We want this to hit the ground running with strong legs.

Ultimately my goal is to have this available to everyone for as little as possible. That said the more I raise for development the less it will ultimately sell it for.

What if we don't reach our goal?

If we fall short we will decide which platform to develop first, market what we can and move forward, I do not see this ending that easily. In my mind this funding is as much about raising capital as it is about consumer feedback. In other words if you see enough potential in the idea to invest in it, it will fly.

What's next?

That's up to you! Thanks for coming this far, I hope you see the potential to continue. Read on and see what your support will get you!

story:
We're building a social app for gaymers to connect with nearby gaymers, engage in a game, and find local meetups!


WHAT IS GAYMER APP

Gaymer App is a revolutionary app for gaymers to unite socially through common gaming interests, while promoting a safe and fun experience. From within the app, meet fellow gaymers in your local community or across the country, and invite them to game! Whether it's a challenge, a friendly match, or you need help beating a boss, connecting with a fellow gaymer is only a few taps away! In addition to finding your next gaymer through our exciting app, find and discover events and meetups for gaymers in your area!


Key Features

  • Find Gaymers to Co-Op
    Connect with gaymers in our app to engage in a game! One of the primary features of Gaymer App is for you to check in with the game you're currently playing, or enter the games you enjoy playing the most. Gaymer App will find gaymers closest to you based on your current location, who are currently playing the same game as you or with similar gaming interests.
  • Unlock Gaming Network Usernames
    You have the power to unlock your gaming network usernames to other gaymers individually, or keep them private until you're ready to engage in a game. This makes it easier for you and your new gaymer friend to find and connect with each other on your gaming consoles.
  • Gaming Stats
    Do you love stats? With Gaymer App, check in with the game you're currently playing and we'll help keep track of the games you like playing the most and how often you play them. You can keep your gaming stats private or share them with other gaymers. We'll also summarize what type of games you like to play, whether it be FPS, MMO, RTS, etc.
  • Events for Local Meetups
    Around the world, gaymer groups are growing with amazing fever! We want gaymer communities grow stronger and connect in a new way. Gaymer App will allow verified gaymer groups to invite gaymers based on their location, and you'll be able to find meetup events around you!


WHY GAYMER APP

There currently isn't a simple platform to easily find gaymers around us to join in on a game. With Gaymer App, the goal of the app is to be a single platform where you can engage with other gaymers, connect with them, and co-op with them in a game. Gaymer App is all about getting you to play the games you already love with new friends! Use the app to find local gaymer meetup groups around you, in your local city or a new city you're visiting!

A Story: 

I've always loved playing video games and happened to be gay. I would spend most of  my free time playing my favorite video games in the comfort of my living room. Even though I enjoyed gaming, I still wanted friends who I could play with. I attempted using other social apps to find someone to play with, but it was hard to tell who matched my gaming interests. After a lot of searching, I finally connected with a few other gaymers, but still wondered why there isn’t an app to help me connect easier with other gaymers in my local community. So I decided to take on the endeavor to meet that need. 

-Eric Hulsey, Founder

Who is a Gaymer?

Gaymer or gay gamer is an umbrella term used to refer to the group of people who identify themselves as gay, bisexual, lesbian, or trans, and have an active interest in the video gaming community. Whether you play on a console, PC, tabletop games, or mobile games, you can still be a gaymer.


THE DETAILS OF GAYMER APP

What are the goals of the Indiegogo Funds?

The funds from the Indiegogo campaign goes towards the creation and implementation of a functional Gaymer Social Mobile App. We're working with an experienced development team to deliver the best app experience.

PHASE I - Under this phase, we will be able to have our developer start work on the UX (User eXperience) and the artwork, which means building the looks and laying out a roadmap of features.

PHASE II - This is the phase where we have our developer get down to the nitty-gritty of development for iOS devices, then Android devices if we are fully funded. This is where the bulk of the time and expenses reside. Once developed, we will migrate everything to servers that we will lease (the "Other" expense). At the end of this phase, we'll open up testing for our beta testers who will get access to the app for testing functionality and server load.

COSTS BREAKDOWN

User Experience (UX): $9,000
Art: $9,000
iOS Development: $32,000
Android Development: $35,000
Other (server hosting): $3,750

FUNDING GOALS

Goal 1: Raise $50,000 to build the UX, art, and iOS development.
Goal 2: Raise the final $35,000 to develop an Android version.


Where is the future of Gaymer App?

The key goal of Gaymer App is to grow and strengthen communities across cities, gaming consoles, and beyond. In the future, we would love to continue this trend by utilizing the app as a tool to help promote the formation of local gaymer meetups and an overall positive gayming culture. Gaymers are a dynamic and passionate group, so we would like to share that.

We hope to further develop the app so that gaymer meetups can utilize it to stay in touch, connect, and grow their own gaymer communities.

The future is bright for video gaming and for gaymers!


MEMBERSHIP LEVELS

Free

Gaymer App will be made available as a free download. You'll get access to these great features:

  • Find gaymers around you to co-op
  • Unlock gaming network usernames
  • Gaming stats
  • Find local gaymer meetups

Premium

We'll be offering premium membership as an upgrade for $2.99 a year. Premium members get additional features, including:

  • Ad-free version of Gaymer App
  • Unlimited profile pictures and game images
  • Access to advanced gaming stats


WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Whether you're a gaymer, someone who loves to play games, or just like the idea of our app, we'd love your support! We understand that not everyone will be able to contribute to our campaign, but can still be an awesome help in other ways.

  • By sharing our Indiegogo page with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, reddit, gaming groups, and beyond!
  • Spread the word to your friends and neighbors IRL (in real life).
  • If you would like to have digital marketing material, please contact ehulsey@gaymerapp.com.

story:
NEW CROWDFUNDER ONLINE-QUAD CORE TABLETS

 

 

Our goal is to build a powerful, True Linux Tablet, one free of Google and Android's restrictions, at a reasonable price.  If you're a Linux fanatic you probably ended up getting an Android phone. Hey, it's Linux right? It'll be open, run all the programs I'm familiar with and let me hack around and have some fun right?  Too often, this is not so. That is why we set out to find a way to run real Linux and all the software you really want on the incredibly low cost and powerful Arm based System on a Chip(SOC) hardware available for tablets. Enter the Allwinner A10 SOC.  This beast of silicon radically changed the market overnight with 1.2 Ghz speed, glitch free HD video coprocessing, 3D acceleration, HDMI, SATA....

Features of the Allwinner A10 include:

  • 1.2ghz Cortex A8 ARM Core

  • MALI400MP OpenGL ES 2.0 GPU

  • DDR3 Controller 800MHz 1GB max

  • 2160p Hardware-accelerated Video playback (4x the resolution of 1080p)2D Accelerated Graphics Engine

  • NAND Flash Controller

  • 4 SDIO interfaces

  • USB 2.0 Host as well as a 2nd USB-OTG Interface

  • 24-pin RGB/TTL as well as simultaneous HDMI out

  • SATA-II 3gb/sec

  • 10/100 Ethernet

  • a 2nd 24-pin RGB/TTL interface that is multiplexed (shared) on the same pins for a standard IDE (PATA) interface.

GPIO, I2C, PWM, Keyboard Matrix (8x8) and much more.

This processor and its incredibly low price have enabled a whole generation of low cost, high powered electronics. Beyond just tablets, the A10 is used in mini PCs, “TV Sticks”, netbooks and more. All these devices come standard with Android, which is a good start, but not enough.  Now we come to the best part.  Allwinner's Linux kernel source has been made available and has an active community working to mainline it.  Their contributions have created a stable system running true Linux, not just Android with a working U-boot, kernel and Debian, Ubuntu or Linaro root file system.  This system is open source top to bottom and almost feature equivalent with Android on the same hardware. The purpose of this Kickstarter is to complete development of the PengPod line of Allwinner based electronics and improve the tablet related features in the community Allwinner Linux kernel. As a bonus, all these devices already run a high quality, stable version of Android they can easily be made to run both systems. Why not have the best of both worlds?

The Devices

Introducing the PengPods, a line of high powered Linux tablets and PCs! All these devices are the latest available in their category and show what the Allwinner chips can do. All devices are available in the rewards with Android and some with Linux pre-installed. We are focused on the tablets and our initial goals will fund the completion of the software enhancements and hacking tools for PengPod tablets. We intend to eventually offer all the devices with preinstalled Linux if our stretch goals are met. All devices will have Linux images available for download at shipment time, regardless of whether they are available with Linux pre-installed, which depends on the stretch goals.  We have a new demonstration video coming very soon...

Product line includes:

 

 

The remaining devices will be available as strech goals.

  • PengPod713: 7” Tablet with A13, 512MB ram, 4GB flash for under $100

  • PengBox: Mini PC with 1GB ram, 4GB flash around $110

  • PengBook: 10" Netbook with A10, 1GB ram, 8GB flash around $160

What will my device come with?

Linux or Android, its your choice. Every PengPod device is capable of running from internal flash or booting from an SD Card. You can choose to get your device with Android or Linux pre-installed.  If you choose Android you will still be able to boot the device into Linux with a properly prepared SD card. In the rewards we are also offering SD cards preprogrammed with bootable Linux images, so if you want both, just add the SD card amount to your contribution and make sure to fill out the survey we send so we know which image you want.

If we reach our stretch goals, we will begin offering more devices, but some might be offered with Android pre-installed only until a further goal is met. The devices will still support Linux and we will have images ready for them by the time they ship, but again we may not be able to pre-install Linux on the internal memory.  Please keep an eye on our project updates for more information.

All devices also include standard accessories like power plugs and cables, check each device for details. We also have several accessories available which make the devices better, make sure to take a look!

Why crowd funding?

Most of the software we will be providing is stable, open source and freely available, so why the crowd funding? Our experience has proven it takes a lot of time to locate, research, build and run all the pieces needed for a working A10 Linux system. We are working to coalesce all these parts into a stable image so users can be up and running right away. Our time is precious and every hour we can avoid redoing something that already works is another we can spend hacking!

The hardware is ready to be made with no further hardware engineering. 

While we have a good, running Linux system now for all the devices, there are still some rough edges. We intend to fix up the tablet related features, host a central repository of A10 specific packages and create images and guides to make these devices even better. All these efforts will take time and we plan to use the proceeds from the crowd funding to fund the remainder of the software work and maintenance.  We would like the Linux tablets to match the main Android feature list.

The features which are not yet complete are:

  • G Sensor based automatic screen rotation.

  • Hardware button support.

  • On board camera support with Video4Linux.

These features are close to ready and will be completed using the proceeds from the crowd funding. Interested in hacking? We are also going to...

  • Maintain a community forum and wiki

  • Provide source for everything we create and share it on Github.

  • Provide a package repository for the PengPods.

  • Provide prebuilt images, with updates as available.

  • Provide tools, scripts and guides as we go.

Based on how much is brought in we are also considering offering prizes for developer teams implementing community goals, adding more devices and maybe even other processor lines to our support list. Many of the tablet related packages created will benefit systems beyond Allwinner and hopefully help create a true Linux based tablet movement.

 

Learn more and get involved with the community at http://www.PengPod.com

 

Perks:  Please note its $5 extra to get Linux installed on the internal flash, make sure you add that to your contribution.  Linux on flash devices might take a few more weeks to ship, we will keep you informed when we get to this stage.  There seems to be a limit on the number of perks, so we had to stack options inside the perk, sorry its a little compilcated.  Make sure to ask us if you have any questions.

 

Accesories:  The accesories in the perks can be added to any PengPod device by contributing the extra amount indicated.  It will be less than getting it individually becuase of the shared shipping.

 

BONUS:  We realize Christmas is right around the corner and some people might be consider PengPods as gifts.  Given the busy holiday manufacturing and shipping schedules we will not have the devices before Christmas.  So if you want to give one as a gift, for no extra charge we will send a nice certificate to let the receiver know their gift is on the way soon.

 

About shipping outside the USA:  Our perks are based off USPS domestic rates.  If you want your device shipped outside the USA you must add an addition amount.  For PengPod devices to Canada and Mexico, $24 for everywhere else $39.  If you are only getting an SD card then the rate is $12 to Canada and Mexico and $16 for everywhere else.  These fees are one per shipment, so if you get several items you only have to pay the additional fee of your largest item once.  This does not include and duties, fees or taxes that may be charged by your governent or domestic carrier which will be solely your responsibilty.

story:
Short Summary

There are many USB-cabels designed as keychains, that work only connecting with laptops or computers. We have decided to create a keychain with its own battery.

zFob

Battery’s capacity is 220 milliamp hours, and it can provide about 30-40 extra minutes of talk time or up to several hours being on standby.

Undoubtedly you were in such situations, when you didn’t have possibility to charge your cell phone and it switched off at the most critical moment. You could neither make a call nor send a message. You also couldn’t use a map. With zFob you need not worry about it.

Size


How it works

Charge up the zFob from the supplied cable. Then just put it in your pocket or attach it to your keychain.

How to use it

Just move the slider-button up, connect the zFob with your cell phone and it will start to charge. 

Parts and desing


A lighting connector is used in device. It means that you can use it only with iPhone 5; 5s; 5c; iPad 4; iPad mini; iPod touch.

We also think about an opportunity to use Micro-USB in this device so that will be able to charge Android phone.

e-mail: zFobinc@gmail.com

story:
GoDusk is an ecologically designed, portable shade for your tablet or phone 

Place your device into your GoDusk and you can enjoy glare free viewing anywhere at any time. 
Works in direct sunlight and is made with 100% recyclable materials in Belgium, Europe.

Easy to carry

You can set up and fold it back easily; no difficult mounting instructions.
The extremely light weight means you can take it with you wherever you go.

With a size of 31 x 23 x 25 cm (12.2 x 9.1 x 9.8 inch) installed,
or 30 x 30 cm (11.8 x11.8 inch) flat folded,
and a weight of only 79 gr.
Will fit up to a 10.1 inch tablet with cover

What we’ve achieved so far

  • Fabulous looking Website www.GoDusk.com
  • With an amazing looking 3D Modeler tool 
    Please do test this out yourself and share the images!
  • 3D images 
  • Development prototype of GoDusk Beach

Why we need your help to create something great

After 6 months of prototyping and testing we need to start production... and this needs to be done on a larger scale. 

And as shipping worldwide would mean that the ecological advantages of our product gets lost, we want to start up local plants in USA/Canada, Australia and all over the world. 

Second Stage: Development of GoDusk Festival

When reaching 18.000 $ we can start the development of the GoDusk Festival for smartphones only. With this version you should be able to walk around, take pictures, selfies, ...all in direct sunlight and with different phone sizes.


Third Stage: Development of GoDusk Park

When reaching 36.000 $ we can start the development of the GoDusk Park for laptops. For everybody who wants to work outdoor, this would be the perfect solution.


Do you want to be first to have a Unique, limited edition of the GoDusk Beach? 

Then get the 3rd Perk and share this experience with some friends. 

Indeed, you will get 3 GoDusk Beach delivered to your door. 

So you can enjoy your summer outdoors putting your tablet, Ipad, Iphone or other smartphone into your own GoDusk.

'Tis the season to Godusk!

story:
The Mantrailing App

Zeichne während deines Mantrail-Trainings deinen Trail auf. Mit dieser App ist die aufwändige Dokumentation deines Trainings endlich leicht und komfortabel.
Record, file and analyze your trail data and maps comfortable in your smartphone

The Mantrailing App bietet dir folgende Funktionen:

  • Genaue GPS-Aufzeichnung und Wiedergabe deines Trails
  • Darstellung des Trails des Runners und des Mantrailers auf der selben Karte
  • Umfangreiche Speicherung von Details zum Trail wie Informationen zu Versteckpersonen, Geruchsträgern, Wetter, Datum & Uhrzeit, Umgebung, Trainigsschwerpunkten etc.
  • Automatische Speicherung vieler verfügbarer Daten wie Datum & Uhrzeit von Start und Ende, -Track, Wetterdaten, Windrichtung, Temperatur, Windstärke, Luftfeuchtigkeit, Luftdruck, Bewölkung und vieles mehr.
  • Export der GPS-Daten
  • Druckfunktion und Trainingsübersicht im Detail mit Karte als PDF
  • Teilen über Soziale Median wie Facebook.

Alle Traningsinformationen sind anschließend komfortabel wieder abrufbar. Auf umfangreichem Kartenmaterial können die Tracks übersichtlich angezeigt werden.


With this app you can record your trail during your training. The bothersome documentation of your mantrailing trainings is now finally an easy and comfortable task.

The Mantrailing App provides the following functionality and features:

  • GPS record and vizualization of your trails (light version only shows parts of the trail)
  • Shows runner's trail and dog's trail on the same map
  • Extensive data capture of additional training information like runner, scent article, weather data, date & time, environment, training focus etc.
  • Automatic data capture of all available training information like date & time of training start and end, GPS-track, weather data, wind direction, temperature, wind speed, humidity, barometric pressure, cloudiness and much more.
  • Export GPS-Data
  • Print training overview and details including maps and tracks to PDF
  • Share your training records and maps on social media like Facebook

All training data can be visualized and edited comfortable with this app using extensive cartographical material.



Projekt ohne technisches Risiko

Die Mantrailing App ist bereits für Android Smartphones verfügbar. Wir können damit demonstrieren, dass wir in der Lage sind, diese App auch für Apple Geräte mit allen Funktionen zu entwickeln. Dieses Projekt ist damit absolut ohne Risiko, soweit die Gesamtsumme erreicht wird. Schauen Sie sich die fertige Mantrailing App im Google Play an: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.work4dogs.TheMantrailingApp

The Mantrailing App is already available for Android Smartphones. We have demonstrated that we are also able to develop this App for Apple devices including full functionality. This project is therefore without any technical risk provided that we reach the funding goal. Test drive The Mantrailing App for Android on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.work4dogs.TheMantrailingApp

Wie können Sie helfen neben der Finanzierung?

Neben der finanziellen Unterstützung ist es bei Crowdfunding Projekten erfolgsentscheidend, dass möglichst viele Interessenten von diesem Projekt erfahren und ebenfalls das Projekt unterstützen.

Informieren Sie daher am besten Ihre Freunde und Trainingspartner von diesem Projekt mit dem folgenden Link und einer kurzen Erklärung über soziale Medien und fordern Sie diese auf unser Projekt zu fördern

Mehr brauchen Sie nicht tun!

Beside the financial funding it is very important for the success of this project that more and more people are aware of this campaign and also start to support the project.
So please share this project with your friends and colleagues on social media like Facebook with a short description and ask them to support this project.
That is all you need to do!

story:
Finally, protect your photos online

Until now we've never had the tools to protect our photos online. We've been working together with copyright lawyers and developers to create an app that will protect your intellectual property. 

Your photos are protected by a process that runs in 3 steps:

  1. By marking the photos you take on your phone as yours. They become registered to you.
  2. By searching the internet for replicas of your photo. 
  3. By providing you with proof of your photo's registration, thereby giving you the legal documents necessary to prove your authorship and make a case.
We need your support to bring this app to life and to begin creating a culture of responsible photo sharing online. 

App description

Priorr will be a free to use app. Anyone will be able to download the app, and from that moment on, every photo you take on your phone will automatically be registered under your ID. The app will function in the background of your phone, and will automatically be constantly scanning the internet for copies of your photos. When such copies are found, the app will send you a notification. 

Features

  • automatic photo tagging
  • constant internet searching for copies of your photos
  • notifications when replicas are found
  • watermark and logo tool
  • manual photo search

Additional Priorr services

Besides the free app, we'll be able to provide you with documents and ownership certificates that you can use to build your case in the event that your photos are stolen. The evidence package and ownership certificate are documetns that you can request, and will be made available in 8 different languages, to minimize the communication barrier. 

The watermark and logo tool

Rather than waiting for your photos to be stolen, you'll be able to act preventatively. Before you share your photo online, you can use the free watermark and logo tool to mark up your photo and make it yours, to dissuade others from sharing it without contacting you first. 



Why bother? Who is this for?

We're tired of the disregard for images that's ruled the internet. The fact that merely by sharing your image, it because subject to theft, and there's virtually nothing you can do about it. We want to change this. To create a tool that you can use to claim your rightful ownership of a photo. 

To being to break the mold of careless stealing, we need to start by recognizing ownership. 

For photographers

Photos are your bread and butter. The internet is a fantastic medium to share you art and gain recognition, but it's also a stealing machine. Very often your work will be taken and republished, not only without payment or permission, but worst of all, without even giving credit! Let's make giving credit the norm. 

For the online persona

You're interested in how often your photos are shared, by whom, and where. We'll show you. Not to mention you'll get the watermarking and logo application tool to band your images for free. 

For the average person

You don't expect it until it happens to you. A photo of you can become associated with something that you don't want it to. By tracking your images and by associating them to your ID, you'll create the foundation to have the photo taken down, or at least to provide remuneration, and worst case scenario - to request emotional compensation in court. 

For example, the artist Richard Prince, who steals people's instagram photos and sells them at $100,000 each. Or the photo of Ashley VanPevenage, whose photo was taken out of context and turned into a meme. These cases would have been preventable, or at least easier managed, if they had been able to prove their authorship of the photo at the very beginning and requested from the original sharer that they should be taken down. 

Risks & Challenges

For now, our technology can only tag and protect your photos taken on your phone. We realize that that's only a fragment of all photos taken. With your support, we'll be able to continue development to include DSLR and other digital cameras in our protected circle. 

In addition, Priorr doesn't guarantee protection. We offer the proof you need to be able to build the case. However approaching the sharer, or if a legal case must be made, will be in the user's hands and will depend on their proactive measures. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're interested in seeing this campaign come to life, be sure to follow us on your favourite social media platform. Find us on Facebook, Twitter, Google +, Linkedin and Youtube. 

Hit "share" and spread the news about this campaign!

FAQ

1.Will the app be available for free?
Yes, the app will be free to download and use. 

2.Which platforms will the app be available on?
You'll be able to use Priorr on your Android and iOS devices. 

3.How much does an evidence package and photo ownership certificate cost?An evidence package will cost $19.90 and a photo ownership certificate will cost $9.90.4. What's the difference between an photo ownership certificate and an evidence package?

The evidence package will provide you the data and information of the infringement - where your photo was replicated, the date, etc. Whereas if you simply need to provide proof of ownership of the image, that will be done through the ownership certificate, which states when the photo was registered to you. 

5. Will there be a limit to the amount of photos I can take?
No, there'll be no limit to the amount of photos you can take. Take as many as you want!

6. Will there be any other expenses in the app?
For the first 500 photos you take, we'll scour the internet for replicas for free. For each next batch of 500 photos, you'll have to pay $2.90.

7. Is it possible for me to ever lose my data? How do I know it's safe?
Your date will be stored in 2 secure data storage locations in Europe and the US, and will be duplicated for the security purposes. This will prevent your data from being accidentally lost. However you'll have the option to delete your account, and all the data that goes along with it. 

8. Will my photos be stored anywhere? (other than in my phone)
No, the photos themselves won't be stored, only the photo's data, evidence packages, and ownership certificates. 

9. Is a demo version available?
No, the Beta testers will have the first access to the app. 

10. How will the $75k be used?
The funding is necessary for creating the system that will be stored in the cloud and on 2 different continents, iOS and Android development, our copyright lawyers, designers, translators (because the evidence package will be available in 8 different languages).

Finally, protect your photos online Until now we've never had the tools to protect our photos online. We've been working together with copyright lawyers and developers to create an app that will protect your intellectual property. 
Your photos are protected by a process that runs in 3 steps:


By marking the photos you take on your phone as yours. They become registered to you.
By searching the internet for replicas of your photo. 
By providing you with proof of your photo's registration, thereby giving you the legal documents necessary to prove your authorship and make a case.

We need your support to bring this app to life and to begin creating a culture of responsible photo sharing online. App description
Priorr will be a free to use app. Anyone will be able to download the app,
and from that moment on, every photo you take on your phone will automatically
be registered under your ID. The app will function in the background of your
phone, and will automatically be constantly scanning the internet for copies of
your photos. When such copies are found, the app will send you a
notification. 
Features

automatic photo tagging
constant internet searching for copies of
     your photos
notifications when replicas are found
watermark and logo tool
manual photo search


Additional
Priorr services
Besides the free app, we'll be
able to provide you with documents and ownership certificates that you can use
to build your case in the event that your photos are stolen. The evidence
package and ownership certificate are documetns that

story:
Version française du texte en bas de page

Sous-titres disponibles sur la vidéo.

Each of us is daily exposed to radiations sources : at home, at work, during the day,...

Let’s expose you a few examples : radioactive stone on jewelry, old lightning rods, contaminated objects as kitchenware, radon gas, wastes from nuclear industry or medicine, and so one.

To live in a better environment, you need tips to minimize your exposure !  For that purpose, we are developing  RIUM.

RIUM is a sensor able to measure all ionizing radiations (counting and dosimetry : the role of Geiger counters and dosimeters). Furthermore, our instrument will be able to differentiate not only the particle type (Gamma, Alpha, Beta) but also radioactive isotopes (radon, uranium, cesium, etc.). This information will trace the origin of exposure (natural, industrial, medical) and accurately calculate its impact on health in real time. Moreover, our app gives you tips to reduce your expose to radiation.

We have designed a wooden housing capable of meeting the aesthetic requirements of users while respecting the technical constraints associated with radioactivity detection.

 

RIUM is connected to a smartphone via Bluetooth and usable through a dedicated mobile app for data processing, analysis, pedagogical displays, geolocation and networking tools.

Data collected by instruments can be shared through the Internet. This allows the creation of an instantaneous mapping of radioactivity and its evolution, and it could provide tracking of radioactive materials on the territory. Thus, we provide a response to environmental questions and homeland security needs, these issues being of concern to citizens.

Earthquake prediction

By detecting radon, the RIUM network is able to predict earthquakes !

Since several years, researchers have shown reliable correlation between emission of radon gas and earthquakes. We can cite several peer-reviewed papers as:

NATURE : Scientific Reports | 5:13084 | DOI: 10.1038/srep13084 | A radon-thoron isotope pair as a reliable earthquake precursor Yong Hwa Oh & Guebuem Kim

Our technology is able to take advantage of these researches through our data collection services. Then, based on such results, we propose the first network able to predict earthquakes a few days before they occur. This network can be efficient only with numerous detectors and a big data analyze. YOU can support network deployment! Have a look on the perks !

Thanks to your support, the network may be deployed early enough to predict the BIG ONE in California !

How to use it?

You can measure your daily surroundings and identify every sources of radiation : glasses containing uranium, lighting keychains, watches, smoke detectors, radon gas emanations, and lots of others including wastes.

Easy to use pocket sensor

 

With RIUM you can measure your exposure into your home, and offer a safer environment to your family thanks to tips given by the mobile app.

A collaborative map

Furthermore, users can join the community and create a worldwide watching network with highly reliable data which will be free to access and used for the sciences, for homeland security and citizen power.

Last but not least, RIUM mobile app is also design for educational uses : you can learn science through our software, or use it to raise your children or students' awareness of radioactivity !

RIUM is different from conventional radioactivity sensors such as Geiger counters. Indeed, the Geiger meters only measures a radiation level. However, RIUM is able to give you information on the origins of measured radioactivity. For example : medical, industrial, natural, etc. Thus RIUM is a spectrometer able to compete with laboratory instruments. Thus, RIUM combines high performances, ease of use, and a small size. Through its connectivity, RIUM allows all users to share their datas and create a citizen network. RIUM can also adapt to many professional and scientific uses.

Here are 5 major advantages of RIUM

See how RIUM compares to other sensors :

Each partner supports us financially or trough public communication


We are a new company based in Limoges and Lyon, in France. We developed RIUM during the last year, and we are now ready to start production.

However, we need to buy many tools before starting production. That is why your support is essential for us!

We need $ 15 000 to be able to manufacture a first series of RIUM.  With $ 40 000, it would be possible for us to organize a real factory, and if $ 40 000 is exceeded, we will be able to start development of others pollution sensors, as electromagnetic waves.

How to support us ?

The first simple act you can do for us, is to share the link of the campaign around you.

Thank you and let's go for questions !

How to identify radioactivity source ?

Ionizing radiations gather a lot of radiation types (or particles) and their energy can be very different.

Rium can identify these differences and analyse the energy of every interaction betwen the sensor and any ionizing radiation. This technology allows us to create spectra (especially gamma). The form of each spectrum give us the name of the particle.  Combinations between radionuclides allow us to identify the origin of the source.

Only Android ?

No, iOs is coming in 2017 !!

We can’t find the app on the store.

The app will be available a few weeks before the delivery of the first Rium sensor.

How will you manage the delivery of Rium ?

Every backer will be informed of the delivery dates. And for people who ordered a Rium, we will contact them by mail to check all the information and especially the adress.

What is the autonomy of the sensor ?

Rium is developed to function several weeks without charging the battery. If you decide to use it as a fixed station in a house, he can be connected all time long.

If I want to let Rium collect data all day long, without being near my smartphone, what solution do you propose ?

Rium has an internal memory able to stock data : in normal condition Rium can collect data more than a week. Furthermore, Rium is equipped by an accelerometer which insure the GPS situation of the sensor, if the smartphone is moving. The position at the moment of the connexion can be selected as a reference.

What is the frequence  of the measurement ? Is this frequency variable, what impact on autonomy?

Rium can measure the radiation level every two seconds. This parameter is adjustable in the options. Different modes of measurement are proposed, they vary the autonomy of the battery from 48 hours to several weeks.

If my smartphone is out of service, what happens to the data ? Are they lost ?

Rium has an internal memory to store data : in normal condition it can run autonomously for more than a week. They can be recovered via Bluetooth or microUSB.

What is the lifetime of Rium ?

Several tests will be done before the delivery but the lifetime isn’t supposed to be limited. The battery can be changed by the user.  

 

Version Française - French Version

 

Le produit est fabriqué en France! La carte électronique est produite à Angoulême, le boitier à Niort et nous intégrons le cœur de notre technologie dans nos locaux à Limoges. Enfin, nous entretenons des relations étroites avec un laboratoire universitaire à Lyon.

Résumé

«Mesurez votre environnement, et reprenez le contrôle» est notre devise. Nous sommes convaincus que les réseaux de capteurs environnementaux sont une des clés pour la prochaine décennie.

RIUM est une solution connectée pour la détection de la radioactivité avec la capacité d'identifier la nature du rayonnement.

Notre application mobile informe les utilisateurs sur le niveau de risque et propose des méthodes de protection adaptées à chaque situation. Toutes les données partagées nous permettent de construire des cartes de radioactivité accessibles aux utilisateurs.

Introduction

Chacun d'entre nous est quotidiennement exposé à des sources de rayonnements ionisants : à la maison, au travail, pendant nos déplacements, ...

Voici quelques exemples : une pierre radioactive sur un bijou, de vieux paratonnerres, des objets contaminés tels que des verres teintés à l’uranium, le gaz radon dans nos habitations, les déchets de l'industrie nucléaire ou de la médecine, etc...

Pour vivre dans un environnement plus sain, vous avez besoin de conseils pour minimiser votre exposition, c’est pour cela, que nous développons RIUM.

_______________________________

Le détecteur RIUM est capable de mesurer tous les rayonnements ionisantes (comptage et dosimétrie : le rôle des compteurs Geiger et des dosimètres). De plus, notre instrument sera en mesure de différencier non seulement le type de particules (Gamma, Alpha, Beta), mais aussi les isotopes radioactifs (radon, uranium, césium, etc.). Ces informations permettront de retracer l'origine de l'exposition (naturelle, industrielle, médicale) et de calculer précisément son impact sur la santé en temps réel. En outre, notre application vous donne des conseils pour réduire votre exposition aux rayonnements.

Nous avons conçu un boîtier en bois capable de répondre aux exigences esthétiques des utilisateurs tout en respectant les contraintes techniques associées à la détection de la radioactivité.

_______________________________

RIUM est connecté à un smartphone via Bluetooth et utilisable via une application mobile dédiée pour : le traitement des données, l'analyse, l'affichage pédagogique, la géolocalisation et les outils de partage communautaire.

Les données recueillies par les instruments peuvent être partagées sur Internet. Cela permet la création d'une cartographie instantanée de la radioactivité et de son évolution et pourrait permettre le suivi des matières radioactives sur le territoire. Ainsi, nous répondons aux questions environnementales et aux besoins de la sécurité intérieure, des questions préoccupantes pour nous tous.

 

Prévenir les tremblements de terre

En détectant le radon, le réseau de Rium est capable d'anticiper les tremblements de terre.

Depuis plusieurs années, les chercheurs ont démontré le lien de corrélation qui existe entre les émissions de gaz radon et les séismes. Nous pouvons citer plusieurs études en ce sens :

NATURE : Scientific Reports | 5:13084 | DOI: 10.1038/srep13084 | A radon-thoron isotope pair as a reliable earthquake precursor Yong Hwa Oh & Guebuem Kim

Notre technologie est capable de tirer un gros avantage de ces recherches grâce aux données collectées. En effet, la force du réseau Rium permettra de prédire les séismes quelques jours avant leur déclenchement. Vous pouvez participer au déploiement de ce réseau !! Regardez bien les contreparties !

 

Comment l'utiliser?

 

Vous pouvez mesurer votre environnement au quotidien et identifier toutes les sources de rayonnement : verres contenant de l'uranium, des porte-clés phosphorescents, des montres, des détecteurs de fumée, émanations de gaz radon, et beaucoup d'autres, y compris les déchets.

Avec RIUM, vous pouvez mesurer votre exposition dans votre maison et offrir un environnement plus sûr à votre famille grâce aux conseils donnés par l'application mobile.

De plus, les utilisateurs peuvent se joindre à la communauté et créer un réseau mondial d'observation avec des données fiables qui seront libres d'accès et d'utilisation pour les sciences, pour la sécurité intérieure et la communauté citoyenne.

Enfin, l'application mobile RIUM est également conçue pour des usages pédagogiques : vous pouvez apprendre la science grâce à notre logiciel ou l'utiliser pour enseigner la radioactivité à vos enfants ou étudiants!

Les caractéristiques clés du produit

RIUM est différent des capteurs de radioactivité classiques tels que les compteurs Geiger. En effet, les compteurs Geiger mesurent seulement un niveau de rayonnement. RIUM est, lui, en mesure de vous donner des informations sur les origines de la radioactivité mesurée. Par exemple : médicale, industrielle, naturelle, etc. Ainsi, RIUM est un spectromètre capable de rivaliser avec des instruments de laboratoire. RIUM combine donc des performances élevées, la facilité d'utilisation et une petite taille. Grâce à sa connectivité, RIUM permet à tous les utilisateurs de partager leurs données et de créer un réseau citoyen. Le RIUM peut également s'adapter à de nombreuses utilisations professionnelles et scientifiques.

Voici 5 avantages majeurs de RIUM:

- une connectivité mondiale via internet

- de hautes performances

- une connectivité universelle (chargeur micro USB)

- la facilité d’utilisation

- le design et la petite taille

 

Pourquoi nous soutenir ?

 

Nous sommes une entreprise récemment crée basée à Limoges et à Lyon, en France. Nous avons développé RIUM au cours de la dernière année, et nous sommes maintenant prêts à commencer la production.

Cependant, nous devons acheter de nombreux instruments avant de commencer la production. C'est pourquoi votre soutien est essentiel pour nous!

Nous avons besoin de 15 000 $ pour pouvoir fabriquer une première série de RIUM. Avec 40 000 $, il nous serait possible d'organiser une véritable usine, et si nous dépassons 40 000 $, nous pourrons commencer le développement d'autres capteurs de pollution, comme les ondes électromagnétiques.


FAQ Rium :

Comment reconnaître la source radioactive ?

Les rayonnements ionisants, terme plus large que la radioactivité, regroupent de nombreux types de rayonnement (ou particules). L’énergie de ces particules peut être très variée.

Rium discerne ces différentes particules et analyse l’énergie déposée lors de chaque interaction entre un rayonnement ionisant et le détecteur. Cela permet de créer des spectres (notamment gamma). La forme de ces spectres permet d’en déduire les radionucléides en présence. Et les combinaisons entre radionucléides nous permettent de connaitre l’origine de la source.

Vous êtes seulement disponible sur Android ?

Non, l’application est prévue sous iOs pour la fin d’année 2017.

Vous parlez d’une appli smartphone, pourquoi n’est-elle pas visible sur le store ?

L’application sera disponible en téléchargement quelques semaines avant les livraisons de RIUM.

Comment allez-vous gérer la livraison des Rium ?

Tous les contributeurs seront tenus au courant des dates de livraisons. Et les acheteurs de RIUM seront contactés par mail avant la livraison pour valider toutes les informations, principalement l’adresse.

Quelle autonomie pour Rium avant d’avoir besoin de le recharger ?

Rium est conçu pour fonctionner plusieurs semaines sans recharger la batterie. En station fixe dans une maison, il peut être constamment branché au secteur.

Si je veux laisser Rium enregistrer à un endroit toute la journée, sans que je reste avec mon smartphone à côté, quelles solutions sont possibles ?

Rium a une mémoire interne pour stocker les données : en condition normale il peut fonctionner en toute autonomie pendant plus d’une semaine. RIUM est équipé d’un accéléromètre qui permet de s’assurer qu’il n’est pas déplacé lorsque le smartphone n’est pas à proximité, ainsi la position relevée par le GPS du smartphone au moment de la déconnexion et/ou de la reconnexion peut être prise pour référence.

A quelle fréquence Rium peut-il donner les valeurs de radioactivité ? Est-ce que cette fréquence est modifiable, quel impact sur l’autonomie ?

Rium peut donner une valeur toute les 2 secondes. Ce paramètre est réglable dans les options. Différents modes de mesures sont proposés, ils font varier l’autonomie de la batterie de 48h à plusieurs semaines.

Si mon téléphone est hors service que se passe-t-il au niveau des données sont-elles perdues ?

Rium a une mémoire interne pour stocker les données : en condition normale il peut fonctionner en toute autonomie pendant plus d’une semaine. Elles peuvent être récupérées via Bluetooth ou microUSB.

Quelle est la durée de vie de Rium ?

Des tests de vieillissements vont être menés avant les livraisons, mais nous pensons que la durée de vie sera illimitée. A noter que la batterie pourra être changée par l’utilisateur au besoin.
