Rium can identify these differences and analyse the energy of every interaction betwen the sensor and any ionizing radiation. This technology allows us to create spectra (especially gamma). The form of each spectrum give us the name of the particle.  Combinations between radionuclides allow us to identify the origin of the source.
Only Android ?No, iOs is coming in 2017 !!We can’t find the app on the store.The app will be available a few weeks before the delivery of the first Rium sensor.How will you manage the delivery of Rium ?Every backer will be informed of the delivery dates. And for people who ordered a Rium, we will contact them by mail to check all the information and especially the adress.What is the autonomy of the sensor ?Rium is developed to function several weeks without charging the battery. If you decide to use it as a fixed station in a house, he can be connected all time long.If I want to let Rium collect data all day long, without being near my smartphone, what solution do you propose ?Rium has an internal memory able to stock data : in normal condition Rium can collect data more than a week. Furthermore, Rium is equipped by an accelerometer which insure the GPS situation of the sensor, if the smartphone is moving. The position at the moment of the connexion can be selected as a reference.What is the frequence  of the measurement ? Is this frequency variable, what impact on autonomy?Rium can measure the radiation level every two seconds. This parameter is adjustable in the options. Different modes of measurement are proposed, they vary the autonomy of the battery from 48 hours to several weeks.If my smartphone is out of service, what happens to the data ? Are they lost ?Rium has an internal memory to store data : in normal condition it can run autonomously for more than a week. They can be recovered via Bluetooth or microUSB.What is the lifetime of Rium ?Several tests will be done before the delivery but the lifetime isn’t supposed to be limited. The battery can be changed by the user.   Version Française - French Version Le produit est fabriqué en France! La carte électronique est produite à Angoulême, le boitier à Niort et nous intégrons le cœur de notre technologie dans nos locaux à Limoges. Enfin, nous entretenons des relations étroites avec un laboratoire universitaire à Lyon.Résumé«Mesurez votre environnement, et reprenez le contrôle» est notre devise. Nous sommes convaincus que les réseaux de capteurs environnementaux sont une des clés pour la prochaine décennie.RIUM est une solution connectée pour la détection de la radioactivité avec la capacité d'identifier la nature du rayonnement.Notre application mobile informe les utilisateurs sur le niveau de risque et propose des méthodes de protection adaptées à chaque situation. Toutes les données partagées nous permettent de construire des cartes de radioactivité accessibles aux utilisateurs.IntroductionChacun d'entre nous est quotidiennement exposé à des sources de rayonnements ionisants : à la maison, au travail, pendant nos déplacements, ...Voici quelques exemples : une pierre radioactive sur un bijou, de vieux paratonnerres, des objets contaminés tels que des verres teintés à l’uranium, le gaz radon dans nos habitations, les déchets de l'industrie nucléaire ou de la médecine, etc...Pour vivre dans un environnement plus sain, vous avez besoin de conseils pour minimiser votre exposition, c’est pour cela, que nous développons RIUM._______________________________Le détecteur RIUM est capable de mesurer tous les rayonnements ionisantes (comptage et dosimétrie : le rôle des compteurs Geiger et des dosimètres). De plus, notre instrument sera en mesure de différencier non seulement le type de particules (Gamma, Alpha, Beta), mais aussi les isotopes radioactifs (radon, uranium, césium, etc.). Ces informations permettront de retracer l'origine de l'exposition (naturelle, industrielle, médicale) et de calculer précisément son impact sur la santé en temps réel. En outre, notre application vous donne des conseils pour réduire votre exposition aux rayonnements.Nous avons conçu un boîtier en bois capable de répondre aux exigences esthétiques des utilisateurs tout en respectant les contraintes techniques associées à la détection de la radioactivité._______________________________RIUM est connecté à un smartphone via Bluetooth et utilisable via une application mobile dédiée pour : le traitement des données, l'analyse, l'affichage pédagogique, la géolocalisation et les outils de partage communautaire.Les données recueillies par les instruments peuvent être partagées sur Internet. Cela permet la création d'une cartographie instantanée de la radioactivité et de son évolution et pourrait permettre le suivi des matières radioactives sur le territoire. Ainsi, nous répondons aux questions environnementales et aux besoins de la sécurité intérieure, des questions préoccupantes pour nous tous. Prévenir les tremblements de terreEn détectant le radon, le réseau de Rium est capable d'anticiper les tremblements de terre.Depuis plusieurs années, les chercheurs ont démontré le lien de corrélation qui existe entre les émissions de gaz radon et les séismes. Nous pouvons citer plusieurs études en ce sens :NATURE : Scientific Reports | 5:13084 | DOI: 10.1038/srep13084 | A radon-thoron isotope pair as a reliable earthquake precursor Yong Hwa Oh & Guebuem KimNotre technologie est capable de tirer un gros avantage de ces recherches grâce aux données collectées. En effet, la force du réseau Rium permettra de prédire les séismes quelques jours avant leur déclenchement. Vous pouvez participer au déploiement de ce réseau !! Regardez bien les contreparties ! Comment l'utiliser? Vous pouvez mesurer votre environnement au quotidien et identifier toutes les sources de rayonnement : verres contenant de l'uranium, des porte-clés phosphorescents, des montres, des détecteurs de fumée, émanations de gaz radon, et beaucoup d'autres, y compris les déchets.Avec RIUM, vous pouvez mesurer votre exposition dans votre maison et offrir un environnement plus sûr à votre famille grâce aux conseils donnés par l'application mobile.De plus, les utilisateurs peuvent se joindre à la communauté et créer un réseau mondial d'observation avec des données fiables qui seront libres d'accès et d'utilisation pour les sciences, pour la sécurité intérieure et la communauté citoyenne.Enfin, l'application mobile RIUM est également conçue pour des usages pédagogiques : vous pouvez apprendre la science grâce à notre logiciel ou l'utiliser pour enseigner la radioactivité à vos enfants ou étudiants!Les caractéristiques clés du produitRIUM est différent des capteurs de radioactivité classiques tels que les compteurs Geiger. En effet, les compteurs Geiger mesurent seulement un niveau de rayonnement. RIUM est, lui, en mesure de vous donner des informations sur les origines de la radioactivité mesurée. Par exemple : médicale, industrielle, naturelle, etc. Ainsi, RIUM est un spectromètre capable de rivaliser avec des instruments de laboratoire. RIUM combine donc des performances élevées, la facilité d'utilisation et une petite taille. Grâce à sa connectivité, RIUM permet à tous les utilisateurs de partager leurs données et de créer un réseau citoyen. Le RIUM peut également s'adapter à de nombreuses utilisations professionnelles et scientifiques.Voici 5 avantages majeurs de RIUM:- une connectivité mondiale via internet- de hautes performances- une connectivité universelle (chargeur micro USB)- la facilité d’utilisation- le design et la petite taille Pourquoi nous soutenir ? Nous sommes une entreprise récemment crée basée à Limoges et à Lyon, en France. Nous avons développé RIUM au cours de la dernière année, et nous sommes maintenant prêts à commencer la production.Cependant, nous devons acheter de nombreux instruments avant de commencer la production. C'est pourquoi votre soutien est essentiel pour nous!Nous avons besoin de 15 000 $ pour pouvoir fabriquer une première série de RIUM. Avec 40 000 $, il nous serait possible d'organiser une véritable usine, et si nous dépassons 40 000 $, nous pourrons commencer le développement d'autres capteurs de pollution, comme les ondes électromagnétiques.FAQ Rium : Comment reconnaître la source radioactive ?Les rayonnements ionisants, terme plus large que la radioactivité, regroupent de nombreux types de rayonnement (ou particules). L’énergie de ces particules peut être très variée.Rium discerne ces différentes particules et analyse l’énergie déposée lors de chaque interaction entre un rayonnement ionisant et le détecteur. Cela permet de créer des spectres (notamment gamma). La forme de ces spectres permet d’en déduire les radionucléides en présence. Et les combinaisons entre radionucléides nous permettent de connaitre l’origine de la source.Vous êtes seulement disponible sur Android ?Non, l’application est prévue sous iOs pour la fin d’année 2017.Vous parlez d’une appli smartphone, pourquoi n’est-elle pas visible sur le store ?L’application sera disponible en téléchargement quelques semaines avant les livraisons de RIUM.Comment allez-vous gérer la livraison des Rium ?Tous les contributeurs seront tenus au courant des dates de livraisons. Et les acheteurs de RIUM seront contactés par mail avant la livraison pour valider toutes les informations, principalement l’adresse.Quelle autonomie pour Rium avant d’avoir besoin de le recharger ?Rium est conçu pour fonctionner plusieurs semaines sans recharger la batterie. En station fixe dans une maison, il peut être constamment branché au secteur.Si je veux laisser Rium enregistrer à un endroit toute la journée, sans que je reste avec mon smartphone à côté, quelles solutions sont possibles ?Rium a une mémoire interne pour stocker les données : en condition normale il peut fonctionner en toute autonomie pendant plus d’une semaine. RIUM est équipé d’un accéléromètre qui permet de s’assurer qu’il n’est pas déplacé lorsque le smartphone n’est pas à proximité, ainsi la position relevée par le GPS du smartphone au moment de la déconnexion et/ou de la reconnexion peut être prise pour référence.A quelle fréquence Rium peut-il donner les valeurs de radioactivité ? Est-ce que cette fréquence est modifiable, quel impact sur l’autonomie ?Rium peut donner une valeur toute les 2 secondes. Ce paramètre est réglable dans les options. Différents modes de mesures sont proposés, ils font varier l’autonomie de la batterie de 48h à plusieurs semaines.Si mon téléphone est hors service que se passe-t-il au niveau des données sont-elles perdues ?Rium a une mémoire interne pour stocker les données : en condition normale il peut fonctionner en toute autonomie pendant plus d’une semaine. Elles peuvent être récupérées via Bluetooth ou microUSB.Quelle est la durée de vie de Rium ?Des tests de vieillissements vont être menés avant les livraisons, mais nous pensons que la durée de vie sera illimitée. A noter que la batterie pourra être changée par l’utilisateur au besoin.

story:
Pre-order now 



 

Meet KUKE. Everything You Need in One Case

We love our iPhones, but our team kept having the same problem every day: dead batteries and disappearing storage space. We wasted hours searching for plugs and deleting photos, music, and videos out of necessity.

 

That`s why we come up with the idea of KUKE. With this case, you`ll get up to 70% extra battery life and up to 64G extra storage for iPhone 6/ iPhone 6S/ iPhone 6 (S) Plus.

 

Slim, but Powerful

 

Kuke is so slim you’ll barely notice it — 11mm thick including your phone, and with no bottom bulge.

 

 

64G/16G Extra Storage

We offer two different storage versions for KUKE: 16G or 64G depending on your need. You can move any photo from the iPhone storage to KUKE storage through the KUKE App by one click. 

 

 

 

2400mAh Extra Battery

 

Get up to 70% extra battery for iPhone 6/6s, up to 40% for iPhone 6/6s Plus.

 


 

 

 

 

Backup Album by KUKE App

Backup the whole album by clicking one button in the App. you can also sync any individual photo and video between KUKE and iPhone.

 

 

Music & Video Player in KUKE App

Store all the music or videos you like into KUKE storage, and play whenever you like in the KUKE App. 

 

 

 

Office Document Reader in KUKE App

KUKE provides a very convenient way for business. Within the KUKE App you can view the document or open the document in another App. 

 

 

 

Sync with Mac or PC directly

Simply connecting to PC/Mac with a lightning cable, KUKE can be used in a similar way as a USB disk. Drag the documents/music/video between the folders and sync them your iPhone instantly. 

 

 

Simplify the Way of Using Battery Case

. One Lightning cable, charge both your iPhone and KUKE. You don`t need to bring an extra cable for the battery case.
. When charging, your iPhone will be charged first and then followed by KUKE.
. When sync with iTunes, you don`t need to remove KUKE and it can directly connect your iPhone to it. 
 

 


Installation demo

 


Installation demo





Why Indiegogo

 

Indiegogo is a proven start-up platform, whose community of “early adopters” vets, funds and helps refine new products and services in an efficient manner.

The traditional retail model involving distributors, middlemen and retail outlets is costly and adds no value to the actual product or service around which the manufacturer/customer relationship is formed.

In fact, it is a major impediment for entrepreneurs, who want to realize their vision for a new product. Therefore, we highly value the Indiegogo community and its role in supporting innovation and hope that together we can launch KUKE.

Now we are ready for mass production and with the support of $20,000 we will be able to deliver the first international batch in March 2016!

 

 

Risks & Challenges

No project is without their risk and challenges but we try to do our absolute best to minimize them. We felt that we have done all the necessary preliminary work prior to coming to Indiegogo. We are also no strangers to storage products, Apple accessories or crowdfunding.

The KUKE that you see in the above video/photos are actual production units.With your support, we can bring KUKE to more people. We have started mass production and your contribution will help us achieve economies of scale and keep the product cost low.

Your strong support will give us the needed affirmation to place a larger raw materials order and start mass production earlier.

 

 

Contact our Team

For technical questions about contributing on Indiegogo, you can reach the Indiegogo Team at support@indiegogo.com

For questions about KUKE, you can reach our team at hello@kuner.com

Distribution Inquiries: hello@kuner.com

Press Inquiries: hello@kuner.com

 

 

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

- You may refer to following Indiegogo page as reference:
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/isensor-hd-world-s-most-trusted-security-camera#home
- Please refer to below link for more information about pre-selling business model:
https://www.paypal.com/webapps/mpp/brc/presale-policy-and-reserves#top
Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

Installation demo



 

Installation demo



Why Indiegogo


 
Indiegogo is a proven start-up platform, whose community of “early adopters” vets, funds and helps refine new products and services in an efficient manner.
The traditional retail model involving distributors, middlemen and retail outlets is costly and adds no value to the actual product or service around which the manufacturer/customer relationship is formed.

For questions about KUKE, you can reach our team at hello@kuner.com
Distribution Inquiries: hello@kuner.com
Press Inquiries: hello@kuner.com
 
 
Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
****THANK YOU FOR BACKING DUET! THE CAMPAIGN HAS ENDED**** 

****STILL KEEN TO GET A DUET? CHECK OUT THE NEW DUET EXTENSION CAMPAIGN HERE: http://igg.me/at/duetbyprotag2/x/4111518 **** 

Do you, or someone you know often lose smartphones?

Duet, and the PROTAG app, is an entire eco-system built upon latest Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy technology, to prevent you from losing your phone. It’s your phone’s ever watchful buddy.


Stretch Goals (NEW!):


Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs|Perks 

Why Get Duet?

1.You'll Never Lose Your Smartphone Again

Be alerted quickly if you've left your smartphone behind! Duet's in-built alarm immediately beeps anytime you’re more than 10m away from your phone, so you can hear and return immediately to retrieve it before its lost.

Let's say you’ve accidentally dropped your phone out of your pocket in a cafe and walked off. With duet's beep, you’ll know it right away. And for those of us with a habit of losing phones, you will find that Duet’s alarm trains your brain to develop the good habit of checking if the phone’s on you always. Say goodbye forever to the panic, worry and frustration of losing personal messages, contact lists and selfie photos.

Key Features

Prompt - Left your phone behind? You will be immediately alerted by duet’s in-built speaker

Intuitive use- Just press a button on duet, and you can audibly ring your phone even if its in silent mode. Great if you often leave keys under the sofa.

Everlasting - Easy to replace battery gives you 6 months of uninterrupted power.

Discreet - With Wifi Safe zones,duet knows when to alert you, and when not to. Useful especially if you work in confined spaces such as offices or classrooms.

Amazing connectivity - duet works even in airplane mode. All you need is to turn on Bluetooth.


2.You'll Never Lose Your Valuables Too

Duet can be attached to your valuables. It works together with the all-new PROTAG™ app. The  app constantly monitors your duet-tagged valuables. For example, if you've left your wallet behind in the cafe, the app will notify you. And you can even see the last known GPS location of your valuables on the map. This way, you can be assured that your valuables are always being safeguarded too.

3.You'll Love That It's Versatile

While designing duet, we strove to keep the form factor small, simple to use, and versatile. At just just 2.8 cm X 2.8 cm, it is one of the world’s smallest bluetooth tags. Duet can be easily attached to keys, thumb drives and wallets. Or it can be hung on your bags and handheld clutch.


Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs|Perks 

Duet Comes in 5 anything-but-dull colours 

There's a colour for every personality. Whether you are action-oriented, cool, serious, sociable, or simple person, take your pick of duet’s 5 colors.

PROTAG App

duet connects by Bluetooth to your iPhone or Android device. Setting up duet is as easy as downloading the PROTAG app onto your phone from the Apple or Google Play app stores.

What the PROTAG app can do

Ring Your Duet. 

Press 'Buzz' on the app. Then keep calm and search on. Say you’ve left your keys lying somewhere in the classroom and don’t know where to start looking for it. Most people will start panicking, but you’re calm and composed because you can ring your duet’s inbuilt alarm from the app. And if you can hear it, you’ll be able to find it in no time!

Track up to 10 duets

You can add up to 10 duets and view them in the elegant map view. And the app will always remember the last location it saw them. And with that many duets, your phone also becomes virtually loss-proof.The protection you get is so tight, it’s almost reaching that of a musical orchestra.

Duet Radar

You’ll know if you are getting nearer or further away from the duet within a 30m range when you turn on the Radar™. 

Compatibility

Duet works with all Apple devices iOS 7 and above, as well as Android phones running v4.3 and above.

Unfortunately duet does not work with Blackberry or Windows Phones at this time.

Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs|Perks 

Perks


Who We Are

Meet the PROTAG™ team, the makers behind the Duet. We’ve been working on loss prevention devices for personal belongings for 3 years now, and come from different fields of expertise and countries.

"We are united by a dream to create a world where people never need to lose their smartphones and valuables again."

 Rick Tan, Founder and CEO, oversees the development of over 20 markets for the distribution and advancement of the PROTAG line of products.


Johnathan Lim, Chief Engineering Officer , brings 3 years of electrical engineering chops into the team and oversees the hardware development of the Duet.


Jay Jay, Operations Head, ensures smooth daily operations of the startup.


Johnathan Leow, Marketing Head, does marketing and brand strategy development. 


Morad Salhi, Chief Software Engineer, oversees a team of software engineers and is responsible for the development of the PROTAG app.


Lenny Cendrawasih, Product Designer, is responsible for the visual looks of the Duet, and also all visual collaterals at PROTAG.

The duet that you see in the video is a real working prototype. We were founded in 2011, and duet is our 3rd product.

What Your Contribution Will Fund

With your support, we can put duet into people’s hands worldwide. Your contribution will help lessen the overall production costs. The more you order in bulk, the lesser we can cut the production cost and hence the better value for money to your wallet.


Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs| Perks 

FAQs

What phones does it work with?

Works with iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, Android v4.3. duet does not work on windows phones or blackberry currently.

How long can duet last?

Each duet lasts up to 6 months, and can be easily replaced with any 3V coin lithium battery.

Are the batteries replaceable?

Yes. Duet runs on a replaceable 3V battery. Each battery lasts 6 months for normal use. Every Duet shipped will come with 2 batteries.

When will I receive my duet?

duet will begin shipping the first pre-orders from end May 2014.

Does duet ship internationally?

Yes. duet is available for shipment internationally.

Do you have a guranteed warranty?

Yes. Every duet comes with a 1 year guaranteed warranty. If your duet is ascertained to be faulty, we will replace it for you at no cost.

Can duet prevent theft?

No, though you will still be alerted if someone takes away your phone or valuables. It's designed mainly for people who tend to lose their phones.

Where can I attach duet on

duet ships with a key-ring, adhesive sticker, and a lanyard by default. You can attach it easily to most everyday items such as keys, bags, purse.

How do I setup my duet?

Just 3 easy steps. When you’ve received your duet, put in the batteries provided. Secondly, download the PROTAG app. Lastly, follow the easy in-app tutorial to add your duet to your account.

How can I contact you?

Email support@innovatechnology.com.sg

What is the range of duet?

The range of duet from your phone is up to 10m, subject to your surroundings. That means that once your phone goes beyond 10m of you, you will be immediately alerted.

Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs| Perks

Ring Your Duet. 
Press 'Buzz' on the app. Then keep calm and search on. Say you’ve left your keys lying somewhere in the classroom and don’t know where to start looking for it. Most people will start panicking, but you’re calm and composed because you can ring your duet’s inbuilt alarm from the app. And if you can hear it, you’ll be able to find it in no time!Track up to 10 duets
You can add up to 10 duets and view them in the elegant map view. And the app will always remember the last location it saw them. And with that many duets, your phone also becomes virtually loss-proof.The protection you get is so tight, it’s almost reaching that of a musical orchestra.Duet RadarYou’ll know if you are getting nearer or further away from the duet within a 30m range when you turn on the Radar™. Compatibility

Duet works with all Apple devices iOS 7 and above, as well as Android phones running v4.3 and above.
Unfortunately duet does not work with Blackberry or Windows Phones at this time.Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs|Perks Perks



Who We Are

Meet the PROTAG™ team, the makers behind the Duet. We’ve been working on loss prevention devices for personal belongings for 3 years now, and come from different fields of expertise and countries."We are united by a dream to create a world where people never need to lose their smartphones and valuables again."





Rick Tan, Founder and CEO, oversees the development of over 20 markets for the distribution and advancement of the PROTAG line of products.











Johnathan Lim, Chief Engineering Officer , brings 3 years of electrical engineering chops into the team and oversees the hardware development of the Duet.











Jay Jay, Operations Head, ensures smooth daily operations of the startup.











Johnathan Leow, Marketing Head, does marketing and brand strategy development. 











Morad Salhi, Chief Software Engineer, oversees a team of software engineers and is responsible for the development of the PROTAG app.











Lenny Cendrawasih, Product Designer, is responsible for the visual looks of the Duet, and also all visual collaterals at PROTAG.



The duet that you see in the video is a real working prototype. We were founded in 2011, and duet is our 3rd product.




What Your Contribution Will Fund

With your support, we can put duet into people’s hands worldwide. Your contribution will help lessen the overall production costs. The more you order in bulk, the lesser we can cut the production cost and hence the better value for money to your wallet.



Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs| Perks 
FAQs
What phones does it work with?
Works with iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, Android v4.3. duet does not work on windows phones or blackberry currently.
How long can duet last?
Each duet lasts up to 6 months, and can be easily replaced with any 3V coin lithium battery.Are the batteries replaceable?Yes. Duet runs on a replaceable 3V battery. Each battery lasts 6 months for normal use. Every Duet shipped will come with 2 batteries.
When will I receive my duet?
duet will begin shipping the first pre-orders from end May 2014.
Does duet ship internationally?
Yes. duet is available for shipment internationally.
Do you have a guranteed warranty?
Yes. Every duet comes with a 1 year guaranteed warranty. If your duet is ascertained to be faulty, we will replace it for you at no cost.
Can duet prevent theft?
No, though you will still be alerted if someone takes away your phone or valuables. It's designed mainly for people who tend to lose their phones.
Where can I attach duet on
duet ships with a key-ring, adhesive sticker, and a lanyard by default. You can attach it easily to most everyday items such as keys, bags, purse.
How do I setup my duet?
Just 3 easy steps. When you’ve received your duet, put in the batteries provided. Secondly, download the PROTAG app. Lastly, follow the easy in-app tutorial to add your duet to your account.
How can I contact you?
Email support@innovatechnology.com.sg
What is the range of duet?
The range of duet from your phone is up to 10m, subject to your surroundings. That means that once your phone goes beyond 10m of you, you will be immediately alerted.
Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs| Perks

story:
Short Summary

QPAY is our passion. We are a team of Mexican Entrepreneurs that want to bring this new technology into our country. As it is a reality in the US, Mexico needs to come forward in payment receiving technologies.

Everyone is selling something at a certain point of their lives. What we want to accomplish is to launch a tool that will help you to sell whatever you want to sell: your old bike, you phone, start a new business... anything! 

QPAY is here to help you close that sale and allow you to cash in for your ideas. Money is out there but not always in cash, most people do not carry cash with them and prefer to use their Debit or Credit cards to purchase stuff. What QPAY will do for you is to let you take those cards and put their money into you bank account!

What We Need & What You Get

Currently we are in the final stage of our platform. We already got the APP running and a phenomenal CC/DC (Credit Card/ Debit Card) reader that ensures security in every transaction.  It is moment to put our technology to the test and undergo the hard testing that VISA and MasterCard puts all new technologies through before entering the market.

EMVCo. is the institution that certifies and tests all new devices in the payments industry. Their testing is expensive and thorough and that is why we need your help. Your contribution will allow us to meet their fees and pay for the lab testing required. 

Once lab tests are done we will be certified and ready to operate in the market. This is our dream. We want to put QPAY on everybody's hands and help them to achieve their business goals. 

There are many big companies out there that are overlooking the Mexican market, but once they realize its potential, they will enter the market and leave us with little chance to  make our dream come true.

The Impact

New jobs are needed in Mexico. We need people to increase their income and inspire them to create new businesses for themselves.

QPAY is a tool that will help anyone to start a new business. We want to make our contribution with our society developing a tool that is written by Mexicans for Mexicans, from people that understand their needs.

If more people have the opportunity to increase their income through sales we are sure more satisfied persons would be out there living a prosperous life, working hard to buy a house or a car o new clothes.

Please help us to give the opportunity to many people to be what they want to be.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our campaign. Be a voice of change for people who want to be financially independent in Mexico, contribute to let everyone be able to accept payments anywhere. 

Your sharing on Facebook and Twitter will enable us to reach tons of people with your commitment for development of new technologies specially designed for people like us. People with dreams and passion for what we do. Our dream is to make QPAY a reality. 

QPAY will revolutionize independent sellers in Mexico. This translates in new jobs and better life quality for many people and YOU are the key to MAKE IT HAPPEN.

THANK YOU!!

story:
Siring has One Light and One Button. 

Siring is like the mouse of a PC; but much more, and for the iPhone. With just one press of your thumb, you can remotely accomplish almost all the daily functions of your iPhone.  Remotely wake up Siri, be notified of new messages, reject or make phone calls, press the button once to unlock your phone, play/pause/skip music and a 30-Day rechargeable battery life. 
And More.

(An Android version of Siring will be released later on down the road.)

With One Button and One Light, Siring Creates Infinite Possibilities!


The iPhone has been a big part of our lives. We may think we control the iPhone, but maybe it controls us. We always hold it in our hands. Or are we in the hands of the iPhone? We want to regain the power.

Siring is simple, powerful and beautiful. It will completely change the way we use the iPhone.

(Note that currently Black, Gold, and Silver are available - Blue and Fuchsia could be future stretch goals - stay tuned!)

1. Notifications and Communication 
  • Be notified of incoming calls, emails and chat messages
  • Reject or make phone calls

2. Control Apps

  • Wake up Siri
  • Play/stop/skip music players, such as iTunes, Spotify
  • Take selfie pictures more easily with your friends 
  • Record/Pause Recording apps. Such as Voice Memos, AudioMemos
  • And more!


3. Use iPhone6 Plus with One Hand

How can you operate the iPhone6 with One Hand easily?
Here is our solution!
Assign the single or short press ring button method to return to the home screen, double press to switch tasks, and long press to wake up Siri. 
Along with One Press to Unlock feature illustrated below.Siring can replace Home Button completely.
You can use you phone with one hand even if it’s the 5.5-inch screen of the iPhone6 Plus. How cool is that!?

4. One Press to Unlock Your Phone

You can set up your phone's unlock-screeen password in Siring's accompanying app.
Then you can press once to unlock your phone, saving tons of tedious time spent inputting 4, 8, or more numeric digits for your password! 
In this way you don't need to remember this lengthy password anymore!


5. Make Your Devices Smarter

Siring can work with headphones, smart watches, and other Bluetooth devices to dramatically improve product performance and user experience.

 


  • First, download and open Siring's accompanying app.
  • Second, pair Siring with your iPhone (make sure your iPhone's Bluetooth is working). 
  • Then you can set the light to display different colors to indicate different kinds of incoming messages. You can also assign different button press methods to achieve actions specified in the Siring's app.

    Enjoy Siring! 


You can download our app in the iTunes App Store and discover more secrets inside Siring. We will continue to enrich Siring's functionality, and over time you’ll be able to update the app to get the newest functions of Siring.

We will support Android soon.

Month-long Battery Life

Lithium polymer rechargeable battery.
Siring was specially designed to save power.  On average, if you press Siring 200 times a day, the battery can last between 20-30 days without phone call notifications. With call notifications, the average battery life is between 10-15 days.


IPX-7 Waterproof

With an Ultra-Sonic sealing, Siring can last for 30 minutes submerged under 1 meter of water. 

Organic Glass Material
The Organic Glass Material ensures not only the stability of the wireless signal, but also provides a crystal clear look that aluminum can’t.


PCBA
We have integrated one of the world's smallest Bluetooth modules.  (See the image below for a size comparison.)

Includes a 1 year limited warranty
*Transparent pedestal not includedThe Three stages of The Mobile phone Development:

  • 1982-2007    Mobile Communication Devices

(Mobile Phone: supporting voice phone calls and SMS)

  • 2007-2014    Mobile Computer Devices

(Mobile PC: supporting network and local programs)

  • From 2014    Mobile Server Devices

(Mobile Server: supporting all kinds of external devices)


We are thrilled to work with developers and manufacturers from all over the world to meet new development stages of mobile phones.

Siring provides you the best remote control solution. Enrich your user experience with control and functionality you've never had before.

You can develop apps or devices you want based on the Siring SDK.

  • If using Siring to control the screen’s light, you can extend the usage time of other smart devices such as smart watches like Moto360, saving half of the power and doubling the usage time.
  • With Gopro, you can control the recording on/off button through Siring, making your extreme sports videos even more extreme.

See more about Siring on our website: www.sansensi.com
                                                or contact us: thesiring@gmail.com

  • iPhone® (4S, 5, 5C, 5S and later)
  • iPad® (3rd generation and later)
  • An Android version of Siring will be released later on down the road.

All men and women are created equal.
Life, Liberty, and Lust for Creativity.
This is our belief.
And Siring is our Proof.

Here is an introduction of our talented team:

  • Founder and Product Manager: Frank Zheng (Creator of Siring)
  • Chief Marketing Officer: Zoe Lai (Focused on startup businesses for more than 3 years)
  • COO and International Marketing Manager: Jason Stine (Experienced in crowdfunding project management)
  • International Business Development: Anthony Paglino (Helps to grow startups across diverse cultural landscapes focusing on universal human themes of connectivity)
  • Chief Technology Officer: Leo Fang (4 years of iOS app development experience)
  • Supply Chain Manager: Xiangming Huang (Over 10 years of supply chain management experience)
  • International Business Development: Anthony Paglino (Helps to grow startups across diverse cultural landscapes focusing on universal human themes of connectivity)
  • Chief Designer: Chulin Yang (not pictured) (Sincerely believes that design is always unfinished and tries hard to perfect every design. )
  • Hardware Design: Win Zhougang (not pictured) (4 years of hardware design experience at Huawei Technologies)
  • Hardware Design: Abel Jilei (not pictured) (also 4 years of hardware design experience at Huawei Technologies)


This amount will help us to manufacture the initial batches of Siring:
$17,000: to create molds of different sizes and to prepare production materials.
$8,000: to prepare PCBA components and other miscellaneous hardware items.
$5,000: to cover shipping and logistics expenses. 

Ideally, we aim to crowdfund more than this amount so we can establish a more formal company and continue to produce and improve Siring. However, regardless of whether we reach this goal, all backers who preorder through Indiegogo will receive their rings! 

Our challenge over the next two months is to refine the product by testing it in labs, begin to make product molds, and arrange manufacturing in order to produce a quality product.

The risk is simply that we don’t have enough money to buy all the components until enough funds are raised through the website. In addition, there is an important component (the Bluetooth antenna) that will take 6-8 weeks to order, which may lead to production delays, and thus a minor delivery delay of a couple weeks.

It should take on average 10 days to receive our product after the fundraising campaign, and may take 20-30 days in special situations. Because our users are from all over the world, everyone will receive the product at a different time. To that extent, please be patient.

Our team has a very strong background in hardware and manufacturing. We have engineers who are responsible for hardware and manufacturing with more than 10 years of experience. Therefore, we’re quite confident we can deliver successfully, and we believe that we will start shipping Siring to our supporters in November 2014.

We hope you will receive Siring in time for the new iPhone6, allowing you to experience a new way to control Apple’s latest smartphone.

1. How long does the battery last?

With only one button and a small LED light, the amount of power used is extremely small (in terms of just μA). Therefore, the rechargeable battery keeps Siring going for 20-30 days. Siring should at least provide 10-15 days of battery life with phone call notifications and up to 30 days when all functions are used minus the phone call notification function.

2. How far away can my Siring be from my phone?

Siring must be within 20ft of your smartphone to stay connected.

3. What Apps does Siring support?

Siring can remotely control all core apps on your iPhone, and by enhancing it using the SDK, all apps can theoretically be controlled. More specifically, Siring is your mobile mouse that helps you to operate your iPhone. And we have only one button with three kinds of button press methods: short, long and double presses. You can set up different press methods for different usages. For example, short press to one-key unlock your phone, double press to go to the Home screen, and long press to open your music, like iTunes or Spotify.

4. What's the material of the ring?

We contemplated which materials to use for a long time. Aluminium or Plastic or Glass? Finally, we selected acrylic with a gem gloss for a better feel and appearance. This material is also referred to as “Organic Glass”. The Organic Glass ensures not only the stability of the wireless signal, but also provides a crystal clear look that aluminum can’t.

5. Will Siring work with Android or Windows phones?

There is support planned for Android but currently not for Blackberry or Windows Phone at the moment.

6. Do I need to pay for the shipping fee?

No shipping fee is required. The shipping fee is already counted as part of the pledge. We will send our product to every backer in November, 2014 if everything goes well. The only issue will be that backers from different locations may receive Siring at different times because of different shipping distances. 

7. Can I order multiple units on Indiegogo?

Please send your request to thesiring@gmail.com.
We will have an online store after the campaign where you can easily preorder more than one Siring. 
We will of course provide a lower price for our campaign backers.

8. Where can I buy Siring after Indiegogo campaign?

We’ll soon have an online store up where you can buy the ring. We also intend to have it eventually available on Amazon.

9. Why did we call it Siring?

It has been three quiet years since Apple launched Siri in 2011. And all this time, Siri has been asleep in a forgotten corner. To put it poetically:
I wish Siri can hear my voice anytime. I wish to enjoy music when I want and I how I want.  I wish to say good bye to annoying password inputs. I wish to free my hands, and free my phone.
I wish for Siring. Siring will awaken Siri, and revolutionize the way we use the iPhone.

10. Can it control the iPad|Mini iPad too?

Yes, Siring is compatible with the following:

•iPhone® (4S, 5, 5C, 5S and later)

•iPad® (3rd generation and later)

11. What sizes do you have and how do I determine my size?

We have six standard American sizes: 6~11.

Tips for finding your ring size:
·Measure your finger in warm temperatures at the end of the day.
·When considering a wide band, move up a size from your measurement, for comfort's sake.
·Different countries have different ring-size systems. All sizes listed here are standard American sizes.
·The average woman’s ring size is about 6. The average man’s ring size is about 10.

12. How heavy is Siring?

Siring weighs below 10 grams. The whole package for Siring, including the battery stand and cable, is about 0.5 kilograms.

13. What is your return policy and warranty?

We have a global replacement warranty of up to 12 months starting on the date specified on the shipping invoice.

14. Will Siring work with my Smartphone, Smart Watch or other Fitness Trackers?

Not for now, but that’s exactly what we will do in the future. We will continue to improve our software and hardware to improve functionality. 

15. Can all users use the SDK?

We are thrilled to work with developers and manufacturers from all over the world to meet new development stages of mobile phones.
Siring provides you the best remote control solution. Enrich your user experience with control and functionality you’ve never had before.

4. What's the material of the ring?
We contemplated which materials to use for a long time. Aluminium or Plastic or Glass? Finally, we selected acrylic with a gem gloss for a better feel and appearance. This material is also referred to as “Organic Glass”. The Organic Glass ensures not only the stability of the wireless signal, but also provides a crystal clear look that aluminum can’t.
5. Will Siring work with Android or Windows phones?
There is support planned for Android but currently not for Blackberry or Windows Phone at the moment.
6. Do I need to pay for the shipping fee?
No shipping fee is required. The shipping fee is already counted as part of the pledge. We will send our product to every backer in November, 2014 if everything goes well. The only issue will be that backers from different locations may receive Siring at different times because of different shipping distances. 
7. Can I order multiple units on Indiegogo?

Please send your request to thesiring@gmail.com.We will have an online store after the campaign where you can easily preorder more than one Siring. We will of course provide a lower price for our campaign backers.

8. Where can I buy Siring after Indiegogo campaign?
We’ll soon have an online store up where you can buy the ring. We also intend to have it eventually available on Amazon.
9. Why did we call it Siring?

It has been three quiet years since Apple launched Siri in 2011. And all this time, Siri has been asleep in a forgotten corner. To put it poetically:I wish Siri can hear my voice anytime. I wish to enjoy music when I want and I how I want.  I wish to say good bye to annoying password inputs. I wish to free my hands, and free my phone.I wish for Siring. Siring will awaken Siri, and revolutionize the way we use the iPhone.
10. Can it control the iPad|Mini iPad too?
Yes, Siring is compatible with the following:
•iPhone® (4S, 5, 5C, 5S and later)
•iPad® (3rd generation and later)
11. What sizes do you have and how do I determine my size?
We have six standard American sizes: 6~11.
Tips for finding your ring size:·Measure your finger in warm temperatures at the end of the day.·When considering a wide band, move up a size from your measurement, for comfort's sake.·Different countries have different ring-size systems. All sizes listed here are standard American sizes.·The average woman’s ring size is about 6. The average man’s ring size is about 10.
12. How heavy is Siring?

Siring weighs below 10 grams. The whole package for Siring, including the battery stand and cable, is about 0.5 kilograms.
13. What is your return policy and warranty?
We have a global replacement warranty of up to 12 months starting on the date specified on the shipping invoice.
14. Will Siring work with my Smartphone, Smart Watch or other Fitness Trackers?

Not for now, but that’s exactly what we will do in the future. We will continue to improve our software and hardware to improve functionality. 
15. Can all users use the SDK?

We are thrilled to work with developers and manufacturers from all over the world to meet new development stages of mobile phones.Siring provides you the best remote control solution. Enrich your user experience with control and functionality you’ve never had before.

story:
Free Greeting Cards

 

http://www.free-greeting-cards.org/

 

Hello everyone


Become our sponsors!!!

Back us by buying Flash Greeting Cards or Full Flash Website

Support us to build new generation of Free Greeting Cards!


This application is for sending greeting cards by email. This application is running on Chrome Web Store Entertainment ->Photos.

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/free-greeting-cards/fgldabboffnmlcadifecoiooegleiaek?utm_source=gmail

You can choose from variety of flash animated greeting cards like Cute Cat, Teddy Bears, Anniversaries, just say “Hello” with Hearts. This application is looking for sponsors. 

 

 

 

 

Our Goal

We need $50000 for developing a new version of  Free Greeting Cards 

We want to make greeting cards in new version more customizable like to build a  greeting card from scratch. User will be able to move object on greeting card with their  mouse. User will able to choose from a large assortment of templates, pictures and animations.

Multi Language Support will be added. This application will also support Facebook version.

See example our work in progress:

http://www.free-greeting-cards.org/NewVersion/ (domain will change).

We need your help with this project. We need funding to hire a Flash Developer, Web Designer and a Web Developer.

This project will be finished in 6-12 months.

 

If you back this app with $20 you will receive Personal  Thank  You letter by email.

If you back this app with $35 you will receive:

1)  Personal  Thank  You letter by email.

2)  Adding Your Name and Link to Personal Facebook Profile or Your Website  to “Our Sponsors” Page inside the application.

 

If you back this app with $5000 you will receive:

1)  Personal  Thank  You letter by email.

2)  Adding Your Name and Link to Personal Facebook Profile or Your Website  to “Our Sponsors” Page inside the application.

3)  Adding your photo on homepage inside the circle with switching images.


We are also selling the Flash Cards an Full Flash Website in swf and fla files. Doesn't include domain. I will give you a license for personal, non- commercial use for one copy of collection. You can't resell it, can't sell greeting cards or put advertisement on website. You can't make profit from it. It's for personal use only. It supports Flash 8 version.

You will get Anniversary Flash Cards collection from the left side.I will give you a license for personal , non- commercial use for a one copy of collection. It includes swf and fla files, html page that load the card and Music MIDI files. You can use it on your  website or on your computer.No shipping needed, I’ll send you files to download. I'll need your email address. 


For $50

 

You will get Anniversary Flash Cards collection from the right side


For $50

 

You will get Angels Flash Cards collection.

For $50

 

 Fairy Flash Cards collection.

For $50

 

Letters Flash Cards collection.

 

For $50

 

Victorian Valentines  Flash Cards collection.

For $50

 

Roses Flash Cards collection.

For $50

 

Hearts Flash Cards 1 collections.

For $50


Hearts Flash Cards 2 collections.

For $50

 

Christmas Flash Cards collection.

For $75

 

Birthday Flash Cards collection. 

For $100

 

You will get  All 11 Flash Cards collections.

For $300

 

You will get  Full website and  11 Flash Cards collections. Including installation to your web server.  I will give you a license for personal, non- commercial use for one copy of collection. You can't resell it, can't sell greeting cards or put advertisement on website. You can't make profit from it. It's for personal use only. It includes swf and flash files, html page that load the card and Music MIDI files. You can use it on your website or on your computer. No shipping needed, I’ll send you files to download. Doesn't include domain. It supports Flash 8 version.

 

For $20000

Delivery time after November 24, 2013

Thanks for looking :)

story:
Story

Galdoran, the last sorcerer Of Casa de Diosa, has been dead for forty years. With the destruction of his heartstone his lifeforce has dissipated and his influence faltered. Although, peace has taken time to return no major wars have threatened the fifteen peoples since his final death.

However, as the great war begins to fade from memory a decaying boat washes ashore bearing the corpse of Jonathan Wintercloak, the knight presumed killed in his quest to destroy Galdoran, and within his decaying chest, is a new heartstone pulsing with light…

Game Description Here

An introduction to the rules, species, magic and lands of Endara, a rich tabletop fantasy RPG setting. The Isle of Hearts is a setting first containing a strong overview of the world and more detailed information about the continent, cultures, and fifteen playable species that players will encounter in the sample campaign.

The game provides a light and flexible system of rules that can be modified or bent to the fit the situation with a minimum of fuss and requires only a single D10 to play. The game provided in this book are complete in and of itself; future installments to this series will expand upon the sample campaign and provide more detailed information about the rest of the world and its peoples, as well as brilliant artwork.

What's the Money for?

The Isle of Hearts is a book headed rapidly towards completion. Interior and cover illustrations are coming together nicely, and the final editing is rapidly approaching completion. Thanks to the excellent work of Yukimi Mills and James Turner Mahoan, the illustrators on the project, the book is going to have some really gorgeous artwork to help bring the it to life.

While writing, illustrations, design, and editing are all paid for, but as any seasoned role player can tell you; a hardcover edition of the book is often preferable to a soft cover edition due to its ability to lay flat and stay open. Hardcovers are also built to last longer.

With this in mind we'd really like to give readers and fans the opportunity to own the book in a high-quality hardcover edition. Unfortunately, quality hardcover printing costs quite a lot and we're running short of the cost of a print run.

By contributing to our campaign The Isle of Hearts, you are helping to fund a limited edition hardcover of the book. No further hardcovers of this edition will be printed beyond this first run. Should we meet our goal, but have copies left over after the campaign they will be sold at conventions, to libraries, or other venues until the supply is depeleted. After that the book will only be available in a soft cover edition or in PDF format. Your generosity during this campaign will help ensure as many players as possible have the opportunity to recieve the highest quality version of the book and help to spread word about our unique setting and campains.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal of $7,000 is the bare minimum needed to do a high quality print run of the book in hardcover. Although we will be able to fulfill hardcover pre-orders of the book whether or not we meet the funding goal, the quality of the hardcovers produced will be lessened and we will take a slight loss on each book printed; well worth it to get books into the hands of new readers and fans, but unfortunately not a sustainable practice and we would only be able to supply exactly the number of books preordered through the campaign. Other readers would never have the opportunity to own a hardcover copy of the book.

The $7,000 requested goes entirely to the production and shipping costs of the book; if we meet this goal we will simply break even and have some additional hardcover books left over for sale at conventions as a result of the minimum order size for quality printing and binding.

If we fail to meet our funding goals we will take a small personal loss, but still be able to spread some quality hardcovers to all of you, our readers.

Other Ways You Can Help

We'd really appreciate it if you help spread the word. Even if you can't donate, maybe you know someone who would be interested in helping us meet our goal. Or maybe you know somebody who knows somebody, every little bit helps and we really appreciate anything you can do.

story:
For updates check the bottom of the page!

Short Summary

Hi! We are Vasilis Georgitzikis, Maria Kousta, Markellos Orfanos, Stelios Tsampas and Dimitris Amaxilatis, and we are the team behind codebender. In the past, each of us has worked on quite a few projects you might know, like MacPorts, Growl, the Arduino TFTP bootloader and we even had a project featured on hackaday. None of it comes close to our work on codebender though.

codebender comes to fill the need for reliable and easy to use tools for makers. A need that from our own experience could not be totally fulfilled by any of the existing solutions. Things like installing libraries, updating the software or installing the IDE can be quite a painful process.

In addition to the above, the limited features provided (e.g. insufficient highlighting, indentation and autocompletion) got us starting building codebender, a completely web-based IDE, that requires no installation and offers a great code editor. It also stores your sketches on the cloud.

That way, you can still access your sketches safely even if your laptop is stolen or your hard drive fails! codebender also takes care of compilation, giving you extremely descriptive warnings on terrible code. On top of that, when you are done, you can upload your code to your Arduino straight from the browser without installing anything.

What We Need & What You Get

Alright, so we need you to help us get started. We want to keep codebender open to everyone, with no restrictions, no fees or subscriptions. We need your help to raise at least $ 5000 to cover our hosting and operating costs for the first year. If we raise more, all the extra funds will go to further improvements on our infrastructure and features. If we raise less, it will still go to covering our hosting and operational costs for as long as possible, and we will try to find alternate methods to keep going. We are not going to give up that easy.

We'll be offering exclusive access for the first couple of months, to see what people think, and iron out any rough spots. You will also get a monthly update of the status of the project, behind-the-scenes, new features and info on the development process. Be the first one to use codebender and the first one to hear the news!

We are also offering exclusive, limited edition t-shirts with the codebender logo (available only to the codebender developers and you), never to be printed again! Get yours today! For the pioneers among you, we offer an Arduino Ethernet pre-loaded with our next-gen bootloader which lets you upload sketches not only from the USB but also using TFTP to flash your projects through the network to any Internet connected Arduino.

For our biggest supporters, we are offering a place of eternal glory on our website! Donate $500 and you will be listed as a supporter on our About page, or donate $1000 and you or your company will be listed on our front page! Let the whole world know how cool you are!

The Impact

codebender does all of the above (and we will do more in the near future as we are working on some more cool stuff) while being completely open source and free to use! We deeply believe in the open source philosophy and we embrace it in everything we do. codebender, the compiler, the bootloader and the Java Applet we use to talk to the Arduino are all completely open.

The Arduino bootloader we are working on will enable you to program your Arduino Ethernet or Arduino /w Ethernet Shield remotely through the network. That means you will be able to program any Arduino through the network using standard tools or straight from codebender, without the need to pull your project apart or connect it to your computer, from anywhere in the world!

But that's not all. We're taking it a step further. We would like to improve collaboration between makers, so we are building tools to help the maker community grow and collaborate easier. You can search for projects, clone them and exchange ideas with each other. Together, we can make this a reality. You can help us build a collaboration hub for the maker community, and we can help you breathe life to your next awesome project faster and easier!

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help us by spreading the word for codebender to friends, family and colleagues. As a reward for your help we will be offering exclusive access to some of you as well. For twitter lovers, we'll be giving away 10 beta invites per day for the next week. Follow us,send a tweet containing @codebender_cc or #codebender and get a chance to win one of the 10 daily invites! If you are more of the facebook type, like our facebook page and get another chance to win one of 10 daily invites!

  • Update 20/08/2012

Our campaign has ended! With your help we were able to gather $6,881, reaching our main goal of $5000 and almost reaching our first stretch goal of $7000.

We want to thank you one last time for your financial support and for spreading the word about codebender across the Internet, to blogs, news sites and social sites. We also want to thank you for your kinds words of support in the comments and the emails we received. We feel honored and extremely happy that we have you with us in this attempt to push the maker movement one step forward and revolutionize the way we program and develop our embedded devices.

We guess a lot of you are wondering about the perks.
We are currently negotiating a deal with a US distributor for the Ariadne preloaded Arduino Ethernet so that you get them in the best possible way and as fast as possible, since we are based in Greece and shipping them ourselves is out of the question. We hope to start shipping them in one or two weeks. Either way we will keep you updated.

We are also working on getting those fancy T-shirts printed for you. Of course we will need from all of you that claimed a perk that included a T-shirt, to send us your size. You can expect an email about that soon, and hopefully we’ll have them printed within the week. We will try to get an estimated shipping date for them too and we will keep you informed as we get all that sorted out.

Your codebender team 

  • Update 24/07/2012

We are glad to say, we have reached our target! We want to thank everybody that contributed to the project. We are also happy to announce that we have two major supporters.Our “Ultimate Supporter” Wyolum LLC  and Fab Lab Barcelona! We are really grateful for their donation that helped us reach our goal and keep codebender free!

It is now time to set our next goal. We have 6 days left to reach $7000. If we manage to raise 7000$, we will be able to work full-time on our Remote Flashing feature on codebender which will allows us to add Remote Flashing right after the campaign ends. Help us reach $7000 and you could be flashing your Arduino remotely in 6 days from now!

The Remote Uploading is something a lot of people have been waiting for. We think it’s time to give you an update. We are excited to announce that as of today, we are officially releasing the Ariadne-Bootloader, an updated version of Arduino's team TFTP-Bootloader, that will enable you to program your internet-connected Arduino through the network. You can watch the teaser video in our blog while we update the documentation with instructions on how to use it.

You can grab and compile the code from github or you can claim the Pioneer perk and get an Arduino preloaded with our bootloader delivered straight to your door. Grab them while they are still available and get started right away!

  • Update 18/07/2012

We’d like to share some news with you guys. We are working very hard to squash bugs you reported and add the new features that you requested. We have improved our compiler, added a temporary library-management system (until our final version is complete) along with some commonly-used libraries, improved our TFTP-Bootloader, improved our infrastructure and squashed many an inconceivable bug.

We feel the need to thank you for making codebender a reality with your donations. Keep spreading the word and our link to the indiegogo campaign and main site. With your help, we can reach our goal and ensure that codebender will stay free, up and running.

Talking about advancing the maker movement, we have some more great news. We are joining forces with the ArduSat project to help them make their project a reality as well. Space exploration for everyone on a budget! Together, we are certain we can do that. We are very excited to work with them and we will keep you updated. We will also be back with more cool updates really soon (hint:TFTP-Bootloader!)

Q) I am a blogger, a journalist. I need more information.
A) If you are going to write about our service but the information is not enough, contact us at girder@codebender.cc. We would love to answer your questions.

If you are more of the facebook type, like our facebook page and get another chance to win one of 10 daily invites!

Update 20/08/2012
Our campaign has ended! With your help we were able to gather $6,881, reaching our main goal of $5000 and almost reaching our first stretch goal of $7000.We want to thank you one last time for your financial support and for spreading the word about codebender across the Internet, to blogs, news sites and social sites. We also want to thank you for your kinds words of support in the comments and the emails we received. We feel honored and extremely happy that we have you with us in this attempt to push the maker movement one step forward and revolutionize the way we program and develop our embedded devices.We guess a lot of you are wondering about the perks.We are currently negotiating a deal with a US distributor for the Ariadne preloaded Arduino Ethernet so that you get them in the best possible way and as fast as possible, since we are based in Greece and shipping them ourselves is out of the question. We hope to start shipping them in one or two weeks. Either way we will keep you updated.We are also working on getting those fancy T-shirts printed for you. Of course we will need from all of you that claimed a perk that included a T-shirt, to send us your size. You can expect an email about that soon, and hopefully we’ll have them printed within the week. We will try to get an estimated shipping date for them too and we will keep you informed as we get all that sorted out.Your codebender team 

Update 24/07/2012
We are glad to say, we have reached our target! We want to thank everybody that contributed to the project. We are also happy to announce that we have two major supporters.Our “Ultimate Supporter” Wyolum LLC  and Fab Lab Barcelona! We are really grateful for their donation that helped us reach our goal and keep codebender free!It is now time to set our next goal. We have 6 days left to reach $7000. If we manage to raise 7000$, we will be able to work full-time on our Remote Flashing feature on codebender which will allows us to add Remote Flashing right after the campaign ends. Help us reach $7000 and you could be flashing your Arduino remotely in 6 days from now!The Remote Uploading is something a lot of people have been waiting for. We think it’s time to give you an update. We are excited to announce that as of today, we are officially releasing the Ariadne-Bootloader, an updated version of Arduino's team TFTP-Bootloader, that will enable you to program your internet-connected Arduino through the network. You can watch the teaser video in our blog while we update the documentation with instructions on how to use it.You can grab and compile the code from github or you can claim the Pioneer perk and get an Arduino preloaded with our bootloader delivered straight to your door. Grab them while they are still available and get started right away!


Update 18/07/2012

We’d like to share some news with you guys. We are working very hard to squash bugs you reported and add the new features that you requested. We have improved our compiler, added a temporary library-management system (until our final version is complete) along with some commonly-used libraries, improved our TFTP-Bootloader, improved our infrastructure and squashed many an inconceivable bug.
We feel the need to thank you for making codebender a reality with your donations. Keep spreading the word and our link to the indiegogo campaign and main site. With your help, we can reach our goal and ensure that codebender will stay free, up and running.
Talking about advancing the maker movement, we have some more great news. We are joining forces with the ArduSat project to help them make their project a reality as well. Space exploration for everyone on a budget! Together, we are certain we can do that. We are very excited to work with them and we will keep you updated. We will also be back with more cool updates really soon (hint:TFTP-Bootloader!)
Q) I am a blogger, a journalist. I need more information.A) If you are going to write about our service but the information is not enough, contact us at girder@codebender.cc. We would love to answer your questions.

story:
NEOST’s three powerful UV lamps kill 99.9% of harmful bacteria within 3 minutes. Its slim size makes good use of it to use in practically and portably anytime, anywhere, which provides the healthy day with only one click. Its internal battery is possible to charge various smart device during outdoor activity, and it can be used as a tripod for smartphone or camera that are rechargeable.

NEOST - Portable UV sterilizer that is easy to kill germ within 3 minutes anytime, anywhere. NEOST has overcome shortcoming of existing sterilizers for indoor use only due to large dimension and power supply system. NEOST is able to use anywhere (indoor and outdoor) because its slim cylindrical shape and dimension. Its internal second battery with high capacity can charge another smart device anytime. NEOST provides the clean and healthy day.

 

 

 

 

Because it has internal battery of 4,800 mAh, it can sterilize about 80 times when fully charged and can be used anywhere (indoor and outdoor). Anything that can be placed in the inside diameter formed by expanding three legs of light weight product with 250g is possible to be sterilized.

 

 

 

 

 

 

It is available as a tripod.  It has a built-in battery capacity of 4,800mAh and

you can use as an powerbank for smart device.

 

 

Bluetooth remote control is not included. We filmed it with the bluetooth pen on the Galaxy S9.

 

 

Area of Sterilization

 

Its length is 195 mm and its maximum sterilization diameter is 200 mm when adding legs (+40 mm). As a tripod structure, it minimizes blind zones to be sterilized, so it is possible to sterilize intensively and effectively.

 

Bacteria Account

 

As the stuffs we carry 24 hours are exposed to diverse environment and its various applications, there are always contaminants and harmful bacteria, including dust and germ. These harmful bacteria can cause various diseases including diarrhea, food poisoning, and skin ailment. If you have NEOST, you can be free from various kinds of harmful germs and keep your life clean and healthy.

 

 

Area of Sterilization

 

Its length is 195 mm and its maximum sterilization diameter is 200 mm when adding legs (+40 mm). As a tripod structure, it minimizes blind zones to be sterilized, so it is possible to sterilize intensively and effectively.

NEOST passed the test to sterilize pseudomonas aeruginosa that cause inflammation and sepsis also staphylococcus aureus and E . Coli that cause food poisoning, which was conducted by Korea Conformity Laboratory which is a nation-authorized standardization test institution.

 

The earliest prototype had a cube shape to sterilize germ when rotating, but its rotating motor had high defect rate, narrow battery space, and discomfort in carrying. Its second prototype overcome those shortcoming as mentioned above, designed with tripod shape. For the latest version, its slim tripod shape to use only with one-click anywhere is actualized by lightening weight. Now, the third prototype is developed, which is finished certifying patents its design, functions and its sterilization ability. Its mold production is being prepared for mass production.

 

 

Components

 

 

 

Shipping Details

 

You will be charged different shipping cost based on delivery country. On top of the price of item. Please check the total price for your contribution. Be aware that any fees required by the shipping company are not shipping costs also tariff and taxes are not included which is vary from country to country. KOREA ELECTRONICS TECHNOLOGY Co., Ltd. are not responsible for those extra fees. Also shipping fees are not refundable. we need at least 5 working days notice of cancellation and refund before shipping the perks. scheduled shipping day is the last day of every month.

 

 

 

 

http://koreaet.co.kr/

http://korea-et.com/

https://facebook.com/neostkorea/

https://facebook.com/koreaelec

https://www.linkedin.com/in/korea-electronics-t...

story:
Our Story

It started with a haircut. When Kyle was younger he went to a barbershop every six weeks or so to get a haircut. Each visit he forgot what he got the time before and would be forced to try to remember and describe how it looked when they were done last time. He would often daydream about a system that the stylist could write down what they did and have that info shared amongst other stylists in the company and across multiple locations. This way, if he got someone different the next time or if he had to visit another location, he wouldn’t run into this problem. This idea quickly outgrew barbershops and extended to coffee shops, restaurants, retail stores, and much more. 

The general purpose: To supply businesses with a tool that anticipates their customer’s needs so they may serve them best.

We did many months of research at coffee shops, restaurants, and malls taking advantage of our environment to study customer and business behavior. The one thing we found was that businesses don’t have the time to gather any information that would enhance the customer experience (past an email address) and customers don’t respond well to giving out their information if they don’t know how it’s going to be used. The latter really got us thinking about how we can get a win-win situation with both sides of the relationship. That’s when we started doing research on personal information control. 

By giving customers their own universal profile that companies request access to, ultimately flipping the current customer relationship management model on its head, we discovered an entirely new way to secure personal information and manage customers efficiently and effectively at the same time.

 


Our Products:

We’ve been developing Identity and Concierge for about a year. In that time we found that the CRM business is an $18B industry and that private, universal digital identification is a $33B industry and is completely untapped. With the help of emerging technologies such as Bluetooth iBeacons, we have the opportunity to build smart retail stores, coffee shops, hotels, restaurants, homes, cars, etc.

Here's what Identity's sign-on would look like on a mobile application:


Our Progress:

Since June, Andrew and Kyle have been working tirelessly to design the system architecture for each program (seen below) as well as design the user's experience from beginning to end.

Due to Andrew's full-time job and the adjoining non-compete clause, he is unable to build out 100% of the back-end. This campaign's main purpose is to build a small runway for Andrew to finish the back-end completely, at least to an Alpha stage. The rest of the funds will be used to hire an intern front-end developer, design a basic human interface, pay for the software license we're building upon, and account for some smaller operational costs.

Our Company

From the beginning, we knew we wanted a business that centered on people.

That might sound strange because all businesses are, technically, meant for people. Specifically, we didn't want to run a software company or a product company, we wanted to lead a people company. We love people, new technology, and discovering new opportunities to do something that matters—something meaningful for the world. Creating thoughtful applications that can be appreciated equally for its clever uses, outstanding beauty, and ease of use is deeply ingrained in our DNA. Currently, our team is comprised of two individuals who are extremely passionate about helping others, especially with technology:

Kyle is Co-Founder and CEO of Human Planet. With an obsession with customer service and an unmatched love for all people, Kyle is responsible for setting the overall direction and product strategy for the company. He leads the design of Human Planet's services and development of its core technology and infrastructure. Kyle loves making people smile so much that he sometimes anonymously buys Starbucks for the rest of the line.

Andrew is Co-Founder and CTO of Human Planet. Growing up with a database and software genius as a father, Andrew ended up becoming a computer scientist himself with great fervor for helping others with the technology he builds. With this passion, he's improved face-to-face collaboration between more than 20 sites for Logitech, Inc. worldwide, and drove innovation in the way videoconferencing technology was utilized on a day-to-day basis. His knowledge of Unified Communications Technology and more than nine years of experience in customer service makes him the perfect person to harness the organization’s culture of speed, creativity and exploration to build products, services and infrastructure. Bonus points: In his spare time, Andrew is an award winning theatre actor, singer, and dancer.

With your help, we can build the first private profile and customer-centric relationship manager for the world. If you can't contribute financially, we'd really appreciate if you could share this with your friends and family. 

Thank you and we love you!
