story:
Every year there are more than one billion smartphones sold in the world . The average selling price is around 300 USD. It is however have been reduced every year but the big price explosion had to wait. A lot of people to gain access to low-cost smartphones force themselves into 1-2 year loyalty time and monthy installments but it’s over.

We are introducing The world’s Cheapest currently available SmartPhone.

The purchase price is only an introductory price so do not be fooled by the new product since for this price you will receive an exclusive product.

It will compete with the currently most expensive Android phones performance and even you dont have to be ashamed of the 64GB internal storage.

The camera will also not disappoint with the 12 megapixel and with image stabilization you will be able to create perfect images in the most bumpy situations and in terms with the quality of the images you can be the star of social media.

Of course the videos played on the endless screen you will hear it in stereo quality and you wont need to bother with the endless cables and wont get lost in the heaps of cables thanks to the wireless charging.

The phone can handle two sim cards at the same time thus you dont need to bother with sim card changes and other phones.

If the incredible 64GB internal memory is not enough of course you can expand it with micro sd card.

Thanks to the built NFC you can pay with your phone whenever and wherever you are.

You can secure your stored data with your fingerprint.

We believe that this is the best way to introduce out product. If we had to bother ourselves with heavy marketing we could not provide you with competitive prices. Thus we will only produce the specifically ordered quantity and we believe that our goal can be achieved with the power of community and we can bestow a phone not only in performance and appearance that will cause you a lot of pleasure and a price that only we can uniquely offer in the world.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION

GENERAL

Model: N1

SIM Quantity: Dual SIM

SIM Types: Micro SIM Card

CPU: Over 5000 order (:

CPU Processor: 8 Core

OS System: Android 6.0

RAM: 3 GB

Storage: 64 GB

External Memory: up to 1 TB (not include)

Sensor: Over 5000 order (:

Support Language: Multi-Languages

NETWORK

Type: Over 5000 order (:

Band: Band (2G): GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz
Band (3G): WCDMA 850/900/1900/2100MHz
Band (4G): FDD-LTE 800/1800/2100/2600MHz

B1/B3/B5/B7/B20 – Europe and Asia

B2/B4/B5/B7/B17 - Usa

WIFI: Yes.

GPS: Yes.

Bluetooth: Yes.

DISPLAY

Screen Size: Over 5000 order. (: (frameless)

Screen Type: Over 5000 order. (: (frameless)

Resolution: 1920*1080 pixels

CAMERA

Camera: Dual.

Front: 5 MP

Main: 12 MP

Video recording: Yes.

MEDIA

Audio: Over 5000 order. (:

Video: Over 5000 order. (:

CONNECTIVITY

Ports: Over 5000 order. (:

BATTERY

Type: Over 5000 order. (:

Capacity: 4800mAh

Standby time: ~ 15 days

WEIGHT

Size: Over 5000 order. (:

Weight: 184 g

PACKAGE

Package Contents: Over 5000 order. (: + gift

How it is possible that the price is so reasonable?

Through the result of many years hard work we have gained lot of experience and we have been able to produce this quality product line using quality and durable parts.

 

What kind of warranty can I get with these products?

We offer two years full warranty for all products. The warranty excludes issues related to usage (breakage, scratching, theft, etc.) If there is a problem with your device, within the two year warranty period we will replace it with a new product.

 

Can I trust such a low price product?

Of course, you can. We are proud that with many years of experience we have been able to create a high level and quality product. We only work with reliable partners and suppliers. Up to now, we haven't experienced any issues with our partners or products. Your purchase is covered by our two-year warranty, where we replace any defective items.

 

Do you ship worldwide?

Yes.

story:
Hi guys,

Thank you all for your support.

The production will start next week and we will be able to ship to all of you.

We will plan to open points of sells in 6 different Countries, stay tuned!!!

 

www.poquetpatch.com


THIS IS POQUET PATCH.. thanks to all of you!

 

 

 

 

PACKAGING DESIGN in progress...

 

FIRST BATCH ready!!

 

 

Projecting fase in May...

 

 

 

..some of your questions so far..

 

Q: What material is POQUETpatch?
A: POQUETpatch is a special material made by a core of stainless steel fiber coated with cotton and polyester, designed to shield and reflect electromagnetic waves.

Q: Does this product effect the signal?
A: It doesn't. POQUETpatch creates just an invisible shield between you and your device not compromising the signal.

 

Q: Does it protect me from Wifi radiation also?
A: Yes, the material is certified to protect from all kind of electromagnetic radiation. 
It shields from 100MHz to 3000MHz.

Q: Would I have any problem in the airport?
A: No problem at all for the metal detector, you can see it only if you pass under the full body scanner, but no consequences.

Q: Do I feel it in my pocket?
A: No, it’s just an extra layer of fabric in you pocket, flexible and light as a normal fabric.

Q: How long does this product last in our clothes? Does the detergent effect this product?
A: It all depend’s how you iron it and treat your clothes, but the glue we chosen is a professional industrial fabric glue, it last for years.

Q: Does the detergent effect this product?
A: Detergents does NOT effect the product.

Q: Why don’t you just make it in a pouch or phone case instead of a pocket so we don’t need to modified our clothes by adding this layer?
A: First of all because if you use a cover, you have to pay attention all the time on how you place the phone in your pocket; second because if you like your phone as it is or you have a cover battery or your favourite cover, you will have to change it; but most important because the cover does not protect a large area like your POQUETpatch does!
Using a pouch also will effect too much the signal, and as less as the signal, the stronger are your mobile’s emissions, and that’s something we don’t want.

Q: Can I be electromagnetism free with this product?
A: This is a product which helps you reduce the risk from direct irradiation from a device we hardly can be away from, either for work (imagine a business man without), or for other reason (imagine our child going somewhere with friends or school trip).
Of course it’s impossible to be electromagnetism-free nowadays, but it also true that most of the radiation around us are not that dangerous if we pay enough attention to our everyday lifestyle.

POQUETpatch creates just an invisible shield between you and your device not compromising the signal. Q: Does it protect me from Wifi radiation also?A: Yes, the material is certified to protect from all kind of electromagnetic radiation. It shields from 100MHz to 3000MHz.Q: Would I have any problem in the airport?A: No problem at all for the metal detector, you can see it only if you pass under the full body scanner, but no consequences.Q: Do I feel it in my pocket?A: No, it’s just an extra layer of fabric in you pocket, flexible and light as a normal fabric.Q: How long does this product last in our clothes? Does the detergent effect this product?A: It all depend’s how you iron it and treat your clothes, but the glue we chosen is a professional industrial fabric glue, it last for years.Q: Does the detergent effect this product?A: Detergents does NOT effect the product.Q: Why don’t you just make it in a pouch or phone case instead of a pocket so we don’t need to modified our clothes by adding this layer?A: First of all because if you use a cover, you have to pay attention all the time on how you place the phone in your pocket; second because if you like your phone as it is or you have a cover battery or your favourite cover, you will have to change it; but most important because the cover does not protect a large area like your POQUETpatch does!Using a pouch also will effect too much the signal, and as less as the signal, the stronger are your mobile’s emissions, and that’s something we don’t want.Q: Can I be electromagnetism free with this product?A: This is a product which helps you reduce the risk from direct irradiation from a device we hardly can be away from, either for work (imagine a business man without), or for other reason (imagine our child going somewhere with friends or school trip).Of course it’s impossible to be electromagnetism-free nowadays, but it also true that most of the radiation around us are not that dangerous if we pay enough attention to our everyday lifestyle.

story:
Currently shipping! Available for purchase on our official website.


A beautiful split keyboard
with mechanical keys.

Successfully funded! Now available for pre-order right here, with our new ErgoDox EZ Wing wrist rest and the exclusive ErgoDox EZ Tilt/Tent Kit!

  • Comes fully assembled (not a kit).
  • Full 2-year manufacturer's warranty.
  • Case made of injection-molded ABS plastic, not 3D printed.
  • Printed keycaps available! Look for the perk on the right.
  • Custom accessories: Tilt/Tent kit and Wing wrist rest
  • Powerful, customizable, open-source firmware (QMK)
  • Supports N-key rollover (NKRO) and mouse keys

Imagine an ergonomic keyboard that’s so great, people would be willing to buy it in bits and pieces and solder it on their own. A mechanical keyboard, fully customizable to your needs. Such a keyboard exists: the ErgoDox. But why should it be so hard to get?

Those were our thoughts as we drooled over the ErgoDox only a few months ago. Right now, you can only get this keyboard as a kit which you must solder together on your own, and these kits are available only once in a while. We're geeks, but we're not really into soldering tiny components at home.

We looked around and realized we're not alone. The ErgoDox is a proven design. People want this keyboard — and for good reason — but not everyone wants to spend hours, days, even months putting it together. We decided to do something about it.

Introducing: The ErgoDox EZ! The ErgoDox is an open-source design, the concept belongs to the community. Now, we have the opportunity to make it into a complete product anyone can buy. Take it out of the box, plug it in, and start enjoying an amazing typing experience, warranty included. It’s not a kit: It’s a keyboard.

What makes the ErgoDox great

  • It’s a tactile, mechanical keyboard. Mechanical key switches offer a satisfying feel and make for a much better typing experience.
  • The ErgoDox comes in two halves, connected by a standard cable (with 3.5mm jacks on each end — not something custom you’re going to lose). This means you can place each half exactly where you want it, for maximum typing comfort.
  • It’s one of the most powerful programmable keyboards on the planet. Powered by a Teensy microcontroller and running open-source firmware, you can customize the ErgoDox's key layout in almost any way you can imagine.
  • Right now, you can choose between two main kinds of assembled mechanical keyboards: You have the compact “retro” ones like the Happy Hacking keyboard, or the large ergonomic ones like the Kinesis Advantage. The ErgoDox is a mechanical keyboard design that is both compact and ergonomic.
  • Just like high-end headphones have an audio jack rather than a fixed cable, so does the ErgoDox: It comes with a USB jack (and a standard cable in the box, of course). This makes it easy to transport, and means you can always replace the cable.

ErgoDox kits are wonderful, and the fact that the design is open and anyone can manufacture it is great. We claim no copyright or any other exclusivity over the ErgoDox: We merely wish to make this keyboard available to anyone who wants it, regardless of their soldering ability.

The ErgoDox EZ comes as you would expect a keyboard to come: Assembled, in a box, with everything you need. It has a comprehensive 2-year warranty, it’s made in Taiwan, and it’s awesome.

 

 

The ErgoDox EZ Wing

 

Made of a rigid silicon-like polymer (more expensive than ABS plastic), the Wing is a black and substantial custom-molded wrist rest for the ErgoDox EZ. Carefully contoured to match the signature curve of the ErgoDox EZ, the Wing comes as a separate accessory. This allows you to change the distance between the Wing and the ErgoDox EZ for optimum comfort during your day. We found there is no one perfect distance: Different times of day call for different postures.

The Wing's polymer has very little give to it. It isn't soft or squishy, and most important, it isn't tacky. It's about as hard as a fully inflated bicycle tire, with a premium, substantial feel to it (just don't bludgeon anyone with it, please). 

 

The Wing is only available to customers who order the ErgoDox EZ. 

The ErgoDox EZ Tilt/Tent Kit

This is something the ErgoDox has never had before: A way to tilt and tent the keyboard in an adjustable angle. Yes -- there are solutions out there that allow you to tilt the ErgoDox at an angle, but it's one angle. Our tilt/tent kit, made up of six metal legs with rubber feet, makes it possible to fully control both the tilt (front-to-back) and tent (side-to-side) angle of your ErgoDox EZ, and change it anytime you like. It will also make it look like a keyboard spider from the future, squatting on your desk.

The metal legs connect to metal inserts built into the body of the ErgoDox EZ. Both sides of this metal-to-metal connection have knurles or teeth, which means that once you have the tilt/tent legs in position, they won't be going anywhere. Just put the legs in the exact angle you like, tighten the included thumb screws, and you're done -- these will withstand a lot of pressure. Finally, you can have your ErgoDox EZ at exactly the right angle.

 

Below are some photos of our early prototypes for this stretch goal. We've been working on this for a while and ran through some wildly different ideas until we ended up with this design. One of the legs directly supports the thumb area, allowing for very sturdy tenting:

The other two legs support the back part of the assembly, and each is individually adjustable of course:

And here's an example of a pretty extreme tilt (front-to-back angle), just one of many ways you could use the kit:

And here is the final tilt/tent kit, as manufactured:

 

And one of the keyboard with the kit assembled:

 

 

 

Picking your key switches

 

 

One of the most important aspects of a mechanical keyboard is the key switches, and we're offering seven different types for you to choose from.

Each key on a mechanical keyboard hides an actual physical switch under it, rather than a squishy rubber membrane like on most keyboards. Typing on a mechanical keyboard is a very different experience from typing on a regular one.The keys have more travel, and everything is more tactile. Mechanical keyboards have their own unique sound, and you don't have to press the keys all the way down to get a reaction, which makes typing easier on the fingers.

The ErgoDox EZ comes with Gateron Brown key switches by default, but you can choose a different type of switch when ordering. If you’d like to choose a different type of key switch, there are several things you should consider:

  • How much noise do you want your keyboard to make? Do you want a clicky switch or non-clicky switch?
  • Do you prefer a smoother typing experience, or do you want to feel a slight bump when the key is actuated? Do you want a linear or a tactile switch?
  • How much force do you want to use when typing on your keyboard?

Here's a summary of the Gateron key switches we currently offer:

Switch Force (±15gf) Pre-Travel (±0.6mm) Feel Notes
Brown 55g 2.0mm Tactile Quiet, great for office use. Most people go for this. Corresponds to Cherry MX Brown.
Blue 60g 2.3mm Clicky The most popular "clicky" key. Corresponds to Cherry MX Blue.
White 35g 2.0mm Linear Think Cherry MX Red, but lighter.
Red 45g 2.0mm Linear A gamer favorite. Corresponds to Cherry MX Red.
Yellow 50g 2.0mm Linear … think Cherry MX Red, but heavier. :)
Black 60g 2.0mm Linear Corresponds to Cherry MX Black.
Green 80g 2.3mm Clicky A very heavy clicky switch, corresponds to Cherry MX Green.

Default firmware keymap

The ErgoDox EZ is open-source, but the firmware it ships with is already very advanced. When you take your ErgoDox EZ out of the box and plug it in, this is what you get:

 


Click here for a high-resolution version of the keymap

Some of the fun features:

  • A coder-friendly symbol layer.
  • Media keys on your right hand.
  • Mouse keys.
  • A Hyper key, as described by Brett Terpstra.
  • A meh key, which is a less-hyper version of the Hyper key (sends Alt+Ctrl+Shift, without Cmd/Ctrl).
  • A bilingual-friendly key for sending Alt+Shift in a single keystroke.
  • Easily accessible Ctrl keys on your pinkeys, right next to Shift. Tap to send the usual keypress, hold to send Ctrl.
  • A Ctrl key on the thumb cluster that also doubles as Esc when you tap it.
  • An Alt key on the thumb cluster that also works as an Apps (right-click) key when you tap it.
  • Shift, of course, still works as you'd expect it to. so Shift+8 sends * for instance.

Customizing your ErgoDox EZ

Out of the box, your ErgoDox EZ comes with the default ErgoDox EZ firmware (QMK, or Quantum Mechanical Keyboard) and QWERTY keyboard layout as shown above. You can, however, completely transform it. Decide what each key does, and even create entirely new layers of keys. The default firmware has a dedicated layer for numbers and coder-friendly symbols, and a layer with media keys and mouse keys. It also supports N-key rollover out of the box. Then again, you can customize it any way you like.

To make these changes, you have three options:

Use the Massdrop Graphical Configurator

Massdrop, the innovative startup behind the ErgoDox kits, has an online graphical configuration utility which you can use to easily create your own layout. Layouts you create using this configurator are fully compatible with the ErgoDox EZ, as it’s simply an ErgoDox.

This method doesn’t require any programming knowledge, and allows you to share your layouts with others.

Use a community-created version of the firmware

The ErgoDox EZ is all about choice and customization, so we love it when people take the firmware and run with it.

  • Seth Herr created a GitHub repository with firmware files and clear, simple documentation showing how to use them. A great resource for getting started.
  • Stephan Bösebeck created lovely writeup documenting his experiences with the ErgoDox EZ and customizing it for German. Useful even if you use the keyboard in English or any other language.

Done anything cool with firmware for the ErgoDox EZ? Let us know — we'd love to feature you!

Compile the firmware on your own

If you happen to know C, you can customize and compile the actual firmware the ErgoDox is running. This firmware has been created by Jack Humbert of OLKB fame, and is available on GitHub -- that's a direct link to the ErgoDox EZ keymap C file, which you can modify to your liking. And yes, we will fully respect your warranty if you flash your own version (or any other firmware for that matter).

Project schedule and timeline

  

May, 2015: We will spend the month of May doing two things: placing orders for parts (with special emphasis on the key switches) and perfecting the enclosure design. We might do 2-3 more prototypes (what you see in the photos on the page is a 3D-printed prototype). Done.

June-August, 2015: The making of the molds ("tooling") will take around five months. In a typical mold-making cycle, the first three months are spent on the straightforward implementation of whatever we designed. This is where our 3D models come to life.

By the end of August we will have some crude shells that came off that new mold. These usually have problems that require solving. A little warping, perhaps, or one or two parting lines which are too obvious to ignore. This too, is done.

 

September, 2015: Now it's time to perfect the mold. This process is the reason mold makers are considered to be craftsmen of sorts - nothing that will be done in this phase is in the original 3D files. It's all in the mold maker's experience and skills. Our contractor is very expensive and very skilled.

By the end of September, the mold is expected to reach a "really done" state, and the mold maker will proceed with adding surface texture (the parts have a smooth oily feel before the texture is added).

While the mold maker is at it, we will be busy preparing for production. Apart from purchasing components, we will be busy creating "fixtures." These are props needed for industrial-scale assembly and testing of the product.

The plan, at least for now, is to use a robot for the insertion of the key switches and keycaps, as well as for the testing of the finished keyboard. It's not enough to just purchase the right robotic arm. We have to choreograph the whole robotic routine — every movement, every test step, all with vision guidance (cameras that help us make sense of things).

In addition, we will be spending time on making the packaging, as well as going through the CE and FCC certification for the product. All of this is done. Go to the Updates tab to look at our CE and FCC certificates.

October, 2015: We will spend this month fine-tuning the outer surfaces and also experimenting with the color mix in order to get the best possible look and feel for the shells. When this is all finished, the "tooling" phase will finally be done. Done.

November, 2015: Production! For this we will need to have all parts in stock, the tooling ready, the robot waiting, and certificates received. Done! Production is ongoing.

Now you know why people say that "hardware is hard".

Frequently asked questions

What color does the keyboard come in?

We've done a backer-only survey, and right now we're offering the ErgoDox EZ in black.

What is the key profile? What keycaps are included?

For blank keyboards, we are including sculpted PBT DCS keycaps. Keyboards that come with printed keycap come with DSA (non-sculpted) keycaps. The reason for this is so you can still move your key caps around even if you have printed keys, maintaining maximum flexibility.

What about shipping?

If you ordered in the beginning of the campaign, you must have added the Shipping perk to your original ErgoDox order. $30 is a flat international shipping rate we chose for this campaign, to make things simple for everyone. It does not include any customs or taxes you may need to pay in your country. Keyboards will be shipping from Taiwan.

All current orders don't need to add any extra for shipping! IndieGogo tacks on the $30 as you back the keyboard, you do not need the standalone shipping perk if you're ordering a keyboard right now. This is only for old orders who still need to pay for shipping separately.

When do I specify my choice of key switches?

IndieGogo's checkout process does not allow for such customization. Personal contact to the rescue! We'll email you to ask for your choice of key switches as soon as you order.

How should I use the six little red washers that come with the keyboard?

Those washers are a little extra we didn't mention elsewhere. :) The tilt/tent kit meshes with the body of the keyboard using knurled metal surfaces. This means it clicks when you move it, and there are positive stops along the way. If you happen to want to set your tilt/tent kit in some very specific angle that is just between two positive stops (a fraction of a degree), you can use those washers. Stick the washers between the body of the keyboard and the tilt/tent leg, and the leg becomes infinitely adjustable.

Who created your awesome video?

Why, we're glad you asked! The video was shot by the incredibly talented (and fun to work with) crew of Mikooka Productions, at Design Terminal Bat Yam. We're very grateful to all involved.

The reason for this is so you can still move your key caps around even if you have printed keys, maintaining maximum flexibility.What about shipping?If you ordered in the beginning of the campaign, you must have added the Shipping perk to your original ErgoDox order. $30 is a flat international shipping rate we chose for this campaign, to make things simple for everyone. It does not include any customs or taxes you may need to pay in your country. Keyboards will be shipping from Taiwan.All current orders don't need to add any extra for shipping! IndieGogo tacks on the $30 as you back the keyboard, you do not need the standalone shipping perk if you're ordering a keyboard right now. This is only for old orders who still need to pay for shipping separately.When do I specify my choice of key switches?IndieGogo's checkout process does not allow for such customization. Personal contact to the rescue! We'll email you to ask for your choice of key switches as soon as you order.How should I use the six little red washers that come with the keyboard?Those washers are a little extra we didn't mention elsewhere. :) The tilt/tent kit meshes with the body of the keyboard using knurled metal surfaces. This means it clicks when you move it, and there are positive stops along the way. If you happen to want to set your tilt/tent kit in some very specific angle that is just between two positive stops (a fraction of a degree), you can use those washers. Stick the washers between the body of the keyboard and the tilt/tent leg, and the leg becomes infinitely adjustable.Who created your awesome video?Why, we're glad you asked! The video was shot by the incredibly talented (and fun to work with) crew of Mikooka Productions, at Design Terminal Bat Yam. We're very grateful to all involved.

story:
• RECHARGE YOUR MOBILE DEVICE OVER THE INTERNET! 
We already have wireless internet and wireless phones. Why ,then ,are our mobile devices still shackled to the wall to be powered?  Finally ,there is a real wireless charging solution. Like most people Tariq Sawandi and Charles Thomas , co-founders of Dhat-Stone, LLC hated to lose power to their cellphone battery. So the two entrepreneurs and inventors started developing a Wireless smart battery they call BitEnergy.  They took a simple , universal problem and put together a simple ,elegant solution for it.

Losing phone power is not an option if you need to contact a loved one in an emergency or if you need to inform friends or relatives in a change in travel plans, or other critical situations. The computer industry attempted to address this issue several years ago with the introduction of wireless induction chargers that unfortunately do not recharge your batteries beyond a charging kiosk or induction package.

HOW IT ALL STARTED
One night in August 2011 , naturopath , inventor, entrepreneur, and software developer Dr. Tariq Sawandi went to bed in a motel and woke up with a vision for a smart battery that can be recharged through the cloud. At the time, Sawandi who wrote the quantum physics book "The Quantum Signature of God" , had discovered a way to apply quantum energy principles to recharging a battery using only digital codes.

Unhappy with the low battery life of mobile technology Sawandi began searching for alternative gadgets that could recharge a battery wirelessly using binary code energy. Basic versions of such devices existed for more than a decade but the energy companies have continuously suppressed such technologies over the years. They would prefer consumers to keep plugging into their electrical outlets which rack of billions of dollars in profits. However,  in recent years advances in digital circuitry and low energy sensors have helped developers radically improve the designs to make wireless energy transmission more efficient.

Sawandi and Thomas believe that the battery industry is entrenched in antiquated thinking. They want to push the boundaries of battery technology by reinventing the box. The Dhat-Stone team wants to develop and deploy a smart battery in as little as one year. If so , mobile technology is on the cusp of a new revolution!

THE  QUANTUM ENERGY GENERATOR (QEG) BREAKTHROUGH
Sawandi was able to think about the problem of charging a mobile phone literally from a quantum physics principle down to atoms and electrons. This led to a breakthrough with the quantum energy generator (QEG) circuit which converts binary energy into electricity.
Tariq Sawandi and Dr. Charles Thomas explored a strange quantum mechanism to amplify digital codes  into electron current flow. Their invention has caused a stir because it invokes quantum mechanics the branch of physics that describes the behavior of particles in the subatomic realm. Their Idea gives some insight into the process of "digital-energy " which has been overlooked by engineers and physicists and in short can lead to the development of wireless internet charging.
The BitEnergy Smart Battery is scoffed at , however , sparking  incredulity from both venture capitalists (VC's ) and old electronic engineers because quantum effects supposedly hold sway only on the smallest scales and cannot be amplified enough to recharge a mobile phone battery. "I have since realized that some of the best ideas come out of seemingly crazy thoughts, because, otherwise they wouldn't be new." says Tariq Sawandi. 
With the formation of Dhat Stone Quantum Information Technologies LLC , Tariq Sawandi and Charles Thomas aims to provide users of mobile devices with an energy generating device that eliminates the need for charging cell phones with cords and electrical outlets. "Its like having a mini generator attached to your phone", Tariq Sawandi says of that BitEnergy technology. 

WHAT IS BIT-ENERGY? 
Tariq and Charles built their first prototype in a garage. The two cofounders dubbed their creation The BitEnergy Smart Battery - a small plastic battery sized device that reads binary codes sent wirelessly over the Internet. BitEnergy is defined in telecommunications as the " signal energy " associated with each use of data bit. Eb  , or Bit-energy is measured in units of joules (per Watt seconds). BitEnergy stands for "binary energy" which is based on the mathmatical equation:
                                                 Eb/No  

HELP CREATE A DIGITAL ENERGY REVOLUTION NOW!
Mobile device charging is about to change with the new Bit Energy Smart Battery that will provide a full charge to your mobile phone battery through the cloud. When you are in the middle of nowhere and your device flashes the 5 minutes battery left warning you can download the Bit Energy recharge App and receive a full digital energy charge to your phone battery from anywhere on the world! In addition,  The BitEnergy Smart-Battery will attach to any make or model cell phone including the old Flips and smartphones.

HOW BITENERGY WORKS:

The BitEnergy Smart Battery has a built-in  Quantum Energy Generator (QEG) circuit that can read digital data sent over the internet and convert it into electrical charges to recharge a mobile phone battery. The BitEnergy device plugs directly into your charger port and slides under your phone. The unit which measures about 6 centimeters by 5 centimeters by 1 centimeter thick and is capable of recharging any mobile device from anywhere in the world. BitEnergy delivers unlimited power through the cloud! Connection to your existing cell phone is easy and straightforward. There are no cords or wires; instead the user simply attaches the unit  to their phone charger port and download the BitEnergy Recharge App which supports the BitEnergy smart battery. Whenever your battery power is low you simply click on the App icon button and the BitEnergy cloud datacenter will send Digital energy to your phone. 

EASY EXTERNAL ATTACHMENT TO ANY PHONE OR iPAD:


SLIDES RIGHT UNDER YOUR PHONE:



Below is the Showcasing of the Quantum Energy Generator circuitry inside of the BitEnergy smart battery.




ILLUSTRATION OF THE BITENERGY INTERNAL COMPONENTS:

Illustration of the components that make BitEnergy work:

A. The BitEnergy Smart'Battery.
B. Wireless sensor.
C. The (QEG) circuitry.
D. Embedded software.
E. External charger jack.


RECHARGE WEARABLES

Proposed Wearable by Dhat-Stone. To address the problem of low battery life,the Dhat-Stone wearable will power itself through the cloud!
THE PARTS:
A.  A touch screen display which serves as a remote control to any MP3 player, or smartphone. A screen  notification and vibration cues the user when the BitEnergy chip is recharging the watch battery.

B. A digital microprocessor receives a digital signal through the cloud to began activating the Quantum Energy Generator (QEG).

C. The (QEG) circuit converts the digital binary code into current to generate electricity.

D. The BitEnergy (QEG) chip sends the electric charge to the watch battery.

BitEnergy will eliminate the need to recharge cell phone batteries with portable chargers for electrical outlets. See the feature story of the BitEnergy Recharging Technology and Dhat-Stone LLC. Google "RECHARGE YOUR PHONE OVER THE INTERNET".


YOUTUBE VIDEO ABOUT BITENERGY:
See www.YouTube.com/BitEnergy Wireless Technology.  Video featuring Dr. Tariq Sawandi, entrepreneur and the inventor of the BitEnergy smart battery ,who explains how and what makes BitEnergy work along with graphical illustration. He shows how to recharge a mobile phone with digital code sent over the Internet. This will strike a chord with consumers who live with their cell phones and are constantly losing power.

RECEIVE A CLOUD-BASED RECHARGE!




SAVE LIVES: A BETTER CHARGER TECHNOLOGY FOR THE DEVELOPING WORLD


BitEnergy is a disruptive technology that can be tremendously empowering and affordable in developing countries such as Africa and India where electrical power grids are poor. Mobile is the future, but throughout the developing world in regions such as Africa it's not about smartphones - the basic limitation is electrical power. Cellphones require recharge to help people make money-transfers, to communicate during disasters, connecting to health care services and education, or helping those in poverty to run a business.

In many parts of Africa and India, people get their electric power from deficient electrical-grids. Because of decades of ineffective government control, electricity isin critically short supply. In Lagos, Nigeria every household store depends on diesel generators. Many sit in the dark in an upscale hotel waiting for a generator to kick in. Its unbearable.

How do you deliver cellphone energy to the 3 billion people living off the grid? THE BITENERGY SMART BATTERY will turn  Internet digital data into a battery charge. 5 percent of the net proceeds from the BitEnergy campaign  Empowered by you will help supply free BitEnergy Smart Batteries to help impoverished men and women in multiple developing nations in Africa, India, and China.

STAY CHARGED WITH THE BITENERGY RECHARGE APP:

If you're stuck in a place without a plug to recharge your phone the BitEnergy Smart Battery will turn your Internet phone connection into your own personal cloud-based power grid. The BitEnergy Recharge App which you can download for FREE will give you a service that acts as a local hotspot. The App enables your smartphone to remain connected to power on demand. We have designed the App to give a visual alert that your phone is receiving "digital energy files". With the BitEnergy App on your phone, you can go anywhere in the world and receive digital power.



PERFECT FOR DEVELOPING COUNTRIES:

In developing countries such as Africa, India, and China, there are masses of people who do not have access to a reliable power grid to recharge their mobile devices. BITENERGY is a solution to this problem. The BitEnergy Smart Battery cloud -based technology can generate electricity to charge devices like cellphones and lamps - a potential lifesaver for the 3 billion people worldwide who lack access to reliable power. 


FUNDING TO COMPLETE THE PROTOTYPE:
Dhat-Stone,  LLC is seeking $20,000 to develop ,design, and license our BitEnergy Smart Battery. We have partnered with Davison.com Design & Development Corporation,  and HLH prototypes two top quality prototype developers in the U.S. They will assist us in integrated product rendering presentation and complete design and development of the final BitEnergy device. We will use the funds to complete the final prototype model and the BitEnergy Recharge App, which will cost about $10,000. We also need another $10,000 to build a web-site and hire a consultant in supply chain management and Sales to target the U.S., Africa , Europe , the Middle East ,and Asian markets.  We expect to release our product by December 2015. Here is the total breakdown of the expensives to fund our project:
BREAKDOWN OF EXPENSIVES:
- $2, 700 to produce the CNC mold for the final BitEnergy Smart Battery module design.
- $3, 800 will go towards completing the BitEnergy Recharge App source code.
- $2, 000 to hire a branding and marketing team to bring BitEnergy to global markets.
- Another $2, 500 to set up a web-site and cloud datacenter to service users of the BitEnergy Recharge Cloud service.
- $5, 000 to lease office space and provide a sales force team.
- $4, 000 will go towards the cost to packaging and manufacturing the BitEnergy Smart Battery and deliver to our backers and customers.
We expect to deliver our product to our backers by December 2015 - just in time for Christmas!

WHY WE CHOSE INDIGOGO CROWD FUNDING:
 We're choosing to build a product that provides the user with a device that cuts out the middleman and empower the consumer to self connect the Smart Battery to their existing cell phones. This will give the user direct access to digital recharge through a cloud based service,  rather than depending on smartphone makers to integrate it into their devices. Thre BitEnergy Recharge App which supports the smart battery will be developed into Android and iOS phone versions. We're trying to create a solid app where the user will never have to worry about losing power to their phone. We think we can lead an entire new movement in Internet Recharge Technology.

RISKS & CHALLENGES
It has taken already about three years to be where we are today with the BitEnergy chip & software app and it has been a great challenge from a design and development perspective to achieve such a great and revolutionary wireless technology.
The hardest part of designing the initial prototype was producing enough voltage to fully recharge a lithium Ion battery. Eventually after experimenting with the (GAN) transistors, we were able to produce up to 1000 volts.  This was enough voltage to recharge conventional mobile device batteries. 
We face the final major task of bringing all the materials and elements together through programming , building , and testing the prototype. For example , the energy producing quantum generator needs to be scaled to fit into different mobile devices and to recharge a battery in a short amount of time. At this stage of our design, we foresee this as the largest hurdle aside from the normal challenges involved in any hardware and software development. To reduce the risk and challenge we have partnered with a technology think tank team called Davison a brilliant team of prototype designers and developers and engineers out of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. This provides us added  insurance and confidence to reach full product development by December 2015. Our in- house design team has spent a considerable amount of time constructing the base prototype model of the BitEnergy technology and we believe we have greatly reduced the challenges involved.

OUR MISSION:
We are a startup software company and we want to make a difference , we love the community and we're hoping you'll want to make our project successful. We want to provide an alternative to today's tangle of charger cords and wires. HELP US START THIS DIGITAL REVOLUTION NOW!

story:
Features

 

 

Get ready to fall in love with FOBO TAG’s 13 powerful features/functions.

 


Key Features/Functions:

 

1. FindME comprises five search functions to retrieve something or someone missing.

    • Augmented Reality(AR) Search enhances the effectiveness of a search. It maps the real life surrounding with directional indications to enhance visual recognition and depth perception during a search. This AR effectively navigates you towards the missing item in a familiar or unfamiliar environment.

     

     
    • Group Search improves the efficiency of a search in a large area.  With patented technology, FOBO TAG app lets you mobilize an enlisted team search for a missing item or loved one. The search members can individually and simultaneously search at different spots of a large area with AR Search function.  This function is useful when time is an essence.

     

     

    • 2D Search uses directional radio signal strength, audible beep and flashing light to direct you to the FOBO TAG attached on the missing item. You can activate a strong audible beep with flashing light from FOBO TAG to detect its actual location when you are in close proximity.

     

    • Patented Crowd Search is a remote search function which other FOBO TAG app users can help locate a missing item when they come in Bluetooth range with a FOBO TAG.   With Bluetooth 5 wireless technology, FOBO TAG gets detected from afar, 4 times the range of other trackers of Bluetooth 4. (USA – Patent No. US9485613 B2)

     

    • Reverse Search helps you search for the smartphone that the FOBO TAG is paired with. This function is handy when you have misplaced your phone. If you have multiple TAGs paired with your phone, you can mobilize a team search by assigning one TAG to each team member.

     

     

    2. TrackME shows ON DEMAND the presence of items that you would like to track. It provides an instant summary view of those FOBO TAG that are in Bluetooth range with your smartphone. This function is handy when you have to move about with multiple belongings like during a family vacation or tracking expensive tools in a construction environment.

     

     

    3. RemindME alerts you when a tracked item gets out of Bluetooth range with your smartphone, reminding that the item has been left behind or alerting that the item has been taken away or wandered off. This function stops LOSS.

     

    • SafeZone is a patented feature that allows the FOBO TAG app to drop its guard on a tracked item at a location where you need to detach from the item.  You can set a preferred perimeter in which the RemindME function is turned off for the said tracked item.  This is a useful feature when you need to detach from the item within a safe perimeter, like at home. (USA Patent No. US9614952 B2)

     

     

    • TimeZone is a patented feature that turns off the RemindME function during a time frame you set so that you can detach with the tracked item beyond the perimeter set for SafeZone. This feature is useful when you intentionally leaves a tracked item in the office when having lunch away from office.

     

     

    4. PromptME alerts you when a tracked item comes in Bluetooth range with your smartphone.  It is useful for parents who fetch children from school events; the tracked FOBO TAG will also beep when gets in range telling the children that their parents are waiting by. A traveler can avoid the crowd and approach the airport carousel upon getting a notification as the luggages turn up and get in range with the smartphone(FOBO TAG should be leashed on the bag exterior).

     

     

    5. Don’tMoveMe is a motion detection function that alerts you when the tracked item is moved.  This is a safety feature that you would love when traveling alone to alert you if there is a movement of the hotel room door.  You can also use to detect movement of the lid of a candy jar.  If the tracked item is moved when you are away, you will still get an alert when you return; a movement log is provided.  You can use this feature in a busy airport to alert you against luggage theft(FOBO TAG should be leashed on the bag exterior).

     

    • FOBO Share allows two users to track the same FOBO TAG together or separately.  This patented feature also shows the detached user whether the tracked item is with the other user.  When both of the users are detached from the tracked item, they will be alerted at once, even if they are not at the same location. This feature is useful to monitor the movement of a child at a shopping mall or a pet at a park.

    (Patent No.: Singapore-11201504174W, Russia-2619924, South Korea-10-1639687, Japan-JP,6150185,B)

     

    • CrossPair allows you to swap from one smart device to another, seamlessly. This patented feature is useful when you change to a new phone.  All installed FOBO TAGs will transferred to the new device, without the need to individually pair and install each TAG. (Patent No.: Singapore-11201504174W, Russia-2619924, South Korea-10-1639687, Japan-JP,6150185,B)

     

    CrossPair  Demo Video

     

     

     

    Attach FOBO TAG to your belongings and you will not lose any.

     

     

    Note: User can replace the battery in 5 seconds without using a tool.

     

     

                                 Actual item                                             FOBO TAG App                         

     

    Color choice:


     

    Connectivity Range

     Note: Models compared in table above are Tile Mate and TrackR Bravo.

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    Risks and challenges 

    We were challenged to produce a tracker that is like no other trackers in the World today.  We had to choose the latest and right technologies in hardware, squeeze many components onto a tiny PCB, produce the most reliable antenna performance and audio production into a slim and slick mechanical enclosure. The tracker had to be robust, water resistant and user friendly.  The App had to connect flawlessly with the firmware of the tracker and work with Android and iOS devices using Bluetooth 5 while there were no such devices available at the time of designing.

    We had overcome all these challenges and we are ready to take this product into mass production and commit to delivery.

     

    Press contact: fobo@salutica.com.my

     

    About Us

    We are a group of enthusiastic engineers with passion in design and creation.  With extensive experience with designing products based on Bluetooth wireless technology, we created the FOBO brand, an acronym for For Our Better wOrld.  FOBO carries a mandate to help enhance mankind’s daily living through innovative and smart products. FOBO products get in tune with the Nature, by monitoring key environmental elements that interact with our daily livings or things/loved ones that we care so much about; FOBO is Sensing with Sense TM .

    We had successfully launched an Indiegogo campaign for FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike and accomplished timely delivery to our backers.  We are confident to delivery again a quality and reliable FOBO TAG in this campaign.

     

    Shipping & Logistics for FOBO TAG

    FOBO TAG will be shipped worldwide. Since there are variations in shipping rates across the globe, the tier prices do not include shipping fees(unless otherwise specified). These fees are separately calculated based on the destination country and will be automatically added at the completion of your pledge on our Indiegogo campaign.

    Backers are also responsible for any applicable import duties, taxes, or tariffs imposed by the destination country. Please be aware of your local import procedures before choosing to back our campaign.

     

    FAQ

     

    What is the connectivity type and range?

    FOBO TAG is using Bluetooth 5 and is compatible with smart devices using Bluetooth 5 and 4:

    • Range of connection is up to about 400 feet(120m), if the smartphone has Bluetooth 5.
    • Range of connection is up to about 100 feet(30m), if the smartphone has Bluetooth 4.

     

    Which smartphone is compatible with FOBO TAG?

    Smartphone using iOS 7.1 or Android 4.3 or above and equipped with Bluetooth 5 or Bluetooth 4.

     

    When can I get the TAG if I placed my order today?

    The shipment may take up to 20 business days. 

     

    Do I need to manually re-connect FOBO TAG if I go out of the Bluetooth range?

    Once FOBO TAG has been installed and connected to the smartphone,  it will automatically connect when within the Bluetooth range.

     

    Type of battery and lifespan?

    Battery type is CR2025, which can last up to 12 months with standard use and within safe operating temperature.

     

    Is the battery replaceable or rechargeable?

    The battery is replaceable but not rechargeable. An user can replace the battery in 5 seconds without using a tool.

     

    Warranty?

    Warranty is valid for 15 months from the date of purchase.

     

    Is the battery covered by any warranty?

    No, battery is a consumable item and will not be covered by warranty.

     

    How many TAGs can be paired with one phone?

    Android – up to 6 Tags.

    IOS – More than 6 but limited to the phone memory.

     

    GPS built-in?

    No GPS is available in FOBO TAG.

     

    Can FOBO TAG prevent theft?

    FOBO TAG is not an anti-theft or anti-kidnapping device. Please continue to take precautionary measures and take full responsibility of your belongings or loved ones against theft or kidnapping. You will still be alerted if someone takes away your belongings. It's designed mainly for people who tend to lose their belongings.

     

    Can I use FOBO TAG to locate my phone?

    Yes, you can do the reverse search using your TAG to locate your phone.

     

    Can I monitor FOBO TAG without internet connection?

    Yes, you can monitor the TAG without internet connection. FOBO TAG utilizes Bluetooth technology to communicate with the smartphone.

     

    How do the FOBO TAG attach to items?

    FOBO TAG is slim and compact, which makes it easy to fit inside a wallet or purse without hassle. FOBO TAG also comes with a key chain ring.

     

    What if the TAG got stolen?

    The TAG is linked to user’s email address. This will prevent the stolen TAG to be used by anyone else.

     

    Is the App free of charge to download and use?

    FOBO TAG is available free of charge to download on Google Play store (Android) or AppStore (iOS). There are no additional or any hidden charges.

     

    Can I use FOBO TAG to take pictures?

    Yes, you can customize (in the App) the FOBO button to take pictures.

     

    Can I adjust the coverage distance in FOBO TAG App?

    Yes, you can adjust the coverage distance (near or far) in the FOBO TAG App.

     

    How can I contact you?

    Feel free to contact us at fobo@salutica.com.my
story_txt:
Features
  Get ready to fall in love with FOBO TAG’s 13 powerful features/functions. 
Key Features/Functions:
 1. FindME comprises five search functions to retrieve something or someone missing.
Augmented Reality(AR) Search enhances the effectiveness of a search. It maps the real life surrounding with directional indications to enhance visual recognition and depth perception during a search. This AR effectively navigates you towards the missing item in a familiar or unfamiliar environment.

 
 
Group Search improves the efficiency of a search in a large area.  With patented technology, FOBO TAG app lets you mobilize an enlisted team search for a missing item or loved one. The search members can individually and simultaneously search at different spots of a large area with AR Search function.  This function is useful when time is an essence.  
2D Search uses directional radio signal strength, audible beep and flashing light to direct you to the FOBO TAG attached on the missing item. You can activate a strong audible beep with flashing light from FOBO TAG to detect its actual location when you are in close proximity. 
Patented Crowd Search is a remote search function which other FOBO TAG app users can help locate a missing item when they come in Bluetooth range with a FOBO TAG.   With Bluetooth 5 wireless technology, FOBO TAG gets detected from afar, 4 times the range of other trackers of Bluetooth 4. (USA – Patent No. US9485613 B2)
 
Reverse Search helps you search for the smartphone that the FOBO TAG is paired with. This function is handy when you have misplaced your phone. If you have multiple TAGs paired with your phone, you can mobilize a team search by assigning one TAG to each team member.  2. TrackME shows ON DEMAND the presence of items that you would like to track. It provides an instant summary view of those FOBO TAG that are in Bluetooth range with your smartphone. This function is handy when you have to move about with multiple belongings like during a family vacation or tracking expensive tools in a construction environment.  3. RemindME alerts you when a tracked item gets out of Bluetooth range with your smartphone, reminding that the item has been left behind or alerting that the item has been taken away or wandered off. This function stops LOSS. 
SafeZone is a patented feature that allows the FOBO TAG app to drop its guard on a tracked item at a location where you need to detach from the item.  You can set a preferred perimeter in which the RemindME function is turned off for the said tracked item.  This is a useful feature when you need to detach from the item within a safe perimeter, like at home. (USA Patent No. US9614952 B2)  
TimeZone is a patented feature that turns off the RemindME function during a time frame you set so that you can detach with the tracked item beyond the perimeter set for SafeZone. This feature is useful when you intentionally leaves a tracked item in the office when having lunch away from office.  4. PromptME alerts you when a tracked item comes in Bluetooth range with your smartphone.  It is useful for parents who fetch children from school events; the tracked FOBO TAG will also beep when gets in range telling the children that their parents are waiting by. A traveler can avoid the crowd and approach the airport carousel upon getting a notification as the luggages turn up and get in range with the smartphone(FOBO TAG should be leashed on the bag exterior).  5. Don’tMoveMe is a motion detection function that alerts you when the tracked item is moved.  This is a safety feature that you would love when traveling alone to alert you if there is a movement of the hotel room door.  You can also use to detect movement of the lid of a candy jar.  If the tracked item is moved when you are away, you will still get an alert when you return; a movement log is provided.  You can use this feature in a busy airport to alert you against luggage theft(FOBO TAG should be leashed on the bag exterior). 
FOBO Share allows two users to track the same FOBO TAG together or separately.  This patented feature also shows the detached user whether the tracked item is with the other user.  When both of the users are detached from the tracked item, they will be alerted at once, even if they are not at the same location. This feature is useful to monitor the movement of a child at a shopping mall or a pet at a park.(Patent No.: Singapore-11201504174W, Russia-2619924, South Korea-10-1639687, Japan-JP,6150185,B) 
CrossPair allows you to swap from one smart device to another, seamlessly. This patented feature is useful when you change to a new phone.  All installed FOBO TAGs will transferred to the new device, without the need to individually pair and install each TAG. (Patent No.: Singapore-11201504174W, Russia-2619924, South Korea-10-1639687, Japan-JP,6150185,B)
 CrossPair  Demo Video

story:
Rubicon 3D

is a simple, yet powerful 3d scanner that will enable its users to turn real world objects into virtual 3d models.


How it works:

Webcam takes a picture of an object on the turntable with both lasers on and off, then the software looks for differences in those pictures to detect the shape of your object. Next the turntable turns 0.45 degrees and the process repeats. 800 steps for a full 360° revolution.


What comes out:

After the scanning is complete, you would be able to export either a raw hi-polygon mesh or have it structured and optimized.


Scanning small objects:

( right click + View Image to see big picture )


Examples:

sample scan - vase
sample scan - frog
sample scan - knight


What makes us special:


* Webcam is not included. We suggest using Logitech C920 because of its good quality, but any other webcam would work, too.

With current setup you can scan objects up to 160mm in diameter and about 250mm in height, but since the camera is movable, even bigger objects might fit in.


What do we need the funding for:

Right now our prototype is working on an arduino microcontroller with a stepper motor drive. Of course, we want to develop and use our own PCB. As well as ordering the parts in bulk will help reduce its cost.


When will the scanner be ready:

We expect to have everything ready by the second half of December.

story:
Wireless doorbells are quite common nowadays, but what makes Linbell stand out is the fact that it doesn’t need batteries or an external power supply.


Linbell is easy to install, requires no wiring and requires no battery replacement.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Linbell is programmed with 36 types of ring tones and adjustable on the volume. Pick the favorite one for you and family!


Linbell is entirely self-sufficient, converting the kinetic energy of the switch actuation into a voltage pulse, powering an RF transmitter and sending signals to the receiver.

 

 

 

 

The Linbell energy harvesting kit is an easy-to-use feature for a better user experience.

 

There are 2 transmitters, 1 receiver, and 1 Evaluation board in the kit.

The transmitter contains a energy harvester and a wireless PCB. When you press the transmitter, it will transmit wireless signal and the receiver will receive the signal and output digital "1" or RS232 digital message.

The evaluation board contains a connection unit for RS232 to USB, one reset key, and one buzzer. You can see the communication message by a serial digital numbers on the computer.

 

Explore what you can do with the Linbell energy harvesting kit!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

The risks inherent in mass production are real and we’ve taken every precaution to prepare for and actively address them should they arise. With the support of our manufacturing and distribution partners we are well equipped for the challenges ahead.

We promise to maintain transparency and to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues that may arise and our solutions to such.

Our passion and mission is to deliver the best possible Linbell into your hands ASAP.

story:
Quick Facts

  • Gemini is an integrated keyboard mobile device that fits in your pocket
  • It features an ultra-thin metal clamshell design with a fully integrated QWERTY keyboard
  • Designed for Android, it also features a dual boot Linux option
  • 4G & WiFi and WiFi only models are available - enabling both data communications and mobile phone calls
  • The large ultra-wide touchscreen and double-sized battery provide optimal usability and portability

HURRY! GEMINI IS NOW IN PRODUCTION AND SHIPPING TO INDIEGOGO BACKERS ONLY. ORDER YOUR PERKS TODAY TO GET INTO THE NEXT PRODUCTION RUN. 

Media coverage

Trusted Reviews: "Return of The Psion: New Gemini PDA is a retro Android and Linux delight"
The Register: "The Psion returns! Meet Gemini, the 21st century pocket computer"
ZDNet: "Psion reborn? But this time it's Gemini PDA, an Android-Linux phone with full keyboard"
Slash Gear: "Gemini PDA brings back Psion days with Android/Linux pocket PC"
MÓVIL EXPERTO: "Gemini PDA, un proyecto interesante basado en Linux"
Pc Watch: "シャープの「NetWalker」の再来を彷彿とさせる5.7型のAndroid/Linuxデュアルブート端末"

Summary

At Planet Computers, we are passionate about typing, writing, being productive and creating on the go. 

Since the introduction of touchscreen mobile phones and tablets, we felt that it is very difficult to type on these types of devices. On-screen keyboards often take up more than half the readable screen. We want to get back to typing on a fully tactile keyboard whilst being able to view the entire screen. All this on a device no larger than most modern mobile phones.

We decided to re-invent the palm-sized keyboard mobile device that will benefit many, who we think are missing using the keyboard on the move. From bloggers and creatives that need to constantly write, to professionals who need to read and write e-mail, create and edit documents and spreadsheets.

Gemini is a modern clam-shell based mobile device with a fully integrated palm-sized keyboard. 

To ensure Gemini has the lineage and continuity of the clamshell PDA designs, and to have the best mobile keyboard design on the market, we partnered up with Martin Riddiford and his London-based product design consultancy, Therefore, who were instrumental in the design of the Psion PDAs of the 1990s. In terms of software we partnered up with Private Planet, a leading supplier of applications and personal cloud solutions for mobile operators such as T-Mobile and Etisalat. The Planet Computers team each has over 20 years experience of software and hardware delivery.

The result of our work with Therefore is a beautiful piece of design, befitting the device we want to create. The hardware is based on a leading reference design based on a 10-core state-of-the-art mobile processor.

Gemini features a sleek metal clamshell design that is perfectly balanced for typing when open and beautifully tucks away the palm-sized QWERTY keyboard and screen when closed. It fits into a pocket, roughly the same size as most of today's mobile phones. When open, the innovative clamshell also acts as a support of the device. The ultra-wide 5.99" hi-res screen provides ample space for creating on the go. The fully tactile keyboard is recognised as the world's best yet smallest full-sized keyboard for finger touch typing. 

We plan to have two versions of Gemini: one model with WiFi only; and the other fully equipped with WiFi and 4G mobile communications. 

Features:

  • Two weeks of stand-by time / 12 hours of talk time (TBC)
  • Fully tactile keyboard - recognised as the smallest keyboard for finger touch typing
  • Measure: 17.14 cm x 7.93 cm x 1.51 cm
  • 5.99” colour hi-res ultra-wide touch screen
  • Wifi & WiFi+4G mobile options
  • Weight: 320 g
  • Dual side mounted speakers
  • Dual USB-C connectors to connect to keyboards, external screens, mice, charging cables as needed and many more.
  • Integrated Voice Assist button
  • SD card slot (covered)

Technical Specifications:

    Gemini PDA (Wifi Only) Gemini PDA (Wifi + 4G)
Network: WIFI 802.11a/b/g/n/ac

802.11a/b/g/n/ac

  SIM - SIM slot + eSIM (ready)

Platform: OS Android OS, Linux OS (dual-boot) Android OS, Linux OS (dual-boot)

  CPU

  Bluetooth v4.0 v4.0
  GPS Yes, with AGPS Yes, with AGPS
  NFC - -
  USB 2x USB Type C, OTG support 2x USB Type C, OTG support
Features: Keyboard Mechanical full keyboard Mechanical full keyboard
 

Voice Assistance

 Dedicated button for voice commands Dedicated button for voice commands
  Sensors Accelerometer, compass, light sensor, gyro, magneto-sensor Accelerometer, compass, light sensor, gyro, magneto-sensor
  Fingerprint - -
Battery:   Li-Ion 4220mAh battery Li-Ion 4220mAh battery
Misc: Colour Metal, Gold-plated (limited edition) Metal, Gold-plated (limited edition)

 

Software:

Gemini is powered by the latest Android OS, supporting all your favourite applications. A number of key applications will also be optimised for the landscape screen and physical keyboard.

Gemini will also support Linux as a secondary boot option which provides Linux users with the rich set of Open Source applications.

The software also supports voice recognition using the integrated Voice Assist smart button located on the right hand side of Gemini. You can interact with Gemini using voice commands, even when it is closed in your pocket.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are proud of what we have created to date but need your help to push it over the line. By supporting us, you will be part of re-inventing the PDA product category, which we feel is so lacking in the market at present. We would love you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.

We aim to raise $200,000 through our crowd funding campaign. We have a fully functioning physical model of the device and have identified the mobile hardware platform that is based on the Mediatek Helio X27 processor and the Mali GPU.

Funds raised will go directly to funding the final design phases, manufacturing of the units ordered through the crowd fund, and development of the full software stack. 

As early backers, we were keen to reward you with some unique perks. All Gemini units claimed as perks will have at least $200 off the planned retail price. First deliveries now start in January 2018 - only to Gemini backers.

 

The Impact

We want to change the way you work and play, liberating you from the need to take laptops with you, whilst still giving you an environment in which you can create on a tactile keyboard. Its computing for the creators, rather than consumers. Whether you owned a PDA in the 90's or require a real keyboard integrated into your mobile device for extensive typing, Gemini is the device for you. 

The team behind this campaign and Planet Computers has been involved in successfully delivering 5 funded crowdfunding campaigns. We have expertise in bringing both consumer electronics, hardware and software to market.

 

Risks & Challenges

At present, we have a fully functioning physical model of the device. We have identified a number of suppliers of off-the-shelf components including the ultra-wide displays and the PCBs. By working with these providers, we plan to significantly de-risk the process of bringing Gemini to market allowing us to focus on the plastic parts and metalworks (including hinge) of the Gemini body and the software stack of the device. We plan to manufacture the keyboard component ourselves.

We are currently identifying manufacturing and assembly partners hoping to be able to assemble Gemini in the UK. If however, this were to prove un-economical in light of the pricing we have set for our product in this crowd-fund, we might have to manufacture the device elsewhere.

Our team has experience of delivering both software and hardware. Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in January 2018. We know this is an ambitious target but one which we truly believe is achievable. As such we will be providing our backers with regular updates on Gemini's progress.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We would love you to join the Gemini movement. We have set out a wide variety of ways for you, as backer, to help us. Any support, however great or small, is kindly received. As any startup, we will have our hands full trying to get this product to market, and we are super excited about it. 

Helping spread the word on social media or telling colleagues or friends about our campaign would be like having fairy dust sprinkled on us! If you have any suggestions of ways you think you can help, please don't hesitate to reach out to us by email (hello@planetcom.co.uk) or social media. We would love to hear from you. 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

What keyboard layouts does the keyboard support?
The keyboard layouts that we plan to support as part of the crowd fund are: English (UK/US), French, German, Spanish, Italian, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Russian, Arabic, Japanese, Chinese and Dvorak. For any other languages, please contact us.

What Linux distribution will Gemini run?
We are currently talking to a few companies representing different Linux flavours and we are considering a number of options but the decision has not been taken yet. We are also taking into accounts comments from the backers into consideration, including Sailfish & Ubuntu OS, which have been suggested several times.
story_txt:
Quick Facts
Gemini is an integrated keyboard mobile device that fits in your pocket
It features an ultra-thin metal clamshell design with a fully integrated QWERTY keyboard
Designed for Android, it also features a dual boot Linux option
4G & WiFi and WiFi only models are available - enabling both data communications and mobile phone calls
The large ultra-wide touchscreen and double-sized battery provide optimal usability and portability
HURRY! GEMINI IS NOW IN PRODUCTION AND SHIPPING TO INDIEGOGO BACKERS ONLY. ORDER YOUR PERKS TODAY TO GET INTO THE NEXT PRODUCTION RUN. Media coverageTrusted Reviews: "Return of The Psion: New Gemini PDA is a retro Android and Linux delight"The Register: "The Psion returns! Meet Gemini, the 21st century pocket computer"ZDNet: "Psion reborn? But this time it's Gemini PDA, an Android-Linux phone with full keyboard"Slash Gear: "Gemini PDA brings back Psion days with Android/Linux pocket PC"MÓVIL EXPERTO: "Gemini PDA, un proyecto interesante basado en Linux"Pc Watch: "シャープの「NetWalker」の再来を彷彿とさせる5.7型のAndroid/Linuxデュアルブート端末"SummaryAt Planet Computers, we are passionate about typing, writing, being productive and creating on the go. Since the introduction of touchscreen mobile phones and tablets, we felt that it is very difficult to type on these types of devices. On-screen keyboards often take up more than half the readable screen. We want to get back to typing on a fully tactile keyboard whilst being able to view the entire screen. All this on a device no larger than most modern mobile phones.We decided to re-invent the palm-sized keyboard mobile device that will benefit many, who we think are missing using the keyboard on the move. From bloggers and creatives that need to constantly write, to professionals who need to read and write e-mail, create and edit documents and spreadsheets.Gemini is a modern clam-shell based mobile device with a fully integrated palm-sized keyboard. To ensure Gemini has the lineage and continuity of the clamshell PDA designs, and to have the best mobile keyboard design on the market, we partnered up with Martin Riddiford and his London-based product design consultancy, Therefore, who were instrumental in the design of the Psion PDAs of the 1990s. In terms of software we partnered up with Private Planet, a leading supplier of applications and personal cloud solutions for mobile operators such as T-Mobile and Etisalat. The Planet Computers team each has over 20 years experience of software and hardware delivery.The result of our work with Therefore is a beautiful piece of design, befitting the device we want to create. The hardware is based on a leading reference design based on a 10-core state-of-the-art mobile processor.Gemini features a sleek metal clamshell design that is perfectly balanced for typing when open and beautifully tucks away the palm-sized QWERTY keyboard and screen when closed. It fits into a pocket, roughly the same size as most of today's mobile phones. When open, the innovative clamshell also acts as a support of the device. The ultra-wide 5.99" hi-res screen provides ample space for creating on the go. The fully tactile keyboard is recognised as the world's best yet smallest full-sized keyboard for finger touch typing. We plan to have two versions of Gemini: one model with WiFi only; and the other fully equipped with WiFi and 4G mobile communications. Features:
Two weeks of stand-by time / 12 hours of talk time (TBC)
Fully tactile keyboard - recognised as the smallest keyboard for finger touch typing
Measure: 17.14 cm x 7.93 cm x 1.51 cm
5.99” colour hi-res ultra-wide touch screen
Wifi & WiFi+4G mobile options
Weight: 320 g
Dual side mounted speakers
Dual USB-C connectors to connect to keyboards, external screens, mice, charging cables as needed and many more.
Integrated Voice Assist button
SD card slot (covered)
