 Software:Gemini is powered by the latest Android OS, supporting all your favourite applications. A number of key applications will also be optimised for the landscape screen and physical keyboard.Gemini will also support Linux as a secondary boot option which provides Linux users with the rich set of Open Source applications.The software also supports voice recognition using the integrated Voice Assist smart button located on the right hand side of Gemini. You can interact with Gemini using voice commands, even when it is closed in your pocket. What We Need & What You GetWe are proud of what we have created to date but need your help to push it over the line. By supporting us, you will be part of re-inventing the PDA product category, which we feel is so lacking in the market at present. We would love you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.We aim to raise $200,000 through our crowd funding campaign. We have a fully functioning physical model of the device and have identified the mobile hardware platform that is based on the Mediatek Helio X27 processor and the Mali GPU.Funds raised will go directly to funding the final design phases, manufacturing of the units ordered through the crowd fund, and development of the full software stack. As early backers, we were keen to reward you with some unique perks. All Gemini units claimed as perks will have at least $200 off the planned retail price. First deliveries now start in January 2018 - only to Gemini backers. The ImpactWe want to change the way you work and play, liberating you from the need to take laptops with you, whilst still giving you an environment in which you can create on a tactile keyboard. Its computing for the creators, rather than consumers. Whether you owned a PDA in the 90's or require a real keyboard integrated into your mobile device for extensive typing, Gemini is the device for you. The team behind this campaign and Planet Computers has been involved in successfully delivering 5 funded crowdfunding campaigns. We have expertise in bringing both consumer electronics, hardware and software to market. 
Risks & Challenges
At present, we have a fully functioning physical model of the device. We have identified a number of suppliers of off-the-shelf components including the ultra-wide displays and the PCBs. By working with these providers, we plan to significantly de-risk the process of bringing Gemini to market allowing us to focus on the plastic parts and metalworks (including hinge) of the Gemini body and the software stack of the device. We plan to manufacture the keyboard component ourselves.
We are currently identifying manufacturing and assembly partners hoping to be able to assemble Gemini in the UK. If however, this were to prove un-economical in light of the pricing we have set for our product in this crowd-fund, we might have to manufacture the device elsewhere.
Our team has experience of delivering both software and hardware. Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in January 2018. We know this is an ambitious target but one which we truly believe is achievable. As such we will be providing our backers with regular updates on Gemini's progress.
 


Other Ways You Can Help
We would love you to join the Gemini movement. We have set out a wide variety of ways for you, as backer, to help us. Any support, however great or small, is kindly received. As any startup, we will have our hands full trying to get this product to market, and we are super excited about it. 
Helping spread the word on social media or telling colleagues or friends about our campaign would be like having fairy dust sprinkled on us! If you have any suggestions of ways you think you can help, please don't hesitate to reach out to us by email (hello@planetcom.co.uk) or social media. We would love to hear from you. 
 

Frequently Asked Questions
What keyboard layouts does the keyboard support?The keyboard layouts that we plan to support as part of the crowd fund are: English (UK/US), French, German, Spanish, Italian, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Russian, Arabic, Japanese, Chinese and Dvorak. For any other languages, please contact us.
What Linux distribution will Gemini run?We are currently talking to a few companies representing different Linux flavours and we are considering a number of options but the decision has not been taken yet. We are also taking into accounts comments from the backers into consideration, including Sailfish & Ubuntu OS, which have been suggested several times.

story:
Jackky is new way of connection!


This small innovative connector can protect your audio devices and accessories from broken wires or jack damages, tripping over cable resulting in smashed phones, pointless fiddling to plug in cable in the dark, water damage through audio outlet. Moreover, it simplifies connection with the help of magnetic technology.

           


To get one free Jackky adapter in addition to your pledge just follow the instructions listed in the end of this page.



Using magnetic technology Jackky holds adapter on the connector. Wherein it transmits audio signals between your devices without distortions. It can be easily connected in 3 simple steps:

  1. Insert cable connector into Jackky adapter;
  2. Insert Jackky connector into audio source device;
  3. Smoothly snap 2 parts of Jackky.



Jackky has several advantages comparing with usual audio jacks.


  1. Jackky is unified device and compatible with same devices as usual audio jack;
  2. You can easily use it after connection in 3 simple steps;
  3. Adapted looks tiny and connector will not interfere you being inserted in device;
  4. Can prevent jack of device from water/dirt;
  5. Affordable for everyone;
  6. Headphones with microphone will work properly;
  7. No more wire breaks or damages. It disconnects when tension is exceeded.

Note: water protection may not work on some devices with specific body.


Connecting to all your audio devices and accessories becomes simple and smooth. You can use your Jackky with your phone, computer, tablet, headphones, stereo systems, even your car auxiliary or any place you want an easier and safer way to connect your audio.

        

Jackky supports headphones microphones and buttons, so you can answer calls and change volume as usual.



We have various ideas as stretch goals. It will be added later depending on main campaign progress.




Large funds suggest great responsibility to our investors. Here we’ll show how donated money will be distributed among the needs for Jackky realization.


We  are trying to make your life better. That is why invented Jackky. We are young developing team that needs your support. Jackky is only the beginning, we have a lot of interesting and exciting ideas!

To get free Jackky adapter in addition to your pledge you just have to do several actions:

  1. Share our campaign on Facebook or Twitter;
  2. Follow us on Facebook;
  3. Send us a screenshot of 2 steps above and send it to jackkyaudio@gmail.com. Specify your Indiegogo account name to let us know where to send a free Jackky.

            



Depending on your location delivery period may change. We will notify you about terms of delivery via e-mail. Tiny custom made parts are needed, that is why delays in manufacturing are possible. Post service delays are also possible, we’ll try to minimize period of delivery.
  

1. What about sound quality?

         Jackky does not affect on quality of audio signal. We have tested Jackky with lots of audio devices. Sound quality remains the same as when directly connected to the device.

2. Does magnet influence on my device?

         Magnets are tiny and harmless for your device.

3. How does water protection work?

         Jackky connector has silicone ring that fits tightly to the surface of your device and prevents the ingress of water.

        Note: water protection does not work on devices where edges are not flat.

         In most devices silicone ring fits tightly to the edge surface and water protection works.

4. What is the quality of materials?

         We use only high quality materials for Jackky production.

5. What will the price be for ordinary buyer who has not invested into project?

         It will be 17$ plus transportation costs for 1 Jackky Set.

6. Will it be carried out at retail? Will it be able to get Jackky adapters and connectors separately?

         Of course. You will be able to get any part of Jackky in any quantity.

7. Is it possible to use case along with Jackky?

         If the case suggests usage of headphones. Using Jacky does not differ from using usual audio jack.

8. Why don’t you have official website?

         Website is under construction, we are working on it.

story:
Hi!  We're Marc and Dave and our project is called Charging for Change.  

Even though it pains us to say it, we're a couple of middle aged dudes who wanted to do something cool to support some amazing charitable causes that help people on a day to day basis as well as make an awesome gadget that people will actually use! We like to say that we are "Solving First world problems and REAL world problems". Cool?
Here's how we want to do this - and ultimately what Charging for Change is all about.  We've created a super-slick looking rechargeable, portable charger that holds about 2 full smartphone charges that would easily fit in a pocket, a purse (or murse) a backpack, or whatever.   You can use it to charge pretty much any USB portable device when you inevitably need to (usually around 2:30 PM).  Its also a pretty effective conversation starter.  Pull it out in a restaurant and an attractive person will inevitably come over and say "Hey whats that", and you can say "its an awesome charger, but it also supports cancer research".  And they'll say, "You are awesome, and you have an awesome charger.  We should be soulmates".  
See?


In addition to enabling your social life, we are committed to supporting 5 very worthy causes, and the color corresponds to the cause that YOU are interested in supporting!  
  • Pink will support Breast cancer research and screening, 
  • Blue will support Autism research, 
  • Orange will support Alzheimer's research, 
  • Green supports Parent Project Muscular Dystrophy, and 
  • Black will offer support to our military veterans.
  • White will support all the causes equally. 
If you're not sure or want to support all of them, pick our white one.  We won't judge.
We'll follow up with you after each contribution to get your color choice!

Don't worry though if your charitable cause of choice is not listed here.  We want to hear from you!  We love hearing (perhaps another cause?) and love hearing from you even more.

This Indiegogo campaign will help us create the budget for not just the first round of chargers, we'll also make more chargers so that we can raise even more funds for these causes.  

What We Need & What You Get

We are hoping to raise $40,000 or more!  The entire amount raised, less Indiegogo fees and other expenses will go to purchase as many Charging for Change chargers as possible.  We have already been approached about putting our chargers in certain retail establishments, but we would prefer to sell them directly.

We've given a ton of thought to how we structure the perks so that there are plenty of opportunities to contribute.  Almost all of our perks will give you at least one Charging for Change Charger in the color of your choice, but we've also added a couple of contributions which we think are really cool - one is called "Show your Corporate Colors".  This one is designed for a business or organizational contribution and we will deliver 40 chargers, in your choice of color - with the business or organization logo printed on the surface!

We really hope that everyone thinks that our chargers and support for causes are pretty awesome, but, in the event that we are wrong and we don't reach our goal, we are still going to make sure that everyone receives their gift for contributing!


    The Impact

    The goal of Charging for Change is twofold.  First of all, we want to make sure that we are raising awareness and funding some very worthy and needed charitable causes that will make a difference to the day to day lives of those who need it.  Secondly, we want to make sure that we provide a charger that is great looking, well made and reliable so that users can keep connected to their world!  

    None of us can change the world on our own.  It is only by working together that we can make a positive change!  This is why we think that the Charging for Change Charger is so cool - it is a simple, inexpensive device that almost anyone needs and will use on a day to day basis, and as a result of so many people using it we can, in fact, make such a huge difference in the lives of others.


      Risks & Challenges

      So far, all funding for this project, including, but not limited to design, prototyping, creative, and corporate set-up expenses have been bootstrapped by us.  We don't have any external funding or any outside investor that we have to answer to.  We believe in Charging for Change and have already put our money where our hearts are.  

      There are a number of challenges that we are up against.  Firstly, we many not meet our goal, and not even have enough money to cover our expenses.  That is fine because we knew what we were getting into.  Secondly, we could run into production issues  - quality or time - that could impact what we are doing.  Because of our demand for the best quality, we have been in touch with a number of potential manufacturing partners and have narrowed it to two vendors that can produce a quality product to our specification.  As such, if we run into problems with one, we can move to a back up for production. Third, we could run into scalability issues.  This means that we may have more demand than production and distribution space.  We think we are OK here.  We have two manufacturing partners who have more than adequate production capacity and our distribution partner has the capability to directly ship from three different Distribution Centers across the US.  If we do end up with this problem we are committed to either expanding our relationships with our partners or determining new partners  who can meet our needs.


        Other Ways You Can Help

        If you can't financially support Charging for Change we get it!  It's OK - Seriously! Not everyone can support everything, but if you'd like to give us a shout out on Facebook, twitter or instagram we'd really love it.
        Indiegogo has these really easy sharing tools that will make it easy for you to share on your social network of choice!

  Other Ways You Can Help

Indiegogo has these really easy sharing tools that will make it easy for you to share on your social network of choice!

story:
EXECUTIVE SUMMARY: 

Have you ever wanted to get a LIVE update of a high school game score and could not find it? Our research show 38% of sports fans have. How about for a sport other than football or basketball? The scores are not available at all.  How would you like to be able to get not only the score but the live play-by-play of the final minutes of the game live on your phone? What about live streaming video of the final minutes or even the whole game on your smart phone!  The app we have all been needing is finally here and together we can have it ready to launch by summer! Support the High School Scoreboard™ Project by donating any amount or at least pledging $1 to order your download in advance! 

THE TIME HAS COME FOR A HIGH SCHOOL SCOREBOARD™!

TRZ Sports has been working on a way to develop a High School Sports Scoreboard for several years. With the wide availability of smart phones, and the routine use of social media to communicate in real time, we think we can develop a smart phone app that will allow anyone, anywhere, to get not only real time scores of their favorite high school teams, but even live audio play-by-play and even live video of those games.

To do a High School Sports Scoreboard, it is much more than just an iPhone, IPad, Android and computer App. We have to do all that, PLUS produce the report of the game, and the audio play-by-play, and the live video of the event and then be able to stream them worldwide to an audience of millions. No easy task,  which is why no one has done it until now and why TRZ Sports is uniquely qualified to make it happen. 

JUST LIKE USING FACEBOOK OR TWITTER:

With billions of people using Facebook and Twitter to send information everyday to people with similar interests, our research has shown that we can use that experience to have people reports scores, and game updates to people who like the same teams! Reporting a score and game notes would be just like using Facebook, but you would be sending in a score and description of the big plays. Quick and easy and something that will benefit a lot of people. 

COOL FEATURES (NOT MENTIONED IN THE VIDEO):

The app will only cost 99¢, but if you report a score, even one time, you will get your money back to thank you for helping all the other fans of that team by reporting scores. Remember, this is all about community, helping each other by ending the frustration of not being able to get the score and bringing a little joy to peoples lives.

"Followers" will know the screen name of who is reporting the scores and will be able to rate the "reporters" for accuracy and timeliness - and block those who do not do a good job!  We are even working on promotions where those who report the most scores for that sport in each state, and who have the highest user ratings, will get something like an all expenses paid trip to that sports state championship!

"Followers" will be able to upload a custom picture for their splash screen of their favorite player or the school logo or whatever they want.  The app will not only give you notifications of the scores for the team you are following, but it will let you look at the scores of every other team in the state who is playing that day, so you can keep an eye on rival teams!

Each team will have it's total number of followers listed on every "Followers" screen so you know how many parents, athletes, fans and alumni are interested in how your team is doing. Every High School Coach in the country will be offered a free copy of the app as well, just to thank them for all they do for their athletes, their school and their community.

RESEARCH:

Our preliminary research suggests that 11% of sports fans would pay 99¢ to download the app, and an amazing 30% of sports fans would download it and use it if it were free! 

Better yet, 21% of sports fans said that they would also be willing to report a score or do an update while they are attending a game!  Even 9% of them said they would be willing to do play-by-play and stream video. That is off the charts!  With over 100 million sports fans in the US, you can see that this could be a very, very popular app.  

We are so excited about this opportunity that we have filed a provisional patent on our service to give us legal protection from competitors while we develop and launch the service.

Our goal is to launch the first version of the service by August of 2014!

story:
Have you ever been running and wished your earphones would just stay in your ears? Do you ride a motorcycle and struggle to keep your earphones or earplugs in when wearing a helmet? Do you find that your earphones hurt your ears after a while? Earcandi is a reusable, silicone based polymer that moulds around your earphones giving you a customised fit and ensures that they stay in your ears - 100% guaranteed, no matter what. Earcandi was born out of a desire for functional sports earphones that don't fall out or dislodge when engaging in physical activity. We have developed a solution to the problem of earphones falling out for when you need to focus on your sport and not mess around putting your earbuds back in your ears every 5 minutes.

Essentially, anything generic that fits in the ear can be customised with Earcandi. Because your ear shape is as unique as your fingerprint there is no ,'one size fits all' option that works fully. The cool thing about Earcandi is that in the same way as we are customising our phones with apps and printing stuff on our desktop in 3D, it's now possible to get away from the uncomfortable generic earphones with poor functionality and upgrade to something blueprinted exactly for you.

IMPORTANT!

Colours of Earcandi available to Indiegogo supporters are as follows:

Purple, blue, green, yellow, orange, pink, black and white.

When you choose your perk please indicate your preferred colour in the *name* section when filling out your name and address, e.g. Lloyd Daly: YELLOW. If you don't do this we will just assume you don't mind which colour you get and send you one at random.


Well, it's pretty simple. Earcandi kind of looks like play-doh, but you get a white part and a coloured part. Take the two parts out of their respective packaging and mix them together for about a minute - this sets in motion the curing process. Insert your earphones into your ears, split the resulting mix in two and just push it in around your earphones (or just in your ears for earplugs). Leave it for ten minutes to set, take them out and voila, Earcandi custom moulded earphones!

The medical grade silicone polymer we use produces a soft, flexible and durable product which you can leave in your ears for hours without noticing. Noise isolation is greatly improved due to the exact fit you get with Earcandi, allowing you to play your music at lower volumes which reduces the chance of damaging your hearing by having to crank up the volume. For this reason audiologists will all emphasize there is no substitute for custom earphones. The silicone easily bonds to any earphones and will retain its shape permanently, giving you a soft, sturdy and comfortable set of custom earphones that will last.

Regular custom moulded earphones/monitors have been around for a while now, but for the majority of people they are prohibitively expensive. Earcandi are the first of their kind and solve the problem of cost by cutting out expensive elements of production such as visits to specialists for ear castings and injection moulding systems.We think we've struck a good balance with the Earcandi system - better than the 'one size fits all' approach of regular earbuds, but a fraction of the cost of expensive in-ear monitors.



Although sport is a huge part of our market, it isn't the only application for Earcandi and our unique Sonicone material can be used for a variety of other things as well. The secure, low profile fit ensures that when wearing a helmet for motorsport or motorcycle riding, you earphones will stay in even when the rumble strips and potholes are rattling out your fillings. You can also say goodbye to windrush as the perfect fit you get with Earcandi make this a thing of the past.

Musicians can also benefit from a custom fit for on stage in-ear monitors. Because they are moulded easily in only ten minutes at home, they are ten to one hundred times cheaper than the prohibitively expensive custom monitors professional musicians use.

In addition to this, Earcandi can be used without earphones to make custom moulded earplugs for anything from surfing to blocking out noise from the habitual snorer lying next to you. Earcandi particularly suits people who have trouble sleeping as the custom fit ensures that they are incredibly comfortable when lying down whilst providing excellent noise reduction.



Hi, We're Lloyd and Steve - the guys behind earcandi. We're both pretty active people and participate in quite a few different sports - running, cycling, mountain biking, triathlon, snowboarding, climbing and kickboxing to name a few. Like many people we knew, we were completely fed up of our earphones constantly falling out whenever we did any kind of sport. Between us we'd tried all of the sports-fit styles, ear-buds and even these weird little cone things, (which either fell out or hurt our ears after about 10 minutes). We'd pretty much given up on being able to listen to music when we were moving around with any kind of intensity until Lloyd started messing around with a squidgy wax earplug whilst on holiday in Norway. Fast forward past Steve's kitchen, combining stinky bathroom sealant and various other bits and bobs and we hooked up with a medical silicone manufacturer who helped us formulate a much safer, softer and more colourful version of the original, smelly prototype. To this day, the first pair moulded have never fallen out, no matter what, not once - and we reckon that's pretty good going considering how often we find ourselves upside down when we should be the right way up. We're a young company trying to find our feet in the world of business, (the jeans and hoodies get some odd looks at meetings), but we reckon if we can do what we do well, offer our product at a reasonable price and look after and listen to our customers we should be alright. The feedback we have received on the product so far has been fantastic and the journey has been loads of fun, we're looking forward to seeing what's in store for the future and hope you join us for the ride...

Cheers,

Lloyd and Steve :)



At the moment we are in the process of building the website and designing packaging, logos and creating videos. As fun and challenging as this is, it all costs money - and we're running out! The companies we have been working with have been great and a some have such faith in the product that they are willing to accept payment further down the line, once we are into production. This has been a massive help and consolidates our opinion that Earcandi is a genuinely good idea. With a relatively small boost from the Indiegogo campaign we'll be able to source the raw materials we need and pay the packaging manufacturer to move us into full scale production.



We've been working on Earcandi for almost a year and had initially intended to launch in November 2013. We held back so that we could ensure the prototype formulation worked perfectly and so that we could speak to more factories to ensure they could cope with a potentially huge ramp-up in production. Comfortable that we can deliver this, we’re now launching Earcandi! 

Below are a couple of the main challenges we will tackle:

Choice of Factory: As with any physical item there are a number of challenges to getting it right. We have been part of numerous projects that have made it through development, into the factory production phase, and then into consumer hands. While our experiences have helped prepare us to avoid major pitfalls, we have been very selective in our choice of factory, choosing a partner that we know we can work with and that is perfect for our needs. They are large enough to scale Earcandi, but without being so big that we'll be lost amidst the shop floor, and they have a great development team. We also intend to spend a large amount of time in person at the factory.

Quality Control: Good QC is a major focus of ours. The quantity of orders on Indiegogo will help determine how we handle this. If we receive orders for under 1000 units, we will batch test ourselves at Earcandi HQ in Brighton. If we receive over 1000 orders we will carry out all QC in-situ at the factory, with the assistance of dedicated QC personnel.

We had an initial campaign on IGG that we wanted to extend as we felt we didn't have enough time to reach our target. Unfortunately the rules of IGG meant we couldn't do this, but as we have had offers of TV and magazine features we felt it was worth relaunching the campaign as these things would mean we would be likely to hit, or even exceed our target.

This is about getting the best possible product into your hands ASAP. So please take a look at the rewards and pledge now.

Thanks!



KARMA CANDI-LEON: You'll get warm fuzzy feelings, free hugs and a huge dose of Earcandi karma. Angels will descend from the heavens and shower you with ambrosia. Plus you get to feel pretty good about contributing to something cool, new and original.


EARLY BIRD: You'll get warm fuzzy feelings as above, plus a new pair of earcandi in the colour of your choice from our main production run. To say thank you for supporting us at the very start and shipped free to anywhere in the world, you'll save £4.99 off the RRP. Limited to first 10 donations. (Don't forget to specify which colour you want in the *NAME* field when ordering).


THE MAIN RUN: Grab a cool new pair of earcandi in the colour of your choice from our main production run. Still plenty of virtual hugs to say thanks for getting in early too! Shipped free to anywhere in the world.  (Don't forget to specify which colour you want in the *NAME* field when ordering).


2 PAIRS OF EARCANDI: Everything in the main run, but as you've probably guessed, 2 pairs instead of 1! At a lovely discounted price of course! (Don't forget to specify which colours you want in the *NAME* field when ordering).


3 PAIRS OF EARCANDI: Yes we know it's ridiculous and we'll be giving them away for free next, but we appreciate your support! Works out to just over £8.00 each. Bargin. (Don't forget to specify which colours you want in the *NAME* field when ordering).


4 PAIRS OF EARCANDI: Club together with some mates and get a great deal! Everything in the main run but for a massive discount! (Don't forget to specify which colours you want in the *NAME* field when ordering).


DISTRIBUTOR 1: Ideal for a test order - 15 pairs of earcandi for retailers or distributors. £6.70 per unit, RRP - £14.99.


DISTRIBUTOR 2: 50 pairs of earcandi for retailers or distributors. £6.50 per unit, RRP - £14.99.


DISTRIBUTOR 3: 100 pairs of earcandi for retailers or distributors. £6.00 per unit, RRP - £14.99.


IMPORTANT!

Colours of Earcandi available to Indiegogo supporters are as follows:

Purple, blue, green, yellow, orange, pink, black and white.

When you choose your perk please indicate your preferred colour in the *name* section when filling out your name and address, e.g. Lloyd Daly: YELLOW. If you don't do this we will just assume you don't mind which colour you get and send you one at random.

story:
We have moved to https://invizbox.com



As featured in Ars Technica,  Digital Trends,  Wired,  Golem.de,  Muy Computer and Cyberbloc.

 

UPDATE:

Now accepting Bitcoin, Litecoin and Dogecoin via our external site. All purchases made there will result in us manually contributing towards our goal here while the campaign is running. When the campaign ends, we will accept paypal and cryptocurrencies on the external site.


What is Invizbox?

Invizbox is a small, low power device that helps provide an easy-to-use method of protecting your privacy on the Internet.  You plug Invizbox into your existing router/modem. It creates a new wifi hotspot and you connect any of your devices (laptop, phone, pc, etc) to this hotspot.


Our goal is to provide an easy-to-use & competitive price point for this device by drawing together off the shelf hardware and customised open source software solutions.


Why do you need Invizbox?

We all have a right to privacy, a right to protect our personal information, data, location and internet behavior.  You may think you have nothing to “hide”, or you aren’t doing anything “wrong” that would require investigation by third parties but neither do we. That doesn’t mean that we have to leave ourselves open to tracking and profiling by people, governments, companies, hackers etc. who we neither know or trust. Invizbox provides an easy solution to give you back control over who & what you choose to disclose your personal information to.


Most people don’t know how to go about protecting their information on the Internet and with Invizbox you don’t need any technical know-how to gain that protection.  


Where are we right now?
Referral Rewards Program
Who are we?
What we need to get off the ground
So, What's the hardware?
And the software?
I'm worried after being burned by a similar project
How are you achieving your low price compared to other products?
Purchasing and shipping


Where are we right now?

We have already established a manufacturing and logistics supply chain to cope with demand.

We have added Tor to the OpenWRT software on Invizbox and have also routed traffic through the Tor network. We're currently locking everything down and making sure the firewall rules are solid and there's nothing unnecessary running on the box. We will then move on to developing and enhancing the consumer ready, plug and play experience. Our goal here will be to make this effortless to you the end user and let you get on with normal browsing with significantly enhanced privacy.
We have engineering samples in our hands and are amazed at just how small they are. They're tiny!


Referral Rewards Program

Invizbox for FREE? That's right you read that correctly. We want to reward our backers with either cash (paid through paypal) and / or free Invizboxes. How it works is really easy: Share your unique Indiegogo referral URL anywhere and everywhere (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn etc.) and let people know about Invizbox, how great it is and why your friends should buy one. For every $200 that gets pledged with your unique URL, we will give you $10 (that's only 5 unit pledges). If you reach the lofty heights of $1000 of referrals you will get an Invizbox for FREE and $30 via paypal. You get paid for doing what friends do best: being social! it could not get better than that. Find out more about how to share your referral URL and get more referral information here.



Who are we?

A 3 person team of computer science professionals with  wide and varied backgrounds which include software development, mobile internet security, lots of Linux experience and security specific qualifications. 


What we need to get off the ground:

Because of our lower profit margins we hope to do a minimum run of 500 units and require 20,000 dollars for this.



So, What's the hardware?

WT 3020A device 

Dimensions: 65mm X 45mm X 22mm

  • Supports Wifi b/g/n
  • MAC address filtering
  • Support for WPA / WPA2, WPA-PSK / WPA2-PSK.
  • Support System: Windows / Mac / Linux
  • Colours - White.
  • Power via micro USB (cable included).
  • 16MB flash
  • 64MB RAM
(note that we investigating using a slightly faster device, but you should assume that it's the one listed above for now)

And the software?

The router will run on a locked down version of OpenWRT with Tor.

OpenWrt is an open source operating system / embedded operating system based on the Linux kernel, and primarily used on devices like this one. 

From the Tor project website: 

Tor protects you by bouncing your communications around a distributed network of relays run by volunteers all around the world: it prevents somebody watching your Internet connection from learning what sites you visit, and it prevents the sites you visit from learning your physical location.

Our part in this is to properly lock down OpenWRT, add the latest version of Tor, add various routing configurations, add a user interface that allows people to set up various Tor config files automatically and in a user friendly way (e.g. for relays if people decide they would like to contribute to the Tor network). We will then QA this and hand it over to the manufacturer as an image for the router. We will be fundamentally altering the way the device would have normally worked. 


I'm worried after being burned by a similar project:

  • Two of the project founders have security specific qualifications and all of us have many years of software industry experience and extensive Linux knowledge.
  • We will provide documentation clearly outlining what the box is good for and especially what it's not good for. Do not trust your freedom or your life to this technology! It's not designed for that.
  • The OpenWRT image will be properly locked down. No unnecessary daemons will be running on the box.
  • To cover the possibility of intercepted units with rootkits, we will offer the ability to download and flash firmware directly from our site (with hash for verification). We're looking into tamper evident packaging but can't guarantee it.
  • On the issue of hardware back doors: We're not manufacturing directly. We have been assured that there are no back doors and we will test for them, but as before you should not trust your life to this box and we will provide clear documentation covering that (and guidelines on what to consider if you need that actual anonymity).
  • We can't stop browser fingerprinting. We are considering options to help here but for now we'll inform people on ways to avoid it if it's a concern. We're open to suggestion (see link below in the last bullet).
  • If there are vulnerabilities found in Tor, we will patch our firmware and release an update.
  • We have guaranteed logistics and hardware manufacturing capabilities for (within reason) any scale, but priority goes to the first 500 customers.
  • Want to make your own with our firmware? No problem. We'll release full specs on the hardware so you can buy it.
  • If you have questions, there's a thread over here on boards.ie.

How are you achieving your low price compared to other products?

Low profit margins.


Purchasing and shipping:

Where do you ship to?

Anywhere. Shipping is included in the purchase price.

(NOTE: Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries).


Thanks to Nina Szymanska for the amazing photography, Ray Woods for the lovely animation and Karl Vincent for the catchy music.



Other languages sections are below here.


Invizbox - Deine Privatsphäre im Internet schützen–leicht gemacht



Was ist Invizbox?

Invizbox ist ein kleines Gerät mit einem niedrigen Stromverbrauch das eine einfach zu bedienende Methode zum Schutz deiner Privatsphäre und Daten im Internet bietet. Invizbox wird einfach am bestehenden Modem/Router angeschlossen, und schafft dann einen neuen WiFi-Hotspot mit dem alle anderen Geräte (Laptop, Telefon, PC, etc.) verbunden werden. Unser Ziel ist es, dieses Gerät einfach zu bedienend und zu einem wettbewerbsfähigen Preis anzubieten; erreicht werden soll dies durch die Zusammenführung von handelsüblicher Hardware und maßgeschneiderten Open Source-Softwarelösungen.


Warum brauchst Du Invizbox?

Wir alle haben ein Recht auf eine Privatsphäre, das Recht auf unsere persönlichen Informationen, Daten, Standort und wie wir uns im Internet verhalten. Du denkst vielleicht, du hast nichts zu "verstecken", oder du machst nichts "falsch" das eine Untersuchung von Dritten erfordern würde, und das denken wir auch. Aber das bedeutet lange nicht, dass wir uns für Tracking und Profilerstellung von Regierungen, Unternehmen, Hackern, Privatpersonen usw. offen lassen wollen, die wir nicht kennen und denen wir nicht vertrauen. Invizbox bietet eine einfache Lösung die dir wieder Kontrolle zurückgibt, damit du entscheiden kannst zu wem und wofür Du deine persönlichen Daten übergeben willst.
Die meisten wissen nicht, wie man die eigenen Informationen im Internet schützen kann, und mit Invizbox brauchst du keine technischen Kenntnisse um diesen Schutz zu erlangen.


Rewardsprogramm für Empfehlungen

Invizbox GRATIS? Du hast richtig gelesen. Wir wollen unsere Unterstützer entweder mit Bargeld (über Paypal bezahlt) und/oder Invizboxes belohnen. Ganz einfach, so funktioniert es: du teilst deine einzigartige Indiegogo Empfehlungs-URL überall (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn etc.) und informierst so deine Freunde über Invizbox. Du sagst wie großartig Invizbox ist und warum deine Freunde das Gerät kaufen sollten. Für jede $ 200, die mit deiner einzigartigen URL verpfändet werden, geben wir dir $ 10 (das ist nur 5 Einheiten verpfändet). Wenn du die luftigen Höhen von $ 1000 in Überweisungen erreicht hast, erhältst du eine Invizbox GRATIS und $ 30 wird dir durch Paypal zugeschickt. Du tust einfach was Freunde am besten können: nützliche oder interessante Sachen empfehlen, und du wirst dafür bezahlt. Was gibt es besseres?
Erfahre mehr darüber, wie du deinen Empfehlungs-URL teilen kannst und erhalte hier mehr Informationen.


Wer sind wir?

Drei Informatik-Profis mit breiten und vielfältigen Hintergründen, die Softwareentwicklung, die Sicherheit mobiler Geräte, sowie viel Erfahrung in der Programmierung unter Linux und IT-Sicherheit umfassen.




Invizbox - Protégez votre vie privée sur Internet très simplement.


L'Invizbox, qu'est ce que c'est?

L'Invizbox est un petit appareil qui consomme peu et vous permet de protéger votre vie privée sur Internet d'une manière très simple. Il vous suffit juste de connecter l'Invizbox à votre routeur/modem. Elle va automatiquement créer un nouveau réseau Wi­Fi auquel vous pouvez connecter tous vos appareils (ordinateur portable, téléphone portable, PC, etc.)

Notre objectif est de fournir une solution simple d'utilisation et à un prix compétitif. Pour cela, nous avons combiné du matériel relativement standard et des solutions logicielles basées sur du code source ouvert (open source).



Pourquoi avez­vous besoin de la Invizbox?

Nous avons tous un droit à la protection de notre vie privée, un droit à la protection de nos données et informations personnelles (photos, localisation, pages visitées sur Internet, etc.). Vous pouvez très bien penser que vous n'avez rien à cacher ou que vous ne faites rien de mal et donc que vous n'encourrez aucun risque. Nous sommes du même avis. Tout cela ne veut pas dire que vous ne devez pas vous protéger un minimum contre la surveillance et le profiling standard par des individus, gouvernements, entreprises, hackers, etc. que vous ne connaissez pas et en qui vous n'avez pas particulièrement confiance. L'Invizbox vous fournit une solution simple et vous rend le contrôle de vos données, vous pouvez à nouveau choisir ce que vous partagez et avec qui.


La plupart des gens ne savent pas par où commencer pour protéger leurs données sur Internet et grâce à l'Invizbox, vous n'avez plus à vous poser cette question et à acquérir les connaissances nécessaires pour vous protéger efficacement.



Programme de récompense

L'Invizbox GRATUITEMENT? Oui, vous avez bien lu! Nous voulons récompenser nos contributeurs soit en liquide (payé par Paypal) soit avec des Invizbox gratuites. Pour cela, c'est simple, partagez votre lien de référence Indiegogo sur toutes les plateformes possibles (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin, etc.) et faites savoir à tous que vous aimez notre projet et pourquoi vos amis devraient tous y participer. Pour chaque $200 qui nous parvient par votre lien personnel, nous vous donnerons $10 (pensez­y cela ne fait que 5 Invizbox!). Si vous atteignez la somme impressionnante de $1000, nous vous envoyons une Invizbox GRATUITE et $30 par Paypal. En somme, nous vous payons pour ce que vous aimez le plus: être sociable! Plus d'informations sur le partage de liens de référence ici.



Qui sommes­-nous?

Notre équipe est composée de 3 professionnels de l'informatique avec une expérience large et variée dans des domaines tels que le developpement logiciel, la sécurité des réseaux télécoms et aussi beaucoup d'expérience sur Linux. Nous avons également récemment mis à jour nos qualifications en sécurité des réseaux.




O que é Invizbox?

Invizbox é um dispositivo pequeno, de baixa potência e fácil de usar que implementa um método simples de proteger a sua privacidade na internet. O Invizbox é ligado a um router/modem que você já possua, e vai criar um novo ponto de acesso wifi onde você poderá ligar qualquer dispositivo (computador portátil, telefone móvel, computador pessoal, etc).

Com este dispositivo, o nosso objetivo é fornecer uma solução fácil de usar e com preço competitivo, conjugando o hardware disponível no mercado e software existente em código aberto customizado.


Porque precisa do Invizbox?

Todos temos direito à privacidade, direito a proteger a nossa informação pessoal, osnossos dados, a nossa localização e o nosso comportamento na internet. Você pode pensar que não tem nada a “esconder”, ou que não está a fazer nada “errado” que requeira investigação por outras partes, mas nós também não temos. Isso não significa que nos devamos expor a sermos seguidos e a que o nosso perfil seja acompanhado por pessoas, governos, empresas, piratas informáticos, etc. que não conhecemos ou confiamos. Invizbox fornece uma solução fácil para lhe devolver o controlo que de quem você é e da informação pessoal que você escolhe disponibilizar. A maior parte das pessoas não sabem como proteger a sua informação na internet e com o Invizbox você não precisa de nenhum conhecimento técnico para conseguir essa proteção.


Programa de recompensa por referência?

Invizbox grátis? Sim, é verdade, leu corretamente. Nós queremos recompensar os nossos referentes com dinheiro (pago através do paypal) e/ou através de Invizboxes grátis. Funciona de forma bastante simples: Partilhe o seu endereço único Indiegogo em qualquer altura e qualquer lado (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc) e dê a conhecer o Invizbox, quão fantástico é e a razão dos seus amigos deverem comprar um. Por cada $200 que for associado ao seu endereço URL único, daremos $10 (correspondentes a 5 unidades promessa). Se atingir o objetivo de $1000 através de referências, recebe um Invizbox grátis e $30 através do paypal. É pago por fazer aquilo que os amigos fazem melhor: ser social! Não pode ser melhor do que isso! Mais aqui.


Quem somos?

Uma equipa de 3 pessoas de profissionais da área das ciências computorizadas com largos e variados conhecimentos que incluem desenvolvimento de software, egurança em internet móvel, muita experiência de Linux e qualificações específicas em segurança.



اینویزباکس چیست؟

اینویزباکس دستگاه کوچک و کم مصرفی است که راه حل ساده ای برای حفاظت از حریم خصوصی شما در شبکه اینتر نت فراهم میکند.شما اینویزباکس را به مودم یا روتر خود وصل میکنید و اینویزباکس یک شبکه بیسیم جدید برای شما ایجاد میکند که می توانید همه وسایل ارتباطی خود را از طریق این شبکه جدید به اینترنت وصل کنید. هدف ما فراهم کردن راه حلی بسیار ساده با قیمت رقابتی با استفاده از سخت افزار آماده به کار و نرم افزار کد باز سفارشی سازی شده می باشد.



چرا شما به اینویزباکس نیاز دارید؟

حریم خصوصی ، حفاظت از اطلاعات شخصی، داده ها، موقعیت مکانی و رفتار اینترنتی حق همه ماست. شاید تصور کنید که چیزی برای« پنهان» کردن ندارید یا کار« اشتباهی» نکرده اید که کسی بخواهد بررسی کند، ما هم چنین فکری نمیکنیم. اما به این معنا نیست که ما باید خودمان را به سادگی در معرض ردیابی شدن بدست سایر افراد، دولتها، شرکتها، هکرها و سایرین قرار دهیم. افرادی که نه میشناسیم و نه به آنها اعتماد داریم. اینویزباکس راه حل ساده ای برای بدست گرفتن دوباره کنترل اطلاعات شخصی شما، و اینکه چه کسی و به چه میزان به آنها دسترسی داشته باشد، فراهم میکند. بیشتر افراد نمیدانند چگونه از اطلاعات شخصی خود در اینترنت محافظت کنند، با اینویزباکس شما نیاز به هیچگونه اطلاعات فنی برای حفاظت ازخود ندارید.



برنامه پاداش معرفی اینویزباکس به دوستان

اینویزباکس مجانی؟ بله درست خواندید. ما به حامیان اینویزباکس به صورت نقدی (پرداخت از طریق پی پال) یا با اینویزباکس مجانی پاداش می دهیم.بسیار ساده است: شما لینک اختصاصی ارجاع به ایندیگوگو رابه اشتراک بگذارید( در فیسبوک، توییتر، اینستاگرام، لینکداین و . . .) و اهمیت حفظ حریم خصوصی و اینکه اینویزباکس چگونه به سادگی این امکان را فراهم میکند به دوستانتان یادآوری کنید. به ازای هر ۲۰۰ دلارتعهد از طریق لینک اختصاصی شما(فقط ۵ تعهد) ما ۱۰ دلار پرداخت میکنیم. اگربه سقف ۱۰۰۰ دلار ارجاع برسید یک اینویزباکس مجانی و ۳۰ دلار ازطریق پی پال پرداخت میکنیم. بهتر از این نمیشود! شما برای کاری که دوستان به بهترین نحو انجام میدهند پول دریافت میکنید: اجتماعی بودن و اشتراک گذاشتن. بهتر از این نمیشود. پاداش ادجاع



درباره ما

تیم ۳ نفره از متخصصین علوم رایانه با تجربه و پیشینه گسترده در توسعه نرم افزار، امنیت اینترنت موبایل، لینوکس و مدارک اختصاصی امنیت شبکه تشکیل شده است.


؟"Invizbox”ما هو جهاز

هو جهاز ذو استهلاك طاقة منخفضة يساهم في توفير وسيلة سهلة الاستخدام لحماية خصوصيتك على الإنترنت. كل ما عليك فعله هو توصيل الجهاز بالمودم أو راوتر الإنترنت الخاص بك فيقوم الجهاز بإنشاء شبكة واي-فاي آمنة تستطيع توصيل أجهزتك الأخرى (الكمبيوتر المحمول, الموبايل, الكمبيوتر الشخصي ....إلخ) لتنعم بالحماية والخصوصية أثناء استخدام الإنترنت. هدفنا هو توفير وسيلة سهلة الإستخدام وبأسعار تنافسية بدمج مواد بسيطة ومتوفرة واستغلال البرمجيات الحرة والمفتوحة المصدر


؟"Invizbox”لماذا تحتاج

لدينا كل الحق في الحصول على الخصوصية وحماية بياناتنا ومعلوماتنا الشخصية أثناء تصفحنا أو استخدامن للإنترنت. قد تعتقد مثلنا تماما أنه لا يوجد سبب فعلي ل"الاختباء"، أو انك لم تفعل أي شيء يستوجب التحقيق من قبل أطراف ثالثة. ولكن هذا لا يعني أن علينا أن نترك بياناتنا متوفرة للتتبع والتنميط من قبل الناس، والحكومات، والشركات، والمتسللين(الهاكرز) أو اي شخص آخر لانعرفه يوفر لك حلا سهل الإستخدام لتستطيع التحكم بما تقوم بنشره من بيانات وتحديد الأشخاص المخولين بالإطلاع على بياناتك ومعلوماتك الشخصية معظم الناس لا يعرفون كيفية حماية المعلومات الخاصة بهم على الإنترنت ومع جهازنا فإنك لا تحتاج أي دراية تقنيةأو عجهد للحصول على هذه الحماية


برنامج المكافآت

بإمكانك الحصول على الجهاز مجانا! أجل "مجانا"! نحن نسعى لمكافأة داعمينا إما نقدا (تدفع عن طريق البي بال) أو بإهدائهم الجهاز مجانا. لتنال المكافأة كل ما عليك فعله هو أن تقوم بانشاء الرابط الخاص بك لنشر منتجنا في كل مكان (تويتر, فيسبوك, انستاغرام, لينك إن .... إلخ) وتعريف أصدقاءك وجميع من حولك بهذا المنتج, مميزاته ولماذا يحتاجون لاقتنائه. لكل 200$ يتم التعهد بها عبر استخدام اللينك الخاص بك اللذي استخدمته لنشر منتجنا سوف تحصل على 10$. وإذا وصلت إلى 1000$ سوف تحصل على الجهاز مجانا بالإضافة إلى 30$ مدفوعة عن طريق البي بال ليس هناك ما هو أسهل من هذا! سوف تحصل على المكافأة لمجرد قيامك بالتواصل الإجتماعي ونشر معلومات منتجنا. للتعرف أكثر على طريقة الحصول على الرابط الخاص بك لدعم منتجنا, يمكنك معرفة ذلك عبر تصفح هذا الرابط


من نحن؟

نحن فريق من 3 أشخاص من خبراء علوم الكمبيوتر, ذوي خلفيات واسعة ومتنوعة والتي تشمل تطوير البرمجيات، وأمن الإنترنت عبر الهاتف النقال، والكثير من الخبرات في أمن أنظمة اللينكس ومؤهلات الحماية الإلكترونية.
story_txt:
We have moved to https://invizbox.com



As featured in Ars Technica,  Digital Trends,  Wired,  Golem.de,  Muy Computer and Cyberbloc.
 UPDATE: 

Now accepting Bitcoin, Litecoin and Dogecoin via our external site. All purchases made there will result in us manually contributing towards our goal here while the campaign is running. When the campaign ends, we will accept paypal and cryptocurrencies on the external site.

What is Invizbox?
Invizbox is a small, low power device that helps provide an easy-to-use method of protecting your privacy on the Internet.  You plug Invizbox into your existing router/modem. It creates a new wifi hotspot and you connect any of your devices (laptop, phone, pc, etc) to this hotspot.
Our goal is to provide an easy-to-use & competitive price point for this device by drawing together off the shelf hardware and customised open source software solutions.
Why do you need Invizbox?
We all have a right to privacy, a right to protect our personal information, data, location and internet behavior.  You may think you have nothing to “hide”, or you aren’t doing anything “wrong” that would require investigation by third parties but neither do we. That doesn’t mean that we have to leave ourselves open to tracking and profiling by people, governments, companies, hackers etc. who we neither know or trust. Invizbox provides an easy solution to give you back control over who & what you choose to disclose your personal information to.
Most people don’t know how to go about protecting their information on the Internet and with Invizbox you don’t need any technical know-how to gain that protection.  

Where are we right now?
Referral Rewards Program
Who are we?
What we need to get off the ground
So, What's the hardware?
And the software?
I'm worried after being burned by a similar project
How are you achieving your low price compared to other products?
Purchasing and shipping


Where are we right now?
We have already established a manufacturing and logistics supply chain to cope with demand.We have added Tor to the OpenWRT software on Invizbox and have also routed traffic through the Tor network. We're currently locking everything down and making sure the firewall rules are solid and there's nothing unnecessary running on the box. We will then move on to developing and enhancing the consumer ready, plug and play experience. Our goal here will be to make this effortless to you the end user and let you get on with normal browsing with significantly enhanced privacy.We have engineering samples in our hands and are amazed at just how small they are. They're tiny!

Referral Rewards Program
Invizbox for FREE? That's right you read that correctly. We want to reward our backers with either cash (paid through paypal) and / or free Invizboxes. How it works is really easy: Share your unique Indiegogo referral URL anywhere and everywhere (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn etc.) and let people know about Invizbox, how great it is and why your friends should buy one. For every $200 that gets pledged with your unique URL, we will give you $10 (that's only 5 unit pledges). If you reach the lofty heights of $1000 of referrals you will get an Invizbox for FREE and $30 via paypal. You get paid for doing what friends do best: being social! it could not get better than that. Find out more about how to share your referral URL and get more referral information here.





Who are we?A 3 person team of computer science professionals with  wide and varied backgrounds which include software development, mobile internet security, lots of Linux experience and security specific qualifications. What we need to get off the ground:Because of our lower profit margins we hope to do a minimum run of 500 units and require 20,000 dollars for this.
So, What's the hardware?
WT 3020A device 
Dimensions: 65mm X 45mm X 22mm

Supports Wifi b/g/n
MAC address filtering
Support for WPA / WPA2, WPA-PSK / WPA2-PSK.
Support System: Windows / Mac / Linux
Colours - White.
Power via micro USB (cable included).
16MB flash
64MB RAM

(note that we investigating using a slightly faster device, but you should assume that it's the one listed above for now)
And the software?
The router will run on a locked down version of OpenWRT with Tor.
OpenWrt is an open source operating system / embedded operating system based on the Linux kernel, and primarily used on devices like this one. 
From the Tor project website: 
Tor protects you by bouncing your communications around a distributed network of relays run by volunteers all around the world: it prevents somebody watching your Internet connection from learning what sites you visit, and it prevents the sites you visit from learning your physical location.
Our part in this is to properly lock down OpenWRT, add the latest version of Tor, add various routing configurations, add a user interface that allows people to set up various Tor config files automatically and in a user friendly way (e.g. for relays if people decide they would like to contribute to the Tor network). We will then QA this and hand it over to the manufacturer as an image for the router. We will be fundamentally altering the way the device would have normally worked. 


I'm worried after being burned by a similar project:
Two of the project founders have security specific qualifications and all of us have many years of software industry experience and extensive Linux knowledge.
We will provide documentation clearly outlining what the box is good for and especially what it's not good for. Do not trust your freedom or your life to this technology! It's not designed for that.
The OpenWRT image will be properly locked down. No unnecessary daemons will be running on the box.
To cover the possibility of intercepted units with rootkits, we will offer the ability to download and flash firmware directly from our site (with hash for verification). We're looking into tamper evident packaging but can't guarantee it.
On the issue of hardware back doors: We're not manufacturing directly. We have been assured that there are no back doors and we will test for them, but as before you should not trust your life to this box and we will provide clear documentation covering that (and guidelines on what to consider if you need that actual anonymity).
We can't stop browser fingerprinting. We are considering options to help here but for now we'll inform people on ways to avoid it if it's a concern. We're open to suggestion (see link below in the last bullet).
If there are vulnerabilities found in Tor, we will patch our firmware and release an update.
We have guaranteed logistics and hardware manufacturing capabilities for (within reason) any scale, but priority goes to the first 500 customers.
Want to make your own with our firmware? No problem. We'll release full specs on the hardware so you can buy it.
If you have questions, there's a thread over here on boards.ie.

How are you achieving your low price compared to other products?
Low profit margins.

Purchasing and shipping:
Where do you ship to?
Anywhere. Shipping is included in the purchase price.
(NOTE: Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries).Thanks to Nina Szymanska for the amazing photography, Ray Woods for the lovely animation and Karl Vincent for the catchy music.Other languages sections are below here.



Invizbox - Deine Privatsphäre im Internet schützen–leicht gemacht


Was ist Invizbox?

Invizbox ist ein kleines Gerät mit einem niedrigen Stromverbrauch das eine einfach zu bedienende Methode zum Schutz deiner Privatsphäre und Daten im Internet bietet.  Invizbox wird einfach am bestehenden Modem/Router angeschlossen, und schafft dann einen neuen WiFi-Hotspot mit dem alle anderen Geräte (Laptop, Telefon, PC, etc.) verbunden werden. Unser Ziel ist es, dieses Gerät einfach zu bedienend und zu einem wettbewerbsfähigen Preis anzubieten; erreicht werden soll dies durch die Zusammenführung von handelsüblicher Hardware und maßgeschneiderten Open Source-Softwarelösungen.

Warum brauchst Du Invizbox?

Wir alle haben ein Recht auf eine Privatsphäre, das Recht auf unsere persönlichen Informationen, Daten, Standort und wie wir uns im Internet verhalten. Du denkst vielleicht, du hast nichts zu "verstecken", oder du machst nichts "falsch" das eine Untersuchung von Dritten erfordern würde, und das denken wir auch. Aber das bedeutet lange nicht, dass wir uns für Tracking und Profilerstellung von Regierungen, Unternehmen, Hackern, Privatpersonen usw. offen lassen wollen, die wir nicht kennen und denen wir nicht vertrauen. Invizbox bietet eine einfache Lösung die dir wieder Kontrolle zurückgibt, damit du entscheiden kannst zu wem und wofür Du deine persönlichen Daten übergeben willst.

Die meisten wissen nicht, wie man die eigenen Informationen im Internet schützen kann, und mit Invizbox brauchst du keine technischen Kenntnisse um diesen Schutz zu erlangen.


Rewardsprogramm für Empfehlungen

Invizbox GRATIS? Du hast richtig gelesen. Wir wollen unsere Unterstützer entweder mit Bargeld (über Paypal bezahlt) und/oder Invizboxes belohnen. Ganz einfach, so funktioniert es: du teilst deine einzigartige Indiegogo Empfehlungs-URL überall (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn etc.) und informierst so deine Freunde über Invizbox. Du sagst wie großartig Invizbox ist und warum deine Freunde das Gerät kaufen sollten. Für jede $ 200, die mit deiner einzigartigen URL verpfändet werden, geben wir dir $ 10 (das ist nur 5 Einheiten verpfändet). Wenn du die luftigen Höhen von $ 1000 in Überweisungen erreicht hast, erhältst du eine Invizbox GRATIS und $ 30 wird dir durch Paypal zugeschickt. Du tust einfach was Freunde am besten können: nützliche oder interessante Sachen empfehlen, und du wirst dafür bezahlt. Was gibt es besseres?
Erfahre mehr darüber, wie du deinen Empfehlungs-URL teilen kannst und erhalte hier mehr Informationen.

Wer sind wir?
Drei Informatik-Profis mit breiten und vielfältigen Hintergründen, die Softwareentwicklung, die Sicherheit mobiler Geräte, sowie viel Erfahrung in der Programmierung unter Linux und IT-Sicherheit umfassen. 




Invizbox - Protégez votre vie privée sur Internet très simplement.

L'Invizbox, qu'est ce que c'est?

L'Invizbox est un petit appareil qui consomme peu et vous permet de protéger votre vie privée sur Internet d'une manière très simple. Il vous suffit juste de connecter l'Invizbox à votre routeur/modem. Elle va automatiquement créer un nouveau réseau Wi­Fi auquel vous pouvez connecter tous vos appareils (ordinateur portable, téléphone portable, PC, etc.)
Notre objectif est de fournir une solution simple d'utilisation et à un prix compétitif. Pour cela, nous avons combiné du matériel relativement standard et des solutions logicielles basées sur du code source ouvert (open source).


Pourquoi avez­vous besoin de la Invizbox?
Nous avons tous un droit à la protection de notre vie privée, un droit à la protection de nos données et informations personnelles (photos, localisation, pages visitées sur Internet, etc.). Vous pouvez très bien penser que vous n'avez rien à cacher ou que vous ne faites rien de mal et donc que vous n'encourrez aucun risque. Nous sommes du même avis. Tout cela ne veut pas dire que vous ne devez pas vous protéger un minimum contre la surveillance et le profiling standard par des individus, gouvernements, entreprises, hackers, etc. que vous ne connaissez pas et en qui vous n'avez pas particulièrement confiance. L'Invizbox vous fournit une solution simple et vous rend le contrôle de vos données, vous pouvez à nouveau choisir ce que vous partagez et avec qui.


La plupart des gens ne savent pas par où commencer pour protéger leurs données sur Internet et grâce à l'Invizbox, vous n'avez plus à vous poser cette question et à acquérir les connaissances nécessaires pour vous protéger efficacement.


Programme de récompense
L'Invizbox GRATUITEMENT? Oui, vous avez bien lu! Nous voulons récompenser nos contributeurs soit en liquide (payé par Paypal) soit avec des Invizbox gratuites. Pour cela, c'est simple, partagez votre lien de référence Indiegogo sur toutes les plateformes possibles (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin, etc.) et faites savoir à tous que vous aimez notre projet et pourquoi vos amis devraient tous y participer. Pour chaque $200 qui nous parvient par votre lien personnel, nous vous donnerons $10 (pensez­y cela ne fait que 5 Invizbox!). Si vous atteignez la somme impressionnante de $1000, nous vous envoyons une Invizbox GRATUITE et $30 par Paypal. En somme, nous vous payons pour ce que vous aimez le plus: être sociable! Plus d'informations sur le partage de liens de référence ici.


Qui sommes­-nous?

Notre équipe est composée de 3 professionnels de l'informatique avec une expérience large et variée dans des domaines tels que le developpement logiciel, la sécurité des réseaux télécoms et aussi beaucoup d'expérience sur Linux. Nous avons également récemment mis à jour nos qualifications en sécurité des réseaux.





O que é Invizbox?

Invizbox é um dispositivo pequeno, de baixa potência e fácil de usar que implementa um método simples de proteger a sua privacidade na internet. O Invizbox é ligado a um router/modem que você já possua, e vai criar um novo ponto de acesso wifi onde você poderá ligar qualquer dispositivo (computador portátil, telefone móvel, computador pessoal, etc).

Com este dispositivo, o nosso objetivo é fornecer uma solução fácil de usar e com preço competitivo, conjugando o hardware disponível no mercado e software existente em código aberto customizado.


Porque precisa do Invizbox?

Todos temos direito à privacidade, direito a proteger a nossa informação pessoal, osnossos dados, a nossa localização e o nosso comportamento na internet. Você pode pensar que não tem nada a “esconder”, ou que não está a fazer nada “errado” que requeira investigação por outras partes, mas nós também não temos. Isso não significa que nos devamos expor a sermos seguidos e a que o nosso perfil seja acompanhado por pessoas, governos, empresas, piratas informáticos, etc. que não conhecemos ou confiamos. Invizbox fornece uma solução fácil para lhe devolver o controlo que de quem você é e da informação pessoal que você escolhe disponibilizar.

A maior parte das pessoas não sabem como proteger a sua informação na internet e com o Invizbox você não precisa de nenhum conhecimento técnico para conseguir essa proteção.


Programa de recompensa por referência?

Invizbox grátis? Sim, é verdade, leu corretamente. Nós queremos recompensar os nossos referentes com dinheiro (pago através do paypal) e/ou através de Invizboxes grátis. Funciona de forma bastante simples: Partilhe o seu endereço único Indiegogo em qualquer altura e qualquer lado (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc) e dê a conhecer o Invizbox, quão fantástico é e a razão dos seus amigos deverem comprar um. Por cada $200 que for associado ao seu endereço URL único, daremos $10 (correspondentes a 5 unidades promessa). Se atingir o objetivo de $1000 através de referências, recebe um Invizbox grátis e $30 através do paypal. É pago por fazer aquilo que os amigos fazem melhor: ser social! Não pode ser melhor do que isso! Mais aqui.

Quem somos?

Uma equipa de 3 pessoas de profissionais da área das ciências computorizadas com largos e variados conhecimentos que incluem desenvolvimento de software, egurança em internet móvel, muita experiência de Linux e qualificações específicas em segurança.








اینویزباکس چیست؟

اینویزباکس دستگاه کوچک و کم مصرفی است که راه حل ساده ای برای حفاظت از حریم خصوصی شما در شبکه اینتر نت فراهم میکند.شما اینویزباکس را به مودم یا روتر خود وصل میکنید و اینویزباکس یک شبکه بیسیم جدید برای شما ایجاد میکند که می توانید همه وسایل ارتباطی خود را از طریق این شبکه جدید به اینترنت وصل کنید.
هدف ما فراهم کردن راه حلی بسیار ساده با قیمت رقابتی با استفاده از سخت افزار آماده به کار و نرم افزار کد باز سفارشی سازی شده می باشد.



چرا شما به اینویزباکس نیاز دارید؟
حریم خصوصی ، حفاظت از اطلاعات شخصی، داده ها، موقعیت مکانی و رفتار اینترنتی حق همه ماست. شاید تصور کنید که چیزی برای« پنهان» کردن ندارید یا کار« اشتباهی» نکرده اید که کسی بخواهد بررسی کند، ما هم چنین فکری نمیکنیم. اما به این معنا نیست که ما باید خودمان را  به سادگی  در معرض ردیابی شدن بدست سایر افراد، دولتها، شرکتها، هکرها و سایرین قرار دهیم. افرادی که نه میشناسیم و نه به آنها اعتماد داریم. اینویزباکس راه حل ساده ای برای بدست گرفتن دوباره کنترل اطلاعات شخصی شما، و اینکه چه کسی و به چه میزان به آنها دسترسی داشته باشد، فراهم میکند.
بیشتر افراد نمیدانند چگونه از اطلاعات شخصی خود در اینترنت محافظت کنند، با اینویزباکس شما نیاز به هیچگونه اطلاعات فنی برای حفاظت ازخود ندارید.



برنامه پاداش معرفی اینویزباکس به دوستان
اینویزباکس مجانی؟ بله درست خواندید. ما به حامیان اینویزباکس به صورت نقدی (پرداخت از طریق پی پال) یا با اینویزباکس مجانی پاداش می دهیم.بسیار ساده است: شما لینک اختصاصی ارجاع به ایندیگوگو رابه اشتراک بگذارید( در فیسبوک، توییتر، اینستاگرام، لینکداین و . . .) و اهمیت حفظ حریم خصوصی و اینکه اینویزباکس چگونه به سادگی این امکان را فراهم میکند به دوستانتان یادآوری کنید. به ازای هر ۲۰۰ دلارتعهد از طریق لینک اختصاصی شما(فقط ۵ تعهد) ما ۱۰ دلار پرداخت میکنیم. اگربه سقف ۱۰۰۰ دلار ارجاع برسید یک اینویزباکس مجانی و ۳۰ دلار ازطریق پی پال پرداخت میکنیم. بهتر از این نمیشود! شما برای کاری که دوستان به بهترین نحو انجام میدهند پول دریافت میکنید: اجتماعی بودن و اشتراک گذاشتن. بهتر از این نمیشود.

پاداش ادجاع



درباره ما
تیم ۳ نفره از متخصصین علوم رایانه با تجربه و پیشینه گسترده در توسعه نرم افزار، امنیت اینترنت موبایل، لینوکس و مدارک اختصاصی امنیت شبکه تشکیل شده است.






  ؟"Invizbox”ما هو جهاز

هو جهاز ذو استهلاك طاقة منخفضة يساهم في توفير وسيلة سهلة الاستخدام لحماية خصوصيتك على الإنترنت.
كل ما عليك فعله هو توصيل الجهاز بالمودم أو راوتر الإنترنت الخاص بك فيقوم الجهاز بإنشاء شبكة واي-فاي آمنة تستطيع توصيل أجهزتك الأخرى (الكمبيوتر المحمول, الموبايل, الكمبيوتر الشخصي ....إلخ) لتنعم بالحماية والخصوصية أثناء استخدام الإنترنت.
هدفنا هو توفير وسيلة سهلة الإستخدام وبأسعار تنافسية بدمج مواد بسيطة ومتوفرة واستغلال البرمجيات الحرة والمفتوحة المصدر


؟"Invizbox”لماذا تحتاج 

لدينا كل الحق في الحصول على الخصوصية وحماية بياناتنا ومعلوماتنا الشخصية أثناء تصفحنا أو استخدامن للإنترنت. قد تعتقد مثلنا تماما أنه لا يوجد سبب فعلي ل"الاختباء"، أو انك لم تفعل أي شيء يستوجب التحقيق من قبل أطراف ثالثة. ولكن هذا لا يعني أن علينا أن نترك بياناتنا متوفرة للتتبع والتنميط من قبل الناس، والحكومات، والشركات، والمتسللين(الهاكرز) أو اي شخص آخر لانعرفه

يوفر لك حلا سهل الإستخدام لتستطيع التحكم بما تقوم بنشره من بيانات وتحديد الأشخاص المخولين بالإطلاع على بياناتك ومعلوماتك الشخصية

معظم الناس لا يعرفون كيفية حماية المعلومات الخاصة بهم على الإنترنت ومع جهازنا فإنك لا تحتاج أي دراية تقنيةأو عجهد للحصول على هذه الحماية


برنامج المكافآت

بإمكانك الحصول على الجهاز مجانا! أجل "مجانا"! نحن نسعى لمكافأة داعمينا إما نقدا (تدفع عن طريق البي بال) أو بإهدائهم الجهاز مجانا.
لتنال المكافأة كل ما عليك فعله هو أن تقوم بانشاء الرابط الخاص بك لنشر منتجنا في كل مكان (تويتر, فيسبوك, انستاغرام, لينك إن .... إلخ)  وتعريف أصدقاءك وجميع من حولك بهذا المنتج, مميزاته ولماذا يحتاجون لاقتنائه.
لكل 200$ يتم التعهد بها عبر استخدام اللينك الخاص بك اللذي استخدمته لنشر منتجنا سوف تحصل على 10$. وإذا وصلت إلى 1000$ سوف تحصل على الجهاز مجانا بالإضافة إلى 30$ مدفوعة عن طريق البي بال
ليس هناك ما هو أسهل من هذا! سوف تحصل على المكافأة لمجرد قيامك بالتواصل الإجتماعي ونشر معلومات منتجنا.
للتعرف أكثر على طريقة الحصول على الرابط الخاص بك لدعم منتجنا, يمكنك معرفة ذلك عبر تصفح هذا الرابط


من نحن؟

نحن فريق من 3 أشخاص من خبراء علوم الكمبيوتر, ذوي خلفيات واسعة ومتنوعة والتي تشمل تطوير البرمجيات، وأمن الإنترنت عبر الهاتف النقال، والكثير من الخبرات في أمن أنظمة اللينكس ومؤهلات الحماية الإلكترونية.

story:
If you follow me on social media, you know my Macbook Pro has crashed and burned. I need to have the internal flash drive repaired, which costs a bit more than a typical wipe and attempted hard drive repair. $500 is the MINIMUM cost I will have for repair, it could be a bit more. I wont just ask for donations, so instead I would like to sell my art and candles in return! 

etsy.com/shop/thealtaregos

etsy.com/shop/fandomlydesigns

Please note that if we dont reach the goal, your donations will be refunded back to you.

story:
Hi, my name is Gregory

founder of fabricovers®

 

Who we are:

A passionate Team stands behind Fabricovers®

Passionate about the Apple products, having fun in life and being fashionable, gave us the idea about the Fabricovers®. It took us months and months off work, but at the end we are proud that we could  create such a beautiful and simpel product especially for you. All of you will have a lot of fun with it, it gives your iPhone a different look and feel whenever you want. It is your choice!

  • It is feather light
  • It adheres to the back
  • It is removable without residues
  • It is fashionable
  • It has some unique designs
  • It is a new breed of protection
  • it protects the iPhone from scratches
  • It is made for you, have fun with it!

Why Fabricovers for the iPhone?

Fabricovers® is a new breed of protection, feather light, stain protected, fun and fashionable. 

It adheres to the back of your iPhone and it is removable without adhesive residues. 

We at Fabricovers® are fond of apple products and we wanted to create something different.

There are loads of covers for the iPhone, but none have the fun and easy removal possibilities, and is changeable like Fabricovers®.

 

You can put your Fabricovers® on and change it whenever you want. 

It protects the iPhone from scratching and common hazards, like keys in your pocket, etc… It’s the perfect cover for the fashionable and desirable iPhone 4, iPhone 4S and iPhone 5 users.

Fabricovers® has been patented and is a registered trademark™. It is licenced by Apple® 

What material is the Fabricovers® made of and does it get dirty?

It is made from 100% cotton, and it is specially coated to even be water and stain resistant.

 

 

The Indiegogo Collection:

After the campaign you can specify which Fabricover you would like to receive! 

 

How the idea came about

It happened months ago the idea grow on us, but it was not easy, not easy at all.

Before our idea worked, it had a lot of set backs, but we kept on going, and one day it all happened, we found out how to do it!

 

 

Why I need your support

We have already done all the work.

But we would like to go further, and go for 40 designs for the iPhone 4 and iPhone 5. 

And besides that we would love to have the covers available for the iPad and iPad Mini!

If you support this project you'll be able to buy loads off designs in the future!

So please support this project now and help spread the word!

 

The future of Fabricovers!

This is what we want to bring out, with your help!


Why CHARITY?

We care, we care about people! 

Sebastian Indian Social Projects (SISP) was founded in 1996 by Paul Van Gelder en Werner Fynaerts. It is a non-profit, charitable organization working in the outskirts of Thiruvananthapuram, the capital of the most southern state of India, Kerala. The primary goal of S.I.S.P. is to improve the standards of living among the financially and socially disadvantaged sections of the society with a special focus on Vizhinjam village and surrounding areas. 

S.I.S.P. works with the poorest by offering free education, training in self-employment (for women in difficult situations, destitute and unemployed youth), setting up saving schemes, micro credit unions, food support, old age care, disabled care, educational care etc. S.I.S.P. has an explicit commitment not to be involved in any religious activity and to work for the poorest among all communities. The doors of S.I.S.P. are open to all, irrespective his/her cast, sex or religion. 

 The Kovalam Surf Club is a part of S.I.S.P. and outside the school hours we try to get the children of S.I.S.P. off the streets and on a surfboard. There is only one rule the children have to live by: `no school-no surfing`. This to motivate the children to give up their bohemian street habits and become regular students in order to make something of their lives. With the Kovalam Surf Club we also offer job careers to some of the older surfers who have finished their education. Unemployment is roaring in these areas and therefore to find a job which is well paid by doing something the younsters like to do is very rare. 

All profits made from the commercial activities of the Kovalam Surf Club go directly to S.I.S.P. to support its social activities.

On every Charity covers sold, we give € 1 to Charity.

 


Q&A 

I’m a retailer or a distributor. How can I order the Fabricovers wholesale?

Contact us for distribution opportunities in EU and other countries as well as the wholesale price list per e-mail

 

What material is the Fabricovers made out off?

100 % Cotton and the fabric is specially coated.

 

Does it exist for iPad and iPad Mini too? 

We are working on it!

 

Delivery

When Indiegogo ends, we ship, we are ready for it!

We have stock today to delivery when the campaign is succesful and ends on Indiegogo.

 

 

Press

Please send an email click here

 

 

Is a patented and registered trademark. We even received a licence from Apple!

* Actually price is € 9.99 due to Indiegogo we can not use figures with a comma, so we had to put it up by € 0.1  to € 10.

 

Months and months of trying and making it happen! 

 

Word from Gregory

To have an idea is not always easy, we at Fabricovers® know that by now, it took us months and months of trying, to find the perfect combination, to make it what it is today! We had a lot of set backs, but kept on going!  When we got a licence from Apple®, we knew we where right! Now we are ready to go for it! and that can happen with your help! We tested the product and people are crazy about it! so let's go for it, all together!

Thanks for your help, and you will be amazed with this product, so simple so great, so different!

Gregory

 

We have chosen for a flexible funding: even if the amount has not been reached, we will be delivering. After the campaign our website wil be open.

founder of fabricovers®

 
Who we are:
A passionate Team stands behind Fabricovers®
Passionate about the Apple products, having fun in life and being fashionable, gave us the idea about the Fabricovers®. It took us months and months off work, but at the end we are proud that we could  create such a beautiful and simpel product especially for you. It is feather light

It is made for you, have fun with it!

Why Fabricovers for the iPhone?

It adheres to the back of your iPhone and it is removable without adhesive residues.
