It protects the iPhone from scratching and common hazards, like keys in your pocket, etc… It’s the perfect cover for the fashionable and desirable iPhone 4, iPhone 4S and iPhone 5 users.

Fabricovers® has been patented and is a registered trademark™. It is licenced by Apple® 
What material is the Fabricovers® made of and does it get dirty?
It is made from 100% cotton, and it is specially coated to even be water and stain resistant.

 
 
The Indiegogo Collection:

After the campaign you can specify which Fabricover you would like to receive! 
 
How the idea came about
It happened months ago the idea grow on us, but it was not easy, not easy at all.
Before our idea worked, it had a lot of set backs, but we kept on going, and one day it all happened, we found out how to do it!
 
 
Why I need your support
We have already done all the work.
But we would like to go further, and go for 40 designs for the iPhone 4 and iPhone 5. 
And besides that we would love to have the covers available for the iPad and iPad Mini!
If you support this project you'll be able to buy loads off designs in the future!
So please support this project now and help spread the word!
 
The future of Fabricovers!
This is what we want to bring out, with your help!

Why CHARITY?
We care, we care about people! 
Sebastian Indian Social Projects (SISP) was founded in 1996 by Paul Van Gelder en Werner Fynaerts. It is a non-profit, charitable organization working in the outskirts of Thiruvananthapuram, the capital of the most southern state of India, Kerala. The primary goal of S.I.S.P. is to improve the standards of living among the financially and socially disadvantaged sections of the society with a special focus on Vizhinjam village and surrounding areas. 
S.I.S.P. works with the poorest by offering free education, training in self-employment (for women in difficult situations, destitute and unemployed youth), setting up saving schemes, micro credit unions, food support, old age care, disabled care, educational care etc. S.I.S.P. has an explicit commitment not to be involved in any religious activity and to work for the poorest among all communities. The doors of S.I.S.P. are open to all, irrespective his/her cast, sex or religion. 
 The Kovalam Surf Club is a part of S.I.S.P. and outside the school hours we try to get the children of S.I.S.P. off the streets and on a surfboard. There is only one rule the children have to live by: `no school-no surfing`. This to motivate the children to give up their bohemian street habits and become regular students in order to make something of their lives. With the Kovalam Surf Club we also offer job careers to some of the older surfers who have finished their education. Unemployment is roaring in these areas and therefore to find a job which is well paid by doing something the younsters like to do is very rare. 
All profits made from the commercial activities of the Kovalam Surf Club go directly to S.I.S.P. to support its social activities.
On every Charity covers sold, we give € 1 to Charity.
 

Q&A 

I’m a retailer or a distributor. How can I order the Fabricovers wholesale?

Contact us for distribution opportunities in EU and other countries as well as the wholesale price list per e-mail
 
What material is the Fabricovers made out off?
100 % Cotton and the fabric is specially coated.
 
Does it exist for iPad and iPad Mini too? 
We are working on it!
 
Delivery
When Indiegogo ends, we ship, we are ready for it! 
We have stock today to delivery when the campaign is succesful and ends on Indiegogo.
 
 
Press
Please send an email click here
 
 

Is a patented and registered trademark. We even received a licence from Apple!
* Actually price is € 9.99 due to Indiegogo we can not use figures with a comma, so we had to put it up by € 0.1  to € 10.
 
Months and months of trying and making it happen! 

 
Word from Gregory
To have an idea is not always easy, we at Fabricovers® know that by now, it took us months and months of trying, to find the perfect combination, to make it what it is today! We had a lot of set backs, but kept on going!  When we got a licence from Apple®, we knew we where right! Now we are ready to go for it! and that can happen with your help! We tested the product and people are crazy about it! so let's go for it, all together!
Thanks for your help, and you will be amazed with this product, so simple so great, so different!
Gregory

 
We have chosen for a flexible funding: even if the amount has not been reached, we will be delivering. After the campaign our website wil be open.

story:
Hello my name is Jason Mainella and I have been breaking, repairing, customizing, tweaking, developing and jumping head first into everything and anything to do with technology since i was 9 years old. I love life and continue to strive to bring new solutions to the world everyday.  

Today I present to you the SkinnyCharge. The SkinnyCharge allows you to easily transport extra power for your electronic devices that fits in your wallet. The device comes packed with iphone4,iphone5 and micro usb ports. It even has a mini LED light  to help brighten a dark situation.  This product has been a passion of mine and been in the making for 1.5 years. I have met with some experienced engineers to help me pick the best materials to create this unique product. The battery itself is a 500mah (about half a phone charge on most models). And the outside is made of a rubberized plastic to ensure longterm durability. 

 With the constant use of smartphones and electronic devices today, it's almost impossible to make it through your day with out a charge. Obviously when you need your battery the most its about to die, or better yet already dead. But the time has finally come for a functional solution. With SkinnyCharge leave your dead battery fears at home, simply flip the switch, plug it in, and enjoy your extra hours of battery life. 

I am currently looking for $10 000 to get the first minimum order created. With the help of all you fabulous people I believe we can get this done! 

Please help get the word out!

story:
!!!   GET YOUR YODLA NOW - see Perk "HANSI"  !!!

 

Tired of loosing your Phone or anything else? Connect Yodla once with your bluetooth-phone and attach it to what ever you love to loose ;-)

 

YODLA is a key ring which connects with your cell phone via Bluetooth. Set-up once and it is ready for use. Instantly locate your phone, keys or anything else you don't want to lose anymore.

GERMAN:
YODLA ist ein Schlüsselanhänger, des sich mit deinem Mobiltelefon via Bluetooth verbindet. Einmal einstellen und Du bist bereit für die Verwendung. Finde Dein Telefon, Deine Schlüssel oder sonstige Gegenstände.

 

Never lose your important stuff again!
Where’s my key, where’s my phone? Imagine not knowing where your main items are but you need them immediately.

 

Find your phone
YODLA can make your cell phone ring. To find your phone, just click the YODLA button.

Find your keys (or anything else)
Use YODLA to attach it with your most frequently needed items like keys. To find your keys, trigger YODLA with your phone.

 

How does it work?

YODLA connects with your cell phone via Bluetooth. Pair the devices and setup your custom priority number - the one you want to trigger for an instant call. Use it as a key ring for your keys.

You are ready to use YODLA.

YODLA data

  • 1 button
  • Bluetooth 2.1+ EDR and 4.0 (Low Energy)
  • 1 loudspeaker
  • 1 LED flash light

Compatibility

  • Bluetooth compatible cell phone

 

Open Development for YODLA
We want to share all development work with all of you and enable you to collaborate with us on this project.

This why we develop the device on an open collaboration platform for you to participate and help in realizing the project.

 

Why we need your help?

We have completed the functional prototypes of YOLDA to verify that it works.

We want to produce a small volume of a few hundred YODLAs. We are looking at a retail price below 28 Euro.

Future Plans

Trigger Apps (iPhone, Androit) with the push of a button to bring more life to YODLA.

Why the YODLA campaign?
We are a hand full of close friends, who are working on innovation and improvements for the world and the people. We are from Austria, where yodeling is used as method to communicate in the mountains, this inspired us for YODLA. Some of us are geeks, some of us are project managers and some of us are extremely creative spirits. However, we all have one thing in common: Technology.

When people ask us how we got the idea for YODLA, we can actually tell them that we didn't—it found us. We got the notification of an idea competition (GruenderGarage – see partners) and one of our team entered an idea whilst kissed by a muse. A few weeks later, he was notified that this was an idea with potential and the go ahead to post it on indiegogo.com for crowd funding.

Initially we have looked at YODLA for quickly triggering actions with a smartphone, like ordering your favorite pizza, activating equipment such as heating systems through apps, and so on. We were talking to a great deal of people about this device, but they did not seem to have a hunger for it.
However, when we were talking to a young group of blind and visually impaired people in a Call Center in our area, we received a totally different feedback. When mentioning, that with a push of a button, your phone can be located as it rings, they responded with a wave of positive feedback. The same with our parents and their friends - they see the need for YODLA, because of misplacing phone or keys very, very frequently.

We would love to give YODLA to everyone!!!

 

FAQ

What if I lose YODLA and my phone?

Call your phone from another line in order to find it and use your phone to locate YODLA.

How can I attach YODLA to my cane?

YODLA is like a keyring and can be attached to canes.

How long does the battery last?

We are looking at round about 6 months of battery life.

Is it waterproof?

You cannot immerse YODLA in water, but a walk in the rain will not be a problem.

Does it use up my phones battery?

Yes, YODLA is a Bluetooth device, which uses an additional 5-10% per day of your phone, similar to a Bluetooth Headset.

How will I know when YODLA is running out of battery?

YODLA will trigger a message on your phone.

Can I use YODLA with my headset as well?

Yes, you are able to use your regular Bluetooth headset or even other YODLAs simultaneously with your phone.

How far away can my YODLA be from my cell phone?

You should be within a distance of about 10 meters (~ 30ft.)

What is the size of YODLA?

The housing measures roughly 3cm x 2cm

When can YODLA be used with Apps?

After we have successfully implemented the tasks above we will enhance YODLA capabilities multiple times.

Does YODLA respond if placed under something? Does it work through walls?

YODLA will respond under clothes, magazines, books and the like. Transmission through walls depends on the structure of the building.

Does YODLA respond if placed under something? Does it work through walls?
YODLA will respond under clothes, magazines, books and the like. Transmission through walls depends on the structure of the building.

story:
How does an industry continue to promote growth while maintaining the integrity of its unique subculture?

It’s time to shed some new light on the underground electronic music scene.

  • Fans are looking for new music and events.

  • Artists are seeking new ways to get discovered and booked.

  • Event Creators want new ways to find talent and maximize event ROI.

We decided to make SinLabel.

After years of work in promoting, hosting, and talent buying for events across the country we set out to create a tool for the electronic music community.

 

SinLabel is an easy and customizable way for fans, artists, and event creators to manage their online music identities. Edgy design meets convenient functionality in the unique "widget-based" platform, which allows for users to control and determine their experience at any given time. SinLabel takes what is now a vast digital music landscape and pulls it into one exciting yet intuitive interface.

The SinLabel digital platform allows for three different types of users to connect on a social level not seen in the physical world. We ignite a new level of synergy between users by appealing to each of the unique user class’ needs.

Artists get booked, Venues pack out shows, and Fans get rewarded for just being fans! An entire music community working together to put on better shows with the music they love.

We’ve been hard at work building SinLabel from two angles. 

Live: Creating Better Shows,

[SinLabel’s Shipwrecked Series was named one of Chicago’s Top Ten Parties by Hugecity.com]

SinLabel has proven its concept in our events over the past 18 months. Through our successes buying talent, hosting and promoting; we have gathered a diverse landscape of clientele. Each venue branded towards different sounds allowing us to reach a wide array of fans. We set out to put people in front of the artist they crave and unite them with music that they love.

“I have been working with SinLabel for almost a year now and they have taken my events to another level. They know exactly what sound is right for the room and continue to impress me with talent while other talent buyers can't seem to get it right,” says Robbie Schloss, owner of ChiIL Productions, Chicago’s top entertainment company. “When SinLabel puts their name on something they make sure every aspect of the event meets their brands standards and the guest experience is of the utmost importance. On top of it all they are a great group of guys and are a pleasure to work with. I'm looking forward to the launch of their upcoming project and you can bet it will be a game changer.” 

Digitally: … and building an innovative digital platform.

[SinLabel Digital Platform, SinLabel “Widget-Catalog” Panel]

Fans: Want to find new music, shows, and earn free swag long the way.

Fan users begin by creating a basic user profile, which highlights their preferred genres, geographic location, and age. This simple set of information will launch fan users into their personal SinLabel dashboard, which they start to customize from the ground up via our "widget" catalog. From this catalog, fans can select from a variety of external "widgets" such as SoundCloud, Facebook, Twitter, etc. Internal "widgets" will include the FanFinder (connect with other fans), EventFinder (find new shows), and the ArtistFinder (find new music). Activating any of these widgets (with the addition of authentication where necessary) will immediately enter the user into the SinLabel points network, where fan users will earn points for their activity within each widget.

The SinLabel points network can be broken down into two levels:

Macro (Site Wide): User points across all widgets will be collected and SinLabel based rewards (apparel, exclusive passes, free tickets, etc) will be given at designated intervals. 

Micro (Event Specific): Interactions surrounding individual event listings will be collected and measured on a local level, which will allow for fans to be rewarded (by the venue/event directly) based on their actions related to individual event listings within the SinLabel community. 

The more users interact with their content, the more points they earn. Fans who are on top of their music game will be measured and compared to one another on a daily basis. Only the most active and relevant, "Tastemakers", earn special benefits and rewards through SinLabel. 

 The "widget" catalog will continue to grow as new API's are developed and fan needs evolve.

Artists: Want their music to be heard and increase their booking potential.

SinLabel makes getting noticed by both fans and talent buyers easier by connecting the right music with the right people. Artists will grow their digital presence utilizing the SinLabel social network, while still being able to view, manage, and analyze their profiles across most major social media platforms...all within one interface!

Connecting with the right audience exposes artists to new listeners, new locations, and new booking opportunities. It's time to be heard, it's time to get booked, it's time to get paid!

Event Creators: Want to increase event exposure and maximize ROI for every show they put on.

Music brings people together... we bring them to your show. SinLabel is a comprehensive set of tools for the event creator/promoter of the modern era, which takes the limitations of the physical promotion/production world and tosses them out the window.

Minimize the risk of buying talent with SinLabel's comprehensive analytics packages. Talent buyers are able to view what talent is most popular according to geographic location in real-time, “the pulse”.

With the SinLabel digital platform, show promotion goes beyond the limitations of your everyday street team. Fan users become promoters as they earn points for engaging with listed events. Every tweet, comment, like, check-in, etc. is being collected and evaluated by the SinLabel analytics engine. We make fans work for you!

Devices/Platforms: We want to reach everybody!

Our Stretch Goal is $120,000. SinLabel (beta) will launch as a fully responsive web experience in the Fall of 2013. However, the additional funding will allow us to achieve our native mobile efforts which are currently in construction for iOS and Android devices, and we plan on starting a Windows build by the end of 2013. Our mobile approach will allow for even higher levels of fan interaction in real-time.

We are continuously researching the fabric of the live music experience to discover how the SinLabel platform can better serve the electronic music community; with a special focus in expanding and refining our “widget” catalog.

 

Talk Techy To Me...

If you would like to learn more about our technologies used, or future plans... please reach out to Brett Danick (Digital Operations Director).

 

 

 

Meet the SinLabel Executive Team:

Danny Schwartz, Founder

“As one of the founders of SinLabel I have had the opportunity to make my dreams a reality. Being a part of something bigger than yourself whether it be a company, community or cause, is what gives me the drive every morning to work hard on throwing bigger and better shows for the fans. Equipping artists, venues, promoters and people with the right resources and tools to successfully throw live shows is what we are all about. The idea for Sinlabel was birthed out of my passion and love for music.”

David Monhait, Managing Director
 

“After traveling the county doing various work from event production to promotion to artist hospitality, I noticed a lot of room for improvements in all areas. Currently working as an architect and project manager, I have a natural passion for problem solving in order to make a seamless final product. I love that we are creating a tool that is going to solve problems and create opportunities for everyone involved.”

Klaus Voss, Business Development Director
 

Better known as “Sin Daddy”, Klaus brings SinLabel over 20 years of experience launching new businesses both domestically and abroad. Specializing in early-day and later-stage start-ups; Klaus is proficient in commercialization strategizing and company branding. 

Brett Danick, Digital Operations Director
 

A native of Berlin, Brett has worked on a variety of digital projects with a diverse clientele ranging from start-ups to fortune 100 companies. Acting as project leader, he specializes in building highly custom websites to cross-platform mobile apps. Additionally, he has been DJing and producing techno and tech house under the guise of “Hans Bitburger”.

Matt Salstone, Live Events Director
 

Matt brings years of experience in the live music production, promotion and booking industry. Hailing from a family involved in the recording industry, Matt has maintained and managed several portfolios of recording artists. He is a founder of several start-ups with a knack for real estate investment and new product merchandizing.

Kody Madro, Marketing Manager
 

Kody comes to SinLabel with years of traditional and guerilla marketing experience birthed in a successful career in the action sports industry. The former snowboard pro harbors years of industry experience both as a DJ and an event producer.

Jordan Riley, Promotions Manager
 

Jordan brings SinLabel years of promotional and live event experience and an intimate understanding of the nightlife landscape. Acting as a tastemaker in the Chicago market; event producers both locally and nationwide consult Jordan for advice on wise booking choices.

All members of the executive management team have extensive experience, expertise, and network associations in business, education, and all aspects of the entertainment and event production industry.

We've got great partners backing us in Chicago:

Primary brings unparalleled technical and operational expertise to all of our events. SinLabel is proud to call Chicago's number one nightclub (Yelp.com) home.

SinLabel benefits from the trusted market insight and years of experience from Chicago's best independent event production company.

We're almost there, but we need your help!

Please take a look at our rewards and get involved!

Join SinLabel. Join the Live Music Revolution.

We are continuously researching the fabric of the live music experience to discover how the SinLabel platform can better serve the electronic music community; with a special focus in expanding and refining our “widget” catalog.

 
Talk Techy To Me...
If you would like to learn more about our technologies used, or future plans... please reach out to Brett Danick (Digital Operations Director).
 
 
 
Meet the SinLabel Executive Team:

Danny Schwartz, Founder
“As one of the founders of SinLabel I have had the opportunity to make my dreams a reality. Being a part of something bigger than yourself whether it be a company, community or cause, is what gives me the drive every morning to work hard on throwing bigger and better shows for the fans. Equipping artists, venues, promoters and people with the right resources and tools to successfully throw live shows is what we are all about. The idea for Sinlabel was birthed out of my passion and love for music.”

David Monhait, Managing Director
 

“After traveling the county doing various work from event production to promotion to artist hospitality, I noticed a lot of room for improvements in all areas. Currently working as an architect and project manager, I have a natural passion for problem solving in order to make a seamless final product. I love that we are creating a tool that is going to solve problems and create opportunities for everyone involved.”

Klaus Voss, Business Development Director
 

Better known as “Sin Daddy”, Klaus brings SinLabel over 20 years of experience launching new businesses both domestically and abroad. Specializing in early-day and later-stage start-ups; Klaus is proficient in commercialization strategizing and company branding. 

Brett Danick, Digital Operations Director
 

A native of Berlin, Brett has worked on a variety of digital projects with a diverse clientele ranging from start-ups to fortune 100 companies. Acting as project leader, he specializes in building highly custom websites to cross-platform mobile apps. Additionally, he has been DJing and producing techno and tech house under the guise of “Hans Bitburger”.

Matt Salstone, Live Events Director
 

Matt brings years of experience in the live music production, promotion and booking industry. Hailing from a family involved in the recording industry, Matt has maintained and managed several portfolios of recording artists. He is a founder of several start-ups with a knack for real estate investment and new product merchandizing.

Kody Madro, Marketing Manager
 

Kody comes to SinLabel with years of traditional and guerilla marketing experience birthed in a successful career in the action sports industry. The former snowboard pro harbors years of industry experience both as a DJ and an event producer.

Jordan Riley, Promotions Manager
 

Jordan brings SinLabel years of promotional and live event experience and an intimate understanding of the nightlife landscape. Acting as a tastemaker in the Chicago market; event producers both locally and nationwide consult Jordan for advice on wise booking choices.


All members of the executive management team have extensive experience, expertise, and network associations in business, education, and all aspects of the entertainment and event production industry.

We've got great partners backing us in Chicago:

Primary brings unparalleled technical and operational expertise to all of our events. SinLabel is proud to call Chicago's number one nightclub (Yelp.com) home.

SinLabel benefits from the trusted market insight and years of experience from Chicago's best independent event production company.
We're almost there, but we need your help!
Please take a look at our rewards and get involved!
Join SinLabel. Join the Live Music Revolution.

story:
About Us

We are high school students participating in a Junior Achievement Company Program. It all started with an idea and a drawing. We had an idea about creating something to make holding a cell phone easier. That idea evolved into a magnetic cell phone holder. With an interest in helping a good cause, one of our classmates made a drawing of a turtle holding a cell phone. Excited, we knew we were on to something and the SnapTurtle was born. 

Our Challenge

Our biggest challenge has been production. We make our SnapTurtles on a 3D printer. 3D printing a SnapTurtle takes almost two hours and we only have two 3D printers at school which we need to share with other classes.

Our Need

A faster way to print our SnapTurtles is what we need. You can help by funding SnapTurtle so that we can hire a 3D printing company to do the printing for us.

With an investment of $25, you will fund our first round of SnapTurtle production and we will send you a SnapTurtle.

The Impact

You will not only receive a SnapTurtle with your investment, but a portion of our profits will be donated to the Turtle Island Restoration Network in Galveston, Texas.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't invest today, please share/like/follow us on social media:

- our YouTube channel

- our Facebook page

Thank you so much for your support. And remember...phones need friends too!

story:
About

 

UVGLO is a far ultraviolet light emitting diode (LED) with peak emission wavelengths from 270nm to 280nm. It needs no battery and immediately radiates sanitizing UV-C light beams when plugged to a smartphone. Thanks to its compact size and lightweight, you can carry it with you wherever you go. It works like a charm in killing viruses, germs, bacteria, molds, fungus and allergens on just about any surface you would come into contact with. It comes in handy whenever you want to create a clean and healthy environment for you and your families.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

A 2014 research in the American Journal of Infection Control revealed that a portable wand completely eradicated several types of bacteria commonly existed on surfaces after only 10 seconds, and neutralized 90% of particularly persistent bacteria after 40 seconds.

Researchers from Columbia University had demonstrated that far-UVC light could kill MRSA bacteria (which commonly causes surgical wound infections), as well as aerosolized H1N1 virus (which is a strain of the flu).

With a UVGLO UV-C light sanitizer, you can protect you and your loved ones from the harmful and deadly germs.  

 

 

 
 

 

 

We are surrounded by insidious pathogens and parasites that pose a major threat to our health and welfare. Here comes the UVGLO with cutting-edge technology in shining the germ-killing UV-C light through a LED. The LED is sealed in ceramic packages with a choice of UV-transparent optical window. It protects us and our cherished ones by wiping out harmful germs on the exposed surfaces in a matter of seconds.

 

 

Germs are a fact of life, but you want to keep your home germ-free. Gladly, UV-C exposure is a proven disinfection technique validated by medical practices and scientific experiments. UVGLO will disinfect anything it touches and leave your rooms cleaner than ever! It eradicates virus, germs, and bacteria such as Staph, Salmonella, E. coli, Listeria, MRSA, H1N1 virus, plus other antibiotic-resistant superbugs that cause odors and make us sick.

 

 

UVGLO works at only 0.4W which is extremely energy-efficient that corresponds to keeping an extra app running on your smart phone. It is produced with components and materials of the highest quality that can be found in the market, so the heat released during using is hardly noticeable even after long-time performance. Lab trials have proved that it is also highly durable and has a long lifespan when used on a daily basis. UVGLO is the best hygienic companion you could have ever owned. 

 

 

 

UVGLO is superior to other UV light wand sanitizers in the market especially in its pioneering design. With an appearance similar to a USB flash drive, UVGLO functions without any battery or recharge which saves you the hassles of carrying extra cells, cords or cables on the move. It comes in two types of connectors that go with the ports of almost all major cell phone models available. Simply plug it to your device and the UV-C light will immediately stream down.  

 

 

 

UVGLO is built with the most advanced UV-C LED technology. With a stroke of UV-C LED light, you can ensure that any room in your house is disinfected properly and rid of bacteria and other harmful microbes within seconds. After plugging UVGLO to the charging port of your cell phone, wave them slowly over and no more than 0.4 inch away from the surfaces for at least 10-15 seconds, and  it will sterilizes anything around you. 

 

 

 

UVGLO is developed to decontaminate all objects and surfaces. It optimizes the ultraviolet technology to accommodate everyday use. UVGLO can be commonly used in the sterilization of all kinds of our daily necessities, such as baby products, personal belongings, household items and appliances, etc. 

 

 

 

*Avoid direct shining on human skin and eye

 

 

UVGLO is the most safe and reliable disinfection choice compared to other traditional methods (heat, chemical, ozone, radiation, etc). Antibiotic-containing chemicals leave behind toxic residue, unpleasant smell or bad taste that are harmful to human health, and some even give rise to bacterial "superbugs" that are drug resistant. UVGLO allows you to avoid these pitfalls while acting fast and effectively. In addition, it saves you the time and energy of doing the heavy labor work of cleaning. 

 

 

 

Small enough to fit into a pocket or a bag, UVGLO is the perfect sterilizing solution while on the go. Worried about the microscopic germs and debris left behind in the hotel room by hundreds of previous guests? Equipped yourself with UVGLO on a business trip or a family vacation, and zap highly touched areas such as bedding, telephones, light switches, drinking glasses, bathroom fixtures, sink faucets and other germ-gathering sites to eliminate bacteria and viruses.

 

 

 

 

The average operating hours of the UV light bulb is rated at 5000 hours. The qualities of the electrodes, the gas filling and the emitter have reached the top-level in the industry. As a result, UVGLO is still producing sufficiently high-intensity UV-C at the end of its physical life to guarantee the disinfection. 

UVGLO is a chemical-free, energy-saving, compact, lightweight, durable and easy-to-carry UV-C light sanitizer. It is great on many household, office and travel items. It is a perfect addition to your home and always there when you need it. It is a great product that every home deserves.

 

 

Ultraviolet (UV) light is a short wavelength light put out by the sun that is invisible to the naked human eye. UV is generally divided into three sub-bands based on the wavelength:

UV-A, or near UV (315–400 nm)

UV-B, or middle UV (280–315 nm)

UV-C, or far UV (180–280 nm)

 

 

UV-C light can penetrate the thin wall of a microscopic organism and destroy its nucleic acids. This disrupts the DNA structure and either kills it or renders it unable to reproduce. UV-C light has been widely applied in sanitation as long ago as the late 1800s when its ability to kill up to 99.9% of germs was discovered. 

 

TEST VIDEO

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
UVGLO is under trial production at this stage and we have already received a rough prototype to get started to mass production.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

We are the UVGLO Team, a group of tech lovers dedicated to bring latest tech into everyone's life. 

Our team is made up of experts. We set out to create a product that people can use in their daily life. With this mission, we designed and brought UVGLO - a smallest and smartest UV-C Sterilizer.

story:
SHIPPING NOW inDemand!


TinySticky: the story

TinySticky is a super sticky, double sided sticky pad made of high quality, non-toxic rubber.

This 2x2 cm TinySticky pad guarantees complete grip between the dashboard and your cell phone without leaving undesirable residue. In just a few seconds, you can place the TinySticky on your dashboard and start using your cell phone’s navigator comfortably and safely. 

And because of TinySticky’s transferable, no-residue nature you can use the TinySticky on almost any surface* and with a variety of objects including cell phones, coins, pencils, pens or even kitchen utensils! Use it to organize your car, office, bathroom or kitchen.

Just place TinySticky where you want and stick your objects to it. You can even transfer it anywhere else by peeling it away and placing it somewhere new!

TinySticky is guaranteed to work for a year regardless of dust, heat, cold or humidity!

TinySticky’s special rubber is self-refreshing: when the pad becomes less sticky, washing it and letting it dry is enough to bring it back to its original state of super stickiness.

CHARACTERISTICS

  • Special innovative formula rubber pad
  • Made of non-toxic, odorless material
  • No residues or traces left on surfaces
  • Attaches firmly to surfaces of all materials*
  • Easy to remove and transfer
  • Super sticky
  • Easily renewable stickiness
  • Works in extreme temperatures from -20°C to 100°C

* This special innovative rubber works with all materials used in the production of cell phones and automobiles except for polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE).

TINYSTICKY FREE PERK - RULES!

Here are the rules to get the TinySticky Free perk while supplies last (limited to 1 perk per user) for sharing on Facebook!

1) Select the $1 PERK called "TinySticky FREE Facebook Share". We will thank you abundantly for donations of $1, but you will not receive a perk. 
* The $1 for the perk will go towards shipping and handling prices.

2) On the left hand side of the campaign page, go to the Facebook share button and share the news!

* This must be shared with all of your Facebook friends and not privately to yourself.
** Also, although we appreciate shares to Twitter, Google+, Weibo or other networks, we will only accept shares on Facebook to get the free perk.

3) Take a screen grab (jpg, gif or png format - no tiff files, please!) of your Facebook share and send it to us in an email from the account you used on Indiegogo at info@tinysticky.me before the end of the campaign.

story:
BricksPower is a walking power backup, the first-ever TRUE wireless charger, consistently delivering powers anytime, anywhere by simply sticking it to your phone. BricksPowers gathers features of ALL other wireless chargers, power banks and battery cases in this one tiny brick. It helps conveniently charge your new iPhone and wireless mobile phones. Furthermore, it could also charge your non-wireless phones by simply upgrading them!

 

BricksPower can be used for ALL Wireless Charging Phones! And, MOST non-Wireless Charging Phones! 

 

If your phone has no wireless charging function, no worries, by adding a wireless charging receiver, your phone can be wirelessly charged ! Do not hesitate, upgrade your phone right now! Check the receiver and special phone case as our add on items in our campaign page.

Thank you to everyone who has made this project possible. We wouldn’t be here without you from around the globe who have provided us with huge support!

 Click me to MONEY INC Reviews

Click me to Craving Tech Reviews 

Click me to Coolsmartphone Reviews 

 Click me to Greeky Gadgets Reviews

 

AWKWARD MOMENTS linked to wired or "wireless" chargers!

From the desk to the street. A TRUE mobile wireless charger that attaches easily to your device, without the unsightly wireless.

 

BricksPower a walking power backup, consistently delivers powers anytime, anywhere by simply sticking it to your device.

 

Unlike other wireless chargers, BricksPower is always closely pasted to your device. Whenever you grap up your phone to make a call or read message, you should never worry about charging disconnected.

When using a typical wireless power bank, your mobile phone easily slips out of position and charging disconnects. Our charger is equipped with Super Sticky Nano-suction that stays attached to your device.

After use BricksPower for a long time, you just need to wipe it with a clean, wet cloth to remove all dust and dirt particles on the surface, renewing its strong adhesive contact.

A single BricksPower come with the function of Wireless Charger, PowerBank and Battery Phone Case.

BricksPower can charge your phone while you are listening to the music without any using discomfortable feeling.

 

You can now buy BricksPower for as low as $29, 28% off retail price! A single device that can replace almost $200 worth of separate accessories!  

 

In current campaign, we have two color options for the 3000mAh battery to you.You can choose orange or grey color battery to match with RX.

FCC,CE and Qi standard on product and solution. The charging solution is integrated with temperature control protection, smart monitoring of charge to prevent overheating or circuit malfunction, prolonging the lifespan of your phone battery.  

 

Concept for design inspired by different colors of bricks, to highlight the modular usage and creative nature.

 

We design BricksPower with expandable functions: Wireless Stand, Wireless car charger and more...

If you have a BricksPower:

Check out the ADD ON items special phone case and receiver to UPGRADE your phones to Wireless Charging! Want to add some to your Reward? Just increase your pledge amount accordingly.

Alex has been working in the mobile accessories industry for over 15 years, and he loves to create new accessories. Last year he attended AppleWorld the new iPhoneX announcement. Alex wanted to design true wireless charger. So Alex challenged his team “Hey team, let’s develop a “wireless” wireless charger and give it a cool look?” After 3 months, the first prototype was ready, everybody who’s seen the product was like “Hey, this is so cool, where I can buy?” So we thought, let’s have a kickstarter campaign to share with everyone who’d like to have one.

The team has had extensive industry training in supply chain and logistics control from various assessments and collaborations.

If you like BricksPower, please help us reach our goal by sharing on social media.Thank you!

story:
Hey! This is Sendie, a secure payments system for freelancers and clients!

As designers and developers ourselves, we felt that there was no need for negotiations, haggling and the like via Skype about who pays who what and arguing with no purpose whatsoever apart from wanting discounts. We've had enough and this was the basic idea behind Sendie. After all, you don't want hard work wasted. We know you pour time and effort into your work, help us fuel Sendie!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We are building Sendie from the ground up, we really need funding to help us launch. Please donate and tell your friends!

How does this wizardry work?

To explain this best, we will have two characters, Steve (The Buyer) and Dave (The Seller). So Steve had found Dave via a forum and he needs a website making, Steve and Dave sign up for Sendie, Dave writes the job description. Once Steve agrees, he pays and Sendie keep the money until the job is finished and Steve is happy with the files, the money will then be sent to Dave, automagically!

So, whats the plan, Stan?

In order for Sendie to run successfully, we need funding. So here is the complete list of everything we need funding for lots of things...

  • Cloud Infrastructure Hosting (Our Website & Servers) - £420
  • Secure Payment System -  £300
  • Google Adwords (Marketing) - £3648
  • Site Security - £100
  • Misc... (Domains, Antivirus & DDoS Protection Tools) - £350

If the project is successfully funded, Sendie will launch... Woosh! - If it's not we will try to launch as best as we can without major backing.

- Team Sendie :)
story_txt:
Hey! This is Sendie, a secure payments system for freelancers and clients!



As designers and developers ourselves, we felt that there was no need for negotiations, haggling and the like via Skype about who pays who what and arguing with no purpose whatsoever apart from wanting discounts. We've had enough and this was the basic idea behind Sendie. After all, you don't want hard work wasted. We know you pour time and effort into your work, help us fuel Sendie!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We are building Sendie from the ground up, we really need funding to help us launch. Please donate and tell your friends!


How does this wizardry work?
To explain this best, we will have two characters, Steve (The Buyer) and Dave (The Seller). So Steve had found Dave via a forum and he needs a website making, Steve and Dave sign up for Sendie, Dave writes the job description. Once Steve agrees, he pays and Sendie keep the money until the job is finished and Steve is happy with the files, the money will then be sent to Dave, automagically!
So, whats the plan, Stan?
In order for Sendie to run successfully, we need funding. So here is the complete list of everything we need funding for lots of things...



Cloud Infrastructure Hosting (Our Website & Servers) - £420
Secure Payment System -  £300
Google Adwords (Marketing) - £3648
Site Security - £100
Misc... (Domains, Antivirus & DDoS Protection Tools) - £350

If the project is successfully funded, Sendie will launch... Woosh! - If it's not we will try to launch as best as we can without major backing.
- Team Sendie :)

story:
• Official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/theinvisiblecase

The Invisible Case - this is the most advanced and reliable way to protect your freedom in the dynamic digital world. Today, as technological progress allows you to track your activities until each step, the most important issue is to protect the integrity of personal data, and to ensure their inaccessibility by third persons.

The concept of our cover allows you to block access to any data stored in the memory of your device, to hide information about the current location and remove your device from the zone of ray reachability of signals of any type, just by closing the zipper case.



Features of the The Invisible Case:

- High level of digital protection from ray signals of any type, including Wi-Fi, GPS, and others.

- Availability of interaction with any possible devices (smartphones / tablets).

- Comfortable dimensional grid, which provides support for any carrier.

- High quality of the raw materials.

- Exclusive design. Handmade.

- Toughness, solidity, wear resistance.



Why do you need our product?
The rhythm of modern life often obliges us to be online 24/7, using two or more devices for connection. The Invisible allows to neutralize them, just by closing the zipper of the case. Never before that the full offline feeling was so easy to achieve. 


Materials
Leather.

The outer layer is made of a high-grade quality nappa – fine semi-aniline leather produced from the cattle hides and lambskin. This material is practical, and has a high abrasion resistance. 

Invisible-effect

The inner part is a layer of special innovative covering, which exercise the full isolation of ray signals of any type. We call it a brand «Invisible-effect».


Sizes
Especially for our users, we have tried to create a practical and actual range of sizes, providing support for all modern smartphones and tablets. The concept of our case study involves the design in the context of four different sizes: A, A +, B +, B.


The Idea
The idea of the Invisible Case belongs to our designer. The concept of the cover that hides all the functions of your phone and takes it into a complete isolation, comes from the eternal dissatisfaction with the total availability of the personal data. "Personal data should be protected '- she said once, explaining her idea during one of the informal meetings. The Invisible immediately made a strong impression on all project team members.

At the moment, a team of three people is working on the briefcase for five months. Almost a half-year marathon of developing of our products contained a long process of accumulation of ideas, prototype development, conducting tests, design, test operation and others. The final version, tested in professional laboratories showed excellent technical results, and the appearance of the case has received numerous compliments during the focus. That's why the The Invisible team is confident in its success.

Now the concept The Invisible has adopted its final appearance. Spy case conceived by us effectively works in any medium and with any modern device, demonstrating the tremendous level of isolation. We are satisfied with our work and we dream to share our development with the whole world. We need your help so that Invisible could be implemented and enter in mass production stage. 

Meet the development team of The Invisible Case:

story:
[Important] - LOOP Has Moved

The LOOP is no longer available for pre-order on IndieGogo. Instead, please visit the LOOP Online Store to get yourself a LOOP for the same low price of $99.
Visit the LOOP Online Store


What is the LOOP™?

The LOOP™ is an affordable tablet that runs both Android and LoopX, our custom OS optimized for productivity. Your increase in productivity should help make up for all of the time you spend enjoying our immersive entertainment experience.

The LOOP™ boasts a full 1GB of RAM and a quad-core processor, making it significantly more powerful than leading tablet brands while costing much less. We can achieve the remarkable price of just $99 by sourcing components from dozens of quality manufacturers around the world.


What does the LOOP™ do?

Even though the LOOP™ has 7-inch HD display and is large enough to read e-books or watch movies, you don't have to sacrifice portability or convenience. At just 6mm thick and 300g, you can easily slip your LOOP™ into your backpack or our nylon carrying case.

We are also offering an additional 64GB of storage for just $29, perfect for storing hours of games, movies, and music on your device.


The LOOP™ runs thousands of "productivity interfaces," apps which are synced live with your computer to form a joint working environment. It can also download and run any app, video, book, or song from the Google Play store in your country.

Backer Perks

FAQ's

Have a question? Leave it in the comments area.

Why did you make the LOOP™?

We created LOOP™ tablets because we didn't like the tablet options that were on the market. They were either exorbitantly expensive or unusable. The LOOP™ is both cheap and and versitile, giving it an advantage over our competitors.

Who is the LOOP™ for?

The LOOP™ is for everyone. It's so simple that you can give it to your five year old child, and so durable that you don't have to worry when they throw it across the room. The LoopX productivity software will enhance your performace at work and the built-in entertainment platform will help you relax at home.

When will LOOP™ ship? Where are you shipping to?

The LOOP™ is shipping worldwide. Your shipping cost (if any) will be automatically calculated when you transfer your order to our VCNinc portal. You should expect your LOOP™ to arrive at your doorstep some time this August.

How is the LOOP™ unique?

The LOOP™ ships with LoopX, our custom OS that is optimized for productivity. LoopX can't be found on any other tablet. The LOOP™ also has custom hardware that is optimized for efficiency.

What's the difference between the $99 and the $129 perks?

There's no difference in the actual product that you will receive. We want our first 100 customers to have a discounted price to thank them for being one of the first people to buy the LOOP. After the first 100 units have been sold, you can continue buying the LOOP™ for the normal price of $129.

Specs

Screen Size: 7"
Screen Resolution: 720p HD

Thickness: 7mm
Weight: 300g

Memory (RAM): 1GB
Processor: Quad-Core 1.7GHz

Storage (Without Upgrade): 16GB
Storage (With $29 Upgrade): 80GB

Data Port: Micro USB
Audio Port: 3.5mm Jack
Storage Port: MicroSD

Microphone: Built-In Mono
Speakers: Built-In Stereo

Camera (Front): 720p HD
Camera (Back): 480p SD

Wifi Support: Dual Channel (2.4GHz / 5GHz)
Bluetooth Support: Bluetooth 4.0

Battery Life (Heavy Use): 4 Hours
Battery Life (Moderate Use): 8 Hours
Battery Life (With Upgrade): 24 Hours
Battery Capacity: 3000 mAh

story:
Meet the Newest Addition to the Internet of Things: Your Steering Wheel

SMARTwheel uses patented gesture recognition technology to let you control your vehicle and smart devices with simple gestures—and get real-time feedback and insights from our smartphone app to help you drive smarter.

Share This Campaign!
Help us reach our goal, and make SMARTwheel a reality!

SMARTwheel™ Overview


Control Your Car and Your Smart Devices With Simple Gestures—Without Taking Your Hands off the Wheel

SMARTwheel is the first intelligent steering wheel cover, which lets you control everything in your car, plus your phone and other smart devices, using simple gestures like taps and swipes, right on your steering wheel. No more reaching for buttons, fiddling with knobs, or messing around with remote touchscreens. Plus, SMARTwheel gives you real-time feedback and insights delivered wirelessly to our smartphone app, to actually make you a better driver.

Snap it on any steering wheel--in seconds!


Get connected with our smartphone app, a simple tool to monitor your vehicle, track your driving habits, and more.

SMARTwheel connects wirelessly with a companion smartphone app, which lets you see trip data, tap into your car’s computer via the optional OBD-port plugin, and get insights into your driving habits.

The SMARTwheel app lets you track:

·  Turn rate

·  Hand position

·  Gesture history

·  Tampering

·  Drowsy driving events

·  Unsafe driving events

·  Trip length and time

·  Hard braking

·  Sudden acceleration

·  Collisions

And it makes driving more fun, with:

·  Rewards for safe driving

·  Social leaderboard—challenge your friends to drive smarter together

·  Customizable goals and milestones for driving safety


Technology

Bringing Touchpad Controls to your Steering Wheel

Inside every SMARTwheel is advanced sensor technology that works with a proprietary algorithm to interpret the most subtle hand movements, effectively turning your steering wheel into an intelligent touchpad. SMARTwheel is programmed to track your individual driving habits, so it knows how you drive—and it uses simple, distinct gestures to let you control your vehicle and your smart devices.

Harnessing the Power of Gesture Recognition

Gesture recognition is a rapidly developing field with applications in computing, AI, gaming, and more, in which people use movement to control or interact with their devices. We wanted to bring this technology into our cars, to make driving more fun, intuitive, and safe.

We set out to develop a combination of advanced sensor technology and a proprietary algorithm to allow us to interpret subtle hand movements on the steering wheel, turning your steering wheel into a touchpad you can use to control your vehicle and smart devices!


Control your vehicle

1. Adjust your stereo

2. Turn headlights on or off

3. Activate turn signals

4. Turn on windshield wipers

Control your smart devices

5. Communicate with GPS

6. Answer or make a phone call, initiate a voice text, and activate Siri or other voice-controlled virtual assistant

All without taking your hands off the wheel!


Open API

Our open API for iOS and Android means developers everywhere can dream up new applications for the SMARTwheel Technology.


The Magic is in the Microprocessor

We used Texas Instruments' MSP430-BT5190 for its robust microprocessing capabilities needed to run our proprietary algorithm, which lets SMARTwheel™ analyze complex hand-position data, send real-time feedback for smarter driving, and coordinate Bluetooth communication.

Safer Driving is At Your Fingertips

Distracted driving is a growing problem, but SMARTwheel can help end this dangerous epidemic.

Unlike devices that record vehicle data or apps that disable smartphones from use, SMARTwheel is a proactive solution that eliminates distractions with gesture recognition, and gives real-time alerts to actually change how people drive.

·  STAY SAFE with gesture recognition. Control your car’s basic functions and your smart devices without ever taking your hands off the wheel, or your eyes off the road.

·  DRIVE SMARTER with real-time feedback. Patented sensing technology encourages safe hand position, and lights and tones alert you to common distracted driving behaviors.

·  TRACK IMPROVEMENT with our smartphone app. SMARTwheel delivers trip data to your smartphone via Bluetooth with teachable insights and a grading system to track progress.

Design

SMARTwheel™ easily snaps on to any steering wheel and uses no plugs, cords or wires. It is made with black vegan leather and is ergonomically designed for driver comfort.

We’re continuing to innovate new designs so users get the most out of their experience with SMARTwheel™.



Meet the Team

TJ Evarts, CEO
As the CEO of the Inventioneers® and creator of SMARTwheel™, TJ manages DFM (design for manufacturability) and product manufacturing activities. He applies his expertise in new product development to conducting research and development of current and future technologies, including market research, prototyping, and testing of proposed transportation based safety solutions. TJ also oversees strategic partnership development and investor relations.

Jaiden Evarts, Social Media

Bryeton Evarts, Technical

Inventioneers® Etc., is a Londonderry, New Hampshire-based company that develops innovative technologies to solve safety challenges on the road and in homes, schools, workplaces and more. Now 19-year-old serial inventor TJ Evarts established a group of young inventors in 2004. In 2009, he began development on SMARTwheel™, the only steering wheel cover that senses hand position and provides real-time feedback to encourage safe driving habits, while using a companion smartphone app to track improvements in driving habits and deliver teachable insights. SMARTwheel™ received an offer on the reality show Shark Tank, was pilot tested at MIT, and has been endorsed by President Barack Obama, and the former U.S. Secretary of Transportation, Ray LaHood.

Media


Advisory Board

We work closely with our advisory board to continually improve our SMARTwheel™ technology; to develop industry partnerships; and to build a roadmap for future business growth.

Design

SMARTwheel™ easily snaps on to any steering wheel and uses no plugs, cords or wires. It is made with black vegan leather and is ergonomically designed for driver comfort.

We’re continuing to innovate new designs so users get the most out of their experience with SMARTwheel™.


FAQs

When will I receive my SMARTwheel™ if I contribute to this campaign?
Basic SMARTwheel™ perks will ship in June 2015. We anticipate shipping SMARTwheel™ Touch perks beginning in October-December 2015. SMARTwheel™ Genius perks are slated to begin shipping in June 2016.

What smartphone platforms are supported by the SMARTwheel™ app?
The SMARTwheel™ app is supported on all iPhone and Android phones.

I am an international contributor. Is shipping included?
Shipping is not included. Please add $30 to your contribution to cover shipping costs.

When will access to the API be available for developers?
We need your support to make the next phase of safe driving technology available. We will open our API to developers shortly after release of the SMARTwheel™.

Will SMARTwheel’s gesture controls work with any make/model car or smartphone platform?

SMARTwheel installs easily on any car, and the API is compatible with iOS and Android phones.

Did SMARTwheel™ receive funding from the investors on Shark Tank?
We were thrilled to receive an offer from the investors on ABC’s reality show Shark Tank, but following the show, we decided to move forward without the Sharks and launch SMARTwheel™ on our own. It was a tough decision, but going solo will allow us to bring SMARTwheel™ to consumers as quickly as possible.


Be the First to Get a SMARTwheel™!

The future of driving is at your fingertips—grab it with two hands! Gesture recognition is connecting people everywhere with their devices, and now SMARTwheel can connect you with your vehicle, making driving more intuitive, fun, and safe.

With SMARTwheel, your steering wheel becomes the ultimate control touchpad.

Our mission is to bring the newest technology into vehicles so everyone can use it—even if your vehicle isn’t brand new. An easier, more interactive and safer driving experience should be available to everyone. SMARTwheel makes it happen.

Reaching our crowdfunding goal will allow us to begin manufacturing SMARTwheel™ immediately, so people everywhere can bring the future of driving into their vehicles AND feel safer on the road.

Choose your SMARTwheel

Which SMARTwheel comes with each perk?

SMARTwheel PROTECT
Early Bird
Dual Pack 
SMARTwheel Samaritan
Smart Fleet*
SMARTwheel TOUCH
SMARTwheel TOUCH
SMARTwheel GENIUS
SMARTwheel GENIUS
*Smart Fleet includes customized features not available with the basic SMARTwheel PROTECT model.

We’d Love to Hear from You!

Contact us at contact@SMARTwheelUSA.com with any questions, or for more press information or to schedule a demo or interview.

our crowdfunding goal will allow us to begin manufacturing SMARTwheel™
immediately, so people everywhere can bring the future of driving into their
vehicles AND feel safer on the road.
Choose your SMARTwheelWhich SMARTwheel comes with each perk?SMARTwheel PROTECTEarly BirdDual Pack SMARTwheel SamaritanSmart Fleet*SMARTwheel TOUCHSMARTwheel TOUCHSMARTwheel GENIUSSMARTwheel GENIUS*Smart Fleet includes customized features not available with the basic SMARTwheel PROTECT model.We’d Love to Hear from You!

Contact us at contact@SMARTwheelUSA.com with any questions, or for more press information or to schedule a demo or interview.

story:
Portable Wireless Charger 

Power (10,000 mAh) to charge 1 Qi wireless device, and up to 2 more wired devices through 2 powered USB ports.

That means you can charge 2 phones plus your baby's tablet at the park, cafe, or playground.  The wireless charging capability is convenient and reduces accidents and wear and tear on the power port of the phone / tablet.  

The internal rechargeable battery can be refilled with any computer USB port, AC or car adapter. 

Nexus 4, 5, and 7 Users:

Can wirelessly charge right out of the box.  There are a number of other phones that can also wirelessly charge with it right out of the box.  

Samsung Galaxy S4, S5, Note 3 Users:

Our wireless receiver for each model fits under the back cover and connects to the phone’s built-in charging contacts.  Use with / without a case.

Perks

Portable Wireless Charger (retail $88) Early Bird $48

  • Comes with charging cable and free optional CAR and AC adapters.  
  • Includes free S & H in the USA.  (Outside USA, add $20)

Samsung S4 / S5 / Note 3 Package (retail $118) Early Bird $60
  • Portable Charger +  wireless receiver (fits under back cover)
  • Comes with charging cable and free optional AC adapter.  
  • Includes free S & H in the USA.  (Outside USA, add $20)
Our Story

This is the most powerful and yet lightweight portable wireless charger on the market-with 10,000 mAh.  Most smartphones have 2,000 to 2,400 mAh batteries.  This has 2 USB power ports.

The wireless charging capability is convenient and reduces accidents and wear and tear on the power port of the phone / tablet.   

We will be transparent and update regularly.  

Your help is appreciated!

____________________________________________________________

Specifications:

♦ Capacity: 10,000 mAh

♦ Input: DC 5V, 1000 mAh

♦ 2 USB Outputs: DC 5V 1000 mAh

♦ Charging time: about 2-3 hours

♦ Size: 150 * 75 * 14.5 mm

♦ Weight: 385 g

♦ Wireless charging range: 5 mm

♦ Electrical energy conversion: greater than 70%

♦ Power: 5 W

♦ White, black colors; standard package includes USB cable

story:
Etsitkö Astraterran 2. laitoksen ennakkomyyntiä? Löydät sen TÄÄLTÄ.

Astraterra uudistuu!

Astraterran ensimmäinen laitos julkaistiin heinäkuussa 2014 kovakantisena kirjana, jossa oli värikuvitus. Pelin saama suosio ylitti omat odotukseni ja 500 kappaleen ensipainos myytiin loppuun alle vuodessa. Vaikka peliä ei ole otettu tämän jälkeen uutta painosta, emme suinkaan ole ole olleet asian suhteen toimettomina.

Astraterraan on julkaistu kaksi lisäosaa: olentolisäosa Otus Mekanikus sekä seikkailukokoelma Mutkia Matkassa. Astraterrasta ollaan myös parhaillaan tekemässä käännöstä englanniksi ja se on osa Suomen Pelimuseon kokoelmaa.

Ensimmäisen painoksen loppumisen jälkeen mielessä on käynyt monia eri vaihtoehtoja ja lopulta parhaaksi vaihtoehdoksi tuli todettua uuden päivitetyn ja laajennetun laitoksen tekeminen.

Astraterran 2. Laitos on yhteensopiva ensimmäisen laitoksen kanssa, mutta myös uudistaa peliä monella tapaa. Näkyvin uudistus on kirjan jakaminen kahteen erilliseen kovakantiseen kirjaan: pelaajien Löytöretkeilijän oppaaseen ja pelinjohtajan Kertojan käsikirjaan. Tämän ohella sääntöjä on muun muassa jäsennelty uudelleen ja hahmojen kehitykseen on tuotu lisää vaihtoehtoja. Pelimaailman kuvausta, olentopediaa, lemmikkivalikoimaa ja varustelistaa on myös laajennettu entisestään - muutamia kohtia mainitakseni.


Astraterran 2. laitos on ennakkomyynnissä nyt! 

Tutustu uusittuun laitokseen TÄÄLLÄ.




---

About Astraterra - Adventure RPG 

for All Ages in English here.

---


"Mahtava peli, sopivan simppelit mutta hyvin erilaisiin tilanteisiin taipuvat säännöt ja inspiroiva maailma sekä lapsille että aikuisille. Kiitos tästä."

- Palautetta pelitestaajalta

- - - - - - 


Astraterra on koko perheen seikkailupeli, jossa löytöretket, höyrykoneet , aurinkotuulilla purjehtivat aurinkopurjelaivat sekä taianomaiset teknoaarteet ovat sankareiden arkipäivää.

Astraterran sankarit ovat löytöretkeilijöitä, joiden tehtävänä on tutkia ja uudelleen kartoittaa sirpaleisen maailman unohdettuja kolkkia. Seikkailuillaan sankarit tulevat kohtaamaan mitä omituisempia otuksia, ikimuistoisia henkilöitä ja ihmeellisiä paikkoja. Astraterrassa pelaajat roolipelaavat kukin omaa sankarihahmoaan ja pelaamisen tuloksena syntyy tarina sankarien seikkailuista.

Peli soveltuu kaiken ikäisille 7-vuotiaasta alkaen, niin aloittelijoille kuin hieman kokeneemmille roolipelikonkareillekin. Astraterra on suunniteltu yhdessä lasten kanssa, joten se on varmasti lapsille sopiva. Vaikka suositusikäraja on 7 vuotta, peli sopii myös pienemmille jättämällä joitain hankalampia asioita pelistä pois.

Voit lukea lisää Astraterrasta ja sen ihmeellisestä maailmasta täältä: www.astraterraroolipeli.com


Astraterra - Kokoperheen seikkailuroolipeli

Astraterran sääntökirjassa on 176-sivua, kovat kannet ja täysvärisivut. Kirjan etulehdillä on nelivärinen iso aukeaman kokoinen Astraterran kartta ja kirjan sisäsivut on painettu laadukkaalle kerman väriselle mattapaperille.

Katso näyte kirjasta tästä klikkaamalla

Kirjan sisältö

  • Tervetuloa Astraterraan- lyhyt johdatus roolipelaamiseen ja pelimekaniikkaan.
  • Löytöretkeilijän opas - hahmonluonti, varusteet, lemmikit ja perussäännöt.
  • Kertojan käsikirja - vinkkejä pelinjohtamiseen, toimintakohtausten säännöt ja ohjeita seikkailujen pelauttamiseen.
  • Sankaritarinoita - valmisseikkailu, omien seikkailujen suunnitteluohjeet, aarteet ja palkkiot.
  • Olentopedia - kymmenittäin erilaisia astraterran olentoja.
  • Teknoaarteet - kymmeniä erikoisia muinaisesineitä: nanojuomia, koodikääröjä ja muita astratek-esineitä.



Ennakkotilaajan edut

Tilaa Astraterra-roolipelin sääntökirja ennakkomyynnin aikana 25,00 € hintaan!

Ennakkomyynnin päätyttyä Astraterra-roolipelin suositeltu vähittäismyyntihinta tulee olemaan arviolta 40,00 €.

Lisäksi kaikkien ennakkoon tilattujen kirjojen mukana saa Löytöretkeilijöiden seuran jäsentodistuksen, jonka voi myös tilata erikseen 5€ hintaan ilman erillisiä postikuluja.

Kaikkien siihen luvan antaneiden ennakkotilaajien nimi julkaistaan myös Astraterran kotisivuilla viimeistään ennakkomyynnin päätyttyä.


Maksuvaihtoehdot

Ennakkotilausten maksaminen tapahtuu kansainvälisen verkkomaksupalvelun, Paypalin kautta. Ennakkotilauksen tekeminen ei vaadi Paypal-tiliä.

Paypalin kautta voit maksaa luottokortilla ilman Paypal-tiliä. Tämä vaihtoehto löytyy, kun etenee maksuprosessissa Paypal-kirjautumiseen saakka. Kirjautumiskentän alta voi valita vaihtoehdoksi luottokorttimaksun ilman Paypal-kirjautumista.


Julkaisuaikataulu ja toimitus

Astraterra julkaistaan 25.7.2014 Espoon Dipolissa järjestettävässä Ropecon-roolipelitapahtumassa.

Mikäli olet aikeissa vierailla tapahtumassa, voit noutaa ennakkoon tilatun kirjasi, sekä muut mahdolliset lisukkeet ilman, postikuluja paikanpäällä olevasta myyntipisteestämme (lisätietoja tästä luvassa myöhemmin).

Tapahtuman ulkopuolella ennakkotilausten toimitus tapahtuu elokuun alkupuolella postitse.

Huomioithan posti- ja pakkauskulut tilausta tehdessäsi! Lisää kotimaahan postitettavien tilausten hintaan 5€ ja ulkoimaille tehtäviin toimituksiin 10€.

HUOM! Jostain syystä "perkeissä" näkyy toimitusaikana heinäkuu, hallintapuolella noihin on asetettu toimitusajankohdaksi elokuu, joka on todennäköisempää. Yritetään saada korjattua tiedot oikeiksi heti, kun mahdollista.


Oheistuotteet


Joissakin tilausvaihtoehdoissa (Perk) on mukana oheistuotteita kirjan lisäksi. Tässä niistä hieman tarkemmin:
  • Löytöretkeilijäseuran jäsentodistus: Näyttävä diplomi Astraterran Löytöretkeilijäseuran jäsenyydestä virallisten allekirjoitusten ja leimojen kera.
  • Pdf-versio: Astraterran-sääntökirjan pdf-versiossa on sama sisältö tablet-laitteille optimoituna ja se on ladattavissa viimeistään muiden kirjatoimitusten aikaan.
  • Pelinjohtajan suoja: kolmen A4:n kokoinen kartonkinen näköeste pelinjohtajalle - eli kertojalle. Pelinjohtajan suojan pelaajille näkyvällä puolella on iso tunnelmakuvitus ja kertojalle näkyvällä puolella kätevä kooste erilaisia taulukoita ja muuta hyödyllistä tietoa.
  • Pelivalmiit hahmolomakkeet: nippu valmiiksi tulostettuja ja leikattuja laji- ja roolilomakkeita, joilla pääsee aloittaamaan pelaamisen nopeasti ja vaivattomasti.
  • Astraterran maailmankartta: A3-kokoinen iso Astraterran kartta, josta löytyy tärkeimmät kaupungit ja paikat sekä tähtimeri- ja kaukoporttireitit.
  • Astraterra-juliste: A3-kokoinen seinäjuliste kirjan kuvittajilta*.
  • Nopat: kuusitahoisia 12 mm pyöreäkulmaisia noppia sekä kankainen noppapussi. Joissain tilausvaihtoehdoissa tulee mukana hienommat nopat ja noppapussi, jotka ovat tavallisia laadukkaampia ja näyttävämpiä.
  • Luxus-yllätysaarre: Ainutlaatuinen Astraterra-aiheinen yllätys, joka tehdään jokaiselle tilaajalle erikseen.
  • Tilaajan keksimä sisältö: Tilaaja voi itse keksiä oman lisänsä Astraterraan ja ne julkaistaan joko Astraterran kotisivuilla ladattavana lisämateriaalina ja/tai jonkin julkiastavan lisäosan yhteydessä. Tämän yksityiskohdista sovitaan kunkin tilaajan kanssa erikseen .
  • Signeeraukset ja muut kustomoinnit: Voit lähettää meille toiveesi näiden suhteen tilauksesti yhdeydessä lisätietoina tai yhteydenottolomakkeen kautta. Numeroinnit ja muut erikoismerkinnät, koskevat vain ennakkoon tilattuja kappaleita. Muita numerointeja tms. ei tähän painokseen tulla tekemään. 



Ennakkomyynnin tavoitteena on kattaa kirjan välttämättömät painokustannukset ja saada kirja kaikkien saataville. Meillä on nyt kasassa budjetti kovakantiseen kirjaan, alkuperäisen tavoitteen ylittävä osa ennakkomyynnistä menee 6 000€ saakka värillisen kirjan painokulujen kattamiseen ja sen jälkeen allamainittujen lisäosien kehittämiseen ja kustantamiseen. 

    4 500 € - SAAVUTETTU!

    Kun tämä tavoite on täynnä, kaikki vähintään 25€:lla ennakkoon tilanneet saavat kaksi valmisseikkailua sisältävän Mutkia matkassa pdf-lisäosan muiden tilattujen tuotteiden lisäksi.

    6 000 € - SAAVUTETTU!

    Tämän jatkotavoitteen kohdalla kovakantisen ja värillisen kirjan kulut on katettu kokonaisuudessaan ja tämän yli menevä osuus ennakkomyynnistä käytetään oheistuotteiden ja lisäosien kustantamiseen.

    Kaikki vähintään 25€:llä ennakkoon tilanneet saavat tilattujen tuotteiden lisäksi pdf-lisäosan Olentopedia: Otus Mekanikus, jossa on lisää elokoneista ja muista mekaanisista olennoista ja konepalvelijoista.

    7 500 €

    Kun tämä tavoite on täynnä, kaikki vähintään 25€:llä ennakkoon tilanneet saavat lisäksi pdf-lisäosan Höyrysepän verstas, jossa on säännöt varusteiden virittelylle ja lisää erikoisia vempaimia ja aparaatteja sankareille. Tämän jatkotavoitteen kohdalla kirjan ohella myös kaikki oheistuotteet ja muut tiedetyt sivukulut on kustannettu.

    10 000 €

    Jos ikinä saamme kasaan näin suuren potin, meillä on rahoitus valmiina edellämainittujen lisäosien painattamiseen. Kaikki vähintään 25€:llä ennakkoon tilanneet saavat Mutkia matkassa, Olentopedia: Otus Mekanikus ja Höyrysepän verstas -lisäosat printtituotteina muiden tilattujen tuotteiden lisäksi 

HUOM! Lisäosien toimitus ei ehdi kirjan kanssa samaan toimitukseen, mutta tästä ei koidu Sinulle lisäkuluja. Niiden julkaisu- ja toimitusaikataulusta ilmoitamme myöhemmin, kun yksityiskohdat tarkentuvat.


Kustannusrakenne

Meille on tärkeää saada peli julkaistua - ja tietysti mahdollisimman laadukkaana. Sen vuoksi kaikki ennakkomyynnin tuotto kohdistetaan Astraterran sääntökirjan ja sen ohella myytävien oheistuotteiden tuotantokustannoksiin.

Kovakantisen kirjan kulut ovat noin 3 500 € ja kovakantisen värillisen kirjan oheistuotteineen noin 7 500 €. Tavoitteenamme ennakkomyynnissä on kattaa painokustannukset ja muut välttämättömät tuotantokulut, jotta voisimme tehdä kirjasta mahdollisimman hienon ja laadukkaan.

Ennakkomyynnillä katettavat tuotantokustannukset 7500€ saakka jakautuu karkeasti näin:

  • 75% - Painokustannukset (Kirjan painokulut + rahti)
  • 15% - Oheistuotteet (PJ-näkösuojat, julisteet, nopat, jne.)
  • 7% - Palvelupalkkiot (Indiegogo ja Paypal)
  • 3 % - Muut kulut (logistiikka, muut palvelumaksut, jne)
  • 0 % - Palkkiot tai palkat tekijöille tai kolmansille osapuolille

Tämän ylittävä osuus sijoitetaan lisäosien (mm. Mutkia matkassa, Olentopedia: Otus Mekanikus ja Höyrysepän verstas) tuotantokustannuksiin.


    Astraterra – koko perheen seikkailuroolipeliä tekee Ironspine.

    Ironspine on suomalainen roolipelikustantaja ja julkaisija, joka on toiminut vuodesta 2006 ja saanut paljon aikaan ollakseen vain parin kaverin harrastus. Tällä kertaa haluamme tehdä seikkailuhenkisen roolipelin koko perheelle.

    Videolla esiintyy Astraterra-projektin pääsuunnittelija ja tuottaja, Miska Fredman, viiden lapsen isä ja pelialan ammattilainen. Aisaparina pelisuunnittelussa ja kirjoittamisessa toimii Ironspinen toinen kantava voima, Samuli Ahokas.

    Laatupäälliköinä ja apulaispelisuunnittelijoina ovat toimineet Miskan kolme vanhinta lasta: R. Fredman, M. Fredman ja E. Fredman.

    Lahjakkaiden luottokuvittajien kaartiin kuuluuvat mm. Olli Juutilainen, Olli Hietala, Simo Latvanen, Jouni Nummela ja Hans Zenjuga. Heidän kuvituksissaan Astraterran maailma ja sen monenlaiset olennot heräävät henkiin.

    Lisäksi projektitiimissä on ollut apuna useita roolipelialan konkareita kommentoimassa peliä, oikolukijoita, sekä innokkaita pelitestaajia.


    Astraterra on lasten kanssa suunniteltu roolipeli, mutta se sopii myös nuorille ja aikuisille. Se on aloittelijaystävällinen peli, jonka suunnittelussa on huomioitu erityisesti lapset ja nuoret.

    Roolipelaaminen on arvokas harrastus, sillä se harjoittaa taitoa käyttää mielikuvitusta ja kertoa tarinoita. Se on sosiaalinen harrastus, jossa ollaan aidosti ja suoraan vuorovaikutuksessa keskenään. Ei peliohjaimien tai langattoman verkon kautta. Astraterra auttaa ylläpitämään näitä kallisarvoisia perinteisiä taitoja ja tarjoaa vaihtoehdon valmiiksi kiillotetulle ja pureskellulle viihteelle.

    Haavenamme on, että kahdenkymmenen vuoden päästä Suomessa on sukupolvi nuoria aikuisia, ketkä ovat löytäneet oman luovuutensa ja rohkeuden käyttää mielikuvitustaan roolipeliharrastuksen kautta. Uskomme, että Astraterra voi tehdä sen mahdolliseksi - tai ainakin auttaa siinä.

    Lisää roolipelaamisesta voit lukea täältä.


    Voit auttaa Astraterran ennakkomyyntiä onnistumaan myös muulla tavoin, kuten:

    • Levitä viestiä eteenpäin! Voit jakaa tietoa tästä ennakkomyyntikampanjasta esimerkiksi kertomalla siitä kavereillesi tai jakamalla tämän sivun linkkiä Facebookissa, Twitterissä, Google+:ssa tai muussa sosiaalisessa mediassa.
    • Käy tykkäämässä Astraterran Facebook-sivusta.
    • Tilaa Astraterran kotisivujen päivitykset sähköpostiisi täältä (sivun vasemmassa laidassa).
    • Ropeconiin tarvitsemme halukkaita pelinjohtajia pelauttamaan Astraterraa tai vaikkapa teeman mukaisesti pukeutuneita "cossaajia" jakamaan flyereitämme.
    • Kerro, jos sinulla on itselläsi ajatus siitä, miten voit auttaa. Voit ottaa yhteyttä meihin esimerkiksi yhteydenottolomakkeen kautta - tästä.


    Astraterrasta muualla

    Astraterrasta on ehditty kirjoittamaan jo muutamia juttuja muiden kuin tekijätiimin toimesta.

    • Dome.fi julkaisi jutun Astraterrasta. Jutun voit lukea täältä.
    • Roolipelitiedotuksen ylläpitoon kuuluva Sami Koponen kirjoittaa omassa Efemeros-blogissaan perusteluja, Astraterran ennakkotilaamiselle.
    • Ville "Burger" Vuorela kirjoittaa omassa blogissaan Astraterrasta näin ja pelin ennakkoversion nähtyään näin. Ville on kokenut pelialan ammattilainen ja useita suosittuja roolipelejä julkaissut roolipelisuunnittelija.

    Oletko lukenut jutun Astraterrasta jossain blogissa tai lehdessä, jota ei yllä ole jo listattu? Vinkkaa siitä meille!
