Kirjan sisältö

 Tervetuloa Astraterraan- lyhyt johdatus roolipelaamiseen ja pelimekaniikkaan.  Löytöretkeilijän opas - hahmonluonti, varusteet, lemmikit ja perussäännöt.
 Kertojan käsikirja - vinkkejä pelinjohtamiseen, toimintakohtausten säännöt ja ohjeita seikkailujen pelauttamiseen.

Sankaritarinoita - valmisseikkailu, omien seikkailujen suunnitteluohjeet, aarteet ja palkkiot.


Olentopedia - kymmenittäin erilaisia astraterran olentoja.
 Teknoaarteet - kymmeniä erikoisia muinaisesineitä: nanojuomia, koodikääröjä ja muita astratek-esineitä.  




Ennakkotilaajan edut Tilaa Astraterra-roolipelin sääntökirja ennakkomyynnin aikana 25,00 € hintaan!  Ennakkomyynnin päätyttyä Astraterra-roolipelin suositeltu vähittäismyyntihinta tulee olemaan arviolta 40,00 €.Lisäksi kaikkien ennakkoon tilattujen kirjojen mukana saa 
Löytöretkeilijöiden seuran jäsentodistuksen, jonka voi myös tilata 
erikseen 5€ hintaan ilman erillisiä postikuluja.Kaikkien siihen luvan antaneiden ennakkotilaajien nimi julkaistaan myös 
Astraterran kotisivuilla viimeistään ennakkomyynnin päätyttyä. 

Maksuvaihtoehdot
Ennakkotilausten maksaminen tapahtuu kansainvälisen verkkomaksupalvelun, Paypalin kautta. Ennakkotilauksen tekeminen ei vaadi Paypal-tiliä.Paypalin kautta voit maksaa luottokortilla ilman Paypal-tiliä. Tämä vaihtoehto löytyy, kun etenee maksuprosessissa Paypal-kirjautumiseen saakka. Kirjautumiskentän alta voi valita vaihtoehdoksi luottokorttimaksun ilman Paypal-kirjautumista. 

Julkaisuaikataulu ja toimitus Astraterra julkaistaan 25.7.2014 Espoon Dipolissa järjestettävässä Ropecon-roolipelitapahtumassa.
Mikäli olet aikeissa vierailla tapahtumassa, voit noutaa ennakkoon tilatun kirjasi, sekä muut mahdolliset lisukkeet ilman, postikuluja paikanpäällä olevasta myyntipisteestämme (lisätietoja tästä luvassa myöhemmin). Tapahtuman ulkopuolella ennakkotilausten toimitus tapahtuu elokuun alkupuolella postitse. Huomioithan posti- ja pakkauskulut tilausta tehdessäsi! Lisää kotimaahan postitettavien tilausten hintaan 5€ ja ulkoimaille tehtäviin toimituksiin 10€.
HUOM! Jostain syystä "perkeissä" näkyy toimitusaikana heinäkuu, hallintapuolella noihin on asetettu toimitusajankohdaksi elokuu, joka on todennäköisempää. Yritetään saada korjattua tiedot oikeiksi heti, kun mahdollista. 

Oheistuotteet
Joissakin tilausvaihtoehdoissa (Perk) on mukana oheistuotteita kirjan lisäksi. Tässä niistä hieman tarkemmin:


Löytöretkeilijäseuran jäsentodistus: Näyttävä diplomi Astraterran Löytöretkeilijäseuran jäsenyydestä virallisten allekirjoitusten ja leimojen kera. 

Pdf-versio: Astraterran-sääntökirjan pdf-versiossa on sama sisältö tablet-laitteille optimoituna ja se on ladattavissa viimeistään muiden kirjatoimitusten aikaan.

Pelinjohtajan suoja: kolmen A4:n kokoinen kartonkinen näköeste pelinjohtajalle - eli kertojalle. Pelinjohtajan suojan pelaajille näkyvällä puolella on iso tunnelmakuvitus ja kertojalle näkyvällä puolella kätevä kooste erilaisia taulukoita ja muuta hyödyllistä tietoa.

Pelivalmiit hahmolomakkeet: nippu valmiiksi tulostettuja ja leikattuja laji- ja roolilomakkeita, joilla pääsee aloittaamaan pelaamisen nopeasti ja vaivattomasti.

Astraterran maailmankartta: A3-kokoinen iso Astraterran kartta, josta löytyy tärkeimmät kaupungit ja paikat sekä tähtimeri- ja kaukoporttireitit.

Astraterra-juliste: A3-kokoinen seinäjuliste kirjan kuvittajilta*.

Nopat: kuusitahoisia 12 mm pyöreäkulmaisia noppia sekä kankainen noppapussi. Joissain tilausvaihtoehdoissa tulee mukana hienommat nopat ja noppapussi, jotka ovat tavallisia laadukkaampia ja näyttävämpiä.

Luxus-yllätysaarre: Ainutlaatuinen Astraterra-aiheinen yllätys, joka tehdään jokaiselle tilaajalle erikseen.

Tilaajan keksimä sisältö: Tilaaja voi itse keksiä oman lisänsä Astraterraan ja ne julkaistaan joko Astraterran kotisivuilla ladattavana lisämateriaalina ja/tai jonkin julkiastavan lisäosan yhteydessä. Tämän yksityiskohdista sovitaan kunkin tilaajan kanssa erikseen .

Signeeraukset ja muut kustomoinnit: Voit lähettää meille toiveesi näiden suhteen tilauksesti yhdeydessä lisätietoina tai yhteydenottolomakkeen kautta. Numeroinnit ja muut erikoismerkinnät, koskevat vain ennakkoon tilattuja kappaleita. Muita numerointeja tms. ei tähän painokseen tulla tekemään. 

  
 Ennakkomyynnin tavoitteena on kattaa kirjan välttämättömät painokustannukset ja saada kirja kaikkien saataville. Meillä on nyt kasassa budjetti kovakantiseen kirjaan, alkuperäisen 
tavoitteen ylittävä osa ennakkomyynnistä menee 6 000€ saakka värillisen 
kirjan painokulujen kattamiseen ja sen jälkeen allamainittujen lisäosien
 kehittämiseen ja kustantamiseen. 

4 500 € -  SAAVUTETTU!
 Kun tämä tavoite on täynnä, kaikki vähintään 25€:lla ennakkoon tilanneet saavat kaksi valmisseikkailua sisältävän Mutkia matkassa pdf-lisäosan muiden tilattujen tuotteiden lisäksi.
6 000 € -  SAAVUTETTU! 
Tämän jatkotavoitteen kohdalla kovakantisen ja värillisen kirjan kulut on katettu kokonaisuudessaan ja tämän yli menevä osuus ennakkomyynnistä käytetään oheistuotteiden ja lisäosien kustantamiseen.
Kaikki vähintään 25€:llä ennakkoon tilanneet saavat tilattujen tuotteiden lisäksi pdf-lisäosan Olentopedia: Otus Mekanikus, jossa on lisää elokoneista ja muista mekaanisista olennoista ja konepalvelijoista. 
7 500 €
Kun tämä tavoite on täynnä, kaikki vähintään 25€:llä ennakkoon tilanneet saavat lisäksi pdf-lisäosan Höyrysepän verstas, jossa on säännöt varusteiden virittelylle ja lisää erikoisia vempaimia ja aparaatteja sankareille. Tämän jatkotavoitteen kohdalla kirjan ohella myös  kaikki oheistuotteet ja muut tiedetyt sivukulut on kustannettu.
10 000 €
Jos ikinä saamme kasaan näin suuren potin, meillä on rahoitus valmiina edellämainittujen lisäosien painattamiseen. Kaikki vähintään 25€:llä ennakkoon tilanneet saavat Mutkia matkassa, Olentopedia: Otus Mekanikus ja Höyrysepän verstas -lisäosat printtituotteina muiden tilattujen tuotteiden lisäksi 
HUOM! Lisäosien toimitus ei ehdi kirjan kanssa samaan toimitukseen, mutta tästä ei koidu Sinulle lisäkuluja. Niiden julkaisu- ja toimitusaikataulusta ilmoitamme myöhemmin, kun yksityiskohdat tarkentuvat. 

Kustannusrakenne Meille on tärkeää saada peli julkaistua - ja tietysti mahdollisimman laadukkaana. Sen vuoksi kaikki ennakkomyynnin tuotto kohdistetaan Astraterran sääntökirjan ja sen ohella myytävien oheistuotteiden tuotantokustannoksiin. Kovakantisen kirjan kulut ovat noin 3 500 € ja kovakantisen värillisen kirjan oheistuotteineen noin 7 500 €. Tavoitteenamme ennakkomyynnissä on kattaa painokustannukset ja muut välttämättömät tuotantokulut, jotta voisimme tehdä kirjasta mahdollisimman hienon ja laadukkaan.  Ennakkomyynnillä katettavat tuotantokustannukset 7500€ saakka jakautuu karkeasti näin: 
75% - Painokustannukset (Kirjan painokulut + rahti)
 15% - Oheistuotteet (PJ-näkösuojat, julisteet, nopat, jne.)

7% - Palvelupalkkiot (Indiegogo ja Paypal)
3 % - Muut kulut (logistiikka, muut palvelumaksut, jne)
0 % - Palkkiot tai palkat tekijöille tai kolmansille osapuolille
Tämän ylittävä osuus sijoitetaan lisäosien (mm. Mutkia matkassa, Olentopedia: Otus Mekanikus ja Höyrysepän verstas) tuotantokustannuksiin.   Astraterra – koko perheen seikkailuroolipeliä tekee Ironspine.
Ironspine on suomalainen roolipelikustantaja ja julkaisija, joka on toiminut vuodesta 2006 ja saanut paljon aikaan ollakseen vain parin kaverin harrastus. Tällä kertaa haluamme tehdä seikkailuhenkisen roolipelin koko perheelle. Videolla esiintyy Astraterra-projektin pääsuunnittelija ja tuottaja, Miska Fredman, viiden lapsen isä ja pelialan ammattilainen. Aisaparina pelisuunnittelussa ja kirjoittamisessa toimii Ironspinen toinen kantava voima, Samuli Ahokas. Laatupäälliköinä ja apulaispelisuunnittelijoina ovat toimineet Miskan kolme vanhinta lasta: R. Fredman, M. Fredman ja E. Fredman.   Lahjakkaiden luottokuvittajien kaartiin kuuluuvat mm. Olli Juutilainen, Olli Hietala, Simo Latvanen, Jouni Nummela ja Hans Zenjuga. Heidän kuvituksissaan Astraterran maailma ja sen monenlaiset olennot heräävät henkiin.
Lisäksi projektitiimissä on ollut apuna useita roolipelialan konkareita kommentoimassa peliä, oikolukijoita, sekä innokkaita pelitestaajia.  
 Astraterra on lasten kanssa suunniteltu roolipeli, mutta se sopii myös nuorille ja aikuisille. Se on aloittelijaystävällinen peli, jonka suunnittelussa on huomioitu erityisesti lapset ja nuoret.   Roolipelaaminen on arvokas harrastus, sillä se harjoittaa taitoa käyttää mielikuvitusta ja kertoa tarinoita. Se on sosiaalinen harrastus, jossa ollaan aidosti ja suoraan vuorovaikutuksessa keskenään. Ei peliohjaimien tai langattoman verkon kautta. Astraterra auttaa ylläpitämään näitä kallisarvoisia perinteisiä taitoja ja tarjoaa vaihtoehdon valmiiksi kiillotetulle ja pureskellulle viihteelle.  Haavenamme on, että kahdenkymmenen vuoden päästä Suomessa on sukupolvi nuoria aikuisia, ketkä ovat löytäneet oman luovuutensa ja rohkeuden käyttää mielikuvitustaan roolipeliharrastuksen kautta. Uskomme, että Astraterra voi tehdä sen mahdolliseksi - tai ainakin auttaa siinä. Lisää roolipelaamisesta voit lukea täältä.  
 Voit auttaa Astraterran ennakkomyyntiä onnistumaan myös muulla tavoin, kuten: 
Levitä viestiä eteenpäin! Voit jakaa tietoa tästä ennakkomyyntikampanjasta esimerkiksi kertomalla siitä kavereillesi tai jakamalla tämän sivun linkkiä Facebookissa, Twitterissä, Google+:ssa tai muussa sosiaalisessa mediassa.  Käy tykkäämässä Astraterran Facebook-sivusta. Tilaa Astraterran kotisivujen päivitykset sähköpostiisi täältä (sivun vasemmassa laidassa).  Ropeconiin tarvitsemme halukkaita pelinjohtajia pelauttamaan Astraterraa tai vaikkapa teeman mukaisesti pukeutuneita "cossaajia" jakamaan flyereitämme.  Kerro, jos sinulla on itselläsi ajatus siitä, miten voit auttaa. Voit ottaa yhteyttä meihin esimerkiksi yhteydenottolomakkeen kautta - tästä. 
Astraterrasta muualla Astraterrasta on ehditty kirjoittamaan jo muutamia juttuja muiden kuin tekijätiimin toimesta. 
Dome.fi julkaisi jutun Astraterrasta.  Jutun voit lukea täältä.

Roolipelitiedotuksen ylläpitoon kuuluva Sami Koponen kirjoittaa omassa Efemeros-blogissaan perusteluja, Astraterran ennakkotilaamiselle. Ville "Burger" Vuorela kirjoittaa omassa blogissaan Astraterrasta näin ja pelin ennakkoversion nähtyään näin. Ville on kokenut pelialan ammattilainen ja useita suosittuja roolipelejä julkaissut roolipelisuunnittelija. Oletko lukenut jutun Astraterrasta jossain blogissa tai lehdessä, jota ei yllä ole jo listattu? Vinkkaa siitä meille!

story:
The Combimouse in the picture above was made in July 2013 using funds from this campaign. Click here to view a high resolution version.

The left part in this photo is a mockup and the scroll wheel on the right part is also a mockup. We are currently implementing this functionailty and expect to complete it by the end of July. We will then get the Combimouse reviewed and depending on funding will exhibit at the Tech Crunch in San Francisco in September.

We don't expect to reach our $10K goal but every dollar helps and is appreciated.

Overview

The Combimouse is a Combination Keyboard and Mouse that makes computer input easy and very fast.

It is a split keyboard with separate left and right parts to be used by the left and right hands.

The Combimouse has been in development for a number of years.

There is a lot of interest in the product. Our website has been viewed over 200,000 times, a Google search generates over 50,000 results and the pitch video for our first campaign was viewed over 30,000 times. In May this year we finally resolved alll ergonomic issues and expect to go into production soon. There are about 1.6 billion computers in use and so we think the Combimouse will be very popular.

We used funding raised in the first round to complete the right part and we now have a product that works very well.

We will need to raise significant funding for the Manufacturing phase. Before we do that we need to complete the design and have it evaluated by an independent authoritative organisation to confirm that it works as well as we say it does. This will confirm the product viability and will give investors confidence to invest in the manufacturing phase.

Second Round Indiegogo fund raising

In April this year we ran an Indiegogo campaign. We only raised $7K of our $20K goal. We are now running this second round to make up the shortfall so that we can complete the tasks. See the section below which explains what will be done in this second round.

Note that even if we don't reach our goal of $10K for this campaign we still receive all funds contributed.

Project Milestones

  • 1999 - Combimouse invented and patented by Ari Zagnoev
  • 2003 - Evaluated by Wichita State University. Click here to view the report
  • 2003 - Winner Australian IT Secrets competition. The award was presented to Ari by the Australian IT Minister, Senator Richard Alston. Click here to view the certificate
  • 2003 - 2013 - R&D (See blog - Combimouse Design Evolution.)
  • April 2013 - First round Indiegogo Campaign
  • June 2013 - Right Pre-Production unit ready - Keyboard immobility solved and patented

Old Prototype

The photo below is of an old prototype which is not ergonomic. It illustrates the Combimouse setup which is a split keyboard with two parts. As you have seen above we have made the Pre-Production right part. With funds raised in this round we will make the matching left part which will look similar in shape to the left part in the photo below.

What is the Combimouse?

The Combimouse is a combination keyboard and mouse. The right part doubles as a keyboard and mouse. When you grip it, it becomes a mouse and specific keys switch to mouse click buttons.

You don't have to move your hand off the keyboard to operate the mouse. You just drop your hand, grip it and move it making Computer usage more efficient and convenient. This is the main advantage of the Combimouse.

The right part works and feels exactly the same as a regular mouse.

The Combimouse website details how it works. 

Below are two photos showing the two ways it can be gripped during mouse mode.

The first one is exactly the same way as gripping a normal mouse. It takes fractionally longer to reach then the second method, but it is more accurate because you wrist is supported on the table.

The time to grip using the second grip mode is virtually zero. Pointing is slighly less accurate than the first method because you wrist isn't supported on the table.

When the unit is touched on the right side by the small finger, a sensor is activated and the unit switches to mouse mode. The keyboard keys then become mouse click buttons.

 

 

 

Video using the Combimouse

This video shows the Combimouse being used.

Note that the left part is still the old prototype and will be upgraded using funds raised.

It's best to set the resolution of the video to 720p HD by pressing the gear at the bottom of the video so that you can read the text being entered. Also set it to full screen.

In the first half you will see mouse grip 2 - in the second half mouse grip 1.

Key Layout

The picture at the top shows the current key layout. It doesn't show all the second function keys.

There are four user configurable keys.

The Combimouse will be Mac compatible.

There are four user configurable keys.

Background

Ari Zagnoev is CEO of Combimouse. Ari has been working on the Combimouse for the last 15 years. Overcoming the technological and ergonomic issues has taken a lot of work. 

We are a startup company with 4 shareholders and 4 team members.

We need financial assistance to continue. Thanks to continuous R&D work and technology improvements we now have it working well and it is fully manufacturable.  

What’s in it for you?

If you contribute and claim the early bird perks you will get a Combimouse at a discount. This is our way of saying thank you for starting to get the ball rolling.

  

How will the funds be used?

  1. Complete the design and build two pre-production units. 
  2. Commission an independent authoritative organisation to evaluate the Combimouse. This will confirm the product viability and will give investors confidence to invest in the manufacturing phase which follows. 
  3. Complete the design and generate suitable engineering drawings to obtain accurate quotes to manufacture the Combimouse. We need to know how much it will cost to create the machinery to manufacture Combimouse. We also need to know how much it will cost to manufacture each Combimouse.

Timeline

Completed July 2013 - Task 1

Completed September 2013 - Tasks 2 and 3

The subsequent manufacturing phase will take about 6 months.

How can I follow progress

We will regularly update the Status page on the Combimouse website. We will tweet whenever a significant update is posted, so be sure to follow @combimouse.

Frequently Asked Questions

Will the Combimouse be available in other keyboard layouts?

See this blog.

Why has it taken so long?

Technology is only now available to make it feasible - including thin wall plastics, plastic mold flow analysis software, light weight notebook keyboard technology, low profile mouse sensors and ultra low power electronics.

Overcoming design problems has taken time. Especially making it light and mobile as a mouse AND immobile as a keyboard and at the same time making it manufacturable. For details please read the blog Combimouse Design Evolution. The solution of making it immobile as a keyboard was only achieved in mid 2013 and has been patented.

Why only start with the Evaluation phase and not Full project?

We will need to raise significant funding for the Manufacturing phase. Before we do that we need to complete the design and have it evaluated by an independent authoritative organisation to confirm that it works as well as we say it does. This will confirm the product viability and will give investors confidence in the product.

If Wichita State University tested it successfully why wait another 10 years?

The prototype used by them was not manufacturable.

It moved around during typing.

As discussed above technology was not available at the time to make a commercial product.

Will the keys be user configurable?

Yes

Is the Right Unit too heavy as a mouse?

No, it isn't. See here.

As a comparison the Apple Magic Mouse is 108 grams.

Combimouse Right Unit about 80 grams (this includes 26 grams of lead weights to optimise the centre of gravity and weight distribution).

Does the Right Unit move during typing?

No, it doesn't. See here.

 

Team

Ari Zagnoev, CEO. Main engineer. Majority Combimouse shareholder.

Learn more about Ari at Linked In.

Roger Larcome, Software Engineer. Combimouse shareholder

Learn more about Roger at Linked In.

Simon Herron, Accountant and Business Development. Combimouse shareholder

Learn more about Simon at Linked In.

Paul Read, Public Relations, Marketing and software

 

Follow Combimouse

Website

Twitter @combimouse

Facebook

Google Plus

 

Thank You

If you contribute you will be helping us get the Combimouse into production.

In return you will receive the first Combimouse off the production line.

Thank You

 

Blogs

What's it like using the Combimouse? Updated 2 July 2013

Combimouse key layout and variations to support international options

Why not disclose how the Combimouse Keyboard mode brake works

Gaming on the Combimouse

What should the Combimouse sell for?

Should we make a Left Handed version Combimouse?

Scroll solutions for the Combimouse

 

Less important Blogs

Leap Motion gesture controller and the Combimouse

Why has it taken so long to develop the Combmouse?

Combimouse Prototypes Over the Years

Printing the Combimouse plastic using 3D printing is not possible

Combimouse design evolution

Even with touch devices there is a huge market for Combimouse

Why not use Bluetooth?

Before we do that we need to complete the design and have it evaluated by an independent authoritative organisation to confirm that it works as well as we say it does. This will confirm the product viability and will give investors confidence in the product.
If Wichita State University tested it successfully why wait another 10 years?
The prototype used by them was not manufacturable.
It moved around during typing.
As discussed above technology was not available at the time to make a commercial product.
Will the keys be user configurable?
Yes
Is the Right Unit too heavy as a mouse?
No, it isn't. See here.
As a comparison the Apple Magic Mouse is 108 grams.
Combimouse Right Unit about 80 grams (this includes 26 grams of lead weights to optimise the centre of gravity and weight distribution).
Does the Right Unit move during typing?
No, it doesn't. See here.
 
Team
Ari Zagnoev, CEO. Main engineer. Majority Combimouse shareholder.
Learn more about Ari at Linked In.
Roger Larcome, Software Engineer. Combimouse shareholder
Learn more about Roger at Linked In.
Simon Herron, Accountant and Business Development. Combimouse shareholder
Learn more about Simon at Linked In.
Paul Read, Public Relations, Marketing and software
 
Follow Combimouse
Website
Twitter @combimouse
Facebook
Google Plus
 
Thank You
If you contribute you will be helping us get the Combimouse into production.
In return you will receive the first Combimouse off the production line.
Thank You
 
Blogs
What's it like using the Combimouse? Updated 2 July 2013
Combimouse key layout and variations to support international options
Why not disclose how the Combimouse Keyboard mode brake works
Gaming on the Combimouse
What should the Combimouse sell for?
Should we make a Left Handed version Combimouse?
Scroll solutions for the Combimouse
 
Less important Blogs
Leap Motion gesture controller and the Combimouse
Why has it taken so long to develop the Combmouse?
Combimouse Prototypes Over the Years
Printing the Combimouse plastic using 3D printing is not possible
Combimouse design evolution
Even with touch devices there is a huge market for Combimouse
Why not use Bluetooth?

story:
It's time to make your case your Own.


What is plate.O?

The plate.O is the most customizable iPhone case to date. Our goal at plate.O is to offer a phone case the offers protection without sacrificing the look and feel of the iPhone, while allowing our customers to express their individuality through their case. We accomplished our goal by designing a two part, modular phone case. An aluminium bumper is paired with a backplate. This backplate will be offered in different colors, be able to have your company's logo printed on it, and be made out of different materials. We are in the process of designing backplates that serve a function such as doubling as a wallet, workout band, money clip, you name it! 

Our first launch will be for iPhone 6/6s!

plate.O will email order forms for color combinations before the campaign is over to all gift recipients!

After the campaign, cases will be shipped ASAP!

How it works

The plate.O is a two part bumper iPhone case. First, you place your iPhone into the back of the bumper where it fits perfectly. Then, you pick the color backplate you want to completely customize your phone. Lastly, you snap on the backplate to complete the case!

Why do we need $15,000?

The Funding will be used for the following:

  • Shipping and packaging design
  • Website Improvement
  • Initial Order
  • Manufacturing Cost

The Impact

The plate.O is designed to fulfill every phone case need:

  • The plate.O modularity allows for one case to change with your style, and your needs.
  • Charity backplates where all the profit goes to the represented charity. 
  • We're offering a stylish phone case that does not sacrifice on protection.

Slim and Sleek Design

We designed the plate.O to be slim and mirror the aesthetics of the iPhone. The sleek design feels and looks like you are holding an iPhone, but adds protection with the aluminium bumper. 

Renderings

We have worked tirelessly to produce a design that allows for a protective phone case as well as a aesthetically pleasing design. 


plate.O will email order forms before the campaign is over for the gift recipients!


UPDATES

Check back in throughout the campign to see what we have been working on!

story:
Missed your chance to pre-order V? Be the first to know when it is avaliable to order again by subscribing to our newsletter!

Unsatisfied with most devices out there our team decided to surprise the market by changing the way products are developed. In our open online community, under codename: Project Pyramid Flipper, more than 1000 hardware enthusiasts collaborated globally and created the Eve V.
 




 

'Intel is supporting this  Eve-Tech project because we see the potential for success for the crowd-development approach they are taking. Intel is excited to see such a well-designed premium device, based on Intel 7th Gen Core Processors, coming to market soon.’ – WK Tan, Corporate Vice President, Intel Corporation.

Fascinated by the idea of crowd development, Microsoft and Intel invested in this project allowing us to create a true flagship device. Both companies have helped by supporting us with their R&D resources and provided us with top-notch device testing and debugging facilities. Microsoft helps us ensure that Windows 10 and it's hero features work flawlessly, while Intel helps us to achieve optimal thermal performance of the V and it's hero features like Thunderbolt 3 with external graphics support, 

Tekes is a Finnish governmental innovation fund focused on companies with disruptive ideas. The competition was tough but our big idea of crowd development won hearts of the officials allowing us to secure early- and mid-stage funding of our project.

 Mozo is our accessories partner located few blocks away from us in downtown Helsinki. Together we are developing luxurious accessories for our device such as V Alcantara keyboard.

Propeller Design is One of our core partners. This Swedish design agency has delivered numerous award-winning designs to the market.

Eve V, accessories as well as other Eve products are compliant with electronics certification standards in the US, Europe, China and other parts of the world. 

 

 


 


 

The remarkable interval between charges is achieved with a high capacity battery, totalling 48 lithium-ion powered watt hours. This is even further enhanced by purpose-built algorithms, modernizing the power management.
 


 

Delivering up to 3.6 GHz frequencies, The V's 7th generation Intel (R) Core (tm) CPUs are fabricated with 14 nm technology.  Speeding up your computing experience, the processors are 100% silent and run without fan noise or bulky cooling.


 


 





We started by choosing one of the best LCD panels in the world. Each of this stunning display's nearly five Million pixels is turbo-charged by a new atomic arrangement. The Indium gallium zinc oxide (IGZO)-backlight composition enhances each pixel by raising the amount of light transmission.  Color accuracy is guaranteed with factory calibration. 
 



The display unit is perfected by optically bonding it to a sheet of scratch resistant Corning Gorilla Glass that has a special layer of anti-reflective and dirt-repelling coating applied on top of it.Equipped with dazzling brightness and saturated colors , the world looks better on our display.
 


 


We went to extreme lengths to ensure the V would be comfortable and convenient to use, yet stand its own as an iconic, timeless design. The origins of the V's case lie in one of the many bauxite mines of the world. The raw material is eventually refined to aluminium. The aluminum blocks enter facilities, where, with a precise and delicate method, the computer controlled drills actualize the vision of the designers. The finished structure is sandblasted for a silky-smooth surface and anodized for durable and appealing color. The final result is a casing of the highest quality. Light and strong, Eve V's body is only 0.89 cm thick.
 


 


It took a tremendous effort to fit everything you need inside. We know you will enjoy the result! Our goal was to create a beautiful device that you can use anywhere, anytime. Embodying both the extremely thin casing and one of the slimmest LCD panels ever created, the Eve V weighs in at less than a kilogram with its keyboard, making it lighter and thinner than any laptop. 




We wanted our users to enjoy a precise, noiseless and ergonomic method of input, so we set out to design a durable and sturdy, premium build. Under the fabric surface, precision enhancing scissor mechanisms were built beneath each key. Unmatched in precision, a state-of-the-art mouse pad was chosen. We improved the touch interface even further by a lamination the surface with low friction glass material. Should you choose to go wireless, each input is carried securely over Bluetooth(R) 4.2 radio frequencies.


 



Accompanied with with the modern day cloud services such as OneNote®, the V's pressure sensitive electronic pencil will supercharge your creativity.Windows Ink certified, the V is future-proofed by being compatible with most styluses out there.So you wouldn't ever loose your notes anymore.


 


Imagine logging in to email, bank or to social media - effortlessly.V Computer's power button has a fingerprint reader hidden underneath.Its blazing fast, typing your password in 0.1 seconds". More and more websites are moving to accept Windows Hello as the preferred log in method. With Windows Hello, V allows you to securely log in with a single touch. Your biometric data is stored in the device, fully encrypted and never uploaded to third parties or online. So its time to forget forgetting passwords.


 



Where the display matches the taste of your eyes, the audio quality of V Computer  will not leave your ears disappointed. The V is equipped with one of the finest audio processor available.  Each sound comes out loud and clear through the quad speakers.  The V also features a dedicated audio amplifier on the headphone jack.

HYPERLINK TO COMMUNITY: See why community chose this spec


V Computer remains true to speed even when it comes to its connectivity.
 

Wireless

The blazing fast MU-MIMO AC wireless card streams up to 867 Mbps and with its dual antenna-dual-channel capability, It also achieves greater signal strength and coverage. We've also included the new Bluetooth 4.2, that delivers up to ten times faster connections than other devices in the category, while also providing better reliability and signal strength. 

 Thunderbolt 3

With Thunderbolt 3's top speed of 40 gigabytes each second, your files MOVE. In a heart beat. It also lets you chain-connect multiple devices, such as two 4K displays or even to external graphics cards. Transfer data and take care of the charging simultaneously, you can also establish 10 GB/s Ethernet connection between two Thunderbolt 3 equipped devices.

USB 3 & USB-C

Two full size 3.0 USB ports  port keep you connected to most peripherals. Each is capable of reaching transfer speeds of 5 GB per second.To completely future proof your experience, we also included in the all new USB-C 3.0 with up to 5 GBps data transfer that can also one-up as secondary charging port when needed.The ports are completed by a microSDXC card slot, stylishly hidden under the kickstand.
 

We didn't sacrifice your windows 10 experience. The V is one of the very few devices in the world that is not preloaded with intrusive software you didn't ask for.
 


We are collaborating with premium accessory makers like Mozo from Helsinki.

Stay tuned!

 

 


Reservation Perks

 

This perk enables you to lock in the Indiegogo discounted price for a partial payment of end price.

When you pay the amount in question, whether it was 199 for m3 model, 299 for the i5 model or 399 for the i7 model, you'll get a reservation for the configuration chosen for the next production batch after the first 500 units.  Your Eve V will be produced & delivered in the next batch after the Hyper Early Bird backers have received their order. Shipping of the reserved units will take place during April (an accurate estimate). 

You'll have to pay the remaining sum in January 2017:
The reservation fee you've paid will be used to purchase components related to your order in January 2017 and as such, will be fully refundable until December 21st 2016 (before this Indiegogo campaign ends).  After December 21st 2016 down payment is not refundable.


Directly after the Indiegogo campaign we proceed to order the components for your V, you'll have to  pay the remaining sum on your order to qualify for the production of your V. This will take place in January 2017.

When the time to pay the remaining balance on your order is at hand, we'll send you further instructions via email! 

 

*Eve keyboard will come with ANSI (US) layout by default. As we have seen high demand for country specific layouts in the community we decided to provide you with such an option. After you purchase Eve V we will send you out a survey asking for what layout you would like to have in your device when it is shipped. Some layouts may add up to 20 USD extra. This will be fulfilled if minimum 10 people order that layout. 

 

 

We are a dedicated team of designers, engineers, developers, business folks who want to show the word that together with community we can deliver better devices than major tech brands.  

Have a look at some of the pictures of our team at work. We are very international we have guys in Finland, Sweden, Austia, US, China and the list keeps growing. It is hard to get everyone together for a group photo! But better see us in action below.
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Stuff happened in community timeline

STEP 1 - FORMFACTOR Decided

STEP 2 - Kickstand selected over other 2-in-1 form factors

STEP 3 - Display chosen!

STEP 4 - TO PEN OR NOT TO PEN? TO PEN FOR SURE!

STEP 5 - THE CPU selected

STEP 6 - Concepting the perfect keyboard

STEP 7 - WIFI & WIRELESS locked down

STEP 8 - RAM & ROM decided

STEP 9 - decision to max out the battery - April

 

 

 

We have created an FAQ thread in our community answering huge amount of questions we received over time. See them below:

Official FAQ

story:
This idea was born one evening after making myself a turkey-mayo-cheese sandwich.

We always browse online for recipes and then only, we go out shop for the necessary ingredients.

But what about us, the snackers?

What about the people who came back home exhausted from work and didn't have time to think about what's for dinner?

That's where we come to help!

Using Whatsinmyfridge iPhone/Android app, just type the ingredients already sitting in your fridge and we will come up with a few ideas easy to cook.

It's simple, fast and free!

You are welcome.

 

F

It's simple, fast and free!
You are welcome.

story:
Have you ever wanted to be in two places at once, or keep an eye on something while you're away? Maybe you want to check on your kids or a grandparent? Has the dog been in the trash again?  

We believe home security and monitoring should be affordable for everyone. That's why we built an amazing app called Presence, which repurposes your old iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch as a Wi-Fi video camera. Presence sends short motion detection clips right to your smartphone when something happens, and gives you face-to-face audio and video so you can talk back to your pets and relatives while you're on-the-go. See for yourself, download it for free. 

Now we'd like to take Presence even further by using smartphones to create smarthomes. Our users have asked for longer, more frequent and higher quality video clips stored in the cloud, and browser support so that you only need to have one spare device for the camera, or if you have more than one, you can view them at the same time. 

When we combine Presence with awesome Internet-connected hardware and even more features, you not only have peace-of-mind by monitoring your home or small business, you can control it. We can protect your family better and answer everyday questions about your home while you're anywhere in the world.

Have you ever forgot to to turn off the lights or the thermostat when you left the house? Ever felt guilty for leaving your pets in the dark? Ever wanted to watch your home while you're at work, or have your home automatically tell you when it's in need of repair? How about managing your kids' TV time or saving money on the electric bill? At People Power, we are unlocking these possibilities and many more. And that's where you come in.

We need your help to create these cool new products and features and bring you the ultimate consumer-friendly home control right to your smartphones and web browsers.

For the ultimate do-it-yourself security and monitoring. Presence Pro is a service that will take your home or small business security to the next level of peace-of-mind. Today, the free Presence app only sends you a very short video clip when motion is detected from your free Wi-Fi video camera. It's a great start, but it isn't enough. The Presence Pro service lets you record longer, more frequent, and higher quality video clips when motion is detected back at home. Video is backed up in the cloud with bank-level security so even if something bad happens, you have all the encrypted video footage stored safely off site. You'll be able to save and review past video footage and share the best ones with your friends. Presence Pro will also include web browser support so you can view multiple cameras simultaneously from your laptop while you're at work.

We will be adding Android support to the Presence app, to turn your spare Android phones into free Wi-Fi video cameras. We'll also expand beyond cameras.

Connected thermostats will let you control your home's temperature from your primary smartphone and give you important feedback on your home.

Smartplugs will let you control your appliances and electronics from your smartphone, and see how much money you're spending on your electric bill. Robotic smartphone and tablet mounts will let you take a look around. Above these devices in the Cloud, a powerful set of rules will orchestrate your home or small business as a single system. *(Please note that the thermostats and smartplugs are only compatible in North America.  Contact us about compatible hardware outside North America.)

Hardware and software developers will be able to easily add their own gadgets, products, and services to Presence, and connect Presence with other ecosystems. When you come up with a cool new product to sell that is compatible with the Presence Platform, we have a huge base of free users who are ready to buy it. We've already opened our APIs to get product and app developers connected through your own apps, or directly into Presence.  

We're an award-winning team delivering intuitive mobile apps and cloud based software enabling developers to create powerful analytics on top of the data flowing through our cloud platform. What does this mean? If you have any question about how your home is performing, want notifications before something goes wrong, or simply want your home to control itself, you'll have the power as a software developer to write powerful programs that run safely in our cloud to solve these issues. You'll have the ability to share or sell your solutions with other people, and you can even program our cloud to talk to other clouds so you're not limited in the ecosystems you touch. You can take off-the-shelf connected hardware and infinitely extend its feature set and capabilities through software, right on the Presence Platform.

There are a lot of great ideas out there, and we believe the Internet of Everything should be open.

Thank you for helping make Presence Pro a reality.

 
* Please note that the thermostats and smartplugs are only compatible in North America. Contact us about compatible hardware outside North America.

When we combine Presence with awesome Internet-connected hardware and even more features, you not only have peace-of-mind by monitoring your home or small business, you can control it. We can protect your family better and answer everyday questions about your home while you're anywhere in the world.
Have you ever forgot to to turn off the lights or the thermostat when you left the house? Ever felt guilty for leaving your pets in the dark? Ever wanted to watch your home while you're at work, or have your home automatically tell you when it's in need of repair? How about managing your kids' TV time or saving money on the electric bill? At People Power, we are unlocking these possibilities and many more. And that's where you come in.
We need your help to create these cool new products and features and bring you the ultimate consumer-friendly home control right to your smartphones and web browsers.

For the ultimate do-it-yourself security and monitoring. Presence Pro is a service that will take your home or small business security to the next level of peace-of-mind. Today, the free Presence app only sends you a very short video clip when motion is detected from your free Wi-Fi video camera. It's a great start, but it isn't enough. The Presence Pro service lets you record longer, more frequent, and higher quality video clips when motion is detected back at home. Video is backed up in the cloud with bank-level security so even if something bad happens, you have all the encrypted video footage stored safely off site. You'll be able to save and review past video footage and share the best ones with your friends. Presence Pro will also include web browser support so you can view multiple cameras simultaneously from your laptop while you're at work.

We will be adding Android support to the Presence app, to turn your spare Android phones into free Wi-Fi video cameras. We'll also expand beyond cameras.

Connected thermostats will let you control your home's temperature from your primary smartphone and give you important feedback on your home.

Smartplugs will let you control your appliances and electronics from your smartphone, and see how much money you're spending on your electric bill. Robotic smartphone and tablet mounts will let you take a look around. Above these devices in the Cloud, a powerful set of rules will orchestrate your home or small business as a single system. *(Please note that the thermostats and smartplugs are only compatible in North America.  Contact us about compatible hardware outside North America.)

Hardware and software developers will be able to easily add their own gadgets, products, and services to Presence, and connect Presence with other ecosystems. When you come up with a cool new product to sell that is compatible with the Presence Platform, we have a huge base of free users who are ready to buy it. We've already opened our APIs to get product and app developers connected through your own apps, or directly into Presence.  
We're an award-winning team delivering intuitive mobile apps and cloud based software enabling developers to create powerful analytics on top of the data flowing through our cloud platform. What does this mean? If you have any question about how your home is performing, want notifications before something goes wrong, or simply want your home to control itself, you'll have the power as a software developer to write powerful programs that run safely in our cloud to solve these issues. You'll have the ability to share or sell your solutions with other people, and you can even program our cloud to talk to other clouds so you're not limited in the ecosystems you touch. You can take off-the-shelf connected hardware and infinitely extend its feature set and capabilities through software, right on the Presence Platform.
There are a lot of great ideas out there, and we believe the Internet of Everything should be open.
Thank you for helping make Presence Pro a reality.

 
* Please note that the thermostats and smartplugs are only compatible in North America. Contact us about compatible hardware outside North America.

story:
The Problem we solve

Ever got a high telephone bills and wondered why you have to pay a fortune when calling overseas or when you are travelling?

For years operators have been overcharging for SMS, international calling, long distance calling, roaming and other services.

How we solve it

The rise of smartphones and availability of mobile data (WiFi / 3G / 4G) have made it possible for Yeloworld to develop a smart mobile App that will do to mobile calling what WhatsApp did to SMS.

Yeloworld has rates over 90% cheaper compared to leading operators and other providers in over 200 countries and allows users to save up on their international calls and stop wasting money on their phone bill.

Who we are?

The two co-founders behind this Indiegogo campaign are technology entrepreneurs Philippe Joly and Ron van Valkengoed. Ron is Dutch, so “cheap” is part of his Dutch DNA and Philippe is French. When you put a 'grumpy" Frenchman annoyed of being ripped off by mobile operators overcharging and a cost conscious Dutch man together, you get a great cheap calling App, Yeloworld.

While very experienced and serious about business, we don't take ourselves too seriously, which makes Yeloworld a very enjoyable adventure and place to work at.

Your help in 3 easy steps

You can help us in three easy steps: 

Step 1: Test the Yeloworld App, it is Free to download (see below) 
Step 2: Contribute and get the perks
Step 3: Spread the Word

Yeloworld is a startup launched in January 2013 with for objective to end the rip-off that mobile users endure from mobile network operators whenever they make international calls or are travelling abroad and roaming.

Yeloworld is dedicated to make calls cheaper for everyone and shrink our phone bill.

In simple words, Yeloworld is an App for iOS (iPhone, iPad, iPod) and Android phones/tablets that allows users to make very cheap phone calls to any mobile or landline numbers, anywhere in the world, and save a lot of money on international calls.

In techy words, it’s an OTT calling service using VoIP (Voice over Internet) to initiate the calls and terminating the calls directly on the carrier networks in over 200 countries.

Yeloworld allows you to call regular phone numbers. This means that you don't need anything from the receiving party. No need for them to own a smartphone, install any app whatsoever or even be online! Yeloworld allows you to call anyone, anywhere, on their “normal” phone (cellphone or fixed landline), regardless of where they are and what type of phone they have.

 


Since our launch, we have enjoyed some early success already with about 10,000 users getting our first suite of apps for iOS (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch) and Android. We have received good reviews and great media coverage.

- Appolicious/Yahoo - “The New Android App Worth Downloading”

- The Guardian - “30 Android Apps of the Week”

- Appolicious/Yahoo - “Apps Of The Week”

- Telecompaper – “Yelo targets Skype”

- Frenchweb.fr – “A New Low-cost Competitor To Skype”

Frenchweb did a video chronicle featuring yeloworld as part of the new Hong Kong startups founded by French entrepreneurs - click here to watch (in french).

But we’re just scratching the surface, now we need your help to take the next steps. 

One Australian woman got a bill for 150,000$ because she was travelling in Europe for a few months. A man in the UK got a bill for over 20,000$ for calling his girlfriend abroad. More examples of extreme roaming charges and astronomical phone bills regularly make the headlines of the newspapers around the world.

But without going to the extreme, how many people have received a phone bill inflated by a few hundred dollars after a trip overseas? A lot of people.

Pretty much everyone we know has, at one point or another, received a shock phone bill after calling overseas or travelling abroad.

But there is no reason whatsoever why making a simple phone call home to tell your family that you have arrived safely into a country on the other side of the globe should cost you a fortune. Wouldn't you agree?

We'll let you in on a little secret...mobile network operators have been cashing in on international calls and roaming charges for decades. They have made billions of dollars by overcharging users everywhere they could. And you know why? Because until recently, there was no alternative for the mobile users to make cheaper calls.

The only alternative to make international calls for cheap was to buy a prepaid calling card, scratching a number at the back, dialing an endless sequence of digits, * and # keys, EVERYTIME you wanted to make a call. These calling cards were (and still are) cheap, but not convenient.

Now that technology is catching up, it makes possible for services like Yeloworld to exist and finally allow mobile users to call worldwide for cheap and conveniently, right from their phone, in just one tap.

 

 

Did you know...that you can make calls from overseas without even touching your phone bill at all?

When you’re calling using the Yeloworld App, the cost of the calls is taken from your Yeloworld credits, not your phone bill, so you stay in control of what you spend.

This means no more shock bills. In fact, if you connect to a WiFi hotspot (in a hotel or coffee shop somewhere) and you make calls using the Yeloworld App, you are not even touching your phone bill (at all). 

 

Did you know...that you could make phone calls even if you don't have phone coverage?

With the Yeloworld App you can connect to a WiFi hotspot and make normal phone calls to mobile numbers or landlines. This means that if you have poor phone coverage or no phone coverage at all (for example the basement, my kitchen :) or a meeting room in the office), as long as you have a WiFi access you can make phone calls normally.

I am Philippe Joly, and with two of my friends, Ron and Egidio, we have co-founded Yeloworld. The three of us have been involved with mobile and Internet technologies for most of our careers and have extended experience in running startup companies, managing projects and leading people.

One day, we realized how much it was costing us to communicate with each other across the globe between Italy, France, the Netherlands, the UK, and Hong Kong (where I now live), so we decided to tackle the issue and we came up with an efficient, low-cost and interesting way to make cheap calls worldwide. We worked like mad scientists, brainstorming the technologies available and we got it...the Yeloworld idea was born.

We then involved more people to help us, developers, analysts, support guys and now have a tight group of people fully dedicated to making Yeloworld a success.

Yeloworld is an ambitious project that aims at changing the way people communicate, allowing them to make cheaper international calls to regular mobile or landline numbers, and offering them the immediate benefit of huge cost savings on their phone bills.

Looking at our competitors, which include large services such as SkypeOut, Google Voice, and Rebtel, which turnover hundreds of millions of dollars, we initially thought that we may have engaged in a Samson vs. Goliath battle.

But we are true entrepreneurs, so we live by the motto "if nothing is ventured, nothing is gained". We decided to go for it and dedicated all our time and resources into creating Yeloworld.

We have put in our own money, built a strong business model, created the website http://www.yeloworld.com, designed the Apps and launched the Yeloworld service on all the major app stores in the middle of January 2013.

The early results show that we were right to go for it. Our Apps and website are already very popular and growing fast, which is a satisfaction that we can compete, and compete well, even against such big established players.

Our main advantage is that we are able to offer mobile users much cheaper rates than our competitors. in fact, we are offering rates up to 5 times cheaper than SkypeOut on many destinations.

Because we are experts in the mobile field, we understand the complex infrastructures that are behind what seems as simple as a phone call.

We broke the process down into its main components, and then cut great wholesale deals all the way, which allows us to now offer extremely low rates in over 200 countries. We have developed our Apps using the best of VoIP and other voice technologies in order to give a great quality of calls (often better quality of calls than we I call overseas directly) and ensure that Yeloworld users would be able to call any phone numbers, not just smartphones or other users of the same App (like Viber for example or Whatsapp for messaging).

These are great advantages of Yeloworld, as not only can you call for dirt cheap, have good quality calls, but you also don't need to worry about what type of phone or what app the recipient of your call has on his phone, it doesn't matter at all when you call with the Yeloworld App, because you call normal numbers.

While many providers offer calls to landline very cheap, calling mobile numbers remains a relatively unchallenged area. With Yeloworld, we are challenging the established players and offer significantly lower rates to mobile phones.

See for yourself some of our rates compared to SkypeOut, Google Voice and Rebtel:

 

 

Yeloworld for iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch and Android is our first set of Apps, but we plan to rollout more apps to more platforms (BlackBerry, Windows Mobile and even Web Apps) and more features (SMS and more).

Yeloworld has the potential to help millions of smartphone users around the world save billions of dollars on their phone bills and make a significant impact in the way people communicate in a modern, digitally borderless world. 

 

We’ve made great progress on our own. The Yeloworld App is live on all popular app stores, we have a cool website that attracts thousands of visitors each month, some good press in renowned media, around 3000 Twitter followers, and 1000+ Likes on our Facebook page, but we need your help now.

Our team needs funding to take Yeloworld to the next step and help 1 million people reduce their phone bill this year.

Imagining that Yeloworld could significantly reduce the bills of 1 million people is pretty meaningful and real, and most of all it is immediate. As soon as people start using our App, their bill shrinks straight away.

Because I live abroad, and like most expats in a similar situation, I do need (or simply want) to call my family back home, or my friends spread across the world. I used to pay more than 100US$ per month on my phone calls.

The first month I started using our Yeloworld App, my bill shrinked to 40US$. That’s 60 US$ saved per month so I’ll save over 700 US$ this year. I don’t know about you, but I will be happy at Christmas to have an extra 700 US$ to spend on something more meaningful than a phone bill.

At the current rate and limited funding (our own money), we’ll attract 100,000 users at best by the end of this year, but this is not enough momentum for the business to survive until then. We need to invest in customer aquisition, in developing a version of our App for BlackBerry and Windows Mobile, in extending our distribution, promoting our apps, and last but not least in growing our team.

 

Money is not everything but we all know how much it helps

We have already invested our own funds in the business and continue to do so, while we work without remuneration. Some of us still have to keep their day jobs, and some of us are working full time (for free) on turning our vision for low-cost communication into reality. But the other reality (less enjoyable) is that we don’t have any more money left to continue without external investment.

We evaluated our options and here they are:

  • Bin: Throw in the bin all the effort done to date, close the shop and go find another job. Not an option!
  • Financial institutions: Go to banks or other financial institutions to get a formal insititutional investment. After speaking to Venture Capitalist and other Angel investors, we realized that this approach would not achieve our immediate need because of the lengthy process (6-9 months) and portion of our business that we’ll see disappear. An option but for later!
  • Indiegogo and crowd funding: In the end, our Yeloworld vision is a project by the people for the people, so we decided to calculate how much funds we would need to create enough momentum in order to have a self-funding business that would allow us to achieve our goal of helping 1 million people reduce their phone bill this year. The result is that we need 100,000 users by the end of June and we need 34,000 US$ to achieve that result. 

So we are asking Indiegogoers to raise a total of $34,000. This will allow us to survive for another 3 months, which is enough time for our team to reach the goal of 100,000 users by the end of June, which will be a tipping point to create the momentum of daily downloads necessary to reach our goal of 1 million users by the end of the year. We'll also finish and launch our next suite of Apps to offer the Yeloworld low rates to more smartphone platforms.

Here is the breakdown of how we will spend the money:

  • The bulk will go into customer aquisition (it cost money to get customers).
  • Some funds will go towards development. We have an outsourced team of developers and designers ready to get coding.
  • Developers are great people but they need some business supervision too, so some of the funds will go towards project management. We will allocate the minimum wage salary for one of the founders, to allow him to continue working on Yeloworld full-time.
  • The rest of the money goes towards running the business during those 3 months, in other words to keep the lights on (utilities, Internet, phone, admin etc…).

And if we get more? We'll simply get there faster, and as a result, instead of hiring 1 person, we may be able to hire 2 or 3, depending on how much we raise.

 

  1. Download the free Yeloworld App for iOS or Android, create your account and use the service (we already give you 50 Eurocent courtesy credit for free so you can make calls straight away to try it)
  2. If you like the service, contribute at the level you can afford, the more the better :) but every contribution helps
  3. Spread the word about our Indiegogo campaign and Yeloworld

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Above is our story, our vision, our dream, so if you’re reading up to this point, then there is a good chance that you may want to contribute, so thank you very much for reading this far :)

Every little bit helps! Whether you give $5, $25, $100 or $1000, if you are able to support us and help us reach our goal of $34,000, then fantastic and thank you very much!

But help is not always monetary, so if you can’t help us with funding at this point, then we are still very grateful for your attention and maybe you can be helpful in other ways, by simply taking a few seconds to spread the word about Yeloworld and our Indiegogo campaign, by sharing our story on Facebook or Twitter, or by telling your friends, who may know someone, who knows someone, who knows someone, who may be able to help us achieve our monetary goal. 

The feeling of having contributed to something good?...ok…ok…I know...cheesy, but more seriously, we have created a number of perks to make you benefit from our success by any means available to us. We have some social media perks and also some free call credits and even special offers (even more reduced rates than the public).

By helping us, you will have contributed to the success of a startup that in turn will help you reduce your own phone bill and help you spend your money in more meaningful ways than paying a bill. Somehow, you nearly get your donation back in the savings that the Yeloworld App will allow you to make down the line :)

But most importantly, we calculated that if we were successful in achieving our goal of 100,000 users by the end of June, for which we need to raise 34,000 US$, then we’ll be self-generating enough revenues from our Yeloworld Apps to create 1 new job for a support guy (or girl).

Every entrepreneur will tell you that it is a great satisfaction to create a business out of an idea, but the greatest satisfaction is being able to create a new job for someone, especially in a period where many people are losing theirs. So by helping us as a business, you will also be helping us contribute back to the community and create new jobs.

Thanks in advance for any contribution you have made to this campaign. Any help is much appreciated, no matter how little!

There are other easy things you can do to help us reach our campaign goal such as spreading the word.

Post this link: http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/yeloworld-the-whatsapp-of-mobile-calling on your social network like Facebook and Twitter.

Tell your friends about Yeloworld and invite them to support this great project. Indiegogo has great sharing tools that you'll find on the top of this page below our video.

www.facebook.com/yeloworld

www.twitter.com/yeloworld

www.yeloworld.com

 

Thank you from everyone at Yeloworld! 

 

Questions or Suggestions?

Please contact us at info@yeloworld.com

And if we get more? We'll simply get there faster, and as a result, instead of hiring 1 person, we may be able to hire 2 or 3, depending on how much we raise.
 


Download the free Yeloworld App for iOS or Android, create your account and use the service (we already give you 50 Eurocent courtesy credit for free so you can make calls straight away to try it)
If you like the service, contribute at the level you can afford, the more the better :) but every contribution helps

Spread the word about our Indiegogo campaign and Yeloworld
 
 
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Above is our story, our vision, our dream, so if you’re reading up to this point, then there is a good chance that you may want to contribute, so thank you very much for reading this far :)
Every little bit helps! Whether you give $5, $25, $100 or $1000, if you are able to support us and help us reach our goal of $34,000, then fantastic and thank you very much!
But help is not always monetary, so if you can’t help us with funding at this point, then we are still very grateful for your attention and maybe you can be helpful in other ways, by simply taking a few seconds to spread the word about Yeloworld and our Indiegogo campaign, by sharing our story on Facebook or Twitter, or by telling your friends, who may know someone, who knows someone, who knows someone, who may be able to help us achieve our monetary goal. 

The feeling of having contributed to something good?...ok…ok…I know...cheesy, but more seriously, we have created a number of perks to make you benefit from our success by any means available to us. We have some social media perks and also some free call credits and even special offers (even more reduced rates than the public).
By helping us, you will have contributed to the success of a startup that in turn will help you reduce your own phone bill and help you spend your money in more meaningful ways than paying a bill. Somehow, you nearly get your donation back in the savings that the Yeloworld App will allow you to make down the line :)
But most importantly, we calculated that if we were successful in achieving our goal of 100,000 users by the end of June, for which we need to raise 34,000 US$, then we’ll be self-generating enough revenues from our Yeloworld Apps to create 1 new job for a support guy (or girl).
Every entrepreneur will tell you that it is a great satisfaction to create a business out of an idea, but the greatest satisfaction is being able to create a new job for someone, especially in a period where many people are losing theirs. So by helping us as a business, you will also be helping us contribute back to the community and create new jobs.


Thanks in advance for any contribution you have made to this campaign. Any help is much appreciated, no matter how little!
There are other easy things you can do to help us reach our campaign goal such as spreading the word.
Post this link: http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/yeloworld-the-whatsapp-of-mobile-calling on your social network like Facebook and Twitter.
Tell your friends about Yeloworld and invite them to support this great project. Indiegogo has great sharing tools that you'll find on the top of this page below our video.
www.facebook.com/yeloworld
www.twitter.com/yeloworld
www.yeloworld.com
 

Thank you from everyone at Yeloworld! 
 
Questions or Suggestions?
Please contact us at info@yeloworld.com

story: Greetings My name is Patrick Doran editor for Actors for Autism. I recently graduated from this organization which teaches children and adults on the autistic spectrum. It delivers job training for work in the entertainment industry. I have edited numerous projects such as celebrity interviews, short films such as The Song of Me which makes fun of Diva celebrities like Snooki, but that's not all I have edited numerous public service announcements delivered by famous celebrities. Having just graduated from Actors for Autism my goal is to edit projects for my own and build a career as an editor. I need your help so I can get myself a MacBook pro to edit my own projects.

story:
What are HitStands?

HitStands are silicone pipe stands developed for glass pipes that…
   • Prevent bowls from being knocked over
   • Prevent pipes from breaking
   • They both cushion and silence the impact of pipes on hard surfaces.

Protect your furniture and hand blown glass pipes with our innovative, sculptural, 100% eco friendly silicone pipe stands. Fun and easy to assembly.


HitStands, when assembled, are 5 1/2” long and can accommodate most glass pipes.

They come in three colors: Red, Blue and Green.


Pipes are for tobacco use only. They are NOT part of our product line or, the perks.


Why use HitStands with your pipes?



They both cushion and silence the impact of pipes on hard surfaces. They give you that "Peace of Mind" feeling.


Business Direction/Why We Need Your Support

We are gearing up for another manufacturing run and hope to be able to back it up with a point of purchase display and a marketing plan that includes advertising and promotions.

Because we already have our production molds, the money raised will go to the run itself and then directly into marketing, sales and advertising.

The next goal is to create a second product, either a size variation, or change up the surface patterns.

Testimonials

"Works wonders. Picked one up a little over a week ago. Hardly ever empty since. "
  –  Jalex - CT
"The best product I have seen ever, I will never break a pipe again, thanks guys"
  –  E - CA
"Just got one today!!! Awesome product can't wait to show my friends!!!"
  –  Caitlin - CT
“I love these. Exactly what I need...”
  – Jill - MI
"TERRIFIC !! your product is AWESOME !! thankyou, eddie"
  –  Eddie - CT

Who are HitStands?

Blue Barn Works, llc. is a family owned business that is dedicated to inventing, developing and manufacturing innovative products. We are two brothers, who are second generation artists, photographers and graphic designers who are dedicated to creating products of functional beauty.

Our father was an artist and an art teacher. We both pursued careers in the arts and worked together as toy inventors and entrepreneurs. We invented a rotational painting system for Ohio Art, manufactured a glider that is thrown like a flying disc and a line of flying insect gliders.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute...that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Spread the word
  • Use the email icon to help spreed the word

story:
Use the world's first GoPro Solar Case while surfing, biking, skiing, snowboarding and never run out of power while filming your most exciting adventure.

After using GoPro cameras and wearables frequently outdoors, we think it's the right time to invent a solar-powered protection case for GoPro lovers. The special feature about this product is our integrated SunnyBAG solar-technology, which makes it possible to charge your GoPro with sunlight.

With  the strong  3,15 watt panel it takes less than 100 minutes in direct sunlight to charge a GoPro camera on the go. Furthermore you can charge smart-watches or the Google Glass in even less than 1 hour as well as smartphones and thousands of USB-compatible devices.

The Action Case has a cavity for the GoPro camera made of polyurethane as well as 4 additional cavities for battery packs and other camera accessories. It is suitable for all kind of action cams and particularly GoPro cameras. With less than 300g  it is easy to carry and to store.


Press

Futurezone - "SunnyBAG has great technology and quality in every single detail. It's fun to charge your device by using solar energy outdoors!"

Gizmodo - "SunnyBAG solar bags are not only cool, but also really practical."

Flo Mausser, snowboard professional - "The  best GoPro case on the market, which covers the balance between functionality and power."

Tobias Demel, film producer  - "A useful gadget to use outdoors for my camera and a great experience to charge with sunlight."

Philip Slapar, mountain biker  - "The world's first GoPro Solar Case itself is a very cool idea...incredibly useful product for all Action Cam users."

Awards & Partners

Our Story

SunnyBAG was launched by Stefan Ponsold in Graz, Austria with the idea of creating solar bags for Doctors Without Borders with sophisticated design which had never been launched before. Since 2010 we develop and produce solar-bags and backpacks to charge smartphones, tablets and wearables on the go - all of which are environmentally friendly. In this field we're the #1 in Europe with +350 points of sale and great cooperation projects. In 2013 we funded the SunnyBAG Inc. based in Silicon Valley.

Project milestones:

What we need & what you get

Help us become the Action Case reality by donating for our campaign. With your support, we can bring the world's first GoPro Solar Case to sports and outdoor enthusiasts. Your contribution will help fund:
  • Large solar component order
  • Production process
  • International Distribution
  • Support of aid organizations
Every penny will be used to pay for making this world's first GoPro Solar Case into a reality. Without you, the production, product launch and the best solar powered adventure wouldn't be possible.
In return you can make your next adventure and GoPro experience even more exciting. Be the first to pre-order your Action Case for a special price, which will only be offered to indiedogo backers.  As we skip the middlemen, we are able to offer savings of more than 50%. Your order will be shipped directly from us to your home. With your order you are going to set the trend!
Order your SunnyBAG Action Case today and support us on indiegogo!

Other ways you can help

Please support us and join our community!

  • Visit our SunnyBAG website.
  • Signup to our email updates. 
  • Follow us on Facebook and YouTube.
  • Press & Bloggers - If you'd like to run a story, please find our material here.

story:
Deutsche | Español | Lingua Italiana | Pусский | にほんご  | Français

 

The new BV9600 Plus is different: it has a unique slim, elegant and fashionable design and its thickness had been reduced to only 10mm. It gets the famous tri-proof ruggness of BV phones in a modern, businesslike design.

   

                                          Waterproof

Dropproof

Dustproof​

Totally OK Being In Water, Dropped, Beaten and Bashed. For those with a demanding job or lifestyle with constant exposure to environmental hazards, a rugged smartphone with military-grade protection will be the best option.
 
 

 

      Working Temperature -30 ℃---60℃

The ones that work in the bleak and harsh environment will even need a fully rugged, durable and no-compromises phone, especially, active people who regularly practice different types of outdoor sports.

     

It's freezing out there. You won't need to take your gloves off to use this phone.

If you're sick of taking off your gloves while working, don't have to buy special conductive touch-screen gloves, though. We’ve been used AMOLED touch screen, which integrates the touch sensor into the display well enough to work with gloves. It offers sensitive touch mode that works with gloved hands.

The in-display fingerprint sensors work reasonably well with wet and greasy hands. That’s something you don’t get with capacitive fingerprint sensors.

A fingerprint sensor is both secure and fast, but sometimes you want other unlocking methods. Here's how you can set up and use face unlock to unlock your BV9600 Plus with just a glance.
 
The world of mobile payments has changed significantly over the past decade – and particularly over the past few years as smartphones. The number of in-store mobile payment users in the world is predicted to reach fast and much more.

 

                                      

Advanced GPS offers a valuable outdoor tool for hikers, travelers and other backcountry explorers. And gives you vital information about where you are, where you’ve been and where you want to go.

 

                             

Smartphone batteries are getting larger and larger, with the promise of phones that can go all day on a single charge. But grab a fully charged BV9600 plus,  and you won’t need to search for any electrical outlets during the day. The durable phone from Blackview is the longest-lasting phone we’ve tested currently, lasting more than 13 hours gaming on our punishing battery test.
 
 

       

6.21 inch notch AMOLED display much more clear and comfortable to watch video.With AMOLED, so the power consumption during the day is reduced by 20%, and the night time use is reduced by 41% and can also protect your eyes.

                                    

 

 

 

               

The 4G World Connectivity supports all the operators and networks, supports both Sim Cards( or 1 SIM Card & 1 TF Card) on the extremely fast 4G network(3G if you have not upgraded to 4G yet), TF card 128GB

Unlock more ways of connecting people while doing outdoor activities, no longer be a barrier to contact your workmate or business partners while travelling between different places and countries                                                         

 

For more infomation about this phone, you can visit Blackview official website.

 

                                              

                                                     

About Shipment: You could get the Pro version instead  of Plus much earlier. If you don't want to wait the BV9600 Plus, we can ship the BV9600 Pro to you.

BV9600 Pro (Side fingerprint scanner): Shipping started in Nov. 30.

BV9600 Plus (In-display fingerprint scanner): Shipping Started in Mar.,2019.

Blackview, as the leading rugged smartphone brand and growing fast due to its rugged outdoor smartphones, we won more than 100,000 fans and brand awareness driven worldwide owe to our BV rugged phones.

 

Share your friends and families about  this rugged Blackview smart phone, they may also like it and enjoy this campaign.

 

     Share With Friends and Families

story:
The Invention of the Rora Ergonomic Case

My name is Ruhan and I am a South-African who emigrated to Canada 3 years ago. One month after my arrival I was involved in a terrible car accident and incurred several back and shoulder injuries.  My daily job involved putting in many hours hunched over my tablet, exacerbating my back and shoulder pain. After many unsuccessful attempts to find a solution that raised my tablet into a more ergonomic position, I decided to take matters into my own hands. Thus came the idea of the Rora Ergonomic case.

Using a foam board and some old weathered pants, I got to work on my first Prototype and was shocked to see that it was some-what functional.

I knew that I was not the only one that could benefit from this product, so I assembled a team of young and talented entrepreneurs and engineers with a vision to make your workstation more flexible and comfortable. We hope you will contribute towards a better tomorrow by providing an elegant solution to an everyday problem. 

My Goal is to bring this solution to the masses and help each person to solve the same problem I had of elevating my tablet.  Conventionally, electronic device covers are used to protect the device, as well as raise the screen up to a viewable position on a set surface, but not elevate the device.  At Rora, we provide a solution to the problem by providing a simple and effective way to elevate the device off the surface (e.g. table) to a more ergonomically correct position.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We have a goal of $15,000.00 This will allow us to bring the product to market, and hopefully be able to help 1000's of people make their daily activities a little more comfortable. 
  • If you contribute now you secure your spot in line to receive one of the first set of Rora Ergonomic Cases. 

  • We are doing this, and no is not an option. If we do not reach our goal, we will still use the funds to send each person their Rora case as our goal is to help as many people as we can.

 

The Impact

 

Being able to help everyday people set up a comfortable work station in all situations.  

I have been using the prototype for 6 months and can confidently say that it meets all the requirements I was searching for; a workstation that is comfortable, compact, easy to collapse and portable. 

Risks & Challenges

Shipping packages especially in a Pandemic has a variety of challenges. We have worked hard to ensure that our products are delivered promptly, and will always communicate any issues or delays as they arise.  Should you have any queries, please do not hesitate to contact us at Rora and we will do our best to resolve them in a timely fashion.

To solve this concern we have worked hard with numerous 3PL companies to help us deal with all demands
