story:
We Have a Winner and in our Referral Contest and Will be Announcing the winner soon!

*****

* WIN A FREE IF CONVERTIBLE CONTEST *

*JOIN OUR REFERRAL CONTEST*

Join our contest and win a free if convertible! The person with the most referrals of our indiegogo campaign, will win a *free Prime/Personality package if convertible in their choice of colors. You will also get an extra set of CLIQ covers in your choice of color, as well as a complimentary carrying case and a t-shirt. 

To participate, make sure you share the link only after you are logged into your indiegogo profile. This way, when you share the campaign with the share tools below our video, whoever clicks on your shared link, will register the share to you. The more clicks you get, the more you increase your chances of winning.

Those that have contributed already can still participate of course. Good luck and thanks for the help!!!

_____________________________________________________

Articles about us:

If Convertible: A smartphone, tablet and ultrabook in one

The If Convertible: 3 Devices, 1 Data Plan


At idealfuture, we realized that in 2014, we should have flying cars, jet packs and robots making our breakfast. Instead, we are all still running around with our cell phones in our pockets. Our laptops and tablets are only mere variations of devices that were created decades ago. Convenience these days is becoming more and more inconvenient.

We thought, “What if we could have one device that would make all the others obsolete?” Think about it… what if you could operate all of your devices on the same data plan? What if all you needed was ONE ultimate and integrated device to simplify your life? What if there was one device that could create a more productive work-space by incorporating cutting-edge hardware and software to work, play and communicate?

Together we can bring this vision to reality! We have a revised goal of $10,000 and every dollar counts! Contributions will allow us to start the process of bringing the if convertible to the world! All of our contributors will be included in the idealfuture family; we have everything from T-shirts to the limited edition Founding Series of the if convertible itself.

 - if convertible series comparison chart -

"We believe that through the power of the Indiegogo crowd funding community and the power of innovation, we will revolutionize mobile computing as we know it. At this time we've only scratched the surface of how people will soon be using this device to work, play, and communicate."                                         

                                                                                        -- Jeff Batio Founder


  (see below for more information and images of the packages and their contents)

Introducing the if convertible, the world’s first super phone, hyper-tablet & dual-display laptop that is equal parts art, science and dream...all beautifully crafted to become the future of mobile computing!




 

       (if convertible color palette - this is the Tablet-Phone only) 

The interchangeable CLIQ™ covers are magnetically attached and not only protect your if, but also enhances and personalizes the if's style to meet yours.       

We are ready to provide everyone with an ideal convergent mobile future…if convertible gives you what you need when you need it!





With its sleek, sophisticated, light, and compact design you will not have to worry about lugging around a heavy bag.  Aside from being the only device you will ever need to buy again, the if convertible can run off  ONE data plan. No more multiple data contacts! Now you only need to buy one set of apps! We can  provide everyone with a convergent mobile future.

                                     

When attached to the base, the right screen can be rotated and the device folded closed, converting into tablet mode. As a tablet it can be used flat or angled; ideal for game play or movie watching with no worry of tired hands or the extra expense of a stand.



Dual Displays: The if features dual displays which can increase productivity by as much as 40-60%. No more having someone hover over your shoulder to see what is on your screen. With the if convertible's rotating right screen people can now see what you see. The right screen of the if convertible also detaches to become your android smartphone.


The if convertible is so versatile that it runs both android and Windows 8. When the Slingshot is detached it will run the latest android software. 

The laptop base will run off the newest version of windows. This means you will be able to run your favorite android apps while also having access to all your favorite Windows programs.

                         


  • Dual Displays for Double the Screen Real Estate: two 7” ISP 1920 x 1080P = over 12” of usable work-space!
  • Double the Resolution: when combined, the if convertible provides over 12 amazing inches of beautiful sapphire crystal protected display area.
  • Dual Batteries: the if convertible will have a 3,000 milliamp battery in the Slingshot and a large capacity system battery in the base to keep you unplugged while running longer and faster than anything else around.
  • Dual LTE Antennas: travel and communicate worldwide all with one device.
  • Dual Operating Systems: run all your favorite Android apps alongside the flexibility and power of Windows 8 software. 
  • Double the Storage: never run out of room again with up to 128 GB in the Slingshot™ as well as 128GB in the base. We have also included an extra pair of SD card slots in each for an additional 128GB!
  • Double the Processing Power: the Slingshot™ features the fastest multi-core processor in a handheld device and the base will run a multicore x86 processor. 
  • Double the Camera Power:the Slingshot ™ will have a front facing camera for video chats and docked 'selfies' and an amazing 41 megapixel camera*, with a Carl Zeiss lens and Xenon flash on the back for superior photographs! 
  • TWICE the RAM: the if convertible features 4GB in the Slingshot and an additional 4GB in the laptop base.
  • Run your life from a SINGLE Data Plan: now you don’t need multiple contracts, headaches and costs for your smartphone and tablets, just ONE device and ONE plan!


The if convertible Founders Series Packages Details:


Alpha™ Series - $799
The Alpha is the segue into the world of the if convertible. The Alpha provides the ultimate in mobile computing flexibility at an entry level price. It is all that the if convertible offers, with just a few minor spec tweaks. The Alpha features: Solid screen back housings, and a 13 megapixel camera. 64GB in the Slingshot™  phone module and a single LTE antenna! The Bluetooth headset is an option on the Alpha.  Like all Indiegogo if convertibles, the Alpha comes with a Founder Series engraving that identifies you as a crowd funding innovator.

Prime™ Series - $999
The Prime Series is the intro into the colorful world of if computing. You get all of the performance that the if offers, with a choice of colors. The Prime series comes with a matching set of CLIQ™ covers (1 pair) that are color coordinated to your choice of frame colors.

Edge™ Series - $1,199 
EDGE SERIES: The Edge Series is like having a race car in your pocket. With its glowing edge and if logos on the if CLIQ's, you will really stand apart from the crowd! The Edge's are available in black finish frames with your choice of 2 sets of CLIQ's in any color scheme you want. This also comes with a black custom carrying case to complete the experience. 


Executive™ Series - $1,299
EXECUTIVE SERIES: The Executive Series fits the role perfectly for the corporate world. The color scheme is suited for coffee shops or boardrooms and executive offices worldwide. It comes in your choice of frame colors of either black or mocha and you can choose either matching leather CLIQ covers or dark simulated burlwood. The Executive package also includes a handsome black or brown carrying case / sleeve to transport your if from meeting to meeting. 

Enterprise Package -$65,000
ENTERPRISE PACKAGE and OTHER PERK LEVELS: these packages are iterations of the various if convertibles in packages that suit the needs of the business partnership community. Our potential business partners will have the opportunity get involved in our special developers package that will get your app pre-loaded to the if convertible or to become distributors.

      

                                             

                         travel small but work and play big!

functional & beautiful

mobile & powerful

lightweight & full-featured 

work, play and communicate with ease   

         

  • Proudly assembled of high-end materials such as aircraft-grade aluminum and carbon fiber composite in USA!
  • Exclusive guaranteed lowest price for Indiegogo contributors. Contributors, will save over $200 off the upcoming retail price.
  • 100% preferred delivery guarantee - meaning we promise to ship our device to our backers first.*

  • The if convertible will work with your preferred providers whether on LTE or GSM networks, including Verizon and Sprint.
  • ONE data plan for your phone, table, laptop.
  • Specifications will be finalized throughout the engineering refinement process, in order to guarantee that our hardware reflects cutting-edge and industry-leading design worthy of the if convertible.
       * Domestic and international shipping rates apply.
             

(Edge Series - if convertible)


Risks and Challenges: At idealfuture we have years of experience in hardware design, development and sourcing. This revolutionary new platform will require some flexibility in the exact component list and rest assured we will choose the best parts and at the same time keep our price competitive. If for any reason we are forced to change a major feature, we will replace it with something just as cutting edge.


      UBUNTU VERSION IS NOW AVAILABLE IN THE PERK SECTION 

                  (*Rendering of Ubuntu Version -  available for $649.00)

This game changing new platform has been in development for years, including research, engineering, prototypes, patents and design in order to bring the if to the world.


Rest assured we will keep you informed every step of the way through the manufacturing process.

             (*Rendering of Ubuntu Version -  available for $649.00)


Quotes:


"Not only does screen space impact a users’ productivity, screen space effects the amount of satisfaction obtained from the work”            (NEC)

 

 “A study conducted by the University of Utah and NEC found … 20% reduction in errors (plus reduced stress) for test workers that were using multiple monitors”                                                 (Jon Peddie Research)


“while I am editing this article on my main screen, the screen beside it shows the   outline or earlier draft I am working from — and, sometimes, Web sites or other   documents I keep referring to."            (Ivan Berger)


“Productivity increases an average of 42% when using multiple displays”                                                                                  (Jon Peddie Research)

           A:It’s easier than you think! The left screen will always be attached to the                laptop. The right screen or if slingshot rotates or detaches to be your tablet              or phone. 


Q: Android and Windows...How? 
A:With the if convertible, you can have your cake and eat it too! When the Slingshot (tm) phone module is docked, you have the world's most advanced mobile multi-display device running Windows 8. But when you take the Slingshot (tm) and put it through its paces,  it is running the latest version of Android O/S, so you have all of your favorite apps with you at all times! 

Q: Where can the if be shipped?

A: We will ship all over the world! *


Q: Warranties and Guaranteed First Run Shipping?

A: We will provide a one year warranty for the if convertible!
* Domestic and international shipping rates will apply.

A: Also, we at idealfuture really look forward to the day we are shipping our revolutionary if to the whole world! But before anyone else gets theirs, our loyal indiegogo contributors will absolutely get their if's in their hands before anyone else. 100% guaranteed!


No matter who you are, no matter where you’re going, no matter what you want to do, the if convertible has what you need, when you need it! Think of it as the Swiss-Army knife of computing devices. With the if convertible you can now multi-task and manage all your data in one place. Forget working hard and playing hard, it’s time to work and play smarter. It’s time for the if convertible.

We Have a Winner and in our Referral Contest and Will be Announcing the winner soon!

*****
* WIN A FREE IF CONVERTIBLE CONTEST *
*JOIN OUR REFERRAL CONTEST*
Join our contest and win a free if convertible! The person with the most referrals of our indiegogo campaign, will win a *free Prime/Personality package if convertible in their choice of colors. You will also get an extra set of CLIQ covers in your choice of color, as well as a complimentary carrying case and a t-shirt. 
To participate, make sure you share the link only after you are logged into your indiegogo profile. This way, when you share the campaign with the share tools below our video, whoever clicks on your shared link, will register the share to you. The more clicks you get, the more you increase your chances of winning.
Those that have contributed already can still participate of course. Good luck and thanks for the help!!!

The If Convertible: 3 Devices, 1 Data Plan


At idealfuture, we realized that in 2014, we should have flying cars, jet packs and robots making our breakfast. Instead, we are all still running around with our cell phones in our pockets. Our laptops and tablets are only mere variations of devices that were created decades ago. Convenience these days is becoming more and more inconvenient.


We thought, “What if we could have one device that would make all the others obsolete?” Think about it… what if you could operate all of your devices on the same data plan? story:
Lightweight water resistant cell phone charger


Never be without power again. The power to fully charge your phone in the palm of your hand. To give you an idea of the capacity. Open up your phone's case and inspect the battery. The mAh should be printed on the battery. The Samsung Galaxy 3 uses a battery of 2100mAh. Which means you are able to charge your phone to full capacity.   These cells are fully rechargeable and not a one time use item. They are designed to be used on a daily basis or as an emergency backup . Fully charged, it loses 10% of it's charge every month. So even if it's left alone  you will still have enough power to fully charge your 2100mAh battery. Quality is our priority. I designed this charger with outdoor activity in mind.  It's water resistant and very durable to shock.  You can drop it or even throw it.  It's not going to break.  


How it works Charge it up from the supplied cable or any AC micro-usb plug. Then just put it in your pocket or in your car and forget about it. To Use: Turn the power switch on and plug into your phone, the same as you would your charger. Your phone will start to recharge automatically. Micro-USB is the standard charging connector for all phones apart from iPhone. so you can charge almost any Android, Samsung, LG, Sony, Motorola, Nokia or Blackberry phone. Adapters are available for the iphone 4 and iphone 5.


Funding Where we need you to come in is to help us raise funds to put the Charger into it's first production run and pay for all the certification like CE, RoHS,FCC and WEEE. Any electronic product, especially batteries need FCC and RoHS certification that run into the thousands. Our engineers have guaranteed us that it will pass the necessary inspections. We have set up some rewards for backers that help us bring the Charger to market. Thanks for watching

story:
The ring that you need to handle text messages efficiently without using screens.

Hear and Send Texts Through Your Finger

Hear your text messages through your fingertip and simply send a message through a pair of microphones inside ORII. 

 

WHY ORII?

Who doesn’t feel like they spend too much time looking at screens? Give your eyes a break by using ORII. Pairing the ring to your phone lets you send and listen to texts without taking your phone out and looking at the screen. Breaking free from your screen has never felt easier.

Put your phone away while on the go

Built with walkers and texters in mind, ORII’s there when you need to take care of that quick text or call. Just touch your ear to send that short text message or take a quick call.

 

Clear audio, even when it's noisy

Whether on the subway or in a coffee shop, the audio is crisp and clear. How? Sound gets delivered directly to your inner ear while your finger helps to block out background noise.

 

Live the secret agent's life

Sometimes duty calls. ORII lets you discreetly handle that urgent text message. Audio is sent to your ear by touch, so even in a quiet meeting, you are the only one who can hear the message.

 

Get the most out of your voice assistant

ORII makes your phone’s voice assistant more convenient than ever before by putting it at your fingertip. You’ll find many new ways that your voice assistant can make your daily tasks easier and faster to handle.

 

What can your voice assistant do for you today? Here are just a few commands you can use:

Messaging: “Send a text to Stephen.”

Make Calls: “Call mom at home.”

Manage Calendar: "Schedule a meeting with Kayleigh tomorrow at nine AM.”

Reminders: “Set a reminder for tomorrow.”

See a full list of Siri / Google Assistant commands

HOW ORII WORKS?

ORII receives audio from your smartphone via a Bluetooth connection. The ring transmits sound vibration through your finger to your fingertip so that when you press your ear, you can hear the voice audio. This technology poses no health risks and used in medical-grade hearing aid devices.

 

Thousands of people have tried ORII, and it works!

The first time people hear someone’s voice through their finger, it’s unlike anything they’ve tried before. If you’re wondering how it feels on your finger, the vibrations from the ring are gentle and you get used to them within the first day of using ORII.

Watch a 20 second video of people trying ORII for the first time:

 
 

What about Bluetooth headsets?

TESTING ORII'S SOUND QUALITY

The magic of bone conduction is that you can hear it loud and clear while others around you can’t hear anything. But many bone conduction products suffer from sound leakage, meaning that people nearby can hear what you can hear through your bone conduction device. This is often because they use large actuators at high power output, and there’s always a trade-off between how much power is used to create audio clarity and the amount of sound leakage generated.

ORII’s focus is on delivering crisp and clear human voice audio. By transmitting audio via the finger, we’ve: 

1) shortened the distance the audio needs to travel and increased audio quality 

2) used a smaller actuator at lower power to minimize sound leakage  

 

PRODUCT DESIGN

There were two main considerations for product design: firstly, how can we create smart ring that could offer as many ring sizes as possible without needing to re-layout the internal components for every size; secondly, how can we create an timeless, simple, and sophisticated smart ring design that isn’t “jewelry” nor is it too “techie”?

To create the final design for ORII, we turned to award winning Italian product designer Andrea Ponti. He has received many international prizes and awards, including first prize at the 2012 LG Mobile Design Competition for a smartphone for the visually impaired; two Red Dot Design Awards in 2015, both designed for Philips in collaboration with Gibson Innovations; two Good Design Awards awarded from Japan in 2016, and the 2017 IF Design Award for the Matrix Powerwatch, an eco-friendly smartwatch that runs exclusively on body heat.

 

BUILT FOR EVERYDAY LIFE

Designed to meet IPX7 water resistance testing

ORII is splash proof, so you can wash your hands, get caught in the rain, and get sweat on ring without any worries. We don’t recommend showering or swimming with the ring on.

 

Customize your ORII notifications

Choose your favourite apps and select your key contacts and assign them a colour. The LED light will let you know what kind of notification is coming through.

 

Hot colors to suit your style

ORII’s scratch-proof anodized aluminium finish is now available in four colors:   Stardust Silver, Space Grey, Armor Red and Dark Night!

 

Battery that lasts you a day

 A 50 mAh battery that translates to more than 20 short calls and over 200 text messages. Top it up with a compact charging clip.

Charging Dock & Case

We’ve also designed a charging dock that looks great on your desk but is also portable and sleek. Throw it in your bag so you can bring it with you wherever you’re. 

Got questions? Email us at team@origami-labs.com!

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION

RING SIZING 

Through dozens of different permutations, we came up with a solution that balances design, strength and simplicity to give you the best fit possible.

The interchangeable ring size solution will come with 10 different ring sizes.

ORII is made by Origami Labs, a small team in Hong Kong (with a big army of volunteers) that is passionate about making stylish and screen-free technology for us all. We’re called Origami Labs because the most elegant solutions are born out of simplicity, just like folding a plain piece of paper into a perfectly balanced crane.

 

TIMELINE

Shipping Started

We wasted no time in getting them prepared for shipping around the world.

Waiting to be picked up and flown around the world.

 

THE ORII STORY

We used a “design thinking” approach that focused ways to create screen-free, voice enabled technology. Starting with fundamental research and prototyping, ORII went through many iterations both in technology and in design.

 

LET'S MAKE IT HAPPEN!

Got questions? Email us at team@origami-labs.com!

Ways to Contact Us

                          

1. Send a direct message to us on Indiegogo.

2. For further support, contact team@origami-labs.com

3. Find us on Facebook / Twitter / Instagram

4. If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download the press kit here.
story_txt:
The ring that you need to handle text messages efficiently without using screens.

Hear and Send Texts Through Your Finger
Hear your text messages through your fingertip and simply send a message through a pair of microphones inside ORII. 
 
ORII IN THE NEWS

WHY ORII?
Who doesn’t feel like they spend too much time looking at screens? Give your eyes a break by using ORII. Pairing the ring to your phone lets you send and listen to texts without taking your phone out and looking at the screen. Breaking free from your screen has never felt easier.

Put your phone away while on the go
Built with walkers and texters in mind, ORII’s there when you need to take care of that quick text or call. Just touch your ear to send that short text message or take a quick call.
 

Clear audio, even when it's noisy
Whether on the subway or in a coffee shop, the audio is crisp and clear. How? Sound gets delivered directly to your inner ear while your finger helps to block out background noise.
 

Live the secret agent's life
Sometimes duty calls. ORII lets you discreetly handle that urgent text message. Audio is sent to your ear by touch, so even in a quiet meeting, you are the only one who can hear the message.
 

Get the most out of your voice assistant
ORII makes your phone’s voice assistant more convenient than ever before by putting it at your fingertip. You’ll find many new ways that your voice assistant can make your daily tasks easier and faster to handle.
 

What can your voice assistant do for you today? Here are just a few commands you can use:
Messaging: “Send a text to Stephen.”
Make Calls: “Call mom at home.”
Manage Calendar: "Schedule a meeting with Kayleigh tomorrow at nine AM.”
Reminders: “Set a reminder for tomorrow.”
See a full list of Siri / Google Assistant commands
 
HOW TO USE ORII?

 
HOW ORII WORKS?
ORII receives audio from your smartphone via a Bluetooth connection. The ring transmits sound vibration through your finger to your fingertip so that when you press your ear, you can hear the voice audio. This technology poses no health risks and used in medical-grade hearing aid devices. Thousands of people have tried ORII, and it works!
The first time people hear someone’s voice through their finger, it’s unlike anything they’ve tried before. If you’re wondering how it feels on your finger, the vibrations from the ring are gentle and you get used to them within the first day of using ORII.
Watch a 20 second video of people trying ORII for the first time:

 

 
What about Bluetooth headsets?

ORII is designed specifically for those short texts and phone calls sprinkled throughout your day while you’re on the go. The 1.5 hours of continuous listening time means you can handle many short text messages and calls throughout your day.
ORII doesn’t replace Bluetooth headsets; instead, it uses similar technology to meet a different need. Bluetooth headsets are good for power talkers or when you need to be truly hands-free. ORII is for those brief but frequent calls or texts that you like taking care of while you're on the move.
 
TESTING ORII'S SOUND QUALITY
The magic of bone conduction is that you can hear it loud and clear while others around you can’t hear anything. But many bone conduction products suffer from sound leakage, meaning that people nearby can hear what you can hear through your bone conduction device. This is often because they use large actuators at high power output, and there’s always a trade-off between how much power is used to create audio clarity and the amount of sound leakage generated.


ORII’s focus is on delivering crisp and clear human voice audio. By transmitting audio via the finger, we’ve: 

1) shortened the distance the audio needs to travel and increased audio quality 
2) used a smaller actuator at lower power to minimize sound leakage  
 
PRODUCT DESIGN
There were two main considerations for product design: firstly, how can we create smart ring that could offer as many ring sizes as possible without needing to re-layout the internal components for every size; secondly, how can we create an timeless, simple, and sophisticated smart ring design that isn’t “jewelry” nor is it too “techie”?

To create the final design for ORII, we turned to award winning Italian product designer Andrea Ponti. He has received many international prizes and awards, including first prize at the 2012 LG Mobile Design Competition for a smartphone for the visually impaired; two Red Dot Design Awards in 2015, both designed for Philips in collaboration with Gibson Innovations; two Good Design Awards awarded from Japan in 2016, and the 2017 IF Design Award for the Matrix Powerwatch, an eco-friendly smartwatch that runs exclusively on body heat.
 
BUILT FOR EVERYDAY LIFE

Designed to meet IPX7 water resistance testing
ORII is splash proof, so you can wash your hands, get caught in the rain, and get sweat on ring without any worries. We don’t recommend showering or swimming with the ring on.
 

Customize your ORII notifications
Choose your favourite apps and select your key contacts and assign them a colour. The LED light will let you know what kind of notification is coming through.

 
 

Hot colors to suit your style
ORII’s scratch-proof anodized aluminium finish is now available in four colors:   Stardust Silver, Space Grey, Armor Red and Dark Night!
 

Battery that lasts you a day  

 A 50 mAh battery that translates to more than 20 short calls and over 200 text messages. Top it up with a compact charging clip.

Charging Dock & Case
We’ve also designed a charging dock that looks great on your desk but is also portable and sleek. Throw it in your bag so you can bring it with you wherever you’re. 
Got questions? Email us at team@origami-labs.com!
 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION

RING SIZING 
Through dozens of different permutations, we came up with a solution that balances design, strength and simplicity to give you the best fit possible.
The interchangeable ring size solution will come with 10 different ring sizes. <div><iframe width="612" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/IWbKkA8aQXM?autoh...;
 
 ORII is made by Origami Labs, a small team in Hong Kong (with a big army of volunteers) that is passionate about making stylish and screen-free technology for us all. We’re called Origami Labs because the most elegant solutions are born out of simplicity, just like folding a plain piece of paper into a perfectly balanced crane. TIMELINEShipping StartedWe wasted no time in getting them prepared for shipping around the world.Waiting to be picked up and flown around the world. THE ORII STORYWe used a “design thinking” approach that focused ways to create screen-free, voice enabled technology. story:
The Float Shelf declutters desktops, freeing up valuable workspace.

  

 

 

The Float Shelf is the ultimate, and most fun, shelf for all iMacs and Cinema & Thunderbolt displays. 

 

Display collections of cherished keepsakes on your Float Shelf.

 

Showcase your personality. Get creative.

 

Apple fans and aficionados will appreciate the Float Shelf.

 

 

Keep items of inspiration close at hand with a Float Shelf.

 

The patented, bracketless design lets the shelf slide easily into position using just geometry and gravity.

 

 

Display personal items that might otherwise clutter your desktop.

 

Machined from a solid aluminum extrusion, a Float Shelf readily supports up to ten pounds (4.5 kg).

 

 

A Float Shelf can botanically beautify your workspace.

 

The Float Shelf's slim tapered-profile and anodized surface complement Apple's minimalist aesthetic.

 

Elevate personal items and computer peripherals off your desktop.

 

One more thing, less is more.

 

Other iMac shelves are one-third the size of a Float Shelf, are made of thin bent metal, have painted finishes, hold little more than a single hard drive, and because of the brackets, bolts, and shims they require, can be difficult to install.

The Float Shelf fits all iMacs and Apple displays, both Thunderbolt and Cinema.

Float Shelf dimensions: 

• SMALL Float Shelf for 17", 20" & 21.5" iMacs & 20" & 23" Cinema displays (6.5” x 18” / 16.5 cm x 45.7 cm)

• LARGE Float Shelf for 24" & 27" iMacs; 27" Thunderbolt displays; and 24", 27" & 30" Cinema displays (6.5” x 22” / 16.5 cm x 56 cm)

Steve King—Designer of the Float Shelf

Steve has had two successful crowdfunding campaigns (Hand Stylus and Remora) which were the most popular crowdfunded products of their kind. 

The Hand Stylus raised $313K from 7,500 backers and received rave reviews in the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, the Verge, WIRED, and many other tech publications.

 The REMORA Stylus & Pen holder raised $30K from 750 backers.

The Hand Stylus and Remora are available at prismdesigns.com

Risks and challenges

With thirty years of domestic and international manufacturing experience, and with two successful crowdfunding campaigns under our belt (Hand Stylus & Remora), we know what's required to take a product from concept to completion. 

Because we're committed to delivering the highest quality product possible, we give quality control a higher priority than delivery schedule. Thus, there's always a risk of a shipping delay caused by quality issues that take extra time to correct. 

That said, we've twice demonstrated we can deliver high quality products on time.

story:
STROM is the world’s only battery pack that snugly fits onto your Apple wall charger and powers your mobile life non-stop. 

Remembering to charge another device is a hassle - but with Strom this hassle is gone as it completely integrates into your daily 'charging routine'. In essence, its Charged by Design.




Simply plug STROM in between your Apple wall charger and the USB charging cable: its intelligent circuit priorities charging your phone before its own battery. 





Designed to automatically switch to a 2.1 Amp TurboCharge mode when used as battery pack on-the-go, STROM is specially optimized to charge new iPhones fast. 




Weighing only 2.8 ounces (79 grams), STROM was designed to be lightweight and pocket-friendly with its smooth rounded edges and soft-touch rubber finish.




With its ultra-powerful 3400mAh battery capacity, STROM packs a whole lot of extra battery life and can provide more than one full charge for most smartphones.




Snapping onto your Apple wall charger (US & EU model), STROM charges as you charge your iPhone, without needing any additional outlets, chargers or cables. 



Available in black, white, and a Swiss red, STROM was designed to be aesthetically pleasing and to stray from standard industry greys.




Its advanced shut-off circuitry means that once charged, it consumes no ‘Stand-by Power’, even when left plugged into the outlet.




STROM works with iPhone, Android, and any other USB-charged device so no matter what brand you hold dear, it'll be charged and ready to go.





1) Plug your Apple-certified charger into your AC outlet.

2) Attach STROM onto your Apple charger.

3) Plug your charging cable into STROM's USB port.

4) Plug the other end of the charging cable into your phone.

5) Press the 'ON' button on STROM.

6) Now your smartphone will charge first and then STROM will charge itself.

7) Unplug your charged STROM from the Apple charger to use as battery pack.









1. How do I choose which color of STROM I will receive?   

Once the Indiegogo campaign period ends, all of our supporters will receive a survey asking them to select which color of STROM they would like to receive. If you have pledged for multiple units, you will be able to select how much of each color you want. 

 2. Can I charge STROM without having my iPhone connected?

Yes! STROM’s intelligent charging technology detects when there is no iPhone connected, and will direct power to STROM’s internal battery instead.  You already leave your Apple wall charger plugged into the outlet, even when not charging your iPhone. Now leave STROM plugged into the outlet along with your Apple wall charger. The result: STROM stays 100% charged and always ready to go.

3. Will STROM consume power when left plugged into the outlet?

No! STROM is specially designed to be left plugged into the outlet when not in use, so that its always charged and ready. Its advanced, eco-friendly,  shut-off circuitry means that once charged, it consumes no ‘Stand-by Power’.

4. Will STROM speed-charge all iPhone models?

No. STROM is specifically optimized to meet the increased charging power demand of the new iPhone 6 models and speed-charge them safely, while confirming to Apple Charging Specifications for iDevices. The Apple iPhone 6 PLUS, for instance, can actually demand over double the power (2.0 Amp) supplied by the wall charger (1.0 Amp) included with it. The older iPhone models have a peak charging power demand that does not exceed 1.0 Amp and so STROM will charge them at the same speed as your regular Apple 1.0 Amp iPhone wall charger.

5. Will STROM speed-charge my iPhone, even when charging it using the Apple iPhone wall charger?

No. STROM is specifically designed to output a higher 2.1 Amp charging current when used as a standalone portable battery pack. When charging your iPhone along with STROM using an Apple iPhone wall charger, it gives the same output current as your Apple wall charger i.e. 1.0 Amp.

6. What is the Warranty?  

We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee you receive your STROM  free of manufacturing defects.

7. Can I change or cancel my perk? 

Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on Indiegogo are also non-refundable.

8. Is the Apple iPhone wall charger and the Apple charging cable included?

No. We only manufacture and ship the STROM iPhone Battery Pack. You must use your own Apple iPhone wall charger and regular charging cable. 

9. When was your product founded?

We started working on the product idea about 9 months ago.

10. When was the first prototype built?

In January 2015.

11. Where are you at the current stage of manufacturing?

We have already invested in the tooling and the first pilot lot of 100 units would be produced shortly. These will be used for further final testing and certification, before starting production after end of our Indiegogo Campaign.

story:
A Single Reward


Buy A Prototype Dominion Case Now...

If you live in the U.S.A., pledge $75 and I will send you a small Dominion Case that fits 1-3 Dominion games.  It is nothing fancy, but it will get the job done and allow you to easily bring your favorite Dominion cards over to a friends house!

International Shipping

Currently, I am not shipping internationally.

Local Pickup Option

If you live near the Twin Cities, you are welcome to come pick up the case locally.  If you do, I will refund you the shipping costs, which are included in the reward price.

Case Features

  • hard but lightweight plastic case with hinges and locks
  • removable and adjustable foam trays with slots for Dominion cards
  • small slots for 48 sets of Kingdom cards (10-12 cards per slot)
  • large slots for Randomizer, Treasure, and Victory cards (or game tokens)
  • works with sleeved or unsleeved cardsy

Works with Sleeved and Unsleeved Cards

I have tested these slots with... 
  • Mayday Sleeves (Premium and Regular)
  • Cataphract sleeves
  • Fantasy Flight sleeves.

The Prototypes Are the Basis for Future Cases

If you are a gamer on the go with just a few Dominion games, this is the case for you.  

Case Dimensions

  • Internal Length: 17in (43.1cm)
  • Internal Width: 13in (33cm)
  • Internal Height: 4.4in (11.2cm)
  • External Length: 18.5in (47cm)
  • External Width: 15.5in (39.4cm)
  • External Height: 4.75in (11.9cm)

  • Small slot dimensions: 2.5in x 0.5in (6.35cm x 1.27cm)
  • Large slot dimensions: 2.5in x 2.5in (6.35 x 6.35cm)

What Your Funds Will Be Used For

  • Furthering the development of the Dominion case
  • Pursuing licensing fees to become an "official" case-maker for Dominion
  • Continuing operation of the Website

story:
We created this campaign for those of you that missed the Kickstarter campaign.

See https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2016620887/mcthings-tiny-wireless-bluetooth-sensors-and-contr



mcThings are a collection of devices and software that can be used to measure and control anything and connect to the cloud. The main device is a measure and control board, called a mcModule, which is a tiny low-power device that communicates wirelessly to the cloud through a mcRouter. mcModules are designed to be very small, consume minimal power and therefore run for years on a coin cell.

Other devices in the mcThings product line:

  • A mcRouter is a WiFi bridge between the Internet and the mcModules so mcModules can communicate with the cloud. They provide integration with IFTTT, Facebook, Twitter, SMS, Email and other cloud services. WiFi setup for the mcRouter can be done on an IPhone, Android phone, PC or MAC and is fast and simple because the mcRouter uses TI's SimpleLink and SmartConfig technology. See http://www.ti.com/tool/smartconfig
    The mcRouter also has a USB-A host to plug in a USB drive for loggin and firmware updates,
  • The mcPlug is a power plug that can wirelessly control two power outlets with solid state switches. The maximum voltage of 250V AC and a maximum current of 16 Amp.


The McThings vision 

Our vision is that eventually every house, shop, garage, etc. will have a large number of low-cost, low-power easy to setup sensors and controllers that will improve efficiency, quality of life and minimize power consumption. A router will connect the sensors and controllers to the cloud for full integration with services like Facebook, Twitter, SMS Email, Google+, WeMo devices etc. The McThings infrastructure fulfills this vision with low-power and low-cost modules, full internet connectivity and no programming required.

Low Power 

The McModule uses a modern 32-bit low energy ARM processor which consumes 530nA in sleep. Together with the other components the whole McModule consumes less than 1 µA in sleep. A 230mAh battery can power the device 230,000 hours (26 years) in sleep mode, so the key is to let the device do as little as possible. An example is measuring the temperature every minute where the module wakes up every minute, measures the temperature and makes a connection to the McRouter and sends the temperature. Battery life would be 5 years or longer. Another example is sending a text when the cookie jar is opened. In this case it is maybe used once a day or week and battery life is even longer.

The McModule is Small, Really Really Small.

The McModule is 29 mm (1.1 inch) by 17 mm (0.7 inch) and including the battery it is only 4.6 mm (0.18 inch) thick.

No programming required

Programming is not required. A rule engine tells a McModule what to do and a wizard creates the rules. The wizard communicates over WiFi to the McRouter and they transfer the rules wirelessly to the McModules.

The McRouter stores the rules for all paired McModules locally in flash so after a power failure they are still available. 


Measuring and Sensors

Below is a list of sensors that can be used with the McModule. All measurements can be logged and used to control things. The McModule can measure voltage and resistance very accurately and can communicate with sensors that require UART, I2C or SPI communication. Below are some of the possibilities:

  • Time in all McModules. Can be used with other sensors to measure time like how long the door of the freezer, fridge is open, multiple stopwatches to measure gaming times like how long does it take to drink a glass of beer, etc. Just add a few buttons and it works.
  • Temperature sensor in all McModules or external sensor for temperatures above 200°F. Can be used in freezer, fridge, attic, inside the car, outside, different sides of the house, garage, shop, against the windows, in your dryer, are your pipes freezing, long term logging of any temperature, barbeque, etc.  
  • Acceleration in all McModules. Can detect door knock, something is moved or touched, activity tracking, single and double and directional tapping (user interface), freefall and motion detecting vibration of machines, track when the doggy/cat door is used, oven door is open.
  • Simple button sensors to indicate a certain state or a simple push button
  • Moisture sensor. Can detect moisture in plants or outside in soil or grass, basement flooding, leakage of equipment, etc.  
  • Rain sensor. Can detect rain and can be used in an advanced internet weather station.  
  • Magnetic switch. Can detect everything that moves including door opens, when windows are open or closed, etc.  
  • Biometric sensor like Methane, Carbon Monoxide, Pollen, Dust, LPG, Fingerprint scanner etc. These complex sensors operate like they normally do and the McModule makes them wireless.  
  • Touch sensor, like key-pad sensors, etc.
  • Light sensors for things like detecting day/night, if the cookie jar is open or closed, shadows, etc.  
  • Distance sensor and PIR (passive infrared sensor) to detect if somebody is in the room, etc.
  • Other sensors like Current and Voltage sensors, Force sensors, RFID readers, Infrared proximity sensors and Proximity sensors.

A mcModule reading a capacitive touch sensor

A mcModule in a motion sensor

Controlling

After measuring things you often want to control, indicate or log things. The McModule is ideally situated to do just that without using a programming language.

  • Indicate with the included Green and Red LED. The LED’s can be on, off, blink and the brightness can be controlled. Add more LED’s or other indicators. Combined with sensors they can indicate if there are any open outside doors, if there is movement in a room, if the gate is open, if the lights in a room are on, etc. One McModule can control 6 LED’s plus the internal LED’s. Other examples are the voltage of the car of boat battery by controlling the intensity. 
  • Alphanumeric displays to display messages and other information like temperature, voltage, etc. 
  • Send Text messages based on measurements and events to a cell phone. 
  • Send tweets based on measurements and events to a twitter account. 
  • Send Emails based on measurements and events. 
  • Switching appliances, light, etc. that are connected to the main power with the McPlug. 

Logging

The McRouter can log and distribute measured information to the cloud. This information is available in csv format that can be directly read by Excel or other spreadsheet programs.

Measurements can easily be imported into excel from a CSV file

Some things you can do with it. 

  • Measure and log the temperature of any location in your house, your fridge, your car while it is at home, outside not too far from the house, in the attic, etc. 
  • Log temperature over years, compare the temperature with different wind conditions, find cold spots, calibrate your heating system and save energy.
  • Check the temperature of the hot-tub without going outside
  • Send a tweet, text or email when your freezer/fridge gets too warm, the hot-tub too cold, etc. 
  • Put one in the ice bath of a keg to make sure your beer is always cold
  • Use it as a dog activity tracker
  • Remote control anything that has a plug
  • Connect it to you garden furniture and switch lights on when somebody tries to move it.
  • Use it as a remote for all your lights
  • Switch your lights on and off so it looks that somebody is at home.
  • Measure the vibration when somebody walks up the stairs and switch lights on.
  • Log when doors are opened and closed, change the behavior of your kids and save energy.
  • Buy some low-cost motions sensors and door-sensors and build your own low-cost security system that sends you a text when somebody gets in the house so you can call the police and save hundreds on monitoring
  • Log the sun-rise and sunset time.
  • Measure when you plants, inside or out-side need water.
  • Get a text when someone knocks on the door. 
  • Detect when doors, windows or drawers are open/closed
  • Measure and log the moisture in your plants/flower beds/grass 
  • Log information from a full weather station like wind speed/direction, rain, and humidity
  • Get a tweet or text when someone who shouldn't open your cookie jar does it anyway
  • Turn on lights and a siren when a drawer with valuables is opened
  • Control your lights by just tapping the McPlug or any other location 
  • Measure your car battery voltage and send a message if it gets low.
  • Anything you can come up with.  

How it all started

For one of our projects we needed 40 temperature sensors and if the temperature did not match the required values it should send an Email to the company so they could send someone. All sensors needed to be wireless so the installation cost would be minimal. We used some WiFi boards but the problem was the power. Batteries needed to be changed every week which was not acceptable. Low-power wireless boards exist but they connect to phones, cannot work together and do not connect to the internet. 

That was the moment when we realized that the market needs low-cost low-power (coin-cell) measurement modules that can work together and connect to the internet and cloud services. To make the product more versatile the measurement module must accept a wide range of sensors and controlling the module must be wireless, over the web and simple which means that programming is not an option. To make a complete product we also needed a control module that can switch things on or off, indicate state etc. We combined the measurement and control aspects and built the McModule where the "M" stands for Measurement and the "c" for control. 

We started with some development boards and wrote most of the software to see if we could get the power down. Then we built the McRouter. To switch power we developed the McPlug.

Planning

We have tested all the hardware and we need to change some minor things and do another board-spin. Based on this we expect that the final hardware design will be ready the end of July. Then we can start ordering the components in August. Some of the components have a 12 week lead time so we expect that the production starts in October and will be ready for shipment in November. 

In the mean time we have to complete the software. The state of the software is as follows:

  • McModule is 60% done. We have to add more functionality to the rule engine. Expected effort 6 weeks.
  • McRouter (wireless part) is 80% done. Expected effort 2 weeks.
  • McRouter (routing part) is 60% done. Expected effort 4 weeks.
  • Maintenance program including the Wizard is 80% done. This program contains the rule engine interpreter and the maintenance UI. Expected effort 4 weeks.
  • Integration with IFTTT. Expected effort 4 weeks
  • Wireless Bootloader for the McModule. Expected effort 3 weeks.
  • McPlug is a McModule with extra hardware. Expected effort 3 weeks.

This is about 26 weeks. We expect that we have one full time person working on the software and one person part-time (33%). This would give us a December delivery date.

Pledges

Don't forget that the rewards amounts are in Canadian dollars, which is about 8% lower than the US dollar.


Technical Specifications

mcModule

  • Low Power 32-bit ARM Cortex processor  
  • 2.4GHz multi-protocol radio
  • 128-bit AES encryption co-processor
  • Green and Red LED and a button
  • Temperature sensor
  • Accelerometer with hardware support for tab and double tab
  • 6 Analog/Digital channels that can operate as digital input, digital input with pull-up, digital output, Pulse Width Modulation and analog input I²C bus, SPI bus and UART
  • Two high input impedance measurement channels  
  • 2.4-3.6 Volt supply  
  • Battery clip for coin cell

mcRouter


  • Powerful PIC32MX (100Mhz) processor
  • 128-bit AES encryption co-processor
  • Wi-Fi (CC3000) working on a version with CC3100
  • USB host for logging and firmware updates
  • 2.4GHz Bluetooth LE 4.1 radio
  • Raspberry Pi compatible GPIO

mcPlug


  • Low Power 32-bit ARM Cortex processor
  • 2.4GHz multi-protocol radio
  • 128-bit AES encryption co-processor
  • Green and Red LED
  • Temperature sensor
  • Accelerometer
  • Two solid state switches/dimmers 250V / 16A
  • Enclosure


The Engineering Team

Hardware

Tom

Tom went to the University of Calgary to study Engineering and started to really delve into design for manufacturing. Now he does freelance hardware design and has done work in the medical and Oil+gas sectors. He has experience in RF, miniaturizing designs and how to design within constraints of a manufacturing process.

Firmware/Software

John

John is an Electrical Engineer with extensive experience in software and firmware architecture, design, development and delivery. He was the lead architect of Q-Kernel™ by QuasarSoft Ltd., and is currently product manager of Q-Kernel™.John also worked as a consultant for a medical device company and for oil and gas related companies. He has extensive experience with abstracting the complexities of hardware, the design of modular systems and device drivers.

We created this campaign for those of you that missed the Kickstarter campaign.
See https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2016620887/mcthings-tiny-wireless-bluetooth-sensors-and-contr



mcThings
are a collection of devices and software that can be used to measure and
 control anything and
connect to the cloud. The main device is a measure and control board, 
called a mcModule, which
is a tiny low-power device that communicates wirelessly to the cloud 
through a mcRouter. mcModules are designed to be very small, consume
minimal power and therefore run for years on a coin cell.
Other devices in the mcThings product line:

A mcRouter is a WiFi bridge between the Internet and the mcModules so mcModules can communicate with the cloud. They provide 
integration with IFTTT, Facebook, Twitter, SMS, Email and other cloud 
services. WiFi setup for the mcRouter can be done on an IPhone, Android 
phone, PC or MAC and is fast and simple because the mcRouter uses TI's 
SimpleLink and SmartConfig technology. See http://www.ti.com/tool/smartconfigThe mcRouter also has a USB-A host to plug in a USB drive for loggin and firmware updates,


The mcPlug is a power plug that can wirelessly control two power outlets with solid
state switches. The maximum voltage of 250V AC and a maximum current of 16 Amp.


   
The McThings vision 

Our vision is that eventually every house, shop, garage, etc. 
will have a large number of low-cost, low-power easy to setup sensors 
and controllers that will improve efficiency, quality of life and 
minimize power consumption. A router will connect the sensors and 
controllers to the cloud for full integration with services like 
Facebook, Twitter, SMS Email, Google+, WeMo devices etc. The McThings 
infrastructure fulfills this vision with low-power and low-cost modules,
 full internet connectivity and no programming required.
Low Power 
The
 McModule uses a modern 32-bit low energy ARM processor which consumes 
530nA in sleep. Together with the other components the whole McModule 
consumes less than 1 µA in sleep. A 230mAh battery can power the device 
230,000 hours (26 years) in sleep mode, so the key is to let the device 
do as little as possible. An example is measuring the temperature every 
minute where the module wakes up every minute, measures the temperature 
and makes a connection to the McRouter and sends the temperature. 
Battery life would be 5 years or longer. Another example is sending a 
text when the cookie jar is opened. In this case it is maybe used once a
 day or week and battery life is even longer.
The McModule is Small, Really Really Small.

The McModule is 29 mm (1.1 inch)  by 17 mm (0.7 inch) and including the battery it is only 4.6 mm (0.18 inch) thick.



No programming required

Programming is not required. A rule engine tells a McModule what
 to do and a wizard creates the rules. The wizard communicates over WiFi
 to the McRouter and they transfer the rules wirelessly to the 
McModules.
The McRouter stores the rules for all paired McModules locally in flash so after a power failure they are still available.  Measuring and Sensors

normally do and the McModule makes them wireless.

 Light sensors for things like detecting day/night, if the cookie jar is open or closed, shadows, etc.

Other sensors like Current and Voltage sensors, Force sensors, RFID readers, Infrared proximity sensors and Proximity sensors.

story:
YOUR VIRTUAL DOORMAN FOR ONLY $2/month!

 

Finally! The end of antiquated buzzer systems... Buzzinga!

  • Buzzinga Multi-Buzz
    • Alert all roomies/family members when someone is at your front entrance
    • Fancy menu for guests to pick which roomie to buzz
  • Auto-Magical Entry
    • Keyless entry to your building!  Just buzz your APT, enter your custom PIN and you're in!
    • Having guests over? Set a time block to automatically let them in!
    • Set up custom PIN for visitors to enter even if you're away
  • Family Friendly
    • Set times of the day your kids can buzz guests in
    • Handy dashboard to view guest vists
    • Everyone knows who's coming over - notifications go to everyone who wants them
  • Guest Greetings
    • Record your own greeting for your guest that plays when they buzz you
    • Browse a wide range of novelty greetings available a la carte

WHO ARE WE?

Buzzinga App is a high energy start-up built at the Winnipeg Start Up Weekend in November 2012. We're going heads up against 200+ other startups in a global startup battle. Yes, between the igloos Winnipeg actually has room for apartment buildings!

BUT WAIT...  THERE'S MORE!

Any door, anywhere.  That's where we're going.  You should live life 'Free of Keys', and we're here to build that dream for you.

Using us in conjunction with something like Lockitron (Lockitron guys: call us anytime) allows you to leave the keys at home - no more fumbling when your hands are full, no more waiting for someone else to let you in if you lock yourself out.

WHAT IF I LIVE IN AN IGLOO?

If you don't live in an apartment but still want to support Buzzinga, we will gladly allow you to gift your subscription to someone else. If you are unable to contribute cash you can still help by speading the Buzzinga vision and making people aware of the service. Share our story with your friends, family and co-workers via social media. #BuzzingaApp  @BuzzingaApp   http://www.buzzinga.co

story:
What The Future Holds 

FinalOrder has been introduced as a guild, first of its name, in Nov 2011.. A good community in a stable environment. Now you can help us onto the next stage. 
We will be upgrading to our own guild management system with:
  • Member and event management (with real-time push notifications)
  • A reward system
  • Plans on a monetizing system
What you guys can help with: 
  • Donate just $1 or more.
  • Show others that may be interested in donating.
  • Asking what you can help with except from donating financially.

Remember, we will moving to other games. As we move, we can check out the game and who's playing it in our guild. Showing status of the current guild in that game and share the benefits that are included while playing together.
A preview presentation: http://www.emaze.com/@ACOTLFOR/finalorder-global


What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We just need a starting amount of $500 to get things started. Yes, a few weeks after we get this amount, we can use the website!
  • Donating will give you exclusive perks from the guild. Like branded goods: T-shirts, school accessories, etc. (might take some time to make/order these) Along with on-site ranks/titles, FO points, badges and a special announcement/area on the site marking you as Honorary Contributor.
Your donation will be used for the following:
  • Web Hosting: $100/3yrs
  • Website Theme: $129/yr
  • Full Membership Platform: $200/yr
  • Excess $ will be used for added functionality or some branded goods.

Risks & Challenges

I do plan on funding this project myself; but I'd like it to be a community project so we can all share and feel apart of it.

  • If we do not meet the targeted amount, I'll fill in the rest and still update everyone on progress.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Get the word out and ask someone that could donate to our site development.
  • You can use the share links provided as well.
At the end of this, we will reach the point where we can do almost anything a guild is suppose to do. Guild conventions? :D
Thanks for viewing!

story:
Only ¼” thick and about the size of a credit card, the Jumper Card can charge your phone and other digital devices from any USB port or its own battery.

This little powerhouse packs lots of great features including an sd slot to store up to 128 GB of data.  Carry your resume, website, product info, company details, photos, videos, files and other important data with you.

The Jumper Card battery holds about an hour of power, so when your phone begins to fade, you can get a 'juice-boost' to continue making calls, transferring data, grabbing files, downloading videos & listening to music.

It charges and syncs your phone at the same time, and the fold-out cables let you transfer files and power up your other devices.

The Jumper Card even includes a bright little LED flashlight for low light situations, and a status indicator that lets you know when your Card is finished charging.

                          

Data Storage:   Don't want to store your proprietary information on your phone or on the Cloud?  No problem - load up your private data on your Jumper Card!  You  can carry your valuable data with you on your JumperCard's SD card and free up your phone's memory.

Business Info:   Want to give prospects, clients and associates the perfect gift?   Give them a Jumper Card loaded with  your business information, product pics, videos and contact info.      They'll think of you every time they charge their phone.

 Several Comments from the Pros:

Developed for iPhone, iPad and Android users alike, the Jumper Card works with all popular  devices – phones, cameras, tablets, portable hard drives, and anything else a USB cable works with, even your car’s cigarette lighter with an adapter like the green one shown here.

 

Check Out  All These Great Features:

Living with short battery life and always worrying about lack of power has been a constant hassle - until now.  Quick and easy, the Jumper Card solves that problem with the features,  power and connections you need to keep on the go !

Here are 2 independent video reviews:

IGadgetGeek: 2:55

  Eli the Computer Guy:  3:39

                  ______________________________________
 
 Jumper Card Development
 

    We've been working with our design engineers for over a year to make the Jumper Card  the greatest little smartphone accessary available anywhere. Our goal is to make this device not just a phone charger, but an indispensable part of everyday life with its handy size, assorted functions, and universal adaptability. Our pending design patent and exclusive agreement with our manufacturer means you'll you'll be getting one of the most innovative little chargers available !

                                  _______________________________________________________

Q & A

>  How big is the battery?   500 mAh.  It's an extra power source.
>  How long to charge from fully discharged?  About 2 hours.
>  How much talk time does it add to your phone?  About 60 minutes.
>  How long will the charge last?  A minimum of one year.
>  How many times can it be recharged?  The engineers tell us 500 times.
>  Is it patented?  Yes, we have a design patent, utility patent follows.
>  Is the USB port strong enough to hold my phone?  Yes it is.
>  Can I buy a Jumper Card?  It's primarily for our campaign backers.
>  Are overseas contributions ok?  Yes, please add $10 shipping.
>  What is the actual size?  3.54" x 2.24" x 0.25"
>  Does it work with Android?  Yes, and most other digital devices.
>  Is it guaranteed?  Of course - any problem we'll replace it right away
>  Would you consider a reseller?  Yes, we'll consider a solid reseller.
>  How do I pay?  Select a perk on the right side of the page. 

                            _______________________________________

Perks:  We've got some great rewards to thank you for helping us develop the fabulous new Jumper Card.  Select a pledge level on the right - we'll be sending out our Jumper Cards and other rewards asap!

               

Jumper Card     Solar Charger     SD card         Car Charger     Clip Cable                                           
      *   Jumper Card:  Here's the Swiss Army Knife for phone chargers because of all the features and its small size. About the size of a credit card, the Jumper Card includes multiple charging connectors, synchronous data transfer, SD card data-storage and its own rechargeable battery.

      *  Solar Charger:   This little Solar Charger delivers!  At only 5.5 x 3.3 x 0.5, it's small, but provides 5,000 mAh for lots of power.  Charge it with the sun and use it to charge your phone and other devices.

      *  SD Card:  Removable flash memory cards to store information, files, pics, videos, resume, website etc.  Slide it in the little slot behind the Jumper Card's USB connector and always have your data with you.

     *  Car Charger:  This little device can come in handy when you need to power up your phone & other devices and your  car's cigarette lighter.  Plug it into your car's lighter port, plug in the Jumper Card's USB connector and power up your phone

     *   Clip Cable Dual Charger:  At 3.5" it's the worlds smallest and most convenient charging cable.  It's called the 'Dual Charger' because it works for both Lightning and Micro USB.  It transfers power and data as fast as your computer or battery pack, and its magnetic clasp keeps it folded an firmly in place when not in use.

                                   _______________________________________

Our Benefactor's Package:   Our Benefactor’s Package includes all our perks plus a fabulous weekend at a posh Beverly Hills hotel, a beautiful rental Ferrari, tickets to the latest show in Los Angeles and a special Sunday brunch at a gorgeous waterfront restaurant in Marina Del Rey. We appreciate your belief in our campaign and interest in joining us to develop the best little  charging accessory in the world!

                                    ________________________________________

Testing and Delivery:   We have nearly completed the refinements and testing of this fabulous little game-changer, and with your support will make sure that production is on track and ready to go.  Your pledge brings us a step closer to producing and delivering the great little Jumper Card.

Where the Funding Goes:

  Development           Marketing     Fees            Production                 Shipping

   SOS Africa:  We support a charity in South Africa called SOSAfrica
( www.sosafrica.com ) which funds, cares for and provides education for the poorest children of South Africa.  Charging their phones is a constant problem, so we are donating solar-powered phone chargers to help this wonderful cause.  Your participation will help to make it happen!

                                          _______________________________________

Meet the Team:

                 Earl Brown -  Project Leader with Rocky the Wonder Dog

                Kyle Gosselin -  Marketing Pro and chief advisor

                Steve Bonser - Digital Dynamo and all around good guy

                Steven Zhou  -  Project Coordinator and Organizer

               Assorted Engineers, Specialists. Advisors, etc.

 

 Risks and Challenges:  

Development of the Jumper Card is smooth and on schedule. Only a completely unpredictable event such as the shortage of some key material could delay our production, and then only temporarily. This is one of the best-planned projects ever, and we are both confident of, and committed to, delivering a quality product.

Many crowdfunding projects promise embellishments, refinements and features that never materialize, but we have taken the Jumper Card through pre-production, beta review and comprehensive testing, and have every confidence in our ability to deliver the Jumper Card to our backers on time and on target.

Select a Pledge Level on the right and join us in developing the fabulous new Jumper Card !

Only ¼” thick and about the size of a credit card, the Jumper Card can charge your phone and other digital devices from any USB port or its own battery.
This little powerhouse packs lots of great features including an sd slot to store up to 128 GB of data.  Carry your resume, website, product info, company details, photos, videos, files and other important data with you.
The Jumper Card battery holds about an hour of power, so when your phone begins to fade, you can get a 'juice-boost' to continue making calls, transferring data, grabbing files, downloading videos & listening to music.
It charges and syncs your phone at the same time, and the fold-out cables let you transfer files and power up your other devices.

story:
My name is Ken Wilson, I'm an entrepreneur with passion to create and develop products using my 20 year history of making sunglasses.  I like to create products but money has always limited my ability. I am happy when I design something and see someone in the public using what was once an idea.  I have never made a lot of money but have made a lot of  people happy using what I designed.  See my website www.Liquidpolarized.com and read the comments at the bottom of the product pages. Feel free to google my name under Entrepreneur Magazine Gatorz Ken Wilson.  I have a proven track record with a long history.

I am coming to you with my idea to help me get Wick it Clean off the ground.  I see the need for people to have something to clean their cell phones, Ipads, sunglasses and more.  I have worked very hard to create a product from scratch that will clean anything with an optical surface.  The only thing on the market is a squirt bottle and towel that competes with the Wick.  

This project means a lot to me and I have put a lot of time into this product to make sure it is successful.  I believe you will see lots of companies making something similar to this once it hits the public.  I need money to pay for the production and marketing to get Wick it to consumer.

Some of you may have seen other commercial products I have made called Gatorz.com sunglasses or Liquidsunglasses.com  I started both of those companies from as little as $75.00 start up funds.  I have vision and I make it happen and those two companies have sold millions of dollars of sunglasses made here in the USA.  I am using my same formula to make Wick it, but I need your help to get it off the ground faster.

I am asking for a small safe amount of money that will pay for Wick its production cost of only $5,000  I am offering the wick it for pledges for $19.95 and other pledges for volume.  If your not a contributor please do me a favor by helping spread the word.  When doing so use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks for your support and for being part of the early success.
